trans: 正统的；传统的；惯常的；东正教的

sentences.chinese: …红木桌椅。

sentences.chinese: 他住在德克萨斯州的一个养牛的大牧场里。

detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

detailed_translations.chinese: 反对， 公然反抗； 向…挑战； 对…质疑

sentences.chinese: 一张波斯小地毯铺在了那硬木地板上。

危机的；用于处理危机的

sentences.chinese: 该国目前正面临一场经济危机。

sentences.chinese: 首相处理危机的方式遭到了批评。

sentences.chinese: 我如释重负，我们又避免了一场财政危机。

sentences.chinese: 石油公司因在20世纪70年代的石油危机中赚取了丰厚利润而受到严厉抨击。

sentences.chinese: 汽车工业现在正处于危机之中。

sentences.chinese: 今天我们聚集于此，是为了颁布新的命令，让它在每座城市、每个国家的首都、每座权力的殿堂回响。

sentences.chinese: 保罗非常体贴人。

sentences.chinese: 篝火看上去温暖诱人。

sentences.chinese: 又该修剪草坪了。

sentences.chinese: 没有对船的前部造成直接损坏。

sentences.chinese: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

sentences.chinese: 亨利的部队满载战利品而归。

trans: 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的

sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: a desolate landscape

a place that is desolate is empty and looks sad because there are no people there
someone who is desolate feels very sad and lonely

sentences.chinese: 这是我在嘉年华得的免费赠品。

trans: 同意；（意见等的）一致；赞成

sentences.chinese: 主席是大家一致推选出来的。

sentences.chinese: 她父亲勉强答应了这桩婚事。

sentences.chinese: 犹豫了一会儿之后，他们中有一个人开口了。

detailed_translations.english: when someone hesitates

sentences.english: You might find them in a more receptive mood tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们明天会更乐于接受意见。

sentences.english: a receptive audience

detailed_translations.english: willing to consider new ideas or listen to someone else’s opinions

sentences.chinese: 一年的大部分时间里这个地方都挤满了游客。

sentences.chinese: 一个腿上多毛的干瘦男人

sentences.english: a hairy caterpillar
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的毛虫

detailed_translations.english: a hairy person or animal has a lot of hair on their body

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.chinese: …一座13世纪的城堡。

sentences.chinese: 他被刺了一匕首。

sentences.chinese: 凶手将匕首刺进他的心脏。

name: splinter
trans: 碎片；微小的东西；极瘦的人

sentences.chinese: 我的手指扎了一根刺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碎片；微小的东西；极瘦的人
detailed_translations.english: a small sharp piece of wood, glass, or metal, that has broken off a larger piece

sentences.chinese: 个人道德标准的下降

name: cherry
trans: 樱桃；樱桃树；如樱桃的鲜红色；处女膜，处女

sentences.chinese: 一串樱桃

name: moment
trans: 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.chinese: 哈布斯堡王朝在1278至1918年间统治奥地利。

sentences.chinese: 人手不足严重妨碍了整个进度。

sentences.chinese: 谢谢，你真是太好了。

detailed_translations.english: extremely

sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.english: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.english: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

name: dump
trans: 倾倒；倾卸；丢下，卸下；摆脱，扔弃；倾销
垃圾场；仓库；无秩序地累积

sentences.english: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried toward the market.
sentences.chinese: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德旅馆，急匆匆地向市场赶去。

sentences.english: a campaign to stop cheap European beef being dumped in West Africa
sentences.chinese: 阻止在西非倾销廉价欧洲牛肉的运动

detailed_translations.english: If you dump something somewhere, you put it or unload it there quickly and carelessly.

name: firsthand
trans: 直接的；直接采购的；直接得来的

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接的；直接采购的；直接得来的

name: cordial
trans: 补品；兴奋剂；甜香酒，甘露酒

sentences.english: The talks were conducted in a cordial atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 会谈在友好的气氛中进行。

detailed_translations.english: friendly but quite polite and formal

name: unbearable
trans: 难以忍受的；承受不住的

sentences.chinese: 那疼痛几乎难以忍受。

sentences.english: He was making life unbearable for his parents.
sentences.chinese: 他把父母的生活弄得不堪忍受。

detailed_translations.english: too unpleasant, painful, or annoying to deal with

sentences.english: My passport expires next week.
sentences.chinese: 我的护照下周就到期了。

sentences.english: Ophelia expires in Act IV of Hamlet.
sentences.chinese: 奥菲莉娅在《哈姆雷特》第四幕中死去。

name: ventilate
trans: 使通风；给…装通风设备；宣布

sentences.chinese: 在刮漆的时候要适当地使房间通风。

detailed_translations.english: to let fresh air into a room, building etc

sentences.chinese: 冷冻豌豆

detailed_translations.chinese: 结冰（freeze的过去分词）；凝固；变得刻板

name: skeptical
trans: 怀疑的；怀疑论的，不可知论的

sentences.chinese: 那么，我们如何加强自身的怀疑技能呢？

sentences.chinese: 我们在这门课中提及的理论不全是怀疑性的。

sentences.english: L.M.:Well, I was skeptical myself in the beginning. But these are facts. The findings are very reproducible and we are waiting for confirmation by other labs.
sentences.chinese: 大爷：我老人家一开始也是很怀疑的。但是这个是事实。这个发现可以被反复验证，我们正在等待别的实验是的验证。

name: excess
trans: 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制

sentences.english: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.chinese: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.english: the worst excesses of journalism

detailed_translations.english: harmful actions that are socially or morally unacceptable

sentences.english: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.english: a degree in engineering
sentences.chinese: 工程学学位

detailed_translations.english: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.

name: absorbed
trans: 吸收；使全神贯注（absorb的过去分词形式）

sentences.chinese: 他们完全专注于对方。

sentences.english: ...broad straw hats decorated with ostrich plumes.
sentences.chinese: …装饰着鸵鸟毛的宽沿草帽。

sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc

sentences.english: The police force is below strength at the moment (= there are fewer police than there should be ).
sentences.chinese: 目前警力不足。

sentences.english: the strength of a rope

detailed_translations.english: the number of people in a team, army etc

name: proof
trans: 证明；证据；校样；考验；验证；试验
防…的；不能透入的；证明用的；耐…的

sentences.english: Their defences are proof against most weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们的防卫工事可以抵挡大多数武器的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: facts, information, documents etc that prove something is true

sentences.english: a master chef

detailed_translations.english: a skilled cook, especially the main cook in a hotel or restaurant

name: narrowly
trans: 仔细地；勉强地；狭窄地；严密地

sentences.chinese: 他在选举中以微弱差距败北。

sentences.english: One bullet struck his car, narrowly missing him.
sentences.chinese: 一颗子弹击中了他的汽车，差点打中他。

sentences.chinese: 周日早晨一名男子家中起火，险些丧命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 仔细地；勉强地；狭窄地；严密地

trans: 处女的；纯洁的；未经利用的，处于原始状态的

sentences.english: a virgin bride
sentences.chinese: 贞洁的新娘

detailed_translations.english: someone who has never had sex

trans: 敏锐的，敏捷的；渴望的；强烈的；热心的；锐利的

sentences.chinese: 求知若渴的学生

sentences.english: The kids in my class are all very keen.
sentences.chinese: 我班上的学生都很好学。

sentences.english: She was new in the job and keen as mustard (= very keen ).
sentences.chinese: 她刚开始做这工作，热情很高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热心的； 激烈的； 敏锐的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is keen is eager to work or learn, and enjoys doing it

sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

sentences.chinese: 把框子固定在正确位置上，拧紧螺丝。

sentences.chinese: 镜头旋扣在照相机正面。

name: curve
trans: 曲线；弯曲；曲线球；曲线图表

sentences.english: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.chinese: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.english: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

detailed_translations.english: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this

sentences.chinese: 这一整章可以压缩成几个段落。

detailed_translations.english: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information

sentences.english: Donna might be able to come tomorrow, but it’s very unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 唐娜明天也许能来，不过这可能性很小。

sentences.chinese: 过量止痛药

detailed_translations.english: a medicine which reduces or removes pain

sentences.chinese: 你今天早晨心情不错啊！

sentences.english: the general mood of depression in the office

detailed_translations.english: the way you feel at a particular time

sentences.chinese: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

sentences.english: The transistor became the basis of a new invention called the "computer" which I suspect those of you reading this may be familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 晶体管后来成为了一项叫做“计算机”的新发明的基础，我想正在阅读本文的你对于这个应该比较熟悉吧。

sentences.english: When you got a transistor radio, you could walk around with it, and today you can put your whole record collection in your pocket.
sentences.chinese: 而当你使用晶体管收音机时，你可以带着它到处走动，时至今日你可以把你收集的唱片装进口袋里。

sentences.chinese: 刺绣华美的夹克衫

detailed_translations.english: to decorate cloth by sewing a pattern, picture, or words on it with coloured threads

sentences.chinese: 男女美发店

detailed_translations.english: intended for both men and women

name: disrupt
trans: 破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱

sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

sentences.english: White candles, the only illumination, burned on the table.
sentences.chinese: 白蜡烛作为唯一的照明在桌子上燃烧着。

sentences.english: soft illumination
sentences.chinese: 柔和的光亮

detailed_translations.chinese: 照明；[光] 照度；启发；灯饰（需用复数）；阐明

sentences.chinese: 过高的价格

detailed_translations.english: greater than what seems reasonable or appropriate

sentences.chinese: 被告被判犯有严重叛国罪，并处以死刑。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of being disloyal to your country or its government, especially by helping its enemies or trying to remove the government using violence

sentences.chinese: 截下一段五厘米长的木头。

sentences.chinese: 他的裤子靠一根细绳系着。

sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯切成小块。

to put all the separate parts of sth together to make a complete whole

sentences.chinese: 支持这个政党的选民比例持续下降。

sentences.chinese: 这些药物会减少流向脑部的血液量。

name: slumber
trans: 睡眠；麻木状态；静止状态

sentences.chinese: 他酣然入梦。

detailed_translations.english: sleep
to sleep

sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.english: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

name: warehouse
trans: 储入仓库；以他人名义购进（股票）

sentences.chinese: 我们对面的那个建筑是仓库。

sentences.chinese: 每个仓库把它能完成客户定单的哪个部分（如果有）的报告返回给零售商。

sentences.chinese: 该定价方式允许组织只为他们在其仓库中管理的压缩的用户数据量进行付费。

sentences.chinese: 拼写错误经常是由于匆忙而造成的。

sentences.chinese: 如果匆忙是加速器的踏板，一心多用就是超速档。

sentences.chinese: 我的同事打着手势，匆忙地解释着他使用假护照的意图。

sentences.chinese: 她不走平常向南去亚历山大和家乡的路，而是向西走。

Southward or southwards means toward the south

name: embargo
trans: 禁止出入港口；禁止或限制贸易；征用或扣押

sentences.chinese: 联合国对该国施行了武器贸易禁运。

sentences.chinese: 水果被禁运了。

sentences.english: They embargoed oil shipments to the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 他们禁止了对美国石油船运。

detailed_translations.english: If goods of a particular kind are embargoed, people are not allowed to import them from a particular country or export them to a particular country

sentences.chinese: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

sentences.chinese: 国王想通过战争来提高自己的威信。

sentences.chinese: 这家名不见经传的英国公司如今已经声名鹊起。

name: caravan
trans: （可供居住的）拖车，大篷车；（穿过沙漠地带的）旅行队（如商队）；<英>活动住宅；<美>移民列车
乘拖车度假；参加旅行队旅行

sentences.english: a gipsy caravan
sentences.chinese: 吉卜赛人的大篷车

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that a car can pull and in which people can live and sleep when they are on holiday

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘拖车度假；参加旅行队旅行

sentences.english: a shortage of basic foodstuffs
sentences.chinese: 基本食品短缺

detailed_translations.english: food - used especially when talking about the business of producing or selling food

name: tender
trans: 温柔的；柔软的；脆弱的；幼稚的；难对付的
提供，偿还；使…变嫩；使…变柔软

sentences.english: Continue cooking until the meat is tender.
sentences.chinese: 把肉一直烧到松软为止。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嫩的；脆弱的；疼痛的，一触即痛的；温柔的
detailed_translations.english: tender food is easy to cut and eat, especially because it has been well cooked

a formal statement of the price you would charge for doing a job or providing goods or services

name: simultaneous
trans: 同时的；联立的；同时发生的

sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.english: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

sentences.english: "I do not accept the Negro as my equal, " Douglas said. "And I deny that he is my brother.
sentences.chinese: “我不会接受黑人与我平等的思想，”道格拉斯说，“而且我拒绝把黑人当成我的兄弟。

sentences.english: It meant that I, a humble Negro girl, had just as much chance as anybody in the sight and love of God.
sentences.chinese: 这就意味着，我这样一个卑微的黑人女孩，也可以像其他人一样有很多机会受到上帝的关注和爱。

detailed_translations.english: a word for a black person, usually considered offensive
relating to or characteristic of Negroes

sentences.english: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

sentences.english: an employee’s average weekly earnings
sentences.chinese: 雇员的平均周薪

sentences.english: The company’s earnings have dropped by 5% in the first quarter.
sentences.chinese: 公司第一季度的利润下降了5%。

detailed_translations.english: the money that you receive for the work that you do

sentences.english: the certainty of being caught
sentences.chinese: 被抓的必然

detailed_translations.english: the fact that something is certain to happen

name: showdown
trans: 摊牌；紧要关头；最后一决胜负

sentences.chinese: 他们可能会逼迫总统与其政党做最后的较量。

detailed_translations.english: a meeting, argument, fight etc that will settle a disagreement or competition that has continued for a long time

name: buoy

sentences.chinese: 该党因为最近一次民意测验的结果而受到鼓舞。

detailed_translations.chinese: [水运] 浮标；浮筒；救生圈；航标
detailed_translations.english: an object that floats on the sea, a lake etc to mark a safe or dangerous area
to keep something floating

sentences.chinese: 滴滴涕是最初合成于1874年的杀虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: to make something by combining different things or substances

name: churchyard

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land around a church where people are buried

name: demolish
trans: 拆除；破坏；毁坏；推翻；驳倒

sentences.english: The entire east wing of the building was demolished in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 大楼的整个东翼都被大火烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to completely destroy a building

name: abrupt
trans: 生硬的；突然的；唐突的；陡峭的

sentences.english: an abrupt change of plan
sentences.chinese: 计划的突然改变

detailed_translations.chinese: 生硬的；突然的；唐突的；陡峭的
detailed_translations.english: sudden and unexpected

sentences.english: I depended on his companionship and on his judgment.
sentences.chinese: 我依赖他的陪伴和他的判断。

detailed_translations.english: Companionship is having someone you know and like with you, instead of being on your own

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: capsule

sentences.english: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
sentences.chinese: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

detailed_translations.chinese: 胶囊； 航天舱， 密封舱
detailed_translations.english: a plastic container shaped like a very small tube with medicine inside that you swallow whole

name: scapegoat
trans: 替罪羊，替人顶罪者；替身

sentences.english: I don't think I deserve to be made the scapegoat for a couple of bad results.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我不该为出现的一些不良后果充当替罪羊。

sentences.english: ...a climate where ethnic minorities are continually scapegoated for the lack of jobs and housing problems.
sentences.chinese: …一种屡屡把缺少工作职位和住房问题归罪于少数族裔的风气。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is blamed for something bad that happens, even if it is not their fault

name: dialect
trans: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征

detailed_translations.chinese: 方言，土话；同源语；行话；个人用语特征
detailed_translations.english: a form of a language which is spoken only in one area, with words or grammar that are slightly different from other forms of the same language

name: petty
trans: 琐碎的；小气的；小规模的

sentences.chinese: 小口角

sentences.english: petty restrictions

sentences.english: He was hoarse from laughing.
sentences.chinese: 他笑得嗓子都沙哑了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are hoarse, or if your voice is hoarse, you speak in a low rough voice, for example because your throat is sore

name: slot
trans: 位置；狭槽；水沟；硬币投币口

sentences.english: Alan dropped another quarter into the slot on the pay phone.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦往付费电话的投币口里又塞了一枚 25 分的硬币。

sentences.english: He was slotting a CD into a CD player.
sentences.chinese: 他正把一张光盘放入光盘播放器中。

sentences.english: The car seat belt slotted into place easily.
sentences.chinese: 那个汽车安全带很容易就扣好了。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole in a surface, that you can put something into

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…放入狭长开口中； 把…纳入其中， 使有位置
detailed_translations.english: If you slot something into something else, or if it slots into it, you put it into a space where it fits

name: supplement
trans: 增补，补充；补充物；增刊，副刊

sentences.english: vitamins and other dietary supplements
sentences.chinese: 各种维生素和其他膳食补充剂

detailed_translations.chinese: 增补， 补充； 增刊， 副刊
detailed_translations.english: something that you add to something else to improve it or make it complete
to add something, especially to what you earn or eat, in order to increase it to an acceptable level

name: knot
trans: （绳等的）结；节瘤，疙瘩；海里/小时（航速单位）

sentences.english: A pretty scarf was loosely knotted around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的脖子上松松地系着一条漂亮的围巾。

detailed_translations.english: to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc
a hard round place in a piece of wood where a branch once joined the tree
to tie together two ends or pieces of string, rope, cloth etc

sentences.english: Researchers greeted the proposal with scorn.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们对这个提议报以轻蔑的态度。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that someone or something is stupid or does not deserve respect

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻蔑， 鄙视； 拒绝， 不屑
detailed_translations.english: to show that you think that something is stupid, unreasonable, or not worth accepting

sentences.english: It seems the banks always profit from farmers’ misfortunes.
sentences.chinese: 银行似乎总是从农民的不幸中获益。

detailed_translations.english: very bad luck, or something that happens to you as a result of bad luck

sentences.english: The leopard's skin is marked with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 豹皮上有黑色斑点。

sentences.english: The young leopard separated from its mother would be eaten by other beast.
sentences.chinese: 与母亲离散的幼豹很可能被其他的野兽吃掉。

sentences.english: Her talent was not in gathering information but in analyzing and assessing—a meticulous organizer who plotted and planned with the cunning of a leopard.
sentences.chinese: 她的才华不在信息收集，而在于分析和评估，一个细微谨慎的组织者，策划着，盘算着有如美洲豹般的狡猾。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family, with yellow fur and black spots, which lives in Africa and South Asia

name: suggestion
trans: 建议；示意；微量，细微的迹象

sentences.english: Any suggestions would be welcome.
sentences.chinese: 任何建议都欢迎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 建议， 意见； 细微的迹象； 暗示
detailed_translations.english: an idea, plan, or possibility that someone mentions, or the act of mentioning it

name: maintain
trans: 维持；继续；维修；主张；供养

sentences.english: Careers Officers maintain contact with young people when they have left school.
sentences.chinese: 年轻人离开学校以后，职业指导员和他们保持联系。

sentences.english: Britain wants to maintain its position as a world power.
sentences.chinese: 英国想保持其世界强国的地位。

sentences.english: A lot depends on building and maintaining a good relationship with your customers.
sentences.chinese: 和顾客建立并保持良好关系很重要，很多事情要取决于此。

sentences.english: The hotel prides itself on maintaining high standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家酒店以保持高标准而自豪。

sentences.english: How can we maintain control of spending?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何保持对开支的控制？

sentences.english: Critics maintain that these reforms will lead to a decline in educational standards.
sentences.chinese: 批评者坚称这些改革会导致教育标准下降。

detailed_translations.english: to make something continue in the same way or at the same standard as before

name: collegiate
trans: 大学的；学院的；大学生的

sentences.english: collegiate sports
sentences.chinese: 大学体育运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 大学的；学院的；大学生的
detailed_translations.english: relating to college or a college

name: sherry
trans: 雪利酒（西班牙产的一种烈性白葡萄酒）；葡萄酒

sentences.english: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.chinese: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.english: We sipped dry sherry on his porch until sunrise, and shortly thereafter he moved in to my small Florida home.
sentences.chinese: 我们在他家的门廊上啜饮着干雪利酒，直到太阳升起。 此后不久，他搬进了我在佛罗里达的小家。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雪利酒（西班牙产的一种烈性白葡萄酒）；葡萄酒
detailed_translations.english: a pale or dark brown strong wine, originally from Spain

name: kiosk
trans: 【网络】自助服务终端；一体机；Kiosk (KDE)；小卖部

sentences.english: "We went into a market and established a kiosk in that market out of a butcher's shop," Kalanda says.
sentences.chinese: 卡兰达说，“由于一家肉店，我们进入这个市场，在那个市场我们建立了一个公用电话亭”

sentences.english: We found that only about 5% of the time did people bother to tell the kiosk that they took an accessory.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，只有在近5%的情况下，人们肯在数字亭中留下自己领取配件的信息。

sentences.english: He operated a small tea shop there, a portable metal kiosk from which he served low-ranking bureaucrats who worked in the surrounding government offices.
sentences.chinese: 如今他在这里开设了一家小茶亭——那是个轻便的金属亭子，为附近政府机构的低级别官员提供服务。

sentences.english: 英文编辑：the economic conditions which prevail in England and Wales
sentences.chinese: 英格兰和威尔士普遍的经济状况

sentences.english: Justice will prevail.
sentences.chinese: 正义终将获胜。

detailed_translations.english: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time

sentences.english: The guards hustled Harry out of the car.
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们把哈里从车子里拉了出来。

detailed_translations.english: If you hustle someone, you try to make them go somewhere or do something quickly, for example by pulling or pushing them along
busy and noisy activity

name: lofty
trans: 高的；崇高的；高级的；高傲的

sentences.english: He stayed at the Four Seasons Hotel, from whose lofty heights he could see across New York.
sentences.chinese: 他住在四季酒店，从酒店高处可以看到纽约的全景。

sentences.english: lofty ideals of equality and social justice
sentences.chinese: 平等和社会正义的崇高理想

detailed_translations.english: (of buildings, mountains, etc.) very high and impressive

sentences.english: The area is well suited to road cycling as well as off-road riding.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区很适合公路自行车竞赛和越野骑马。

detailed_translations.english: If something is well suited to a particular purpose, it is right or appropriate for that purpose. If someone is well suited to a particular job, they are right or appropriate for that job.

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

name: denounce
trans: 谴责；告发；公然抨击；通告废除

sentences.english: The group denounced the failure by the authorities to take action.
sentences.chinese: 该团体谴责当局没有采取行动。

sentences.english: She denounced him to the police.
sentences.chinese: 她向警方告发了他。

detailed_translations.english: to express strong disapproval of someone or something, especially in public

sentences.english: That promotion really boosted her ego (= made her feel better about herself ).
sentences.chinese: 那次晋升确实增强了她的自信心。

sentences.english: I need someone to massage my bruised ego (= when you feel less confident than before ).
sentences.chinese: 我需要有人来安抚我受挫的自信心。

sentences.english: a fragile ego
sentences.chinese: 脆弱的自尊心

detailed_translations.chinese: 自我，自己，个人思考和感觉能力
detailed_translations.english: the opinion that you have about yourself

sentences.english: The lime has turned to powder.
sentences.chinese: 石灰已经粉了。

sentences.english: The wall was first pricked up with a coat lime.
sentences.chinese: 墙壁先抹上一层石灰打底子。

detailed_translations.english: a white substance obtained by burning limestone, used for making cement, marking sports fields etc

sentences.english: Plastic replicas of the Greek pottery are sold to gullible tourists.
sentences.chinese: 仿古希腊陶器的塑料复制品被卖给易受骗的游客。

detailed_translations.english: too ready to believe what other people tell you, so that you are easily tricked

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

name: imperial
trans: 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的

sentences.english: Britain’s imperial expansion in the 19th century
sentences.chinese: 19世纪英帝国的扩张

detailed_translations.english: relating to an empire or to the person who rules it

sentences.english: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.english: Environmental groups are exerting pressure on the government to tighten pollution laws.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织在向政府施加压力，要求从严执行环保法律法规。

detailed_translations.english: to use your power, influence etc in order to make something happen

sentences.english: She’s served on innumerable committees.
sentences.chinese: 她在多个委员会担任委员。

detailed_translations.english: very many, or too many to be counted

sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

sentences.english: She is slender and stylish.
sentences.chinese: 她身材修长，穿着时髦。

sentences.english: The company only has a slender hope of survival.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司维持下去的希望很渺茫。

detailed_translations.english: thin in an attractive or graceful way

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

name: tornado
trans: [气象] 龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨

sentences.english: The tornado rubbished the whole village.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风毁掉了整个村庄。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.english: The tornado is coming, so we had better batten down the hatches here and get to the cellar.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风即将来临，因此我们最好把这里的舱口封上，到地下室去。

sentences.english: Spray the plants with insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 给植物喷洒杀虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance used for killing insects

name: skilled
trans: 熟练的；有技能的；需要技能的

sentences.english: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, are in great demand.
sentences.chinese: 对木工之类的熟练工匠需求量很大。

sentences.english: The company is fortunate to have such highly skilled workers.
sentences.chinese: 公司有这样一些技能熟练的工人真是幸运。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well

sentences.english: Someone stole my credit card and forged my signature.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的信用卡，并假冒我的签名。

sentences.english: a forged passport
sentences.chinese: 假护照

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere or continue doing something in a steady determined way

a place where metal is heated and shaped into objects

name: reckless
trans: 鲁莽的，不顾后果的；粗心大意的

sentences.english: He was accused of causing death by reckless driving .
sentences.chinese: 他被控因鲁莽驾驶致人死亡。

sentences.english: a reckless disregard for safety
sentences.chinese: 不顾安全的鲁莽行为

sentences.english: He ran into the burning house with reckless abandon (= without caring about the danger ) .
sentences.chinese: 他不顾危险冲入着火的房子里。

detailed_translations.english: not caring or worrying about the possible bad or dangerous results of your actions

sentences.english: ...chimpanzees and other apes.
sentences.chinese: …黑猩猩和其他猿。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that is similar to a monkey but has no tail or only a very short tail
to copy the way someone speaks or behaves in order to make fun of them

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

name: operation
trans: 操作；经营；[外科] 手术；[数][计] 运算

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: separate
trans: 单独的；分开的；不同的；各自的；

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

sentences.english: They teach the relativity of all ethical ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣扬一切道德观念的相对性。

sentences.english: Einstein put forward his new theory of relativity.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦提出了相对论的新学说。

sentences.english: Everyone was talking about relativity, not only the scientists, but the philosophers and the writers of columns in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都在谈论相对论，不仅仅是科学家，甚至哲学家和报纸的专栏作者也是如此。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship in  physics  between time, space, and movement according to Einstein’s  theory

name: anchor
trans: 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播

sentences.english: We dropped anchor a few yards offshore.
sentences.chinese: 我们在离岸几码远的地方抛锚停航。

sentences.english: The next morning, they weighed anchor (=  lifted the anchor  ) and began to move south again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上他们起锚，又开始向南航行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播
detailed_translations.english: a piece of heavy metal that is lowered to the bottom of the sea, a lake etc to prevent a ship or boat moving
to fasten something firmly so that it cannot move

name: restrictive
trans: 限制的；限制性的；约束的

sentences.english: Many members thought the rules were too restrictive.
sentences.chinese: 很多会员认为这些规定限制条件太多。

sentences.english: a restrictive policy on admission to the college
sentences.chinese: 大学入学的限制性政策

detailed_translations.chinese: 限制的；限制性的；约束的
detailed_translations.english: something that is restrictive stops people doing what they want to do

name: bosom
trans: 胸；胸怀；中间；胸襟；内心；乳房；内部

sentences.english: She cradled the child to her bosom.
sentences.chinese: 她把那孩子抱入怀中。

sentences.english: They were bosom buddies.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾是知心的伙伴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 胸；胸怀；中间；胸襟；内心；乳房；内部
detailed_translations.english: the front part of a woman’s chest
A bosom buddy is a friend who you know very well and like very much

sentences.english: Quit stalling and answer my question!
sentences.chinese: 别拖延时间，快回答我的问题！

sentences.english: He was just stalling for time .
sentences.chinese: 他只是在拖延时间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 熄火； 拖延， 推迟
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately delay because you are not ready to do something, answer questions etc
a table or a small shop with an open front, especially outdoors, where goods are sold

sentences.english: The main character narrates the story.
sentences.chinese: 主人公讲述故事。

detailed_translations.english: to tell a story by describing all the events in order, for example in a book

name: tray
trans: 托盘；文件盒；隔底匣；（无线电的）发射箱

sentences.english: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
sentences.chinese: 服务员用托盘端来饮料。

sentences.english: a cat litter tray
sentences.chinese: 猫砂盘

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc

sentences.english: The verdict was ‘not guilty’.
sentences.chinese: 裁决为“无罪”。

detailed_translations.english: an official decision made in a court of law, especially about whether someone is guilty of a crime or how a death happened

sentences.english: The crowd’s reaction only acted as a spur.
sentences.chinese: 人群的反应不过起了刺激作用。

sentences.english: The band were spurred on by the success of their last two singles.
sentences.chinese: 乐队因最近两张单曲唱片的成功而深受鼓舞。

sentences.english: It was an article in the local newspaper which finally spurred him into action .
sentences.chinese: 是当地报纸上的一篇文章最终促使他行动起来。

detailed_translations.english: a fact or event that makes you try harder to do something
to encourage someone or make them want to do something

sentences.english: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.chinese: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

detailed_translations.english: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed

sentences.english: He thought the door was locked, but he turned the knob and the door opened.
sentences.chinese: 他本以为门是锁住的，但是转了一下把手门就开了。

sentences.english: a brass door knob
sentences.chinese: 黄铜门把手

sentences.english: I adjusted the volume knob and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 我调节好音量旋钮，坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a round handle or thing that you turn to open a door, turn on a television etc

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

sentences.english: It was quite rough at times, and she was seasick.
sentences.chinese: 海上有时波涛汹涌，她就晕船。

detailed_translations.english: feeling ill when you travel in a boat, because of the movement of the boat in the water

sentences.english: differential rates of pay
sentences.chinese: 工资级差

sentences.english: differential treatment of part-time and full-time staff
sentences.chinese: 对兼职员工和全职员工的区别对待

detailed_translations.english: based on or depending on a difference
a difference between things, especially between the wages of people doing different types of jobs in the same industry or profession

name: speedway
trans: 高速公路；（摩托车或汽车的）赛车跑道；机器脚踏车的竞赛场

detailed_translations.chinese: 高速公路；（摩托车或汽车的）赛车跑道；机器脚踏车的竞赛场
detailed_translations.english: the sport of racing  motorcycles  or cars on a special track

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

sentences.english: changing to a decimal system
sentences.chinese: 改为十进制

sentences.english: calculations accurate to three decimal places
sentences.chinese: 精确到小数点后三位的计算

detailed_translations.english: a decimal system is based on the number 10
a  fraction (= a number less than 1 )  that is shown as a  full stop  followed by the number of  tenth s  ,  hundredth s  etc. The numbers 0.5, 0.175, and 0.661 are decimals.

name: silent
trans: 沉默的；寂静的；无记载的

sentences.english: The large house was silent and lonely.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大房子寂静荒凉。

sentences.english: At last the guns fell silent .
sentences.chinese: 枪声终于沉寂了下来。

sentences.english: Julie offered up a silent prayer that she would pass her exam.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉默默地祈祷，希望能通过这次考试。

sentences.english: Alan was silent.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦沉默不语。

detailed_translations.english: without any sound, or not making any sound

sentences.chinese: 离婚是非常痛苦的，涉及孩子的话更是如此。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers concerned suffer particularly from the low prices.
sentences.chinese: 涉及的农民当中，有些人因低价受到的损失尤为惨重。

sentences.english: We are trying to reach an agreement with all concerned (= everyone who is involved or affected ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们试图与相关各方达成协议。

detailed_translations.english: involved in something or affected by it

detailed_translations.chinese: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关

sentences.english: She lost the election by a mere 20 votes.
sentences.chinese: 她仅仅以20票之差落选。

sentences.english: Please extinguish all cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 请把香烟都熄灭了。

sentences.english: Firemen were called to extinguish the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 有人打电话叫消防队员来扑灭大火。

sentences.english: All hope was almost extinguished.
sentences.chinese: 所有的希望都快要破灭了。

detailed_translations.english: to make a fire or light stop burning or shining

sentences.english: Just do one more exercise in this workbook.
sentences.chinese: 就再做一道这本练习册中的练习吧。

detailed_translations.english: a school book containing questions and exercises

name: tribute
trans: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物

sentences.english: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.english: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone

name: dragon
trans: 龙；凶暴的人，凶恶的人；严厉而有警觉性的女人

sentences.english: She worked a dragon on the new linen cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她在新的亚麻布上绣了条龙。

detailed_translations.english: a large imaginary animal that has wings and a long tail and can breathe out fire

sentences.english: Police warned drivers to beware.
sentences.chinese: 警方提醒司机小心行驶。

detailed_translations.english: used to warn someone to be careful because something is dangerous

name: uncontrollable
trans: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的

sentences.english: I felt an uncontrollable urge to scream.
sentences.chinese: 我感到一种控制不住想要尖叫的冲动。

sentences.english: Mother burst into uncontrollable sobs.
sentences.chinese: 母亲突然情不自禁地抽噎起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的
detailed_translations.english: if an emotion, desire, or physical action is uncontrollable, you cannot control it or stop yourself from feeling it or doing it

name: fascism
trans: 法西斯主义；极端国家主义

sentences.english: ...the rise of fascism in the 1930s.
sentences.chinese: …20世纪30年代法西斯主义的兴起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法西斯主义；极端国家主义
detailed_translations.english: a  right-wing  political system in which people’s lives are completely controlled by the state and no political opposition is allowed

sentences.english: She was wearing red lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 她涂着红色唇膏。

detailed_translations.english: something used for adding colour to your lips, in the shape of a small stick

sentences.english: One ounce of almonds contains nearly half the recommended daily amount.
sentences.chinese: 一盎司杏仁大约包含每日需求量的一半。

sentences.english: I knew every ounce would weigh on me like a little anchor, so I was determined not to include a single item that was unnecessary or superfluous.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到每盎司的重量都会成为一个小小的船锚压迫着我，所以我决定不带任何一样不必要的或多余的东西。

sentences.english: The 9” long, 9 ounce device works when you are in motion—just plug in your mobile device, place the nPower PEG vertically in your bag or on your hip and go for a walk or run.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备长9英寸，重9盎司，可在你运动过程中发电——只需把移动设备插到摇摇发电机上，并把发电机垂直地放在包�或挂在臀部，然后走动或跑动即可。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 28.35 grams. There are 16 ounces in a pound.

name: kid
trans: 小山羊皮制的；较年幼的

sentences.english: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.chinese: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.english: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.chinese: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.english: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.chinese: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.english: college kids
sentences.chinese: 大学生

detailed_translations.english: a child

name: commentator
trans: 评论员，解说员；实况播音员；时事评论者

sentences.english: political commentators
sentences.chinese: 政治评论员

detailed_translations.chinese: 评论员，解说员；实况播音员；时事评论者
detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, and who writes about it or discusses it on the television or radio

sentences.english: stars twinkling in the sky
sentences.chinese: 天空中闪烁的星星

sentences.english: I saw lights twinkling in the little town below us.
sentences.chinese: 我看到我们下面的小镇灯火闪烁。

detailed_translations.english: if a star or light twinkles, it shines in the dark with an unsteady light
an expression in your eyes that shows you are happy or amused

name: band
trans: 带，环；[物] 波段；(演奏流行音乐的) 乐队

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

name: telecommunications
trans: 通讯行业：服务类型变更，缴纳话费，账户总览等所有业务均可通过移动设备完成

sentences.english: a new telecommunications system
sentences.chinese: 新的电信系统

sentences.english: the telecommunications industry
sentences.chinese: 电信业

detailed_translations.english: the sending and receiving of messages by telephone, radio, television etc

sentences.english: a cargo plane
sentences.chinese: 货机

detailed_translations.english: the goods that are being carried in a ship or plane

name: motorway
trans: 高速公路，汽车高速公路

sentences.english: They were bowling along the motorway at sixty miles per hour.
sentences.chinese: 他们以每小时60英里的速度在高速公路上飞驰。

sentences.english: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sentences.chinese: 由于无视高速公路上的大雾警告，有好几辆汽车相撞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高速公路，汽车高速公路
detailed_translations.english: a very wide road for travelling fast over long distances, especially between cities

sentences.english: Enter your password, then click on the ‘proceed’ icon.
sentences.chinese: 键入密码，然后点击“继续”图标。

sentences.english: Give your user name and password.
sentences.chinese: 输入用户名和密码。

detailed_translations.english: a secret group of letters or numbers that you must type into a computer before you can use a system or program

name: fail
trans: 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

sentences.english: Let’s go indoors and have something to eat.
sentences.chinese: 我们进屋吃点东西吧。

sentences.english: It rained all day so we had to stay indoors.
sentences.chinese: 雨下了整整一天，我们只好留在屋里。

detailed_translations.english: into or inside a building

sentences.english: What do a hummingbird, a moth, and a maple tree have in common?
sentences.chinese: 蜂鸟、蛾子和枫树之间有什么共同之处呢？

sentences.english: Around streetlights in leafy suburbs what often seems like a moth at first glance may in fact be a small bat.
sentences.chinese: 在绿树成荫的郊区，街灯周围经常有乍一看象蛾子的飞行物，而事实上可能是一只微蝠。

sentences.english: Authorities say the mob of 'roos is endangering a species of local lizard and the threatened gold sun moth through overgrazing.
sentences.chinese: 有关部门表示，由于过度放牧，这些袋鼠已经对一种当地蜥蜴和金日蛾的生存构成了威胁。

detailed_translations.english: an insect related to the  butterfly  that flies mainly at night and is attracted to lights. Some moths eat holes in cloth.

name: mint
trans: 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款

sentences.english: new potatoes sprinkled with chopped mint
sentences.chinese: 撒上薄荷屑的嫩马铃薯

sentences.english: roast lamb with mint sauce
sentences.chinese: 配薄荷调味汁的烤羔羊肉

sentences.english: Decorate with a sprig of mint .
sentences.chinese: 用小薄荷枝装饰。

detailed_translations.chinese: 薄荷；[金融] 造币厂，巨款
detailed_translations.english: a small plant with green leaves that have a fresh smell and taste and are used in cooking
to make a coin
looking new and in perfect condition

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with a broken arm and ribs.
sentences.chinese: 她胳膊和肋骨断了，被送进医院。

sentences.english: He was punched and kicked in the ribs.
sentences.chinese: 他的肋部遭到拳打脚踢。

detailed_translations.english: one of the 12 pairs of curved bones that surround your chest
to furnish or support with a rib or ribs

name: fossil
trans: 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).
sentences.chinese: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant that lived many thousands of years ago and that has been preserved, or the shape of one of these animals or plants that has been preserved in rock

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

name: unnatural
trans: 不自然的；反常的；不近人情的

sentences.english: It was very cold, which seemed unnatural for late spring.
sentences.chinese: 天很冷，对于晚春来说似乎不正常。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不自然的；反常的；不近人情的
detailed_translations.english: different from what you would normally expect

sentences.english: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.english: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.chinese: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.english: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

detailed_translations.english: completely

name: versatile
trans: 多才多艺的；通用的，万能的；多面手的

sentences.english: The potato is an extremely versatile vegetable.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯是一种用途极广的蔬菜。

detailed_translations.english: having many different uses

sentences.english: a one-year cookery course
sentences.chinese: 为期一年的烹饪课程

sentences.english: French cookery
sentences.chinese: 法式烹调

detailed_translations.english: the art or skill of cooking

sentences.english: She stood nervously in the wings waiting for her cue.
sentences.chinese: 她紧张地站在台侧等待出场的提示。

detailed_translations.english: an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen
to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance

sentences.english: Look, darling, there’s Mary.
sentences.chinese: 看呀，亲爱的，玛丽来了。

sentences.english: my two darling daughters
sentences.chinese: 我那两个宝贝女儿

detailed_translations.english: used when speaking to someone you love
used of someone you love very much

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: ‘Why are you doing that?’ the boy inquired.
sentences.chinese: “你为什么这么做？”男孩问道。

sentences.english: Toby would have liked to inquire further (= ask more questions ).
sentences.chinese: 托比本想问更多的问题。

sentences.english: The investigation will inquire into the company’s financial dealings.
sentences.chinese: 此次调查将会涉及公司的财务往来。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone for information

name: hose
trans: 软管；长筒袜；男性穿的紧身裤

sentences.english: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.chinese: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管吸走。

detailed_translations.english: A hose is a pipe made of rubber or plastic, along which a liquid or gas flows, for example from one part of an engine to another
to wash or pour water over something or someone, using a hose

sentences.english: a wholly satisfactory solution
sentences.chinese: 完全令人满意的解决办法

sentences.english: The report claimed that the disaster was wholly unavoidable.
sentences.chinese: 报告称这场灾难完全无法避免。

detailed_translations.english: completely

name: lease
trans: 租约；租期；租赁物；租赁权

sentences.english: The landlord refused to renew his lease.
sentences.chinese: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

sentences.english: The 99-year lease expired in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 99年期的租约于1999年到期。

sentences.english: Do you understand all the terms of the lease?
sentences.chinese: 租约条款你都理解吗？

detailed_translations.english: a legal agreement which allows you to use a building, car etc for a period of time, in return for rent

detailed_translations.chinese: 出租； 租得， 租有
detailed_translations.english: to use a building, car etc under a lease

sentences.english: the warmth of the summer sun
sentences.chinese: 夏天太阳的暖意

sentences.english: the warmth of her smile
sentences.chinese: 她微笑中的热情

detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

name: priest
trans: 使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司

sentences.english: He had trained to be a Catholic priest.
sentences.chinese: 他接受培训成了一名天主教神父。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is specially trained to perform religious duties and ceremonies in the Christian church

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成为神职人员；任命…为祭司

sentences.english: Because she included the hyphen (-), nothing else is required; because 1=1 is always true, she will be able to log in successfully.
sentences.chinese: 由于她包含了连字号（-），所以任何其他东西都不需要；由于 1=1 总是为真，所以她将能够成功登录。

detailed_translations.english: a short written or printed line (-) that joins words or  syllables

name: pose
trans: 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论

sentences.english: We posed for photographs.
sentences.chinese: 我们摆好姿势准备拍照。

sentences.english: Ann struck a pose (= stood or sat in a particular position ) and smiled for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 安摆好姿势露出笑脸准备拍照。

detailed_translations.english: to sit or stand in a particular position in order to be photographed or painted, or to make someone do this
the position in which someone stands or sits, especially in a painting, photograph etc

sentences.english: We all snickered at Mrs. Swenson.
sentences.chinese: 我们都暗暗嘲笑斯温森太太。

sentences.english: ...a chorus of jeers and snickers.
sentences.chinese: ...一阵嗤笑。

detailed_translations.english: to laugh quietly and in a way that is not nice at something which is not supposed to be funny
Snicker is also a noun

name: possess
trans: 控制；使掌握；持有；迷住；拥有，具备

sentences.english: Different workers possess different skills.
sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.english: He no longer possessed the power to frighten her.
sentences.chinese: 他再也吓不倒她了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular quality or ability

sentences.english: ...wild, savage-looking fellows, with large whiskers and dirty faces.
sentences.chinese: …一些狂野、面相凶恶的家伙，留着满脸的络腮胡子，蓬头垢面。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hairs that grow on a man’s face

sentences.english: Beware of pickpockets, especially when making a purchase.
sentences.chinese: 当心扒手，尤其是在购物的时候。

detailed_translations.english: someone who steals things from people’s pockets, especially in a crowd

sentences.english: Mary Shelley was just 18 when she wrote the horror masterpiece ‘Frankenstein’.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽•雪莱创作《科学怪人》这部恐怖小说名作的时候年仅18岁。

detailed_translations.english: a work of art, a piece of writing or music etc that is of very high quality or that is the best that a particular artist, writer etc has produced

sentences.english: a campaign to stiffen rules against drink-driving
sentences.chinese: 要求对酒后驾车严加管制的运动

sentences.english: Their opposition only stiffened my resolve .
sentences.chinese: 他们的反对只是更加坚定了我的决心。

detailed_translations.english: to become stronger, more severe, or more determined, or to make something do this

name: surpass
trans: 超越；胜过，优于；非…所能办到或理解

sentences.english: He had surpassed all our expectations .
sentences.chinese: 他超越了我们所有的预期。

sentences.english: The number of multiple births has surpassed 100,000 for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 多胎产首次突破了 10 万例。

detailed_translations.english: to be even better or greater than someone or something else

sentences.english: He killed his wife’s lover.
sentences.chinese: 他杀了妻子的情人。

sentences.english: Nicola and I were lovers.
sentences.chinese: 我和尼古拉以前是情人。

sentences.english: a pair of young lovers
sentences.chinese: 一对年轻的情侣

sentences.english: music lovers
sentences.chinese: 音乐爱好者

detailed_translations.english: someone’s lover is the person they are having a sexual relationship with but who they are not married to

name: solemn
trans: 庄严的，严肃的；隆重的，郑重的

sentences.english: a solemn expression
sentences.chinese: 严肃的表情

sentences.english: Their faces suddenly grew solemn.
sentences.chinese: 他们的脸突然变得严肃起来。

sentences.english: a solemn procession of mourners
sentences.chinese: 庄重的送葬队伍

sentences.english: solemn ritual/ceremony
sentences.chinese: 隆重的仪式/典礼

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，庄重的；庄严的,隆重的
detailed_translations.english: very serious and not happy, for example because something bad has happened or because you are at an important occasion

sentences.english: His economic predictions are based on some erroneous assumptions.
sentences.chinese: 他的经济预测是基于错误假设之上的。

detailed_translations.english: erroneous ideas or information are wrong and based on facts that are not correct

name: awful
trans: 可怕的；极坏的；使人敬畏的

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

sentences.english: We heard a car door slam.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到有车门砰的一声关上了。

sentences.english: He slammed the door shut.
sentences.chinese: 他把门砰地关上。

sentences.english: She slammed down the phone angrily.
sentences.chinese: 她气呼呼地啪的一声挂上电话。

detailed_translations.english: to shut, or to make sth shut, with a lot of force, making a loud noise

name: Scots
trans: 苏格兰的；苏格兰人的；苏格兰英语的

sentences.english: But where were the Scots from?
sentences.chinese: 但是，苏格兰人又是从哪里来的？

sentences.english: But I was still Queen of Scots,so I came back to Scotland.

sentences.chinese: 军号吹响前进的号令。

sentences.chinese: 我们如何将基督教置于现代物理学和心理学的背景中呢？

sentences.chinese: 明亮的色彩是他绘画作品的特点。

sentences.english: They need to shift from farming to industry, and they need to do so desperately.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要从农业领域转移到工业领域。 他们需要拼命地那么做。

sentences.english: the shift from one type of economic system to another
sentences.chinese: 从一种经济体系向另一种经济体系的转变

detailed_translations.english: to change a situation, discussion etc by giving special attention to one idea or subject instead of to a previous one
a change in the way people think about something, in the way something is done etc

name: flea
trans: 跳蚤；低廉的旅馆；生蚤的动物

sentences.english: Are you sure the dog has fleas ?
sentences.chinese: 你确定那只狗身上有跳蚤吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 跳蚤；低廉的旅馆；生蚤的动物
detailed_translations.english: a very small insect without wings that jumps and bites animals and people to eat their blood

name: hospitable
trans: 热情友好的；（环境）舒适的

sentences.english: The local people were very kind and hospitable.
sentences.chinese: 当地人非常友好热情。

detailed_translations.english: friendly, welcoming, and generous to visitors

sentences.chinese: 爆炸声震破了奥利·威廉斯的耳鼓。

sentences.english: A red sandstone mosque stands on one side.
sentences.chinese: 一座红色砂岩清真寺耸立在一旁。

sentences.english: Red maple leaves and gold on a cottonwood announce the arrival of fall in the pink sandstone canyons of Zion National Park in Utah.
sentences.chinese: 红枫叶和棉白杨树上的金黄色宣布了秋天已经来到了犹他州锡安国家公园各个粉红色的砂岩峡谷。

sentences.english: David Walker, head of the Nottingham Caves Survey, surveys the base of Castle Rock, a large sandstone outcrop in the heart of the city.
sentences.chinese: 大卫·沃克是诺丁汉洞穴勘测组的组长，他负责勘测石头城堡的地基，这是一块位于城市中心的巨型砂岩露头。

detailed_translations.english: a type of soft yellow or red rock, often used in buildings

name: duck
trans: 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分

sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下

a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

sentences.english: Diseases were spread through poor sanitary conditions .
sentences.chinese: 疾病因卫生条件很差而传播开来。

sentences.english: a prison with no proper sanitary facilities
sentences.chinese: 一座缺少适当卫生设施的监狱

detailed_translations.english: relating to the ways that dirt, infection, and waste are removed, so that places are clean and healthy for people to live in

sentences.english: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.english: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it

sentences.english: The school teaches pupils from different ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 该校教授不同种族的小学生。

sentences.english: ethnic Russians in Estonia

sentences.english: plans to partition the republic along ethnic lines
sentences.chinese: 按种族分割该共和国的计划

detailed_translations.english: relating to a particular race, nation, or tribe and their customs and traditions

sentences.chinese: ‘你确实是傻瓜，’他对他们说。

sentences.english: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的读者，假设你是一个白痴。再假设你是一名国会成员。不过我的话说重复了。

name: PhD
trans: 博士学位；哲学博士学位（Doctor of Philosophy）

sentences.english: Proponents of the PhD argue that it is worthwhile even if it does not lead to permanent academic employment.
sentences.chinese: 支持者争辩说，即使找不到终身从事学术研究的工作，攻读博士学位也是值得的。

sentences.english: Firstly, you have to get a PhD, but if you want to practise you then need venture capital, otherwise you don't have the tools.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你必须弄到一个哲学博士学位，但是如果你想执业的话还要有创业资本。 要不然你就拿不到仪器。

detailed_translations.chinese: 博士学位；哲学博士学位（Doctor of Philosophy）

sentences.english: They have kept the price of sugar artificially high and so fattened the company's profits.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直人为地使糖价居高不下，以此为公司牟利。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone is fattening something such as a business or its profits, you mean that they are increasing the value of the business or its profits, in a way that you disapprove of

detailed_translations.chinese: 措辞, 用语, 言语
detailed_translations.english: the choice and use of words and phrases to express meaning, especially in literature

name: lag
trans: 落后；迟延；防护套；囚犯；桶板
落后于；押往监狱；加上外套

sentences.english: In this scenario, due to the lag time required to assimilate new resources, the relationship between required resources and estimated delivery timeframe may even turn negative.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，由于时间已经落后，需要吸收新的人力资源，需要的资源和预计的交付时间的关系甚至更加复杂。

sentences.chinese: 但是对于许多人而言，至少在科学方面，正是那些在过去做的很好的国家现在正在做的更好，而那些位于底层的国家的科学继续落后。

sentences.english: One is that some countries still lag behind.
sentences.chinese: 一个原因是一些国家仍很落后。

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

name: canvas
trans: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备

sentences.english: a canvas bag
sentences.chinese: 帆布包

detailed_translations.english: strong cloth used to make bags, tents, shoes etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备

sentences.chinese: 他们用一支自动步枪在近距离射程内射中了他。

detailed_translations.english: a long gun which you hold up to your shoulder to shoot

sentences.chinese: 八根巨大的石柱支撑起房顶。

sentences.english: Mr Fitzwilliam had been seen as a pillar of the community.
sentences.chinese: 菲茨威廉先生已被视为社区的骨干。

detailed_translations.english: a tall upright round post used as a support for a roof or bridge

sentences.chinese: 蜻蜓总是在水面上撒卵。

sentences.chinese: 那只在排水沟上空飞着的蜻蜓能作为我祈求的答案吗？

sentences.english: It looks like a blue dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 它看上去像只蓝色蜻蜓。

detailed_translations.english: a brightly-coloured insect with a long thin body and transparent wings which lives near water

sentences.chinese: 不向恃强凌弱者屈服需要很大勇气。

trans: 数字；手指或足趾；一指宽

sentences.chinese: 她的电话号码跟我的差一个数字。

name: cardinal
trans: 红衣主教；枢机主教；鲜红色；【鸟类】(北美)主红雀
主要的，基本的；深红色的

sentences.chinese: 双手洁净是准备食物时的一项最基本要求。

sentences.english: an issue of cardinal importance
sentences.chinese: 至关重要的问题

detailed_translations.english: a priest of high rank in the Roman Catholic Church

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，基本的；深红色的
detailed_translations.english: very important or basic

sentences.chinese: 我感到一阵恶心。

sentences.chinese: 货运公司

sentences.english: We’ll send your personal belongings by air freight and your furniture by sea freight .
sentences.chinese: 你的个人物品我们将以空运方式运送，家具将以海运方式运送。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are carried by ship, train, or aircraft, and the system of moving these goods

trans: 紧握；柄；支配；握拍方式；拍柄绷带

sentences.chinese: 紧紧握住麦克风不要让它动。

sentences.chinese: 她觉得手腕像是卡在铁钳里被牢牢地抓住了。

sentences.chinese: …19世纪的最后10年。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 10 years

sentences.chinese: 她有讲不完的有趣故事。

sentences.english: We’ve decided to stain the shelves blue.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把架子涂成蓝色。

a mark that is difficult to remove, especially one made by a liquid such as blood, coffee, or ink

sentences.english: Beneath that aloof exterior, Gayle is a warm, sympathetic person.
sentences.chinese: 在冷漠的外表下，盖尔是个有同情心的热心人。

detailed_translations.english: unfriendly and deliberately not talking to other people

sentences.english: First use some iodine to disinfect the wound.
sentences.chinese: 先用碘酒给伤口消毒。

sentences.english: Disinfect the area thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 把这个区域彻底消毒。

detailed_translations.english: to clean something with a chemical that destroys  bacteria

a friendly act of touching someone with your hand flat
to lightly touch someone or something several times with your hand flat, especially to give comfort

sentences.english: You need to pay the amount owing, plus the interest.
sentences.chinese: 你需要付清欠款，外加利息。

name: SAP

使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

detailed_translations.chinese: [植] 树液；精力，元气；活力；坑道
使衰竭，使伤元气；挖掘以破坏基础

name: inhuman
trans: 残忍的；野蛮的；无人性的

sentences.english: The refugees had suffered degrading and inhuman treatment.
sentences.chinese: 难民遭受了侮辱性和非人的待遇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 残忍的；野蛮的；无人性的

sentences.english: the importance of marital fidelity

detailed_translations.english: when you are loyal to your husband, girlfriend etc, by not having sex with anyone else

sentences.chinese: 吸入氨气是很危险的。

sentences.chinese: 迈拉又点上一支烟，深深地吸了一口。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe in air, smoke, or gas

sentences.english: ...without access to any services such as water or sewerage.
sentences.chinese: ...不能享受任何如供水或污水处理的服务。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which waste material and used water are carried away in sewers and then treated to stop it being harmful

name: sensitive
trans: 敏感的；感觉的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的；易受影响的
敏感的人；有灵异能力的人

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

sentences.english: a highly sensitive electronic camera
sentences.chinese: 高敏感度的电子摄像机

detailed_translations.english: easily upset or offended by events or things that people say

name: tertiary
trans: 第三纪；第三修道会会员；第三级教士
第三的；第三位的；三代的

sentences.chinese: 他一定是通过第二手或第三手资料了解那些哲学家的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 第三纪；第三修道会会员；第三级教士
第三的；第三位的；三代的

sentences.chinese: 晚饭后，我绕着城溜达了一圈。

detailed_translations.english: a slow relaxed walk

trans: 使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋

sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴， 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

sentences.english: independent organizations and alliances
sentences.chinese: 独立组织和联盟

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something

sentences.english: Betty adores her grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂非常宠爱孙辈。

detailed_translations.english: to love someone very much and feel very proud of them

sentences.english: Last year I had an audience of schoolchildren and they laughed at everything.
sentences.chinese: 去年我有一群小学生听众，他们听到什么都哈哈大笑。

detailed_translations.english: a child attending school

name: prefix
trans: 加前缀；将某事物加在前面

sentences.english: To telephone from the U.S. use the prefix 011 33 before the numbers given here.
sentences.chinese: 从美国拨出电话，请在所给号码前加拨前置代码011 33。

detailed_translations.english: a group of letters that is added to the beginning of a word to change its meaning and make a new word, such as ‘un’ in ‘untie’ or ‘mis’ in ‘misunderstand’

detailed_translations.chinese: 加前缀；将某事物加在前面
detailed_translations.english: to add a prefix to a word, name, or set of numbers

name: satire
trans: 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品

sentences.english: the characteristic use of satire in Jonson’s work
sentences.chinese: 琼森作品中讽刺手法的独到运用

detailed_translations.chinese: 讽刺；讽刺文学，讽刺作品
detailed_translations.english: a way of criticizing something such as a group of people or a system, in which you deliberately make them seem funny so that people will see their faults

name: loom
trans: 织布机；若隐若现的景象
可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见

sentences.english: Vincent loomed over me, as pale and grey as a tombstone.
sentences.chinese: 文森特赫然出现在我面前，脸色苍白阴沉得像块墓碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 织布机；若隐若现的景象
detailed_translations.english: a frame or machine on which thread is woven into cloth

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕地出现；朦胧地出现；隐约可见
detailed_translations.english: to appear as a large unclear shape, especially in a threatening way

sentences.english: The seamstress bound the hem of the dress with a ruffle.
sentences.chinese: 女裁缝用褶裥饰边给女上衣镶边。

detailed_translations.english: the edge of a piece of cloth that is turned under and stitched down, especially the lower edge of a skirt, trousers etc
to turn under the edge of a piece of material or clothing and stitch it in place

sentences.english: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.chinese: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.chinese: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.english: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

detailed_translations.english: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes

name: cosmopolitan
trans: 世界性的；世界主义的，四海一家的
四海为家者；世界主义者；世界各地都有的东西

sentences.english: a vibrant, cosmopolitan city
sentences.chinese: 一个充满活力的国际性都市

sentences.english: a lively hotel with a cosmopolitan atmosphere
sentences.chinese: 一家有着国际化氛围的、热闹的宾馆

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界性的；世界主义的，四海一家的
detailed_translations.english: a cosmopolitan place has people from many different parts of the world – use this to show approval

detailed_translations.chinese: 四海为家者；世界主义者；世界各地都有的东西

name: partition
trans: 划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物

sentences.english: ...new offices divided only by glass partitions.
sentences.chinese: …仅仅用玻璃隔板隔开的新办公室。

detailed_translations.chinese: 划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物
detailed_translations.english: a thin wall that separates one part of a room from another
to divide a country, building, or room into two or more parts

sentences.english: He surprised all the doctors by lingering on for several weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他拖了几个星期才去世，让所有的医生都很惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: to continue looking at or dealing with something for longer than is usual or desirable

sentences.english: the school disco
sentences.chinese: 学校的迪斯科舞会

detailed_translations.english: a place or social event at which people dance to recorded popular music

sentences.english: The bolts met all the engineering specifications.
sentences.chinese: 这些螺栓符合所有的工程设计规格。

sentences.english: a specification of what role each member will play
sentences.chinese: 每名成员担当什么角色的具体说明

detailed_translations.english: a detailed instruction about how a car, building, piece of equipment etc should be made

name: slap
trans: 拍击；侮辱；掌击；掴…的耳光

sentences.english: Sarah slapped Aaron across the face.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉在阿龙的脸上掴了一巴掌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拍击；侮辱；掌击；掴…的耳光
detailed_translations.english: to hit a surface with a lot of force, making a loud sharp sound
a quick hit with the flat part of your hand

name: irritation
trans: 刺激；激怒，恼怒，生气；兴奋；令人恼火的事

sentences.english: The heavy traffic is a constant source of irritation.
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的交通一向是令人头痛的问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺激；激怒，恼怒，生气；兴奋；令人恼火的事
detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being annoyed about something, especially something that happens repeatedly or for a long time

name: reflect
trans: 反映；反射，照出；表达；显示;反省

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

trans: 在…上掘沟；把…开入沟里；丢弃

sentences.chinese: 在他后面，在雪橇中间一个高得多的座位上，坐着一个与众不同的女人，她比爱德蒙以前见过的任何一个女人都要高大。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.

sentences.english: She wouldn't understand the hint, but followed me to a sideboard, where I went to lay my bonnet, and importuned me in a whisper to give her directly what I had brought.
sentences.chinese: 她不懂这个暗示，却跟着我到一个餐具柜那儿，我是到那儿放下我的帽子的，她低声央求我把我所带来的东西马上给她。

sentences.english: Instead, I fainted and hit my head on the sideboard, my last thought before passing out being that maybe if I hit myself hard enough I would get a couple of days in bed. A while off school.
sentences.chinese: 我想要对他们都表示感谢，但我却昏倒了，头撞在了食具柜上，在我即将昏迷的那一瞬，我最后的念头是，如果撞得足够厉害，或许可以卧床休息一两天，那样可以有几天不用去学校，并能使别人对我稍加观注。

鹰；鹰派成员；掠夺他人的人

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

name: fitted
trans: 合适的；订做的；有…设备的
适应（fit的过去分词）；合适；为…提供设备

sentences.english: a fitted wardrobe

sentences.chinese: 配有定制设备的厨房

name: voucher

sentences.chinese: 这种购物券可以在大多数大型超市使用。

sentences.english: First prize is a £1,000 travel voucher.

sentences.english: I think someone at this table with blond curly hair should enter.
sentences.chinese: 我认为坐在餐桌边的金发卷毛的人应该参加。

sentences.english: Even the tall Teutonic blond fellow who gave me an unsteady smile as I took the mat next to him is frightened — once I’d sat down, I could see he was shaking.
sentences.chinese: 甚至那个当我要拿起他旁边的一个坐垫时对我颤抖着微笑的高大的日耳曼的金发家伙也很害怕。 有一次我要坐下，就看到他正在发抖着。

sentences.english: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

name: fluff

sentences.chinese: 他在揪裤子上的绒毛球。

sentences.english: a ball of carpet fluff

sentences.english: She has a tendency to generalize from her husband to all men.
sentences.chinese: 她总爱把自己对丈夫的看法推及所有的男人。

投掷；使…不安；突然抬起；使…上下摇动；与…掷币打赌

sentences.english: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.chinese: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 掷钱币来决定； 猛抬头
detailed_translations.english: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game

sentences.english: the old superstition that walking under a ladder is unlucky
sentences.chinese: 认为从梯子下面穿过不吉利的古老迷信

sentences.english: The thermometer registered over 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 温度计显示高于100摄氏度。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that measures the temperature of the air, of your body etc

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

sentences.english: She was cycling home when she had a puncture .
sentences.chinese: 她骑车回家途中轮胎被扎破了。

detailed_translations.english: a small hole made accidentally in a tyre
if a tyre punctures, or if you puncture it, a small hole appears in it

sentences.english: the film’s lavish costumes and spectacular sets
sentences.chinese: 影片中奢华的戏装和壮观的场景

sentences.english: Hallowe’en costumes
sentences.chinese: 万圣节前夕化装服

detailed_translations.english: a set of clothes worn by an actor or by someone to make them look like something such as an animal, famous person etc

sentences.english: He smiled at them with gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 他向他们笑了笑表示谢意。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being grateful and wanting to express your thanks

sentences.english: Jo wore a long wig that made her look very sexy.
sentences.chinese: 乔带着一头长长的假发，使她看起来很性感。

detailed_translations.english: artificial hair that you wear on your head

name: critic
trans: 批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

trans: 值得尊敬的；人格高尚的；相当数量的

sentences.english: hard-working, respectable people
sentences.chinese: 勤勉可敬的人

sentences.english: a respectable family
sentences.chinese: 正经人家

sentences.english: Put a tie on - it’ll make you look more respectable.
sentences.chinese: 戴上领带，这样显得更体面。

detailed_translations.english: considered by society to be acceptable, good or correct

name: uninformative
trans: 不提供信息的；不增长见闻的

sentences.english: It was a singularly uninformative document.
sentences.chinese: 它是一份格外缺乏信息的文件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不提供信息的；不增长见闻的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is uninformative does not give you enough useful information

sentences.english: ...a tumbler with about an inch of whiskey in it.
sentences.chinese: …一个装了大约一英寸高的威士忌酒的大玻璃杯。

detailed_translations.english: Whiskey is a strong alcoholic drink made, especially in the United States and Ireland, from grain such as barley or rye

sentences.english: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩用他的刀子换了一个板球棒。

sentences.english: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.chinese: 比赛失败后，他生气地踏死了他的蟋蟀。

sentences.english: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.chinese: 他是被强拉去参加这场板球义赛的。

detailed_translations.english: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks

sentences.english: Those who knew him are saddened by his death.
sentences.chinese: 认识他的那些人都为他的去世感到难过。
