name: appreciable
trans: 可感知的；可评估的；相当可观的

sentences.english: There’s no appreciable change in the patient’s condition.
sentences.chinese: 病人的状况没有明显改变。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可感知的；可评估的；相当可观的
detailed_translations.english: An appreciable amount or effect is large enough to be important or clearly noticed

name: keynote
trans: 给…定基调；说明基本政策

sentences.english: He would be setting out his plans for the party in a keynote speech.
sentences.chinese: 他将在一次主题发言中陈述他对该政党的规划。

detailed_translations.english: the main point in a book, system of beliefs, activity etc that influences everything else

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…定基调；说明基本政策

sentences.english: The smell of gunpowder filled his nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 火药味灌进他的鼻孔。

sentences.english: the horse’s flaring nostrils
sentences.chinese: 马儿张大的鼻孔

detailed_translations.english: one of the two holes at the end of your nose, through which you breathe and smell things

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: a sulky child
sentences.chinese: 生闷气的孩子

sentences.english: He put on a sulky expression.
sentences.chinese: 他板起了脸。

sentences.english: Katherine sat in a sulky silence.
sentences.chinese: 凯瑟琳闷闷不乐地坐着，一声不吭。

detailed_translations.english: sulking, or tending to sulk

sentences.english: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

detailed_translations.english: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
to move around within a system, or to make something do this

sentences.english: Grains are sold by the bushel.
sentences.chinese: 谷物论蒲式耳出售。

sentences.english: Wheat averages 56 pounds to a bushel.
sentences.chinese: 小麦平均 56 磅为一蒲式耳。

sentences.english: Corn in Chicago has jumped 45 percent this year and traded at $6.035 a bushel today, while wheat has gained 41 percent and soybeans have rallied 27 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在芝加哥，今年的玉米价格已经涨了45%到6.035美元一蒲式耳（体积单位），而小麦和大豆价格分别上涨了：41%和27%。

detailed_translations.english: A bushel is a unit of volume that is used for measuring agricultural produce such as corn or beans. A bushel is equivalent in volume to eight gallons \(35.2 litres\).

name: gross
trans: 总共的；粗野的；恶劣的；显而易见的

sentences.english: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.chinese: 他用最粗俗的字眼辱骂那位海军上将。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone's speech or behaviour is gross, you think it is very coarse, vulgar, or unacceptable

sentences.english: a repertory company
sentences.chinese: 轮演剧目剧团

detailed_translations.english: a repertoire

name: host
trans: [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多

sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on an axis between the north and south poles.
sentences.chinese: 地球绕着南北两极之间的地轴自转。

detailed_translations.english: the imaginary line around which a large round object, such as the Earth, turns

name: lunar
trans: 月亮的，月球的；阴历的；银的；微亮的

sentences.english: studies of the lunar surface
sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

name: layoff
trans: 活动停止期间；临时解雇；操作停止；失业期

sentences.english: It will close more than 200 stores nationwide resulting in the layoffs of an estimated 2,000 employees.
sentences.chinese: 在全国范围内将关闭二百多家商店，造成约两千人失业。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活动停止期间；临时解雇；操作停止；失业期
detailed_translations.english: When there are layoffs in a company, people become unemployed because there is no more work for them in the company

name: admittedly
trans: 公认地；无可否认地；明白地

sentences.english: This has led to financial losses, though admittedly on a fairly small scale.
sentences.chinese: 这已造成了经济损失，尽管这个损失其实还比较小。

detailed_translations.chinese: 公认地；无可否认地；明白地
detailed_translations.english: used when you are admitting that something is true

sentences.english: ...the vivid kaleidoscope of colours displayed in the plumage of the peacock.
sentences.chinese: ...孔雀羽毛的五彩缤纷。

detailed_translations.english: a pattern, situation, or scene that is always changing and has many details or bright colours

sentences.chinese: 池面上的涟漪

sentences.chinese: 她跳入池中，几乎没有泛起水波。

detailed_translations.english: a small low wave on the surface of a liquid
to make a noise like water that is flowing gently

sentences.english: These households comprised of an old man and an old spinster are not rare, and always have the touching aspect of two weaknesses leaning on each other for support.
sentences.chinese: 这种由一个老头子和一个老姑娘组成的家庭是一点不稀罕的，那种两老相依为命的情景总会令人怅然神往。

sentences.english: There was also in this house, between this elderly spinster and this old man, a child, a little boy, who was always trembling and mute in the presence of M. Gillenormand.
sentences.chinese: 在这家人里，除了那个老姑娘和那老头以外，还有一个小孩，一个在吉诺曼先生面前便会发抖沉默的小男孩。

detailed_translations.english: an unmarried woman, usually one who is no longer young and seems unlikely to marry

name: glossary
trans: 术语（特殊用语）表；词汇表；专业词典

sentences.english: A glossary of terms is included for the reader's convenience.
sentences.chinese: 为了方便读者，还收录了术语汇编。

detailed_translations.english: a list of special words and explanations of their meanings, often at the end of a book

sentences.chinese: 工作每况愈下，他就开始借酒消愁。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long sticks that you put under your arms to help you walk when you have hurt your leg

sentences.english: But remember to do your homework before stepping into the conference hall, or you will feel like a rudderless boat in mid-sea.
sentences.chinese: 但是要记得在走进会议大厅之前做好准备工作，否则你会感到就像在大海中间的一艘无舵的小船。

detailed_translations.english: of, relating to, or denoting a vowel whose articulation lies approximately halfway between high and low, such as e in English bet
among or in the middle of

sentences.english: James bore her no malice (= did not feel any malice towards her ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对她并无恶意。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to harm someone because you hate them

sentences.english: There is still much antagonism between environmental groups and the oil companies.
sentences.chinese: 环境组织与石油公司之间仍有很多敌意。

detailed_translations.english: hatred between people or groups of people

name: chariot
trans: 驾驭（过去式charioted，过去分词charioted，现在分词charioting，第三人称单数chariots）

sentences.english: Then, when much blood had clogged their chariot-wheels, I would go up and wash them from sweet wells, Even with truths that lie too deep for taint.
sentences.chinese: 因此当大量的血液凝固，阻塞了战车前进的轮之际，我就要起身，用甘甜清澈的井水刷洗猩红，甚至是用深深隐藏在污点后的事实。

sentences.english: When humans first started building things, determining whether they would work as planned was mostly a matter of trial and error. Build a bridge, drive a chariot across it, and see if it collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 一开始人类建造房屋时,决定房屋是否合格的方法是去试一下,看看有什么不妥的地方.建成一座桥,把辆战车开上面跑一跑,看看桥会不会倒.

sentences.english: I drove my chariot to the vineyard gate, and there I saw the twoKings.
sentences.chinese: 我驾着战车来到葡萄园的门口，看到了那两个国王。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with two wheels pulled by a horse, used in ancient times in battles and races

detailed_translations.chinese: 驾驭（过去式charioted，过去分词charioted，现在分词charioting，第三人称单数chariots）

sentences.english: He would brook no criticism, even from his beloved daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他不能容忍任何批评，哪怕是自己深爱的女儿也不行。

detailed_translations.english: to not allow or accept something
a small stream

sentences.english: a tall girl with straight brown hair and a fringe
sentences.chinese: 一头棕色直发、留着刘海的高个子女孩

sentences.english: The monarchists are a small fringe group who quarrel fiercely among themselves.
sentences.chinese: 君主制拥护者们是个边缘性小团体，内部争吵激烈。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a fringe, your hair is cut so that it hangs down over your forehead
Fringe groups or events are less important or popular than other related groups or events

name: reaction
trans: 反应，感应；反动，复古；反作用

sentences.english: What was Jeff’s reaction when you told him about the job?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉杰夫这个工作时，他是什么反应？

detailed_translations.english: something that you feel or do because of something that has happened or been said

name: bachelor
trans: 学士；单身汉；（尚未交配的）小雄兽

sentences.english: Gerald was 38, and a confirmed bachelor (=  a man who has decided that he will never marry  ) .
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德38岁，抱定主意独身。

sentences.english: a Bachelor of Arts/Engineering/Science
sentences.chinese: 文学士；工程学士；理学士

detailed_translations.english: a man who has never been married

sentences.english: We rented a holiday villa in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 我们在西班牙租了一座假日别墅。

detailed_translations.english: a house that you use or rent while you are on holiday

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

sentences.english: Water splashed onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 水哗的一声泼洒在地板上。

sentences.english: He splashed cold water on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把冷水往脸上泼。

sentences.english: We heard the splash when she fell into the pool.
sentences.chinese: 她掉进游泳池时我们听见扑通的一声。

detailed_translations.english: (of liquid) to fall noisily onto a surface
the sound of sth hitting liquid or of liquid hitting sth

sentences.english: a bar stool
sentences.chinese: 酒吧高凳

detailed_translations.english: a seat that has three or four legs, but no back or arms

sentences.english: the Thames estuary
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河河口

detailed_translations.english: the wide part of a river where it goes into the sea

sentences.english: The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimetres long.
sentences.chinese: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 1,000 millimetres in one metre.

name: interviewer
trans: 采访者；会见者；面谈者；进行面试者

sentences.english: Being a good interviewer, however, requires much preparation and skill.
sentences.chinese: 不过，好的采访者需要许多准备和技巧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 采访者；会见者；面谈者；进行面试者
detailed_translations.english: the person who asks the questions in an interview

sentences.english: A range of official Disney merchandise was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 一系列正版的迪士尼商品在出售。

sentences.english: They inspected the merchandise carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他们仔细地检查了商品。

detailed_translations.english: goods that are being sold
to try to sell goods or services using methods such as advertising

sentences.english: The merit of the report is its realistic assessment of the changes required.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告的优点就是它对所要求的变动进行了实事求是的评估。

sentences.english: The great merit of the project is its flexibility and low cost.
sentences.chinese: 该项目最大的优点是它的灵活性和低成本。

sentences.english: Each of these approaches to teaching has its merits .
sentences.chinese: 这些教学方法每一种都有其优点。

sentences.english: Tonight’s meeting will weigh up the relative merits of the two candidates.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的会议将对两位候选人的相对优点进行考量。

sentences.english: It’s a fascinating book which merits attention.
sentences.chinese: 这是本引人入胜的书，值得关注。

detailed_translations.english: an advantage or good feature of something
to be good, important, or serious enough for praise or attention

name: diver
trans: 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟

sentences.english: Police divers have recovered the body of a sixteen year old boy.
sentences.chinese: 警方潜水员已经发现了一个16岁男孩的尸体。

detailed_translations.chinese: 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟
detailed_translations.english: someone who swims or works under water using special equipment to help them breathe

sentences.english: We apologise for the delay and any inconvenience caused.
sentences.chinese: 我们对延误和由此造成的不便深感抱歉。

detailed_translations.english: problems caused by something which annoy or affect you
to cause problems for someone

name: universal
trans: 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

name: overtime
trans: [劳经] 加班时间；延长时间；加时赛

sentences.english: six hours’ overtime
sentences.chinese: 六小时的加班

sentences.english: They’re working overtime to get the job finished.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在加班赶工。

sentences.english: He’s been doing a lot of overtime recently.
sentences.chinese: 他近来加班很多。

sentences.english: Many employees work countless hours of unpaid overtime.
sentences.chinese: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.english: Many of our offices will be working on overtime until the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

detailed_translations.chinese: [劳经] 加班时间；延长时间；加时赛
detailed_translations.english: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours

sentences.english: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

detailed_translations.english: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc

sentences.english: a razor blade
sentences.chinese: 剃刀刀片

detailed_translations.english: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: obstinate
trans: 顽固的；倔强的；难以控制的

sentences.english: He was the most obstinate man I’ve ever met.
sentences.chinese: 他是我遇到过的最固执的人。

sentences.english: Don’t be so obstinate!
sentences.chinese: 别这么固执！

sentences.english: an obstinate refusal to obey
sentences.chinese: 固执地拒绝服从

detailed_translations.chinese: 顽固的；倔强的；难以控制的
detailed_translations.english: determined not to change your ideas, behaviour, opinions etc, even when other people think you are being unreasonable

name: geometric
trans: 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的

sentences.english: a geometric design
sentences.chinese: 几何图形设计

detailed_translations.chinese: 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的
detailed_translations.english: having or using the shapes and lines in  geometry  , such as circles or squares, especially when these are arranged in regular patterns

name: sign
trans: 迹象；符号；记号；手势；指示牌

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning

sentences.english: The flood waters finally began to recede in November.
sentences.chinese: 11 月，洪水终于开始退去。

detailed_translations.english: if water recedes, it moves back from an area that it was covering

sentences.english: The eagle perched on a nearby branch and said, "You can save the dove, but that means you're starving me.

sentences.chinese: 该项研究的具体内容将会在本月末公布，其中的一项内容是一个游戏，参与者可以选择成为“鸽派”的角色， 与他人合作共享利益， 或者成为“鹰派”的角色。

sentences.english: As ‘hawks' they had the chance to gain more if the other participant chose to be a ‘dove’.
sentences.chinese: 作为鹰派， 他们有机会可以赚得更多， 如果其他的参与者选择成为鸽派。

detailed_translations.english: a kind of small white  pigeon (= bird )  often used as a sign of peace

name: motivate
trans: 刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性

sentences.chinese: 好教师必须能够激发学生的积极性。

trans: 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕；快速轻吻

sentences.chinese: 已是冬天了，麻雀们能找到什么就啄食什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕；快速轻吻

detailed_translations.chinese: 过路费，过桥费；伤亡人数，损失
detailed_translations.english: the number of people killed or injured in a particular accident, by a particular illness etc

trans: [化学] 钠（11号元素，符号 Na）

sentences.chinese: 一平茶匙碳酸氢钠粉末

detailed_translations.english: a common silver-white metal that usually exists in combination with other substances, for example in salt. It is a chemical element: symbol Na

sentences.english: wet grass

the rain
to make something wet

sentences.english: a bottle of tomato ketchup
sentences.chinese: 一瓶番茄酱

detailed_translations.english: a thick cold red sauce made from tomatoes that you put on food

sentences.english: Objective To observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察臭氧水在胃镜体的消毒效果监测。

sentences.chinese: 大气中的氧和（或）臭氧与紫外线协同作用是导致该压敏粘合剂失粘的原因。

sentences.chinese: 测验成绩各校不同。

detailed_translations.english: if several things of the same type vary, they are all different from each other

sentences.chinese: 我们知道怎样去阻止疟疾。

sentences.english: The campaign to eradicate malaria did not.
sentences.chinese: 而根除疟疾运动则未做到这一点。

sentences.english: To reach our goal of near zero deaths from malaria by 2015, we need an extraordinary intensification of our actions in two key areas.
sentences.chinese: 我们要想在2015年以前达到疟疾死亡人数近于零的目标，必须格外加强我们在两个关键领域的行动。

name: gear
trans: 齿轮；装置，工具；传动装置
适合；搭上齿轮；开始工作

sentences.english: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.chinese: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.chinese: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.chinese: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.chinese: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.english: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.chinese: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.chinese: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.chinese: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.english: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.chinese: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 齿轮，传动装置，排挡；用具，设备；衣服
detailed_translations.english: the machinery in a vehicle such as a car, truck, or bicycle that you use to go comfortably at different speeds
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose

sentences.english: A discussion took place respecting the provision of science teaching.
sentences.chinese: 关于自然科学课的开设展开了一场讨论。

detailed_translations.english: about or relating to something

sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

sentences.chinese: “救救我！”她歇斯底里地大叫。

sentences.english: The crowd are on their feet yelling.
sentences.chinese: 观众站着高声呐喊。

sentences.english: He could hear Pete yelling at the top of his voice (= very loudly ).

trans: 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的；不友好的，冷淡的

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard

sentences.chinese: 花园里花朵大大的、富丽堂皇的牡丹花看上去美极了，这就是为什么我们总能在户外布景看到它们。

trans: 边缘；利润，余裕；页边的空白

sentences.chinese: 有人在页边写了条批注。

sentences.chinese: 采用双倍行距和宽阔的页边空白，以便留出地方写评注。

sentences.chinese: 20分钟的木偶表演

sentences.chinese: 这项政策与政府所宣称的目标基本上不符。

sentences.chinese: 孩子就是孩子，不管他们是否有白血病。

sentences.chinese: 与其他三种类型的白血病不同，慢性淋巴细胞白血病患者可能会有一些持续时间不长的病症。

sentences.chinese: 有一些我们认为可能有贡献，但如你所知，我们开了很多不同的药物，特别是给有白血病的儿童。

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

name: rosy
trans: 蔷薇色的，玫瑰红色的；美好的；乐观的；涨红脸的

sentences.chinese: 认为业务前景一片光明的公司

sentences.chinese: 写给欧洲亲戚的信把美国的生活描绘得如花似锦。

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rosy)人名；(罗、意、瑞、典)罗茜(女名)，罗西；(英)罗茜

name: inherent
trans: 固有的；内在的；与生俱来的，遗传的

sentences.chinese: 每笔生意本身都有风险。

sentences.chinese: 这是座很不错的城市，唯一的不足就是天气。

sentences.chinese: 他出去再砍些木材来生火。

sentences.chinese: 你能帮我切一些胡萝卜吗？

sentences.chinese: 加上两个切碎的洋葱和一瓣大蒜。

sentences.english: tidal currents
sentences.chinese: 潮流

detailed_translations.chinese: 潮汐的；潮的，有关潮水的；定时涨落的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the regular rising and falling of the sea

sentences.chinese: 我很高兴主持你们的会议。

sentences.english: Mr Justice Waller, presiding judge for the northeast
sentences.chinese: 沃勒法官，东北地区的首席法官

detailed_translations.english: to be in charge of a formal event, organization, ceremony etc

sentences.chinese: 55英里的时速限制

sentences.chinese: 商家开张停业惊人地频繁。

name: singular
trans: 单数的；单一的；非凡的；异常的

sentences.chinese: 该名词的单数形式

sentences.chinese: 如果主语是单数，就用单数动词。

sentences.chinese: 政治宣传的开展

sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

鬼鬼祟祟的人；偷偷摸摸的行为；告密者

to go somewhere secretly and quietly in order to avoid being seen or heard

sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

detailed_translations.english: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away

sentences.chinese: 有毒废料堆产生的毒气

detailed_translations.english: containing poison, or caused by poisonous substances

name: disguise
trans: 伪装；假装；用作伪装的东西

sentences.chinese: 他无意掩饰他的不安。

sentences.english: He is a master of disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他是伪装高手。

trans: 提高；增高；加强；使更显著

sentences.chinese: 有人担心这次游行会加深种族间的紧张局势。

trans: 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的

sentences.english: Mobile phones have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经成为我们生活中的必需品。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is indispensable is so important or useful that it is impossible to manage without them

trans: 好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩

sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.english: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.english: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.english: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.english: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy

trans: 高雅的，优雅的；讲究的；简炼的；简洁的

sentences.chinese: 身材高挑、举止优雅的年轻女子

sentences.english: You can dine in elegant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在雅致的环境中进餐。

detailed_translations.english: beautiful, attractive, or graceful

sentences.chinese: 计算机瘫痪了，我们所有的记录都被删除了。

sentences.english: There was a great demand for engravings of his portrait, and his head was being modelled by an admiring sculptor.
sentences.chinese: 人们强烈要求要帮他做一个雕塑，一位有名的雕刻家正在把他的头像做成模型。

sentences.english: We can take the mysterious， hazy future and carve out of it anything that we can imagine， just like a sculptor carves a statue from a shapeless stone.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以掌握神秘而不可知的未来，从中创出我们所能想象的任何东西，一如雕刻家可以将未成型的石头刻出雕像一样。

sentences.english: This is what the sculptor must do.
sentences.chinese: 而雕塑家就必须做到这一点。

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes sculptures

sentences.english: the members of the jury

sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定他无罪。

sentences.english: the right to trial by jury
sentences.chinese: 由陪审团进行审理的权利

trans: 保险丝，熔线；导火线，雷管

sentences.chinese: 两根13安培的保险丝

sentences.english: I taught him how to change a fuse .
sentences.chinese: 我教他怎么换保险丝。

sentences.english: A bomb was deactivated at the last moment, after the fuse had been lit.
sentences.chinese: 一枚炸弹在导火线已被点燃后的最后一刻被解除。

sentences.english: The skull bones fuse between the ages of fifteen and twenty-five.
sentences.chinese: 颅骨在15和25岁之间长合。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合; 融合; 熔合
detailed_translations.english: if electrical equipment fuses, or if you fuse it, it stops working because a fuse has melted

sentences.chinese: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange things or put them in their places

trans: 盒式磁带；暗盒；珠宝箱；片匣

sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

sentences.chinese: 如果不是被惹恼了，那狗原本不会攻击的。

sentences.english: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.chinese: 英语、荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言。

detailed_translations.english: people from the Netherlands

name: soldierly
trans: 军人的；适于军人的；英勇的

sentences.english: Napoleon read out the orders for the week in a gruff soldierly style, and after a single singing of Beasts of Engl and, all the animals dispersed.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑用一种粗暴的军人风格，宣读对下一周的安排，随后只唱了一遍“英格兰兽”，所有的动物就解散了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 军人的；适于军人的；英勇的
detailed_translations.english: typical of a good soldier

sentences.chinese: 同义词和反义词词典

sentences.chinese: 她希望地中海的气候能使她的身体完全复原。

sentences.chinese: 暴乱爆发后，国民警卫队被调来恢复秩序。

sentences.chinese: 一首极其美妙的钢琴独奏曲

sentences.chinese: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

sentences.chinese: 你愿意是一名消防队员吗？

sentences.chinese: 为什么你愿意是一名消防队员？

sentences.chinese: 每当有人来问我长大了要做什麽，我从来不会说消防员或是宇航员什麽的。

sentences.chinese: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.chinese: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

sentences.chinese: 好了，走开，不要捣乱。

sentences.chinese: 要是看不到尼克，就可以肯定他又在捣什么鬼了。

sentences.chinese: 足球还是水球？

sentences.chinese: 他刚从南非般到此地， 要将他的马球工具储存在我们的一个单元里。

sentences.chinese: 在炭火上做饭

weather that is a combination of light rain and mist

trans: 引座员，带位员；接待员；门房

sentences.chinese: 他曾在一家剧院做兼职引座员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引座员，带位员；接待员；门房

sentences.english: Jack and Stephen were waiting for them on the quay.
sentences.chinese: 杰克和斯蒂芬正在码头等他们。

sentences.english: measures to curb the spread of the virus
sentences.chinese: 控制病毒扩散的措施

detailed_translations.english: to control or limit something in order to prevent it from having a harmful effect

trans: 普罗阶级的，无产阶级的

sentences.english: ...a proletarian revolution.
sentences.chinese: ...一场无产阶级革命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 普罗阶级的，无产阶级的

sentences.chinese: 她穿上衣服并拉好拉链。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing

name: stationary
trans: 固定的；静止的；定居的；常备军的

sentences.chinese: 你是怎么开车的，竟会撞上一辆停着的车子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 固定的， 静止不动的
detailed_translations.english: standing still instead of moving

sentences.chinese: 伊莎贝尔房间里的花朵已经枯萎了。

detailed_translations.english: if plants wither, they become drier and smaller and start to die

sentences.english: The oil industry uses supercomputers to trawl seismic data before drilling wells.
sentences.chinese: 石油公司可以在钻井之前先拖网分析地震数据。

sentences.english: The new analysis used catch data as well as stock assessments, scientific trawl surveys, small-scale fishery data and modelling results.
sentences.chinese: 这项新研究利用捕捞量、种群评估、科学的拖网调查、小规模渔业数据以及模型进行分析。

sentences.english: But when you go to a tropical rainforest, it's easy to find new insects, and when you go to the deep sea and pull up a trawl, 90% of what you get can be undiscovered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是当进入热带雨林后，我们很容易就能发现新种类的昆虫；进入深海区域洒下一张拖网，你捕获的生物有90％是未被发现过的物种。

name: exile
trans: 流放，充军；放逐，被放逐者；流犯

sentences.chinese: 流亡国外的前总统

sentences.english: political exiles
sentences.chinese: 政治流亡者

name: gorge
trans: 峡谷；胃；暴食；咽喉；障碍物

sentences.chinese: 我可以将每一天都花在狂吃巧克力上。

detailed_translations.english: If you gorge on something or gorge yourself on it, you eat lots of it in a very greedy way
a deep narrow valley with steep sides

sentences.chinese: 骗子想骗取他的钱，可是没成功。

sentences.english: Althoughhis parents are proud of him and expect a great future for him in business, Ortiz is sad to report that some of his relatives think he's a swindler.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他的父母都为他感到骄傲并且期望他将来在商场上有所作为，欧迪兹却不乏感伤的说，他的一些亲戚认为他是骗子。

sentences.english: However, after seeing the show, his friends and business clients now see him as a master "swindler" , with some going so far as cutting ties with him. Even his fiancee shamed for him.
sentences.chinese: 但节目播出后，他的朋友、生意客户都将他视为高明的"骗子"，有的甚至不再和他来往，未婚妻也以他为耻。

sentences.english: Any annex is the integral part of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同一切附件均为本合同的有效组成部分。

sentences.english: The country's leading newspaper has called for a new campaign against child pornography.
sentences.chinese: 该国最大的报纸已呼吁开展一场新运动反对儿童色情作品。

detailed_translations.english: magazines, films etc that show sexual acts and images in a way that is intended to make people feel sexually excited

name: imaginative
trans: 富于想象的；有创造力的

sentences.english: an imaginative use of computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的妙用

sentences.english: children’s imaginative play
sentences.chinese: 儿童富有想象力的游戏

sentences.english: an imaginative solution to the litter problem
sentences.chinese: 解决乱扔垃圾的问题的有创意的方法

detailed_translations.english: containing new and interesting ideas

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["weapons of mass destruction"]}
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

sentences.english: The floods brought death and destruction to the area.
sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of destroying something or of being destroyed

sentences.english: They ran short of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 他们的汽油不够了。

sentences.english: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.chinese: “咦~~~~”难闻死了，像是汽油和花香混在一起。

sentences.english: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.chinese: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from petroleum, used mainly for producing power in the engines of cars, trucks etc

sentences.english: The roses have fungus.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花长了真菌。

sentences.english: So how do you kill a fungus without harming its host?
sentences.chinese: 问题在于，我们如何才能做到不伤害宿主只杀死真菌呢?。

sentences.english: Monokaryons of this fungus will grow readily as saprophytes in plate or liquid culture .
sentences.chinese: 这种真菌的单核体在平板或液体培养时能像腐生菌那样容易生长。

detailed_translations.english: a simple type of plant that has no leaves or flowers and that grows on plants or other surfaces.  mushrooms  and  mould  are both fungi.

sentences.english: We want to dispel the myth that you cannot eat well in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.english: Light poured into the hall, dispelling the shadows.
sentences.chinese: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

sentences.english: Have you got a dustpan and brush?
sentences.chinese: 你有畚箕和刷子吗？

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with a handle that you use with a brush to remove dust and waste from the floor

sentences.english: Chaplin’s comic genius is preserved on celluloid.
sentences.chinese: 卓别林的喜剧天才在电影里被保存了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on cinema film

name: alphabet
trans: 字母表，字母系统；入门，初步

sentences.english: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentences.chinese: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a set of letters, arranged in a particular order, and used in writing

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.english: Dr Alloway, from the University of Stirling in Scotland, has extensively studied working memory and believes it to be far more important to success and happiness than IQ.
sentences.chinese: 来自苏格兰的斯特灵大学阿洛韦博士，已经广泛的研究“工作记忆”，并认为它是比智商更为重要对于成功和幸福来说。

sentences.english: The college has revised its plans because of local objections.
sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.english: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

detailed_translations.english: to change something because of new information or ideas

name: yearn
trans: 渴望，向往；思念，想念；怀念；同情，怜悯

sentences.english: He yearned for freedom.
sentences.chinese: 他曾渴望自由。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong desire for something, especially something that is difficult or impossible to get

sentences.english: an underwater camera
sentences.chinese: 水下摄影机

sentences.english: ...giant submarines able to travel at high speeds underwater.
sentences.chinese: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.english: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.chinese: 有些沙滩在涨潮时会完全被水淹没。

detailed_translations.english: below the surface of an area of water, or able to be used there
Something that exists or happens underwater exists or happens below the surface of the ocean, a river, or a lake

sentences.english: These dogs are absolutely fearless.
sentences.chinese: 这些狗什么都不怕。

sentences.english: a fearless explorer
sentences.chinese: 一个无畏的探险者

detailed_translations.english: not afraid of anything

sentences.english: There have been hints that he may take up coaching.
sentences.chinese: 他暗示过可能会出任教练。

sentences.english: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint .’
sentences.chinese: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.english: I made it clear I wasn’t interested in him, but he didn’t take the hint .
sentences.chinese: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

name: successive
trans: 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的

sentences.chinese: 这支球队已经连胜五场了。

sentences.english: Successive governments have tried to deal with this issue.
sentences.chinese: 历届政府都试图解决这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: coming or following one after the other

name: application
trans: 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.english: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.english: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.english: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.chinese: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.english: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.english: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.chinese: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.chinese: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性
detailed_translations.english: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

name: stigma
trans: [植] 柱头；耻辱；污名；烙印；特征

sentences.english: There is a social stigma attached to single parenthood.
sentences.chinese: 单身父母在社会上的名声不光彩。

sentences.english: In the US, smoking carries a stigma .
sentences.chinese: 在美国，吸烟是不光彩的。

detailed_translations.chinese: [植] 柱头；耻辱；污名；烙印；特征
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling in society that being in a particular situation or having a particular illness is something to be ashamed of

name: aerial
trans: 空中的，航空的；空气的；空想的

sentences.english: an aerial attack
sentences.chinese: 空袭

sentences.english: aerial photographs
sentences.chinese: 在空中拍摄的照片

sentences.english: an aerial view of the Three Gorges Dam project
sentences.chinese: 一张三峡大坝工程鸟瞰图

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞机的，航空的；空中的，架空的
detailed_translations.english: from a plane
a piece of equipment for receiving or sending radio or television signals, usually consisting of a piece of metal or wire

sentences.english: the American Commander, General Otis
sentences.chinese: 美军指挥官奥蒂斯将军

sentences.english: our platoon commander
sentences.chinese: 我们的排长

detailed_translations.english: an officer of any rank who is in charge of a group of soldiers or a particular military activity

name: lace
trans: 花边；鞋带；饰带；少量烈酒

sentences.english: a handkerchief trimmed with lace
sentences.chinese: 饰有蕾丝花边的手绢

sentences.english: lace curtains
sentences.chinese: 网眼窗帘

detailed_translations.chinese: 花边；鞋带；饰带；少量烈酒
detailed_translations.english: a fine cloth made with patterns of many very small holes

sentences.english: In the wagon.
sentences.chinese: 在货车里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 四轮马车， 大篷车； 铁路货车， 客货两用车
detailed_translations.english: a strong vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying heavy loads and usually pulled by horses

sentences.english: Thomson was disqualified from the 400 metre freestyle.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆森被取消了400米自由泳的参赛资格。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from taking part in an activity because they have broken a rule

sentences.chinese: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.english: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.chinese: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

detailed_translations.chinese: 规定的，特定的；假设的；已知的；有癖好的，有倾向的
detailed_translations.english: any particular time, situation, amount etc that is being used as an example
taking something into account

name: album
trans: 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册

sentences.english: a photograph album
sentences.chinese: 相册

detailed_translations.chinese: 相簿；唱片集；集邮簿；签名纪念册
detailed_translations.english: a book that you put photographs, stamps etc in

name: gadget
trans: 小玩意；小器具；小配件；诡计

sentences.english: ...sales of kitchen gadgets including toasters, kettles, and percolators.
sentences.chinese: …厨房小用品的销售，包括烤面包机、水壶和咖啡渗滤壶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小玩意；小器具；小配件；诡计
detailed_translations.english: A gadget is a small machine or device which does something useful. You sometimes refer to something as a gadget when you are suggesting that it is complicated and unnecessary.

sentences.english: The cathedral is dwarfed by the surrounding skyscrapers.
sentences.chinese: 周围的摩天大楼使得大教堂显得很矮小。

detailed_translations.english: to be so big that other things are made to seem very small
a person who is a dwarf has not continued to grow to the normal height because of a medical condition. Many people think that this use is offensive.
a dwarf plant or animal is much smaller than the usual size

sentences.english: She admitted that she was unable to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to reach an agreement in which everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first
an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

name: inaccessible
trans: 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的

sentences.english: In winter, the villages are inaccessible by road.
sentences.chinese: 冬天时，进入这些村子的路很难走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 难达到的；难接近的；难见到的
detailed_translations.english: difficult or impossible to reach

sentences.english: He pulled out to overtake the van.
sentences.chinese: 他把车驶出所在车道想超过那辆小货车。

sentences.english: Never try to overtake on a bend.
sentences.chinese: 绝不要在转弯处超车。

detailed_translations.english: to go past a moving vehicle or person because you are going faster than them and want to get in front of them

name: press
trans: 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机

sentences.english: Oxford University Press
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学出版社

sentences.english: We were able to watch the books rolling off the presses.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以看到书本从印刷机上源源不断地印出。

detailed_translations.english: a business that prints and publishes books

sentences.english: Miss Williams confiscated all our sweets.
sentences.chinese: 威廉斯老师没收了我们所有的糖果。

sentences.english: Many opposition supporters had their goods confiscated.
sentences.chinese: 许多反对党支持者的财产被充公了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially take private property away from someone, usually as a punishment

sentences.english: ...his great interest in forestry.
sentences.chinese: …他对林业学的浓厚兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: the science or skill of looking after large areas of trees

name: prime
trans: 初期；青年；精华；全盛时期

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是为所有的年轻毕业生提供工作。

sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Good management is of prime importance in business.
sentences.chinese: 良好的经营管理在商业领域尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active
to prepare someone for a situation so that they know what to do

sentences.chinese: 女性在职场中仍然面临歧视。

sentences.english: It takes a long time to overcome these kinds of prejudices.
sentences.chinese: 战胜这些偏见需要假以时日。

sentences.chinese: 有人担心媒体的报道会影响陪审团的公正性。

sentences.chinese: 乘电梯到4楼，左边最后的那个办公室就是。

detailed_translations.english: a set of moving stairs that take people to different levels in a building

sentences.english: ...the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: …天主教会。

detailed_translations.english: connected with the Roman Catholic Church
a member of the Catholic Church

name: gallop
trans: 飞驰；急速进行；急急忙忙地说

sentences.chinese: 我被迫尝试一次骑马疾驰。

detailed_translations.english: a very fast speed

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞驰；急速进行；急急忙忙地说
detailed_translations.english: if a horse gallops, it moves very fast with all its feet leaving the ground together

sentences.english: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

trans: 开（黄金成色单位）；克拉（宝石的重量单位，等于carat）

detailed_translations.english: an American spelling of carat

name: miracle
trans: 奇迹，奇迹般的人或物；惊人的事例

sentences.english: It’s a miracle you weren’t killed!
sentences.chinese: 你没有死真是奇迹！

sentences.english: By some miracle, we managed to catch the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们奇迹般地赶上了飞机。

sentences.english: the economic miracle of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济奇迹

sentences.chinese: 她是我们的奇迹宝宝。

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: stun
trans: 使震惊；打昏；给以深刻的印象
昏迷；打昏；惊倒；令人惊叹的事物

sentences.english: Redfern stunned the crowd with a last-minute goal.
sentences.chinese: 雷德芬在最后一分钟进球，使观众很是震惊。

detailed_translations.english: to surprise or upset someone so much that they do not react immediately

name: unaccepted
trans: 未被接纳的；被拒绝的；不承担的

detailed_translations.chinese: 未被接纳的；被拒绝的；不承担的

sentences.english: Burning sulphur creates poisonous fumes.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧的硫磺会产生有毒烟雾。

detailed_translations.english: a common light yellow chemical substance that burns with a very strong unpleasant smell, and is used in drugs, explosives, and industry. It is a chemical element :symbol S

sentences.english: A little lizard scuttled across the path.
sentences.chinese: 一条小蜥蜴急急地从路上爬过。

detailed_translations.english: a container for carrying coal

name: turnover
trans: 翻覆；[贸易] 营业额；流通量；半圆卷饼；失误

sentences.english: The company had a turnover of $3.8 million.
sentences.chinese: 那个公司拥有380万美元的营业额。

detailed_translations.chinese: 营业额， 成交量； 人员调整， 人员更替率
detailed_translations.english: the amount of business done during a particular period

name: venue
trans: 审判地；犯罪地点；发生地点；集合地点

sentences.english: The first thing to do is book a venue.
sentences.chinese: 首先要做的是预订一个会场。

sentences.english: The band will play (= perform at ) as many venues as possible.
sentences.chinese: 那支乐队将在尽可能多的地方演出。

detailed_translations.english: a place where an organized meeting, concert etc takes place

name: seal
trans: 密封；印章；海豹；封条；标志

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

sentences.english: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees C.
sentences.chinese: 把烤箱预热至200摄氏度。

sentences.english: Press the mixture onto the bread and bake in a hot oven for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把混合料抹在面包上，然后在烤箱内高温烘烤10分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front

sentences.english: He’s a very keen sportsman .
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常喜爱运动的人。

sentences.english: a talented all-round sportsman
sentences.chinese: 一名有天赋的全能运动员

detailed_translations.english: a man who plays several different sports

name: soot
trans: 用煤烟熏黑；以煤烟弄脏

sentences.english: ...a wall blackened by soot.
sentences.chinese: …一堵被煤烟灰熏黑了的墙。

detailed_translations.english: black powder that is produced when something is burned

detailed_translations.chinese: 用煤烟熏黑；以煤烟弄脏

sentences.english: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

sentences.english: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是令人喜悦的爱情庆典。

detailed_translations.english: very happy, or likely to make people very happy

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.english: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book
sentences.chinese: 书里的主人公

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

name: tube
trans: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

sentences.english: a tube of toothpaste
sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.english: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

name: voluntary
trans: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

sentences.english: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 工人被鼓励主动离职。

detailed_translations.english: done willingly and without being forced

sentences.english: Billy continued to stand there, mute and defiant.
sentences.chinese: 比利还是站在那儿一声不吭，一副不服气的样子。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is mute does not speak, or refuses to speak
to make the sound of something quieter, or make it disappear completely
a small piece of metal, rubber etc that you place over or into a musical instrument to make it sound softer

sentences.english: Liaison between police forces and the art world is vital to combat art crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方和艺术界之间的联络对于打击艺术犯罪是至关重要的。

detailed_translations.english: the regular exchange of information between groups of people, especially at work, so that each group knows what the other is doing

sentences.english: The Puritans left England to escape being persecuted.
sentences.chinese: 清教徒离开了英国以躲避迫害。

detailed_translations.english: to treat someone cruelly or unfairly over a period of time, especially because of their religious or political beliefs

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct

sentences.english: Teacher: "John, what is the past participle of the verb to ring?"
sentences.chinese: 老师：“John，动词ring的过去分词是什么？”

sentences.english: Some, like swonken (the past participle of swink, meaning “to toil”, but also used to mean coupling), have disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 如swonken（swink之过去分词，意指”辛苦劳作，艰难进行“，但亦有”交媾“之意。） ，但swonken一词早已消失。

sentences.english: So there will be a participle necessary.
sentences.chinese: 于是就有了分词的必要。

detailed_translations.english: one of the forms of a verb that are used to make tenses. In English,  present participle s  end in -ing and  past participle s  usually end in -ed or -en.

name: Polish
trans: 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良

sentences.english: The Polish clergy use their influence to polonize the people.
sentences.chinese: 波兰的教士们运用他们的影响去使人民波兰化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 磨光，擦亮；上光剂，擦亮剂；优雅，精良

detailed_translations.english: relating to Poland, its people, or its language

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ warm dry climate
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
detailed_translations.english: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

name: mean
trans: 平均的；卑鄙的；低劣的；吝啬的

sentences.english: The red light means ‘Stop’.
sentences.chinese: 红灯表示“停”。

sentences.english: This light means you’re running low on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 这个灯亮说明汽油不多了。

detailed_translations.english: to have or represent a particular meaning

name: even
trans: [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

sentences.english: an archaeological site
sentences.chinese: 考古现场

detailed_translations.english: a place where something important or interesting happened
to place or build something in a particular place

sentences.english: drastic cuts in government spending
sentences.chinese: 政府开支的急剧削减

sentences.english: Drastic changesare needed if environmental catastrophe is to be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 要想避免环境灾难就需要重大的变革。

detailed_translations.english: extreme and sudden

sentences.english: Nothing remained of the colonel.
sentences.chinese: 上校身后毫无遗物。

sentences.english: The captain jumped several grades and now was a colonel.
sentences.chinese: 这名上尉一连跳过了好几级，现在是上校了。

sentences.english: What if they go on to behave as murderously as the colonel and his paid killers?
sentences.chinese: 如果他们像他们的是上校和他的杀手们一样继续表现为杀气腾腾的又该怎么办？

detailed_translations.english: a high rank in the army, Marines, or the US air force, or someone who has this rank

sentences.english: She rocked the baby to and fro.
sentences.chinese: 她来回摇动着婴儿。

sentences.english: They’ll soon settle in – kids are very good at adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快就会习惯的——小孩子适应能力很强。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become familiar with a new situation
to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose

sentences.english: the British Medical Journal
sentences.chinese: 《英国医学杂志》

sentences.english: He decided to keep a journal.
sentences.chinese: 他决定记日记。

detailed_translations.english: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest

name: rich
trans: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。

sentences.english: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
detailed_translations.english: The rich are rich people

sentences.english: an overdue gas bill
sentences.chinese: 逾期未付的煤气账单

sentences.english: The library books are overdue.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书过期未还。

sentences.english: The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.chinese: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

detailed_translations.english: not done, paid, returned etc by the time expected

sentences.english: Whether the legend is true or not, the discovery of coffee dates back to 800 A.D. when Africans created a coffee-berry pulp.
sentences.chinese: 不论这个传说是真是假，咖啡的发现要回溯到公元800年，那时非洲人制造出了一种咖啡浆果浆。

detailed_translations.english: a small soft fruit with small seeds

sentences.english: She was my firstborn.
sentences.chinese: 她是我的长女。

detailed_translations.english: Someone's firstborn is their first child

sentences.english: The allegations implicated Abe to such an extent he was forced to resign.
sentences.chinese: 安倍深受指控牵连，不得不辞职。

detailed_translations.english: to show or suggest that someone is involved in a crime or dishonest act

name: setting
trans: 环境；安装；布置；[天] 沉落
放置；沉没；使…处于某位置（set的ing形式）

sentences.english: I’ve worked with children in various settings, mainly in secondary school.
sentences.chinese: 我在许多地方教过孩子，主要是在中学。

sentences.english: The heating system was already on its highest setting.
sentences.chinese: 取暖系统已经调到了最高挡。

detailed_translations.english: the place where something is or where something happens, and the general environment

name: calculation
trans: 计算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑

sentences.english: Cathy did a rough calculation.
sentences.chinese: 凯茜作了一个粗略的计算。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount

name: Marxism
trans: 马克思的；马克思主义的

sentences.english: They openly revised Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 他们明目张胆地篡改马克思主义。

sentences.english: The proletariat must possess the truth of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 无产阶级必须掌握马克思主义的真理。

sentences.english: Both of them believed in Marxism and materialism.
sentences.chinese: 两人都信仰马克思主义和唯物主义。

detailed_translations.english: the system of political thinking invented by Karl Marx, which explains changes in history as the result of a struggle between social classes

detailed_translations.chinese: 马克思的；马克思主义的

name: hollow
trans: 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的

sentences.english: a hollow tree
sentences.chinese: 空心树

sentences.english: Any threat to bring in the police is a hollow one.
sentences.chinese: 任何要叫警察来的威胁都是虚张声势。

sentences.english: The steps were hollowed by centuries of use.
sentences.chinese: 经过几个世纪的踩踏，台阶上出现了凹痕

detailed_translations.chinese: 空的,中空的;；空洞的,无价值的
detailed_translations.english: having an empty space inside
to make the surface of something curve inwards

sentences.english: The last two clauses were an exact quote rather than a paraphrase of Mr. Forth's remarks.
sentences.chinese: 最后两个分句是对福思先生言论的准确引用而不是改述。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that expresses in a shorter, clearer, or different way what someone has said or written
to express in a shorter, clearer, or different way what someone has said or written

name: specialize
trans: 专门从事；详细说明；特化

sentences.english: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.chinese: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.english: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.chinese: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

detailed_translations.english: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

detailed_translations.chinese: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于

sentences.chinese: 在那次政变的余波之中，军队向示威者开了枪。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time after something such as a war, storm, or accident when people are still dealing with the results

sentences.english: Is anything wrong? You look a little tense.
sentences.chinese: 有什么不对劲吗？你看起来有点紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a tense situation is one in which you feel very anxious and worried because of something bad that might happen
to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

sentences.english: $20 an hour is the going rate (= the usual amount paid ) for private tuition.
sentences.chinese: 每小时20美元是私人授课的一般收费。

sentences.english: The company seems to rate him very highly (= think he is very good) .
sentences.chinese: 公司好像对他的评价很高。

detailed_translations.english: a charge or payment that is set according to a standard scale
to think that someone or something has a particular quality, value, or standard

sentences.english: Prince William
sentences.chinese: 威廉王子

sentences.english: Prince Rainier of Monaco
sentences.chinese: 摩纳哥的兰尼埃亲王

detailed_translations.english: the son of a king, queen, or prince

name: filter
trans: 滤波器；[化工] 过滤器；筛选；滤光器

sentences.english: The water in the tank is constantly filtered.
sentences.chinese: 鱼缸里的水在不停地被过滤。

sentences.english: The ozone layer filters harmful UV rays from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧层过滤掉有害的太阳紫外线。

sentences.english: coffee filter papers
sentences.chinese: 咖啡滤纸

sentences.english: filter cigarettes (= with a filter at the end )
sentences.chinese: 过滤嘴香烟

something that you pass water, air etc through in order to remove unwanted substances and make it clean or suitable to use

name: barracks
trans: 兵营，营房；简陋的房子；警察所（barrack的复数）
使驻扎军营里；住在工房、棚屋里；（澳）大声鼓噪（barrack的三单形式）

sentences.english: ...an army barracks in the north of the city.
sentences.chinese: …一所在那个城市北面的军营。

detailed_translations.chinese: 兵营，营房；简陋的房子；警察所（barrack的复数）
detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which soldiers live

detailed_translations.chinese: 使驻扎军营里；住在工房、棚屋里；（澳）大声鼓噪（barrack的三单形式）

sentences.english: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.chinese: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.chinese: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas

trans: 血汗工厂；剥削劳力的工厂

sentences.english: Her boy has never been to a doctor or a dentist, and last bathed when he was 2, so a sweatshop job by comparison would be far more pleasant and less dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子从来没看过医生或者牙医，最后一次洗澡是在2岁的时候，所以两相对照，血汗工厂的工作将会开心的并且没有那么危险。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血汗工厂；剥削劳力的工厂
detailed_translations.english: a small business, factory etc where people work hard in bad conditions for very little money – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: The spinach is shrivelled up.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜蔫了。

sentences.english: Some of the best brain foods: walnuts, blueberries and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 一些最好的“大脑食物”：胡桃、蓝莓和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a vegetable with large dark green leaves

name: engage
trans: 吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定

sentences.english: She engaged the clutch and the car moved.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下离合器，汽车便开动了。

sentences.english: The wheel engages with the cog and turns it.
sentences.chinese: 轮子咬住轮齿并带动它转动。

detailed_translations.english: if you engage part of a machine, or if it engages, it moves so that it fits into another part of the machine

sentences.english: He is currently writing a dissertation on the Somali civil war.
sentences.chinese: 他正在写一篇关于索马里内战的论文。

detailed_translations.chinese: (博士学位)论文，学术演讲，专题论文
