trans: 焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事

sentences.english: his feelings of anxiety
sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.english: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.english: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.chinese: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being very worried about something

sentences.english: the availability of cheap flights
sentences.chinese: 有廉价机票出售

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being at hand when needed

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: After a lovely stretch running right along the edge of Lake Baikal we moved away from birch and pine tree territory into lusher pastures.
sentences.chinese: 在沿着贝加尔湖的一段美妙行程之后，我们离开了桦树和松树的地域，进入了令人迷醉的大草原。

sentences.english: This also explains why some migrants from east Asia to northern Europe suddenly develop an allergic reaction to jackfruit once they have come into contact with birch pollen.
sentences.chinese: 这也解释了为什么来自东亚的某些移民，到了北欧后，一旦接触到桦树花粉，会突然出现菠萝蜜过敏反应的现象。

detailed_translations.english: a tree with smooth  bark (=  outer covering  )  and thin branches, or the wood from this tree

name: recitation
trans: 背诵；朗诵；详述；背诵的诗

sentences.english: recitations from the great poets
sentences.chinese: 背诵伟大诗人的诗

detailed_translations.chinese: 背诵；朗诵；详述；背诵的诗
detailed_translations.english: an act of saying a poem, piece of literature etc that you have learned, for people to listen to

sentences.english: The systems are getting smaller and using lower voltages.
sentences.chinese: 这些系统正变得更小而且使用更低的电压。

detailed_translations.english: electrical force measured in volts

sentences.english: The hull had suffered extensive damage to the starboard side.
sentences.chinese: 船体右舷遭到大面积损坏。

detailed_translations.english: the main part of a ship that goes in the water
to take off the outer part of vegetables, rice, grain etc

sentences.english: She was wearing dark blue pants and a white sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着深蓝色长裤和白色毛衣。

sentences.english: a pair of pants
sentences.chinese: 一件内裤

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers you from your waist to your feet and has a separate part for each leg

sentences.english: Smoke drifted up from the jungle ahead of us.
sentences.chinese: 我们前方的丛林里有烟升起。

sentences.english: Jenni spent the year drifting around Europe.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮这一年来一直在欧洲各地漂泊。

sentences.english: a drift towards longer working hours
sentences.chinese: 工作时间不知不觉的变长

sentences.english: the drift from the countryside to the cities
sentences.chinese: 大量人口从乡村往城市的流动

detailed_translations.english: to move slowly on water or in the air
a slow change or development from one situation, opinion etc to another

name: hip
trans: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的

sentences.english: She stood there with her hands on her hips glaring at him.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.english: The old lady had fallen and broken her hip.
sentences.chinese: 那老妇人摔了一跤，髋部骨折。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts on each side of your body between the top of your leg and your waist

detailed_translations.chinese: 熟悉内情的；非常时尚的
detailed_translations.english: doing things or done according to the latest fashion

name: drop
trans: 滴；使降低；使终止；随口漏出

sentences.english: Your button has dropped off.
sentences.chinese: 你的纽扣掉了。

sentences.english: The number of deaths on the roads has dropped sharply.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故死亡人数已大大减少。

detailed_translations.english: to fall suddenly onto the ground or into something

sentences.english: a naive young girl
sentences.chinese: 天真的小女孩

sentences.english: Jim can be so naive sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆有时候非常幼稚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼稚的； 天真的； 轻信的
detailed_translations.english: not having much experience of how complicated life is, so that you trust people too much and believe that good things will always happen

name: descend
trans: 下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊

sentences.english: Our plane started to descend.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞机开始下降。

sentences.english: I heard his footsteps descending the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 我听到他下楼的脚步声。

detailed_translations.english: to move from a higher level to a lower one
to move from a higher level to a lower one

name: savoury
trans: 可口的；开胃的；令人愉快的

sentences.english: Quite clearly one of our favourite of the First Growths this year, it has a lovely, savoury minerality that gives it elegance, despite its power.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问是今年的头等酒中我们最喜欢的之一，她有迷人、开胃的矿物质味，这使得酒尽管富有力量但不失优雅。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可口的；开胃的；令人愉快的
detailed_translations.english: a savoury smell or taste is strong and pleasant but is not sweet

sentences.english: fake fur
sentences.chinese: 人造毛皮

sentences.english: a fake ID card
sentences.chinese: 假身份证

sentences.english: a fake 20 dollar bill
sentences.chinese: 一张20美元的伪钞

detailed_translations.english: made to look like a real material or object in order to deceive people
a copy of a valuable object, painting etc that is intended to deceive people

detailed_translations.chinese: 伪造， 捏造； 伪装
detailed_translations.english: to make something seem real in order to deceive people

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

sentences.english: My message is "If you try to smuggle drugs you are stupid."
sentences.chinese: 我的讯息是，“你若企图走私毒品，那是犯傻。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私， 偷带， 偷运
detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another

detailed_translations.chinese: 走私，非法私运；偷运，偷带
detailed_translations.english: to take something or someone illegally from one country to another

name: humble
trans: 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的
使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气

sentences.english: a modest and humble man
sentences.chinese: 一个谦卑的男人

sentences.english: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的
detailed_translations.english: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

detailed_translations.chinese: 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
detailed_translations.english: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily

sentences.english: My father expected perfection from all of us.
sentences.chinese: 父亲期望我们都尽善尽美。

sentences.english: the search for technical perfection
sentences.chinese: 对技术的精益求精

detailed_translations.english: the state of being perfect

name: grenade
trans: 扔手榴弹；用催泪弹攻击

sentences.english: a hand grenade
sentences.chinese: 手榴弹

detailed_translations.english: a small bomb that can be thrown by hand or fired from a gun

detailed_translations.chinese: 扔手榴弹；用催泪弹攻击

name: safeguard
trans: [安全] 保护；保卫；保护措施

sentences.english: International safeguards prevent the increase of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 国际安全条约防止核武器数量增加。

detailed_translations.chinese: [安全] 保护；保卫；保护措施
detailed_translations.english: a rule, agreement etc that is intended to protect someone or something from possible dangers or problems
to protect something from harm or damage

sentences.english: That’s a ridiculous idea!
sentences.chinese: 那主意很荒唐！

sentences.english: Don’t be ridiculous!
sentences.chinese: 别傻了！

sentences.english: I’d look ridiculous in a dress like that.
sentences.chinese: 我穿那样的裙子会显得很可笑。

detailed_translations.english: very silly or unreasonable

sentences.english: an authentic account
sentences.chinese: 真实可信的说法

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 可靠的， 可信的
detailed_translations.english: based on facts

sentences.english: They had to struggle against all kinds of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to try extremely hard to achieve something, even though it is very difficult

name: contain
trans: 包含；控制；容纳；牵制（敌军）

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

name: devil
trans: 魔鬼；撒旦；家伙；恶棍；淘气鬼；冒失鬼
虐待，折磨；（用扯碎机）扯碎；（替作家，律师等）做助手；抹辣味料烤制或煎煮

sentences.english: What on earth is wrong with the poor devil?
sentences.chinese: 这可怜的家伙到底怎么了？

detailed_translations.chinese: 魔鬼；撒旦；家伙；恶棍；淘气鬼；冒失鬼
detailed_translations.english: the most powerful evil spiritin some religions, especially in Christianity

detailed_translations.chinese: 虐待，折磨；（用扯碎机）扯碎；（替作家，律师等）做助手；抹辣味料烤制或煎煮

sentences.english: Can you lengthen this skirt for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能帮我把这条裙子改长？

sentences.english: The days lengthened as summer approached.
sentences.chinese: 随着夏天来临，白天变长了。

detailed_translations.english: to make something longer or to become longer

sentences.english: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.english: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.chinese: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

sentences.english: luxuries like chocolate and perfume
sentences.chinese: 巧克力、香水之类的奢侈品

detailed_translations.english: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc

sentences.english: Recently a number of policemen were sentenced to death for their complicity in the murder.
sentences.chinese: 近来很多警察因参与这起谋杀而被判死刑。

detailed_translations.english: involvement in a crime, together with other people

sentences.english: You greedy hog!
sentences.chinese: 你这个贪婪鬼！

detailed_translations.english: a large pig that is kept for its meat

sentences.english: We stayed in the hotel throughout the entirety of the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我们整个周末都待在酒店里。

detailed_translations.english: the whole of sth

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

sentences.english: a convex lens
sentences.chinese: 凸透镜

sentences.english: a convex mirror
sentences.chinese: 凸镜

detailed_translations.english: curved outwards, like the surface of the eye

name: forbidden
trans: 被禁止的；严禁的，禁用的

sentences.english: Sex was always a forbidden topic.
sentences.chinese: 性在过去一直是个禁忌话题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 被禁止的；严禁的，禁用的
detailed_translations.english: not allowed, especially because of an official rule

name: limp
trans: 跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进

sentences.english: a limp handshake
sentences.chinese: 无力的握手

sentences.english: His body suddenly went limp.
sentences.chinese: 他突然身子一软。

detailed_translations.english: not firm or strong

detailed_translations.chinese: 跛行，一拐一拐地走；缓慢费力地前进
detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg is hurt or injured
the way someone walks when they are limping

name: doom
trans: 厄运；死亡；判决；世界末日

sentences.english: A sense of impending doom (= coming very soon ) gripped her.
sentences.chinese: 她心头被一种大难临头的感觉所笼罩。

sentences.english: The plan was doomed from the start.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划一开始就注定要失败。

detailed_translations.english: something very bad that is going to happen, or the fact that it is going to happen
to make someone or something certain to fail, die, be destroyed etc

sentences.english: This issue will be discussed in more detail in Chapter 5.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题将在第五章里作更为详细的论述。

detailed_translations.english: a single feature, fact, or piece of information about something
to list things or give all the facts or information about something

sentences.english: This kind of fungal infection on feet and toenail can be prevented if you practice barefoot walking and give the scope to the feet to breath normally.
sentences.chinese: 如果你练习光着脚走路，并且使你的脚能得到正常呼吸的机会，那么这种脚部及脚趾甲的真菌感染就可以得到抑制。

sentences.english: Heels contribute to hammertoes, neuromas (pinched nerves near the ball of the foot), bunions and “pump bump” (a painful bump on the back of the heel), as well as toenail problems.
sentences.chinese: 高跟会导致槌状趾、神经瘤（靠近脚掌的捏神经）、囊炎肿和“Haglund畸形”（脚后跟痛苦的磕碰），以及脚趾甲问题。

sentences.english: You should cut your toenail.
sentences.chinese: 你应该剪一剪你的脚趾甲了。

detailed_translations.english: the hard part that covers the top of each of your toes

name: empty
trans: 空的；无意义的；无知的；徒劳的

sentences.english: an empty box
sentences.chinese: 空盒子

sentences.english: an empty bottle
sentences.chinese: 空瓶子

sentences.english: an empty space behind the desk
sentences.chinese: 书桌后面的空位

sentences.english: The fuel tank’s almost empty.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱快要空了。

detailed_translations.english: having nothing inside

name: obscurity
trans: 朦胧；阴暗；晦涩；身份低微；不分明

sentences.english: Now, on the eve of the bicentenary of the independence movements, he sets out to rescue San Martín from his relative obscurity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，在那场独立运动二百周年纪念前夕，他再度出手以挽救相对默默无闻的圣·马丁。

sentences.english: At this time he knew nothing of Wells’s and Matthew’s accounts of natural selection; indeed, both accounts languished in obscurity until after the “Origin” was published.
sentences.chinese: 此时他对马修和威尔士关于自然选择的阐述一无所知；事实上，直到《物种的起源》发表这两人一直默默无闻。

sentences.english: The obscurity of JTS is in some sense due to its own success: because it hides the details of transaction management so effectively, we don't hear or say very much about it.
sentences.chinese: 在某种意义上，JTS 的默默无闻恰恰是它的成功：因为它非常有效地隐藏了事务管理的很多细节，因此，我们没有听说过或者谈论过很多关于它的内容。

detailed_translations.english: the state of not being known or remembered

name: exhaust
trans: 排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨

sentences.english: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.english: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel extremely tired

name: landmark
trans: [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事

sentences.english: A normal working week is 40 hours.
sentences.chinese: 一个正常的工作周是40小时。

sentences.english: She was assessed in the normal way, and placed on the waiting list.
sentences.chinese: 她接受了正常的评估后被列入等候名单。

sentences.english: All I want is to lead a normal life.
sentences.chinese: 我想要的只是能过正常的生活。

detailed_translations.english: usual, typical, or expected

sentences.english: knights in armour
sentences.chinese: 身披盔甲的骑士

sentences.english: He was knighted in June 1988.
sentences.chinese: 他于1988年6月被授予爵士称号。

detailed_translations.english: a man with a high rank in the past who was trained to fight while riding a horse
If someone is knighted, they are given a knighthood

name: overwhelm
trans: 淹没；压倒；受打击；覆盖；压垮

sentences.english: But the various pros and cons should not blindly overwhelm one another.
sentences.chinese: 但是，众多的利弊得失不应盲目的一个压倒另一个。

sentences.english: We try not to think about it because it would overwhelm us to an extent that we would just vegetate.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量不去想它，因为在某种我们能够想像到的程度上他会压倒我们。

sentences.english: For example, in a situation in which several bystanders need to band together to overwhelm a perpetrator, they will be more likely to act collectively than to act alone.
sentences.chinese: 例如, 就有这样一种情况， 在只有几个旁观者需要联合起来才能压倒一个罪犯的情况下, 他们就可能会更多地采取集体行动。

detailed_translations.english: if water overwhelms an area of land, it covers it completely and suddenly

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

name: unearth
trans: 发掘；揭露，发现；从洞中赶出

sentences.english: Farmers still sometimes unearth human bones here.
sentences.chinese: 农民们有时仍然能在这里挖到人骨。

sentences.english: In one shop, I unearthed a wonderful collection of 1920s toys.
sentences.chinese: 在一家商店，我发现了一套非常好玩的 20 世纪 20 年代的玩具。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发掘；揭露，发现；从洞中赶出
detailed_translations.english: to find something after searching for it, especially something that has been buried in the ground or lost for a long time

name: abstract
trans: 摘要；提取；使……抽象化；转移(注意力、兴趣等)；使心不在焉

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

name: air
trans: 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.english: Flames leapt into the air.
sentences.chinese: 火苗蹿向天空。

sentences.english: He fell 2,000 metres through the air without a parachute.
sentences.chinese: 他没用降落伞在空中下落了2,000米。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

name: clown
trans: 小丑；乡下人；粗鲁笨拙的人

sentences.english: The performance of the clown kept the public rolling about.
sentences.chinese: 小丑的表演使观众笑得前仰后合。

sentences.english: When she learned how to do this, I was ready to let her step over a clown.
sentences.chinese: 当她学习了该如何做这的时候,我准备好让在一个小丑上的她步骤.

sentences.english: He will go to clown school.
sentences.chinese: 他将去小丑学校上学。

detailed_translations.english: someone who wears funny clothes, a red nose, bright  make-up  on their face etc, and does silly things to make people laugh, especially at a  circus

name: smokestack
trans: 低技术制造业的；大工厂的

sentences.english: At the other end of Shenzhen from Longgang, no smoke is visible from the towering smokestack of the Baoan incinerator, built by a company owned by the municipal government.
sentences.chinese: 深圳龙岗的另一端是宝安垃圾焚烧厂，它由政府所有的一家公司建造，它的烟囱里几乎没有任何可视烟雾排出。

sentences.english: Today, the fly ash produced by coal-fired power plants brims with cenospheres, but they are largely trapped by pollution-control equipment before they escape the smokestack.
sentences.chinese: 如今，由煤炭发电厂所排放的煤灰中充斥着许多小“煤胞”，但大部分在逃离工厂的大烟囱前就让污染控制设备给过滤了。

sentences.english: So for months I have watched a gray plume rise heroically from the smokestack’s summit, disappearing into the gray muckosphere.
sentences.chinese: 连着好几个月，偶都眼巴巴地看着一股灰色的烟柱从烟囱顶上冒出，直冲云霄，最终消失在灰蒙蒙的烂大气里。

detailed_translations.english: a tall  chimney  at a factory or on a ship

detailed_translations.chinese: 低技术制造业的；大工厂的

sentences.english: The lower tier has 10,000 seats.
sentences.chinese: 下面一层有一万个座位。

detailed_translations.english: one of several levels or layers that rise up one above the other
to be or arrange in tiers

sentences.english: He was aware of the stink of stale beer on his breath.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到自己有变味啤酒般的口臭。

sentences.english: We all stank and nobody minded.
sentences.chinese: 我们大家都很臭，所以也就没人在乎。

sentences.english: The place stinks of fried onions.
sentences.chinese: 这地方有股难闻的炒洋葱味。

detailed_translations.english: a very bad smell
To stink means to smell very bad

name: lane
trans: 小巷；[航][水运] 航线；车道；罚球区

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

sentences.english: In today’s painting, we can almost touch the texture of the dress and the cloth of the empress…. However, Veronese is not only known for his technique but also for the use of the color.
sentences.chinese: 时至今日，当我们观看这幅画时，还是几乎可以触及皇后衣裙上的纹理……然而，委罗内塞不只因其绘画技巧为人所知，他对色彩的运用也闻名于世。

detailed_translations.english: a female ruler of an empire, or the wife of an emperor

sentences.english: the intellectual superiority of humans over other animals
sentences.chinese: 人类相比其他动物所具有的智力优势

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being better, more skilful, more powerful etc than other people or things

sentences.english: ...the long-held axiom that education leads to higher income.
sentences.chinese: ...教育会带来高收入这一长期公认的观念。

detailed_translations.english: a rule or principle that is generally considered to be true

sentences.english: Her younger brother hovered in the background watching us.
sentences.chinese: 她的弟弟在后面走来走去，观察着我们。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird, insect, or  helicopter  hovers, it stays in one place in the air

name: sore
trans: 疼痛的，痛心的；剧烈的，极度的；恼火的，发怒的；厉害的，迫切的

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: appeal
trans: 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判
呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

sentences.english: The judge cited a 1956 Supreme Court ruling in her decision.
sentences.chinese: 法官在她的判决中引用了1956年最高法院的一项裁决。

sentences.english: The passage cited above is from a Robert Frost poem.
sentences.chinese: 以上的引文出自罗伯特•弗罗斯特的一首诗。

sentences.english: She was cited in the divorce proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 她在离婚诉讼中被传唤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 引证；引用；〔法院〕传召，传讯
detailed_translations.english: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation

name: organ
trans: [生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音

sentences.english: the liver, heart, and other internal organs
sentences.chinese: 肝脏、心脏及其他内脏器官

sentences.english: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.chinese: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.english: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.chinese: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.english: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.english: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.chinese: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

detailed_translations.english: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

sentences.english: Classical instruments like the violin or the cello are boring, you say, and definitely not cool.
sentences.chinese: 你觉得小提琴或大提琴这样的传统乐器非常枯燥，而且一点也不酷。

sentences.english: Many years ago, a young man learning cello went to Casals, the greatest cellist in the 20th century, for advice: how can I become an excellent cellist?
sentences.chinese: 很多年前，有一位学大提琴的年轻人去向20世纪最伟大的大提琴家卡萨尔斯讨教：我怎样才能成为一名优秀的大提琴家？

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument like a large  violin  that you hold between your knees and play by pulling a  bow (= special stick )  across the strings

sentences.english: the government’s economic and taxation policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济和税收政策

detailed_translations.english: the system of charging taxes

sentences.english: How can I provide feedback without making someone angry?
sentences.chinese: 我怎样才能提出反馈意见又不会得罪人呢？

detailed_translations.english: advice, criticism etc about how successful or useful something is

name: mock
trans: 仿制的，模拟的，虚假的，不诚实的

sentences.english: Opposition MPs mocked the government’s decision.
sentences.chinese: 反对党议员讥笑政府的这一决策。

sentences.english: ‘Running away?’ he mocked.
sentences.chinese: “想逃跑？”他取笑道。

sentences.english: It’s easy for you to mock, but we put a lot of work into this play.
sentences.chinese: 你讲风凉话是很轻松，但我们这出戏可是费了很大力气的。

detailed_translations.english: to laugh at someone or something and try to make them look stupid by saying unkind things about them or by copying them

detailed_translations.chinese: 仿制的， 假装的；模拟的， 演习的

name: reference
trans: 参考，参照；涉及，提及；参考书目；介绍信；证明书

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

name: buck
trans: （美）钱，元；雄鹿；纨绔子弟；年轻的印第安人或黑人

sentences.english: He was a rebel who bucked the system (=  opposed rules or authority  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他是一个反抗体制的叛逆者。

sentences.english: He owes me ten bucks.
sentences.chinese: 他欠我十美元。

detailed_translations.english: to oppose something in a direct way
a US, Canadian, or Australian dollar

name: cradle
trans: 摇篮；发源地；发祥地；支船架
抚育；把搁在支架上；把放在摇篮内

sentences.english: She rocked the cradle to quieten the child.
sentences.chinese: 她摇动摇篮，让宝宝安静下来。

sentences.english: Athens is often regarded as the cradle of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 雅典常常被认为是民主的发源地。

detailed_translations.english: a small bed for a baby, especially one that moves gently from side to side

name: generous
trans: 慷慨的，大方的；宽宏大量的；有雅量的

sentences.english: Dietler is generous with his time and money.
sentences.chinese: 迪特勒在他的时间和金钱方面慷慨大方。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure

sentences.english: The fall leaves crumbled in my fingers.
sentences.chinese: 秋叶在我指间碎裂了。

sentences.english: 1/4 cup crumbled goat’s cheese
sentences.chinese: 四分之一杯山羊奶酪碎

detailed_translations.english: to break apart into lots of little pieces, or make something do this

name: frame
trans: 框架；结构；[电影] 画面

sentences.english: Newman played a central role in framing the new law.
sentences.chinese: 纽曼在拟定新法的过程中发挥了主要作用。

sentences.english: That’s a nice tune.
sentences.chinese: 那曲调很美。

sentences.english: She sang some old classics and a few new tunes.
sentences.chinese: 她唱了几首经典老歌和一些新曲。

sentences.english: Someone’s coming tomorrow to tune the piano.
sentences.chinese: 明天有人来给钢琴调音。

detailed_translations.english: a series of musical notes that are played or sung and are nice to listen to
to make a musical instrument play at the right pitch

sentences.english: Lena moved with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 莉娜走路姿势有着舞者般的优美。

sentences.english: He conducted himself with grace and dignity throughout the trial.
sentences.chinese: 在整个审讯过程中他表现得文雅而有尊严。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth way of moving that looks natural, relaxed, and attractive

name: twilight
trans: 黎明，黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态
黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态

sentences.english: Depression in the twilight years (= the last years of your life ) is usually related to illness.
sentences.chinese: 晚年的精神抑郁通常与疾病有关。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黎明，黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态
黄昏；薄暮；衰退期；朦胧状态
detailed_translations.english: the small amount of light in the sky as the day ends

name: psychiatry
trans: 精神病学；精神病治疗法

sentences.english: In it, he argued that psychiatry was a branch of medical science and should be investigated by observation and experimentation like the other natural sciences.
sentences.chinese: 在书中，他主张精神病学是医学的一个分支，应当像其他自然科学一样以观察和实验为研究手段。

detailed_translations.english: the study and treatment of mental illnesses

name: Karaoke
trans: 卡拉OK；卡拉OK录音，自动伴奏录音

detailed_translations.chinese: 卡拉OK；卡拉OK录音，自动伴奏录音
detailed_translations.english: Karaoke is a form of entertainment in which a machine plays the tunes of songs, and people take turns singing the words

sentences.english: Squatting by one of the walls, I took a little book from my knapsack.
sentences.chinese: 我蹲在胡同的墙根，从背包里拿出一本最近出版的小开本的书。

sentences.english: He unstrapped his knapsack, put it, with his stick, on the hedge-bank, and opened the gate.
sentences.chinese: 他把背包从身上取下来，连同手中的棍子一起放在树篱坡上，把门打开了。

sentences.english: Fascinated by this magic light-generating globe, he cut it off with his bayonet and put it in his knapsack so he could carry around the light with him wherever he went.
sentences.chinese: 他对这个会发光的小球很痴迷，于是用刺刀把它割了下来，放进自己的背包，他觉得这样他就可以把光带到任何他想去的地方了。

detailed_translations.english: a bag that you carry on your shoulders

sentences.english: The uprising was ruthlessly suppressed.
sentences.chinese: 起义受到了残酷的镇压。

detailed_translations.english: to stop people from opposing the government, especially by using force

name: luck
trans: 运气；幸运；带来好运的东西

sentences.english: You’re not having much luck today, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

sentences.english: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

sentences.english: It was an incredible piece of luck.
sentences.chinese: 真是令人难以置信的好运气。

sentences.english: Roulette is a game of luck.
sentences.chinese: 轮盘赌是个靠运气的游戏。

detailed_translations.english: good things that happen to you by chance

name: marine
trans: 船舶的；海生的；海产的；航海的，海运的
海运业；舰队；水兵；（海军）士兵或军官

sentences.english: the enormous variety of marine life
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物繁多的种类

sentences.english: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.chinese: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.english: marine biology
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there

name: transition
trans: 过渡；转变；[分子生物] 转换；变调

sentences.english: Making the transition from youth to adulthood can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 从青少年过渡到成年有时是一个非常痛苦的过程。

sentences.english: a society that is in transition
sentences.chinese: 一个正在转型的社会

sentences.english: the period of transition to full democracy
sentences.chinese: 向全面民主的过渡时期

detailed_translations.english: when something changes from one form or state to another

sentences.english: The shadows concealed her as she crept up to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她借着阴影蹑手蹑脚地走向房子。

sentences.english: The path was concealed by long grass.
sentences.chinese: 小路隐藏在长长的草里。

sentences.english: a concealed weapon
sentences.chinese: 藏匿的武器

detailed_translations.english: to hide something carefully

sentences.english: a tart apple
sentences.chinese: 酸苹果

detailed_translations.english: food that is tart has a sharp sour taste
a  pie  without a top on it, containing something sweet

name: cyclone
trans: 旋风；[气象] 气旋；飓风

sentences.english: The race was called off as a cyclone struck.
sentences.chinese: 由于旋风袭击，比赛被取消了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋风；[气象] 气旋；飓风
detailed_translations.english: a very strong wind that moves very fast in a circle

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

sentences.english: misguided notions of male superiority
sentences.chinese: 男尊女卑的错误观念

detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: resistance
trans: 阻力；电阻；抵抗；反抗；抵抗力

sentences.english: Rebel gunmen have put up strong resistance.
sentences.chinese: 持枪的叛乱分子负隅顽抗。

sentences.english: disease resistance
sentences.chinese: 抗病能力

detailed_translations.english: fighting against someone who is attacking you

sentences.english: She frowned as she read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她看着信皱起了眉头。

detailed_translations.english: to make an angry, unhappy, or confused expression, moving your  eyebrows  together

name: extravagant
trans: 奢侈的；浪费的；过度的；放纵的

sentences.english: Would it be too extravagant to buy both?
sentences.chinese: 把两个都买下会不会太奢侈了？

sentences.english: an extravagant lifestyle
sentences.chinese: 奢侈的生活方式

sentences.english: an extravagant display of loyalty
sentences.chinese: 过分表露忠诚

sentences.english: Don’t be too extravagant with the wine.
sentences.chinese: 不要酗酒。

detailed_translations.english: spending or costing a lot of money, especially more than is necessary or more than you can afford

sentences.english: Skiers always face the risk of serious injury.
sentences.chinese: 滑雪者始终面临着受重伤的风险。

sentences.english: It was a risk, sending a letter to my house.
sentences.chinese: 将信寄到我家是冒险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that something bad, unpleasant, or dangerous may happen

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: solid waste from animals, especially cows

name: duchess
trans: 公爵夫人；女公爵；雍容华贵的妇女；小老板娘

sentences.english: the Duchess of York
sentences.chinese: 约克公爵夫人

detailed_translations.chinese: 公爵夫人；女公爵；雍容华贵的妇女；小老板娘
detailed_translations.english: a woman with the highest social rank outside the royal family, or the wife of a  duke

sentences.english: The company’s financial difficulties have deterred potential investors.
sentences.chinese: 该公司的财务困境令潜在的投资者望而却步。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from doing something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: We watched as the fire slowly kindled.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着火慢慢地燃烧起来。

detailed_translations.english: to start burning; to make a fire start burning

sentences.english: She received a small legacy from her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她从姨妈那里继承了一小笔遗产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产，遗赠；先人(或过去)留下的东西
detailed_translations.english: money or property that you receive from someone after they die

sentences.english: While a ketch offers these advantages to cruisers, they may also be more expensive because of the added mast and sail.
sentences.chinese: 尽管双桅帆给水手们提供了这些优势，它们也因为这额外的桅杆和船帆而造价更加昂贵。

sentences.english: She says the boat would be shaped like a capsule, powered by a small nuclear engine, and though there would be no sail, it would have a mast to hold a camera.
sentences.chinese: 斯托芬表示，探测船将被制成胶囊状，并由一个小型核动力引擎驱动，尽管不会有帆，但船上会有一个固定照相机的桅杆。

sentences.english: She has also studied everything from how to stitch her own wounds to how to cope with sleep deprivation and how to put out fires on board her 11.5-metre twin-mast ketch.
sentences.chinese: 她还学习了相关知识，从如何缝合伤口，到如何应付睡眠不足的状况，再到如何扑灭高11.5米的双桅杆帆船上的火情，可谓应有尽有。

detailed_translations.english: a tall pole on which the sails or flags on a ship are hung
to equip with a mast or masts

name: horizon
trans: [天] 地平线；视野；眼界；范围

sentences.english: In the distance, the dot of a boat appeared on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 远处小黑点般的一条小船出现在地平线上。

sentences.english: a course of study that will broaden your horizons
sentences.chinese: 一门能开阔眼界的课程

detailed_translations.english: the line far away where the land or sea seems to meet the sky

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.english: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.
sentences.chinese: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流。

sentences.english: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.chinese: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal

sentences.english: We were each handed a badge with our name on it.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都拿到一个徽章，上面有我们的名字。

sentences.english: He now sees his wartime injuries as a badge of honor.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他把自己在战争中受的伤看成是一种光荣标记。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal or plastic, with a design or words on it, that a person wears to show that they belong to an organization, support sth, have achieved sth, have a particular rank, etc.

name: media
trans: 媒体；媒质（medium的复数）；血管中层；浊塞音；中脉

sentences.english: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.chinese: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.english: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.chinese: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.english: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.chinese: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.english: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.chinese: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 新闻媒介， 传播媒介
detailed_translations.english: all the organizations, such as television, radio, and newspapers, that provide news and information for the public, or the people who do this work

sentences.english: “I think the Spanish and Italian people are very similar in terms of their character so I feel comfortable here, ” began the Spaniard.
sentences.chinese: “我认为西班牙人和意大利人性格特征非常相似，因此我在这里感到非常舒适。” 这个西班牙人说。

sentences.english: That victory came two weeks after he beat the Spaniard to win the Indian Wells Masters 1000 title.
sentences.chinese: 两周后，他又在1000分系列赛——印第安威尔斯大师赛上击败了西班牙人获得冠军。

detailed_translations.english: someone from Spain

sentences.english: Exercise will improve your looks and your outlook.
sentences.chinese: 运动将会改善你的外在形象和人生态度。

detailed_translations.english: your general attitude to life and the world

name: crossword
trans: 纵横字谜；纵横填字谜（等于cross puzzle）

sentences.english: I like to sit down and do the crossword .
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢坐下来做纵横字谜游戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纵横字谜；纵横填字谜（等于cross puzzle）
detailed_translations.english: a word game in which you write the answers to questions in a pattern of numbered boxes

sentences.english: Doctors have warned against complacency in fighting common diseases.
sentences.chinese: 医生警告说，治疗常见病不能一见好就掉以轻心。

sentences.english: Despite yesterday’s win, there is clearly no room for complacency if the team want to stay top of the league.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这支球队昨天赢了，但要在联赛中独占鳌头，就不能骄傲自满。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of satisfaction with a situation or with what you have achieved, so that you stop trying to improve or change things – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: atmospheric pressure
sentences.chinese: 大气压力

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth’s atmosphere

name: veil
trans: 遮蔽；掩饰；以面纱遮掩；用帷幕分隔

sentences.english: She lifted her veil with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 她用双手揭开面纱。

sentences.english: a bridal veil
sentences.chinese: 新娘的面纱

detailed_translations.chinese: 面纱，面罩；遮盖物，掩饰物
detailed_translations.english: a thin piece of material that women wear to cover their faces at formal occasions or for religious reasons
to cover something with a veil

sentences.english: Each child had participated in extracurricular activities at school.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都参加了学校的课外活动。

detailed_translations.english: extracurricular activities are not part of the course that a student is doing at a school or college

sentences.english: He continued to ponder the problem as he walked home.
sentences.chinese: 他一边往家走一边继续思考那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: to spend time thinking carefully and seriously about a problem, a difficult question, or something that has happened

name: surgery
trans: 外科；外科手术；手术室；诊疗室

sentences.english: major/minor surgery
sentences.chinese: 大 / 小手术

detailed_translations.english: medical treatment of injuries or diseases that involves cutting open a person's body and often removing or replacing some parts; the branch of medicine connected with this treatment

sentences.english: Attempts to standardize English spelling have never been successful.
sentences.chinese: 统一英语拼写的尝试从未成功过。

sentences.english: standardized tests
sentences.chinese: 标准化测试

detailed_translations.english: to make all the things of one particular type the same as each other

name: spectacular
trans: 壮观的，惊人的；公开展示的

sentences.english: a mountainous area with spectacular scenery
sentences.chinese: 景色壮丽的山区

sentences.english: a spectacular success
sentences.chinese: 辉煌的成就

sentences.english: a television spectacular
sentences.chinese: 场面盛大的电视节目

detailed_translations.english: very impressive
an event or performance that is very large and impressive

sentences.english: The rubble was then dumped in a municipal landfill site on the outskirts of Florence.
sentences.chinese: 这堆碎石后来被倾倒在佛罗伦萨市郊的一处垃圾填埋场。

sentences.english: On the outskirts of every city I saw, there was a veritable forest of apartment blocks under construction.
sentences.chinese: 在我造访的每个城市的郊区，一栋栋在建公寓楼确实是鳞次栉比。

sentences.english: After abandoning his devastated home on the outskirts of Damascus, Mustafa, his wife, children and aging parents spent months seeking safety in one town after another.
sentences.chinese: 在抛弃大马士革郊区破坏殆尽的家后，穆斯塔法和他的妻子，孩子几年迈的父母花了几个月的时间在一个又一个小镇躲避战祸。

detailed_translations.english: the parts of a town or city that are furthest from the centre

sentences.english: a loyal supporter of the team
sentences.chinese: 球队的忠实支持者

sentences.english: her many years of loyal service to the company
sentences.chinese: 她在公司多年的忠诚服务

sentences.english: loyal customers
sentences.chinese: 忠实客户

detailed_translations.english: always supporting your friends, principles, country etc

sentences.english: Scrape the carrots and slice them thinly.
sentences.chinese: 把这些胡萝卜去皮切成薄片。

sentences.english: The two of them scraped their dishes clean.
sentences.chinese: 他们两个把盘子擦得干干净净。

sentences.english: I heard the side of the car scrape against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我听到汽车的侧面蹭着墙了。

sentences.english: the scrape of iron on stone
sentences.chinese: 铁摩擦石头发出的嚓嚓声

sentences.english: She emerged from the overturned car with only a few scrapes and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 她从翻了的车里钻出来，只擦破一点皮，碰了几块淤青。

detailed_translations.english: to remove something from a surface using the edge of a knife, a stick etc
the action of one thing rubbing roughly against another

sentences.english: They played some lovely melodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们演奏了一些动听的曲子。

sentences.english: a haunting melody

trans: 中世纪的；原始的；仿中世纪的；老式的

sentences.chinese: 霍奇斯写了一部这位艺术家的非正式传记。

detailed_translations.english: done or produced without formal approval or permission

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

sentences.english: the Annals of the Zoological Society
sentences.chinese: 《动物学学会年报》

detailed_translations.english: used in the titles of official records of events or activities

trans: 可修理的；可挽回的；可补偿的

sentences.english: The HeliOS Project is a non-profit organization that obtains old or repairable computers, refurbishes them and then gives them to disadvantaged kids in the Central Texas area.
sentences.chinese: 太阳神项目是一个非赢利组织，获得旧的或可修理的计算机，整修之后送给德克萨斯州中部地区生活条件差的小孩。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可修理的；可挽回的；可补偿的
detailed_translations.english: able to be fixed

sentences.chinese: 圆锥形屋顶的茅舍

sentences.english: an environment conducive to learning
sentences.chinese: 有助于学习的环境

detailed_translations.english: if a situation is conducive to something such as work, rest etc, it provides conditions that make it easy for you to work etc

sentences.english: You didn’t measure the angle accurately.
sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

detailed_translations.english: the space between two straight lines or surfaces that join each other, measured in degrees

sentences.english: I have found a new gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 我找到一个新的健身房。

sentences.english: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.english: After computer printers and duffle bags had been carried to dorm rooms, everyone gathered in the gymnasium, students on one side of the bleachers, parents on the other.
sentences.chinese: 电脑打印机和行李包都运进了宿舍之后，所有人都到学校的体育馆集合，学生在露天看台的一侧，家长们在另一侧。

detailed_translations.english: a  gym

trans: 注定（destine的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.chinese: 本次航班飞往开罗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 命中注定的， 预定的； 以…为目的地的
detailed_translations.english: seeming certain to happen at some time in the future

sentences.english: a remote border town
sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.english: a fire in a remote mountain area
sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

detailed_translations.chinese: 遥远的， 偏僻的； 关系疏远的； 脱离的； 绝少的； 微乎其微的； 孤高的， 冷淡的
detailed_translations.english: far from towns or other places where people live

sentences.english: an olive grove
sentences.chinese: 一片橄榄树林

sentences.english: They are handsome with dark, shining hair, olive skin and fine brown eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他们很帅，有着乌黑闪亮的头发，黄褐色的皮肤，迷人的棕色眼睛。

If someone has olive skin, the colour of their skin is yellowish brown

sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.english: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: Her temperature soared.
sentences.chinese: 她的体温骤然升高。

sentences.english: The price of petrol has soared in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近几个星期汽油价格猛涨。

sentences.english: soaring unemployment
sentences.chinese: 急剧上升的失业率

detailed_translations.english: to increase quickly to a high level

sentences.english: I hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

detailed_translations.english: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

sentences.english: Put your rubbish in the bin.
sentences.chinese: 把你的垃圾放进箱子。

sentences.english: But you know how it is with us human you take something good you dissect it scrutinise it time and again not believing your good fortune and finally cast it to the "no" bin.
sentences.chinese: 可是你知道的，对我们人类来说，你以为某件事物很好、你仔细分析它、细看它一次又一次，不相信你的好运，最后又把它丢到「不」的箱子里（不再理它），这真是很消极又愚蠢的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for storing things, such as goods in a shop or substances in a factory

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.english: the geology of the British Isles

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the earth, including the origin and history of the rocks and soil of which the earth is made

name: deliberate
trans: 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的

sentences.english: a deliberate attempt to humiliate her
sentences.chinese: 对她的故意羞辱

sentences.english: The attack on him was quite deliberate.
sentences.chinese: 对他的袭击完全是有预谋的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故意的， 蓄意的； 慎重的， 深思熟虑的
detailed_translations.english: intended or planned
to think about something very carefully

name: transparency
trans: 透明，透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃

sentences.chinese: …莉齐艺术收藏品中一些杰作的幻灯片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 透明，透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃
detailed_translations.english: a sheet of plastic or a piece of photographic film through which light can be shone to show a picture on a large screen

name: Israel
trans: 以色列（亚洲国家）；犹太人，以色列人

sentences.chinese: 我们的问题只是以色列。

sentences.english: Jack dehorts me from visiting Israel.
sentences.chinese: 杰克劝阻我出访以色列。

sentences.english: Why have you spelled Israel like this?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你把以色列这么拼？

name: sterile
trans: 不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的

sentences.english: The classrooms are sterile, with no artwork on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 这些教室毫无生气，墙上一张画都没有。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不育的；无菌的；贫瘠的；不毛的；枯燥乏味的
detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that is sterile cannot produce babies

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.chinese: 他的湿衬衫紧紧地贴在身上。

sentences.chinese: 萨拉在母亲去世后比以往任何时候都更依附于她的姨妈。

sentences.chinese: 在整个审判中，她都坚持相信他是清白的。

sentences.chinese: 请不要忽略任何细节，不管它多细小。

trans: 讨厌的人；损害；麻烦事；讨厌的东西

sentences.chinese: 他喝醉时会是一个有点令人讨厌的人。

trans: 不寻常的；与众不同的；不平常的

sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

trans: 罕见；珍贵；珍品（需用复数）；稀薄

sentences.chinese: 电视机天线

detailed_translations.chinese: [电讯] 天线；[动] 触角，[昆] 触须
detailed_translations.english: one of two long thin parts on an insect’s head, that it uses to feel things

trans: 明显的；看得见的；现有的；可得到的

sentences.english: The comet is visible to the naked eye (= can be seen without using special equipment ).
sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.chinese: 慢性关节炎

sentences.chinese: 慢性心脏病

sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.chinese: 允许欧盟公民在欧盟任何地方居住的一项提议

trans: 少数民族；少数派；未成年

sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

sentences.chinese: 他用他的剑当当当地敲了3下盾。

sentences.english: He used his left hand as a shield against the reflecting sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手遮挡反射过来的阳光。

sentences.english: He held up his hands, shielding his eyes from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 他抬手遮住眼睛免受阳光照射。

to protect someone or something from being harmed or damaged

name: particle
trans: 颗粒；[物] 质点；极小量；小品词

sentences.english: dust particles
sentences.chinese: 尘埃

sentences.english: the sub-atomic particles that make up matter
sentences.chinese: 构成物质的次原子微粒

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of something

sentences.english: It really irritates me when he doesn’t help around the house.
sentences.chinese: 家里的事情他一点都不帮忙，真让我恼火。

sentences.chinese: 辛西娅还在写论文。

sentences.english: Their main thesis was that the rise in earnings was due to improvements in education.
sentences.chinese: 他们的主要论点是收入增加得益于教育状况的改善。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of writing about a particular subject that you do as part of an advanced university degree such as an MA or a PhD

sentences.english: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.chinese: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.english: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.chinese: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.english: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to talk or write about a subject that you want to be considered or a question that you think should be answered

name: illuminating
trans: 照亮的，照明的；启蒙的，有启发性的
照明，阐释（illuminate的现在分词形式）

sentences.english: a very illuminating book
sentences.chinese: 一本极具启发性的书

sentences.english: No streetlights illuminated the street.
sentences.chinese: 一盏照亮街道的路灯也没有。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照亮的，照明的；启蒙的，有启发性的
照明，阐释（illuminate的现在分词形式）
detailed_translations.english: To illuminate something means to shine light on it and to make it brighter and more visible

name: thesaurus
trans: 宝库；辞典；知识宝库；分类词汇汇编

detailed_translations.english: a book in which words are put into groups with other words that have similar meanings

name: exclusion
trans: 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物

sentences.english: Your essays tend to concentrate on one theme to the exclusion of everything else.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章往往会集中于一个主题而不顾及其他各个方面。

detailed_translations.chinese: 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物
detailed_translations.english: when someone is not allowed to take part in something or enter a place

name: bodily
trans: 整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式

sentences.english: The column was transferred bodily to a new site by the bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 那根圆柱被整体迁到河堤边的一个新址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式
detailed_translations.english: by moving a large object in one piece
related to the human body

sentences.english: ...the sound of a spoon scooping dog food out of a can.
sentences.chinese: …用勺子从罐子里舀狗粮的声音。

detailed_translations.english: If you scoop something from a container, you remove it with something such as a spoon

name: maternal
trans: 母亲的；母性的；母系的；母体遗传的

sentences.english: Annie was wonderfully warm and maternal.
sentences.chinese: 安妮非常亲切慈爱。

sentences.english: She seems to have a strong maternal instinct (= desire to have babies and take care of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 她似乎有很强的母性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 母亲的；母性的；母系的；母体遗传的
detailed_translations.english: typical of the way a good mother behaves or feels

sentences.english: The lake thawed in March.
sentences.chinese: 3月里，湖水解冻了。

detailed_translations.english: if ice or snow thaws, or if the sun thaws it, it turns into water
a period of warm weather during which snow and ice melt

name: essayist
trans: 随笔作家，散文家；评论家

sentences.english: Ralph Waldo Emerson was an American philosopher, poet, lecturer, and essayist.
sentences.chinese: 爱默生是一位美国的哲学家、诗人、演讲家及散文家。

sentences.english: Historian, essayist and political publicist, he was the editor of several underground “samizdat” periodicals and was arrested and imprisoned several times for his pro-democratic activities.
sentences.chinese: 他身为历史学家、散文家和政治宣传家，曾担任几个地下刊物的编辑，并因从事民主活动而多次被捕入狱。

sentences.english: Borges, a short-story writer, poet and essayist, died in 1986 without the Nobel.
sentences.chinese: 博尔赫斯死于1986年，这位短篇小说作家、诗人和散文家没有获得诺贝尔奖的垂青。

detailed_translations.chinese: 随笔作家，散文家；评论家
detailed_translations.english: someone who writes essays giving their ideas about politics, society etc

name: trigger
trans: 扳机；[电子] 触发器；制滑机

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

name: tremendous
trans: 极大的，巨大的；惊人的；极好的

sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a tremendous bang, and the whole station shook.
sentences.chinese: 突然一声巨响，整个车站都晃动了。

sentences.english: She was making a tremendous effort to appear calm.
sentences.chinese: 她竭力表现出平静的样子。

sentences.english: She praised her husband for the tremendous support he had given her.
sentences.chinese: 她称赞丈夫给了她巨大支持。

sentences.english: Sales have been tremendous so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年到目前为止，销售额十分惊人。

sentences.english: This plan could save us a tremendous amount of money.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划能给我们节省一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: very big, fast, powerful etc

sentences.english: a zealous preacher
sentences.chinese: 热心的讲道者

sentences.english: zealous political activists
sentences.chinese: 积极的政治活动家

detailed_translations.english: someone who is zealous does or supports something with great energy

sentences.english: I can get you tickets for the show but it’ll be tricky.
sentences.chinese: 我能给你弄到演出的票，但会很费事。

detailed_translations.english: a tricky person is clever and likely to deceive you

name: negligible
trans: 微不足道的，可以忽略的

sentences.english: The damage done to his property was negligible.
sentences.chinese: 对他财产造成的损失微不足道。

detailed_translations.english: too slight or unimportant to have any effect

name: oblivious
trans: 遗忘的；健忘的；不注意的；不知道的

sentences.english: She lay motionless where she was, oblivious to pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一动不动地躺在原地，感觉不到疼痛。

detailed_translations.english: If you are oblivious to something or oblivious of it, you are not aware of it

name: direct
trans: 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的
直接地；正好；按直系关系

sentences.english: Experienced users have direct access to the main data files.
sentences.chinese: 高级用户可直接浏览主数据文档。

sentences.english: I’m not in direct contact with them.
sentences.chinese: 我和他们没有直接的联系。

sentences.english: Few policy-makers have had direct experience of business.
sentences.chinese: 决策者几乎都没有直接的从商经历。

sentences.english: Women often feel men are too direct and not sympathetic enough.

sentences.english: The ambassador has endowed a $1 million public-service fellowships programme.
sentences.chinese: 大使资助了一个100万美元的公共服务奖学金项目。

sentences.english: You are endowed with wealth, good health and a lively intellect.
sentences.chinese: 你天生赋有财富、健康，和敏锐的智力。

detailed_translations.english: to give a college, hospital etc a large sum of money that provides it with an income

name: binoculars
trans: [光] 双筒望远镜；[光] 双筒镜，[光] 双目镜

sentences.english: The man focused some binoculars on the green peninsula ahead .
sentences.chinese: 男人拿起双筒望远镜眺望前面那青翠的半岛。

sentences.english: He raised the binoculars to his eye again, scanning across the scene.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次把双筒望远镜举到眼前，仔细观察整个现场。

sentences.english: Practice thesepaths several times with binoculars, and then repeat the one which works bestfor you using the finder of your telescope.
sentences.chinese: 用双筒望远镜练习这些路径几次，然后使用你的望远镜的寻星镜重复最适合的一个路径。

detailed_translations.english: a pair of special glasses, that you hold up to your eyes to look at objects that are a long distance away

sentences.english: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.chinese: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

detailed_translations.english: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good

name: counterpart
trans: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物

sentences.english: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.chinese: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物
detailed_translations.english: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place

name: stale
trans: 变陈旧；撒尿；变得不新鲜

sentences.english: stale jokes
sentences.chinese: 老掉牙的笑话

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting any more

sentences.english: But the brittleness of silicon limits its uses.
sentences.chinese: 但是，硅的脆性也限制了其应用范围。

sentences.english: The company pioneered the use of the silicon chip.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司首先使用硅片。

sentences.english: They consist of silicon, sand and metal so there’s no any connection to dinosaurs … Besides, we may see corrosion on some of them.
sentences.chinese: 它们是由硅砂和金属构成的，和恐龙蛋没有任何关系……除此之外，我们还能看到它们上面的腐蚀的部分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists as a solid or as a powder and is used to make glass, bricks, and parts for computers. It is a chemical element: symbol Si

sentences.english: Using a seatbelt will reduce the likelihood of serious injury in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 系安全带可以降低在车祸中受重伤的可能性。

detailed_translations.english: the degree to which something can reasonably be expected to happen

sentences.english: Consider one of the difficulties: every time we move our eyes, the image on our retina moves.
sentences.chinese: 比如困难之一就是：每当我们的眼球移动时，视网膜上的影像也在移动。

sentences.english: There are sensory neurons, which take information from the world so as you see me, for instance, there are neurons firing from your retina sending signals to your brain.
sentences.chinese: 感觉神经元,负责收集外界信息,比如,当你看到我的时候,视网膜上的神经元会产生神经冲动,将刺激信号传递到你的大脑

sentences.english: A tiny electronic pad is placed onto the retina of one eye, so that the electrodes are in direct contact with the ganglion cells.
sentences.chinese: 一个微小的电子衬垫被放置在单侧眼睛的视网膜上，这样电极就可以与神经节细胞直接接触了。

detailed_translations.english: the area at the back of your eye that receives light and sends an image of what you see to your brain

name: knuckle
trans: 关节；指关节；指节；膝关节；肘

sentences.english: Her knuckles whitened as she gripped the gun.
sentences.chinese: 她紧紧握着枪，指关节都发白了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关节；指关节；指节；膝关节；肘
detailed_translations.english: your knuckles are the joints in your fingers, including the ones where your fingers join your hands

sentences.english: The commander said that the army would comply with the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 指挥官说过部队会遵从停火协议。

sentences.english: Some beaches had failed to comply with environmental regulations.
sentences.chinese: 一些海滩没能遵守环保规定。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you have to do or are asked to do

sentences.english: He was demoted to the rank of corporal.
sentences.chinese: 他被降为下士。

sentences.english: He was advanced to the rank of corporal.
sentences.chinese: 他被提升为下士。

sentences.english: As punishment,the corporal was demoted to private.
sentences.chinese: 作为惩罚，这下士被降为士兵。

detailed_translations.english: of or relating to the body; bodily
a low rank in the army, air force etc

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: Napoleon’s retreat from Moscow
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑从莫斯科的撤退

sentences.english: The rebel forces are in full retreat (= retreating very fast ) .
sentences.chinese: 叛军全线溃退。

sentences.english: The bugler sounded the retreat (= gave a loud signal for retreat ) .
sentences.chinese: 司号兵吹响撤退号。

detailed_translations.english: a movement away from the enemy after a defeat in battle
to move away from the enemy after being defeated in battle

name: convert
trans: 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰
皈依者；改变宗教信仰者

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

sentences.english: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.chinese: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

detailed_translations.english: to ride on waves while standing on a special board

sentences.english: the regimented routine of boarding school
sentences.chinese: 寄宿学校严格的生活规律

detailed_translations.english: to organize and control people firmly and usually too strictly
a large group of soldiers, usually consisting of several  battalion s

name: strap
trans: 用带捆绑；用皮条抽打；约束

sentences.english: The strap of my bag is broken.
sentences.chinese: 我包上的带子断了。

sentences.english: soldiers with grenades strapped to their belts
sentences.chinese: 腰带上绑着手榴弹的士兵

detailed_translations.english: a narrow band of strong material that is used to fasten, hang, or hold onto something
to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps

sentences.english: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

name: cosmos
trans: 宇宙；和谐；秩序；大波斯菊

sentences.english: ...the natural laws of the cosmos.
sentences.chinese: …宇宙的自然法则。

detailed_translations.english: the whole universe, especially when you think of it as a system

sentences.english: Do you work hard for success rather than daydream about it?
sentences.chinese: 你在努力争取成功而非做白日梦吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something pleasant, especially when this makes you forget what you should be doing
pleasant thoughts you have while you are awake that make you forget what you are doing

name: peacock
trans: 孔雀；雄孔雀；爱虚荣的人

sentences.english: Each pea and peach on the beach can be reached by the peacock.
sentences.chinese: 海滩上的每一颗豌豆和桃子孔雀都能触及.

sentences.english: In the evening breeze her pet peacock sat drowsing on its perch, and the pigeons were silent in their corner.
sentences.chinese: 在黄昏的微风中，她宠爱的孔雀蹬在栖木上打睡瞌，她的鸽子沉默地站在它们的角落里。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird, the male of which has long blue and green tail feathers that it can lift up and spread out

sentences.english: They own 200 acres of farmland.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有200英亩农田。

sentences.english: a 200-acre wood
sentences.chinese: 一片200英亩的林地

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,840 square yards or 4,047 square metres

sentences.english: Our host gave us an effusive welcome.
sentences.chinese: 主人热情地欢迎我们。

detailed_translations.english: showing your good feelings in a very excited way

name: sermon
trans: 布道；训诫；启示；冗长的讲话

sentences.english: Cardinal Murphy will deliver the sermon on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 墨菲红衣主教将在周日布道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 布道；训诫；启示；冗长的讲话
detailed_translations.english: a talk given as part of a Christian church service, usually on a religious or moral subject

sentences.english: These included bronzeware and stoneware, most of which are several thousand years old—but heavy, with the heaviest weighing more than a ton.
sentences.chinese: 其中大多数青铜器和石器都有好几千年历史，由于重量的关系都留了下来，最重的一尊达一吨以上。

sentences.english: Now the Java Sea had yielded up a shipload, many perfectly preserved—protected in the stoneware jars from the scouring action of sand on the seafloor.
sentences.chinese: 如今，爪哇海交出了一批船货。 由于石器罐子的保护作用，里面的碗逃脱了海底沙的冲刷，许多都完整的保存下来了。

sentences.english: Tall stoneware jars served as ninth-century shipping containers; each could hold more than a hundred nested bowls that might originally have been padded with rice straw, a sort of organic bubble wrap.
sentences.chinese: 高的石器罐子在9世纪被用作集装箱，每个罐子可装入100多个重叠的碗，也许起初稻草也被当做有机气泡垫包装纸塞在缝隙中。

name: extreme
trans: 极端的；极度的；偏激的；尽头的
极端；末端；最大程度；极端的事物

sentences.english: Extreme poverty still exists in many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold
sentences.chinese: 严寒

sentences.english: He had extreme difficulty getting hold of the ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

detailed_translations.english: very great in degree
a situation, quality etc which is as great as it can possibly be – used especially when talking about two opposites

name: rascal
trans: 流氓，无赖；淘气鬼，捣蛋鬼
不诚实的；下贱的，卑鄙的

sentences.english: What's that old rascal been telling you?
sentences.chinese: 那个老家伙对你都一直说些什么？

detailed_translations.chinese: 流氓，无赖；淘气鬼，捣蛋鬼
detailed_translations.english: a child who behaves badly but whom you still like

detailed_translations.chinese: 不诚实的；下贱的，卑鄙的

sentences.english: The cliffs are being constantly eroded by heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 悬崖正不断受到汹涌海浪的侵蚀。

sentences.english: The rocks have gradually eroded away.
sentences.chinese: 岩石逐渐风化。

detailed_translations.english: if the weather erodes rock or soil, or if rock or soil erodes, its surface is gradually destroyed

sentences.english: ...fodder for horses.
sentences.chinese: …马的饲料。

detailed_translations.english: food for farm animals

sentences.english: A look of annoyance crossed her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上掠过一丝不快。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of slight anger

name: regardless
trans: 不管的；不顾的；不注意的
不顾后果地；不管怎样，无论如何；不惜费用地

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

sentences.english: There were disturbances in the crowd as fans left the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 球迷离开体育场时，人群中发生了骚乱。

sentences.english: When a helicopter lands, it can cause a disturbance to local residents.
sentences.chinese: 直升机降落会惊扰当地居民。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people behave violently in public

name: feeble
trans: 微弱的，无力的；虚弱的；薄弱的

sentences.english: His voice sounded feeble and far away.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音听上去既无力又遥远。

sentences.english: She was too feeble to leave her room.
sentences.chinese: 她身体虚弱，无法走出自己的房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虚弱的， 衰弱的， 无力的； 无效的， 无益的
detailed_translations.english: extremely weak

sentences.english: Reading was her favourite pastime.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是她最喜爱的消遣方式。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do because you think it is enjoyable or interesting

sentences.english: Uncle Ted’s chair collapsed under his weight.
sentences.chinese: 椅子承受不了特德叔叔的重量，塌架了。

sentences.english: The roof had collapsed long ago.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶早就塌了。

detailed_translations.english: if a building, wall etc collapses, it falls down suddenly, usually because it is weak or damaged

sentences.english: It was the kind of rumour that it is impossible to refute.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种不可能推翻的谣言。

detailed_translations.english: to prove that a statement or idea is not correct

name: way
trans: 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: copper sulphate
sentences.chinese: 硫酸铜

detailed_translations.english: a  salt  formed from  sulphuric acid

name: promotion
trans: 提升，[劳经] 晋升；推销，促销；促进；发扬，振兴

sentences.english: a society for the promotion of religious tolerance
sentences.chinese: 一个促进宗教包容的团体

sentences.english: I want a job with good prospects for promotion.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份有良好晋升机会的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of helping something to develop or increase

sentences.english: If patients are disinclined to take a tablet they consider bitter or sour or because they simply do not like the color, then a change of aesthetics might be needed.
sentences.chinese: 如果病人不愿服用他们认为苦或酸的药片，或者他们拒绝服药的原因只是不喜欢药片的颜色，那么就非常有必要对药物进行“美学上的修饰”—换个颜色。

detailed_translations.english: Aesthetics is a branch of philosophy concerned with the study of the idea of beauty

name: proportion
trans: 比例，占比；部分；面积；均衡

sentences.english: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.english: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

name: Jew
trans: 犹太人；犹太教徒；守财奴

sentences.english: The disciple was a Jew . "What good work shall I do to be acceptable to God "?
sentences.chinese: 一个犹太人门徒问：“我应该做什么样工作才能让上帝接受?”（合上帝之意?。

sentences.english: If a Christian wrong a Jew, what should his sufferance be by Christian example? Why, revenge.
sentences.chinese: 要是一个犹太人欺侮了一个基督徒，那基督徒怎样表现他的谦逊？报仇。 妹。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose religion is Judaism, or who is a member of a group whose traditional religion is Judaism

sentences.english: I am most assuredly in favour.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对赞成。

detailed_translations.english: definitely or certainly

sentences.english: The hostages said they were hungry but had not been maltreated.
sentences.chinese: 人质说他们挨了饿，但没有受到虐待。

detailed_translations.english: to treat a person or animal cruelly

name: launch
trans: 发射（导弹、火箭等）；发起，发动；使…下水
发射；发行，投放市场；下水；汽艇

sentences.english: A test satellite was launched from Cape Canaveral.
sentences.chinese: 一颗实验人造卫星从卡纳维拉尔角发射升空。

sentences.english: The organization has launched a campaign to raise $150,000.
sentences.chinese: 为了筹集15万美元，该组织发起了一场募捐活动。

sentences.english: The Canadian police plan to launch an investigation into the deal.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大警方计划对这宗交易进行调查。

sentences.english: The book launched his career as a novelist.
sentences.chinese: 这本书开启了他的小说创作生涯。

detailed_translations.english: to send a weapon or spacecraft into the sky or into space

name: strain
trans: 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: charity
trans: 慈善；施舍；慈善团体；宽容；施舍物

sentences.english: Several charities sent aid to the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 有几家慈善机构已向洪灾灾民送去了救援物资。

detailed_translations.english: an organization that gives money, goods, or help to people who are poor, sick etc

name: hail
trans: 致敬；招呼；向欢呼；猛发；使像下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails）

sentences.english: heavy showers of rain and hail
sentences.chinese: 夹着冰雹的阵阵大雨

detailed_translations.english: frozen raindrops which fall as hard balls of ice

detailed_translations.chinese: 致敬；招呼；向欢呼；猛发；使像下雹样落下（过去式hailed，过去分词hailed，现在分词hailing，第三人称单数hails）
detailed_translations.english: to call to someone in order to greet them or try to attract their attention

sentences.english: The public is treated with contempt by broadcasters.
sentences.chinese: 公众受到了节目主持人的轻蔑对待。

sentences.english: How could she have loved a man who so clearly held her in contempt ?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么会爱上一个明显看不起她的男人呢？

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that someone or something is not important and deserves no respect

name: khaki
trans: 卡其色的；黄褐色的；卡其布做的

sentences.english: On each side of me was a figure in khaki.
sentences.chinese: 我的两侧各有一个身穿卡其布衣服的人。

detailed_translations.english: a dull green-brown or yellow-brown colour

detailed_translations.chinese: 卡其色的；黄褐色的；卡其布做的

sentences.english: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.chinese: 就在近几年，最后的沙丁鱼罐头工厂，在缅因州关门了。

sentences.english: Just in the last few years, the last sardine cannery, in Maine, closed its doors.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅在过去的几年里，缅因州的最后几家沙丁鱼罐头厂也倒闭了。

detailed_translations.english: a factory where food is put into cans

name: monotonous
trans: 单调的，无抑扬顿挫的；无变化的

sentences.english: a monotonous diet
sentences.chinese: 单调的饮食

sentences.english: a little boy who wet his bed with monotonous regularity
sentences.chinese: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

detailed_translations.english: boring because of always being the same
