sentences.english: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.chinese: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.english: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.chinese: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

detailed_translations.english: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

name: smoky
trans: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的

sentences.english: a smoky engine
sentences.chinese: 冒出大量烟的引擎

detailed_translations.chinese: 冒烟的；烟熏味的；熏着的；呛人的；烟状的
detailed_translations.english: producing too much smoke

name: shrine
trans: 将…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣

sentences.english: Elvis’ home has become a shrine for his fans.
sentences.chinese: 猫王的故居成了歌迷的朝圣地。

detailed_translations.english: a place that is connected with a holy event or holy person, and that people visit to pray

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…置于神龛内；把…奉为神圣

sentences.english: Lucy soothed the baby by rocking it in her arms.
sentences.chinese: 露西把宝宝抱在怀里摇晃着，让他安静下来。

sentences.english: She made a cup of tea to soothe her nerves.
sentences.chinese: 她泡了杯茶让自己平静下来。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel calmer and less anxious, upset, or angry

sentences.english: Her scream was followed by a loud echo.
sentences.chinese: 她的尖叫声过后是响亮的回声。

sentences.english: ‘He's gone! ’ Viv echoed.
sentences.chinese: “他去了！”维夫重复道。

detailed_translations.english: a sound that you hear again after a loud noise, because it was made near something such as a wall
to repeat what someone else has just said

sentences.english: Emma studies philosophy at university.
sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the nature and meaning of existence, truth, good and evil, etc

sentences.english: Out with every theory of human behavior, from linguistics to sociology.
sentences.chinese: 从语言学、社会学的人类行为原理里解脱吧。

sentences.english: It took three hours for the doctor of linguistics to tell us this. Again I quit.
sentences.chinese: 关于这一点，这个语言学博士足足讲了三个小时，我再次退出了。

sentences.english: Then we have research center in Grenoble, France where the focus is all on linguistics, machine learning.
sentences.chinese: 我们在法国格勒诺布尔也有研究中心,研究重点是语言学和机器学习。

detailed_translations.english: the study of language in general and of particular languages, their structure, grammar, and history

name: serpent
trans: 蛇（尤指大蛇或毒蛇）；狡猾的人

sentences.english: ...the serpent in the Garden of Eden.
sentences.chinese: …伊甸园里的那条蛇。

detailed_translations.english: a snake, especially a large one

sentences.english: Her clothes had all been ripped.
sentences.chinese: 她的衣服都被撕破了。

sentences.english: The sail ripped under the force of the wind.
sentences.chinese: 船帆被狂风刮破了。

sentences.english: Impatiently, Sue ripped the letter open .
sentences.chinese: 休急不可待地撕开信封。

detailed_translations.english: to tear something or be torn quickly and violently
a long tear or cut

name: thought
trans: 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.chinese: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.english: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.chinese: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think of, remember, or realize

detailed_translations.chinese: 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

name: eve
trans: 夏娃； 前夕；傍晚；重大事件关头

sentences.english: We’re arriving on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 我们将在平安夜到达。

sentences.english: a New Year’s Eve party
sentences.chinese: 除夕之夜的派对

detailed_translations.english: the night or day before an important day

name: reconnaissance
trans: [军] 侦察；勘测（等于reconnoissance）；搜索；事先考查

sentences.english: reconnaissance aircraft
sentences.chinese: 侦察机

sentences.english: a reconnaissance mission
sentences.chinese: 侦察任务

sentences.english: wartime roles such as observation and reconnaissance
sentences.chinese: 监视和侦察等战时任务

detailed_translations.chinese: [军] 侦察；勘测（等于reconnoissance）；搜索；事先考查
detailed_translations.english: the military activity of sending soldiers and aircraft to find out about the enemy’s forces

name: incomparable
trans: 无比的；无可匹敌的；不能比较的

sentences.english: an incomparable view of San Marco
sentences.chinese: 圣马科美妙绝伦的景色

sentences.english: a wine of incomparable flavour
sentences.chinese: 香醇无比的葡萄酒

detailed_translations.chinese: 无比的；无可匹敌的；不能比较的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, beautiful etc, and much better than others

sentences.english: a wildlife refuge
sentences.chinese: 野生动物保护区

detailed_translations.english: shelter or protection from someone or something

name: vitality
trans: 活力，生气；生命力，生动性

sentences.english: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已80岁了，埃尔茜依然充满活力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活力； 生机， 元气
detailed_translations.english: great energy and eagerness to do things

sentences.english: ‘Tom always sends me red roses on my birthday.’ ‘How romantic!’
sentences.chinese: “我过生日时汤姆总是给我送红玫瑰。”“多浪漫啊！”

detailed_translations.english: showing strong feelings of love

sentences.english: As a critic, he is far too subjective.
sentences.chinese: 作为评论家，他过于主观。

sentences.english: a highly subjective point of view
sentences.chinese: 相当主观的看法

detailed_translations.english: a state-ment, report, attitude etc that is subjective is influenced by personal opinion and can therefore be unfair

sentences.english: An inspection was carried out at the school.
sentences.chinese: 有人来学校视察了一遍。

sentences.english: However, on closer inspection, a number of problems emerged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经进一步检查，很多问题冒了出来。

detailed_translations.english: an official visit to a building or organization to check that everything is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: touchdown
trans: 着陆，降落；触地；触地得分

sentences.english: The astronauts are preparing for touchdown tomorrow morning.
sentences.chinese: 宇航员正准备明晨的降落。

detailed_translations.chinese: 着陆，降落；触地；触地得分
detailed_translations.english: the moment at which a plane or spacecraft lands

name: repeal
trans: 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定

sentences.english: The government has just repealed the law segregating public facilities.
sentences.chinese: 政府刚刚废除了隔离公共设施的法令。

sentences.english: Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition.
sentences.chinese: 明年将是禁酒令废止的60周年。

detailed_translations.chinese: 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定
detailed_translations.english: if a government repeals a law, it officially ends that law
Repeal is also a noun

sentences.english: I just shrugged my shoulders and ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 我只是耸耸肩，没有理睬他。

sentences.english: ‘Suit yourself,’ he said with a shrug.
sentences.chinese: “随你的便。”他耸耸肩说道。

detailed_translations.english: to raise and then lower your shoulders in order to show that you do not know something or do not care about something
a movement of your shoulders upwards and then downwards again that you make to show that you do not know something or do not care about something

sentences.english: The country has undergone massive changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家最近经历了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: He has been released from prison to undergo medical treatment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 他获释出狱去美国接受治疗。

sentences.english: She has been undergoing tests since Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她从星期一开始一直在接受各种检查。

sentences.english: Teachers should be expected to undergo mid-career training and development.
sentences.chinese: 教师应该参加中期职业培训和发展活动。

detailed_translations.english: if you undergo a change, an unpleasant experience etc, it happens to you or is done to you

name: godmother
trans: 当…的教母；作…的女监护人

sentences.english: As Cinderella sits crying in the garden, her fairy godmother appears, and promised to provide Cinderella with everything she needs to go to the ball, but only on two conditions.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘在花园里伤心的哭泣，这时她的精灵教母出现了，答应给她提供她参加舞会所需的一切，但有两个条件。

sentences.english: In the case of Roman Catholics, the parents of the child will select a godfather and a godmother and this will be announced at the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 如若是罗马天主教徒，父母就会为孩子选择一位教父和一位教母，并会在仪式上将此事进行宣布。

detailed_translations.english: a female  godparent

detailed_translations.chinese: 当…的教母；作…的女监护人

sentences.english: But critics and environmental groups say poaching is still on the rise in Zimbabwe, especially of the black rhino.
sentences.chinese: 但批评家和环境保护组织认为，偷猎在津巴布韦依然有增无减，尤其是狩猎黑犀牛。

detailed_translations.english: a rhinoceros

sentences.english: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
sentences.chinese: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.english: There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.english: He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
sentences.chinese: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc
someone from Sweden

sentences.english: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.chinese: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

detailed_translations.english: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
to develop or come from something else

name: formidable
trans: 强大的；可怕的；令人敬畏的；艰难的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

name: commonplace
trans: 老生常谈；司空见惯的事；普通的东西

sentences.english: Car thefts are commonplace in this part of town.
sentences.chinese: 镇上的这个地段盗车案屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: It is a commonplace to say that Northern Ireland is a backwater in the modern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 说北爱尔兰是现代欧洲死气沉沉的落后地区已是陈词滥调了。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing in many places, and therefore not special or unusual
something that has been said so often that it is no longer interesting or original

name: unique
trans: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

name: guardian
trans: [法] 监护人，保护人；守护者

sentences.english: Destiny's legal guardian was her grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 德斯蒂妮的法定监护人是她的祖母。

detailed_translations.chinese: [法] 监护人，保护人；守护者
detailed_translations.english: someone who is legally responsible for looking after someone else’s child, especially after the child’s parents have died

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn’t mean to startle you.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我不是故意吓你一跳的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone suddenly surprised or slightly shocked

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

name: urban
trans: (Urban)人名；(西)乌尔万；(斯洛伐)乌尔班；(德、俄、罗、匈、塞、波、捷、瑞典、意)乌尔班；(英)厄本；(法)于尔邦

sentences.english: unemployment in urban areas
sentences.chinese: 城市地区的失业状况

sentences.english: the deprived sections of the urban population
sentences.chinese: 城市人口中的贫困群体

detailed_translations.english: relating to towns and cities

name: elastic
trans: 有弹性的；灵活的；易伸缩的

sentences.english: a piece of elastic
sentences.chinese: 一根橡皮带

sentences.english: the horny elastic pad in a horse’s hoof
sentences.chinese: 马蹄上粗硬而有弹性的肉掌

detailed_translations.english: a type of rubber material that can stretch and then return to its usual length or size
a material that is elastic can stretch and then go back to its usual length or size

sentences.english: Marshal Zhukov
sentences.chinese: 朱可夫元帅

sentences.english: the Marshal of the Royal Air force
sentences.chinese: 皇家空军元帅

detailed_translations.english: an officer of the highest rank in the army or air force of some countries
to organize your thoughts, ideas etc so that they are clear, effective, or easy to understand

name: squarely
trans: 直角地；诚实地；正好；干脆地；正当地

sentences.english: He turned and faced her squarely.
sentences.chinese: 他转过身来和她正面相对。

sentences.english: She hit him squarely on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 她不偏不倚地打在他的鼻子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直角地；诚实地；正好；干脆地；正当地
detailed_translations.english: directly and firmly

sentences.english: He quickened his pace , longing to be home.
sentences.chinese: 他加快步伐，盼望着早点回到家中。

sentences.english: Traffic slowed to a walking pace.
sentences.chinese: 车流速度减缓，犹如步行。

sentences.english: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down.
sentences.chinese: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

detailed_translations.english: the speed at which someone walks, runs, or moves
to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

name: ask
trans: 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: great all-round sportswoman
sentences.chinese: 杰出的全能女运动员

detailed_translations.english: a woman who plays many different sports

sentences.english: Good oral hygiene and regular dental care are important, whatever your age.
sentences.chinese: 无论年龄大小，良好的口腔卫生和定期的牙齿保健都非常重要。

detailed_translations.english: relating to your teeth

sentences.english: But its decline across Europe is not uniform; in each country, the church faces a different mixture of threats and residual strengths.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在欧洲这种萎缩并不均匀，在每一个国家，教会都面对着多种不同威胁和残余的优势。

sentences.english: These, however, have been exposed to the digestive mercies of bacteria in the large intestine, and any residual goodies have been removed from them that way.
sentences.chinese: 然而这些是被暴露到大肠消化道寄生细菌产生的结果，并且任何剩余糖分都是通过这种方式被移除的。

detailed_translations.english: remaining after a process, event etc is finished

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

sentences.english: She was young at the time, and newly married.
sentences.chinese: 那时她还年轻，刚结婚。

detailed_translations.english: recently

sentences.english: Palm oil is an ingredient in an estimate third of all products on supermarket shelves, from biscuits and margarine to shampoo and confectionery.
sentences.chinese: 在超市货架上，棕榈油是一种被估计使用率第三的食品配料，从饼干、人造黄油到洗发水到糖果都有它的足迹。

detailed_translations.english: a yellow substance similar to butter but made from vegetable or animal fats, which you eat with bread or use for cooking

sentences.english: magical powers
sentences.chinese: 魔力

detailed_translations.english: relating to magic or able to do magic

sentences.english: stacks of dirty dishes
sentences.chinese: 一摞摞脏盘子

sentences.english: Mrs. Cathiard was stacking the clean bottles in crates.
sentences.chinese: 卡提亚夫人当时正在把干净的瓶子堆放到板条箱里。

detailed_translations.english: a neat pile of things
If you stack a number of things, you arrange them in neat piles

sentences.english: The movie deals with injustices suffered by Native Americans.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影讲述印第安人受到的不公正待遇。

sentences.english: He had developed a deep sense of social injustice.
sentences.chinese: 他深深感到社会的不公。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people are treated very unfairly and not given their rights

sentences.english: The advice in the booklet reflects the practical experience we have gained (= experience gained by actually doing something, rather than knowledge from books etc ).
sentences.chinese: 小册子中的建议反映了我们所获得的实践经验。

sentences.english: I had some experience in fashion design.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些时装设计方面的经验。

sentences.english: She was turned down on the grounds of lack of experience.
sentences.chinese: 她因缺乏经验而被拒绝。

sentences.english: The book is based on personal experience .
sentences.chinese: 本书是根据个人经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: knowledge or skill that you gain from doing a job or activity, or the process of doing this

name: scant
trans: 不足的；缺乏的；勉强够的

sentences.english: The story has received scant attention in the press.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没在报界引起多少注意。

sentences.english: They produce goods with scant regard for quality.
sentences.chinese: 他们的产品不够重视质量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不足的；缺乏的；勉强够的
detailed_translations.english: not enough

name: tow
trans: 拖；麻的粗纤维；拖曳所用之绳

sentences.english: The ship had to be towed into the harbor.
sentences.chinese: 那艘轮船不得不被拖进港口。

sentences.english: Can you give us a tow to the garage?
sentences.chinese: 你能帮我们把车拖到修车厂吗？

detailed_translations.english: to pull a vehicle or ship along behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain
an act of pulling a vehicle behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain

name: component
trans: 成分；组件；[电子] 元件

sentences.english: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫没能使苏联各组成部分保持在一起。

detailed_translations.english: the component parts of something are the parts that it consists of
one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc

sentences.english: ‘This is boring,’ Kathleen grumbled.
sentences.chinese: “这真无聊。”凯瑟琳抱怨道。

sentences.english: My only grumble is that there isn't a non-smoking section.
sentences.chinese: 我惟一的抱怨是这儿没有无烟区。

sentences.english: They grumble about how hard they have to work.
sentences.chinese: 他们抱怨自己工作得很辛苦。

sentences.english: Taft grumbled that the law so favoured the criminal that trials seemed like a game of chance.
sentences.chinese: 塔夫脱抱怨法律如此有利于罪犯，使得审判看来像是一场运气的游戏。

detailed_translations.english: to keep complaining in an unhappy way
Grumble is also a noun
If someone grumbles, they complain about something in a bad-tempered way

sentences.english: It was all an elaborate pretence .
sentences.chinese: 这一切都是精心的伪装。

detailed_translations.english: a way of behaving which is intended to make people believe something that is not true

name: essential
trans: 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

name: tuck
trans: 卷起；挤进；用某物舒适地裹住；使有褶裥；收拢；大口吃；使隐藏
食物；船尾突出部；缝摺；抱膝式跳水；活力；鼓声

sentences.english: You tuck your secret away in an unexpected place, like an MP3 or a photo file, to conceal the fact you even shared any information at all.
sentences.chinese: 你将你的秘密“卷起来”，放在一个意想不到的地方，比如MP3或照片文件，这样就掩盖了你曾经分享信息的事实。

detailed_translations.english: a pleat or fold in a part of a garment, usually stitched down so as to make it a better fit or as decoration

name: narcotic
trans: 麻醉的；有麻醉作用的；催眠的
[药] 麻醉药；镇静剂；起麻醉作用的事物

sentences.english: The truth of Johnson’s comment was recently brought home to me by the serene calm of a resident who was treating a particularly complicated narcotic-dependent patient.
sentences.chinese: 最近，一位住院医生对待一位异常复杂的麻醉药依赖病人的平静态度让我领会到了塞缪尔.约翰逊这句话的真谛。

sentences.english: As a result, almost 50 years after the agreement was adopted, adequate availability of narcotic drugs for pain treatment remains an unfulfilled promise.
sentences.chinese: 因此虽然条约早在50年前被通过，但确保治疗疼痛的麻醉药物供应充足仍是个未兑现的承诺。

detailed_translations.english: a type of drug which makes you sleep and reduces pain
a narcotic drug takes away pain or makes you sleep

name: enterprise
trans: 企业；事业；进取心；事业心

sentences.english: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.chinese: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.english: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 事业,企(事)业单位；事业心,进取心
detailed_translations.english: a company, organization, or business

name: part
trans: 部分；角色；零件；一些；片段

sentences.english: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.english: Lay all the parts out before you start assembling the model.
sentences.chinese: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time

sentences.english: His parents still clung to the misguided belief that his common sense would keep him out of serious trouble.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母依然错误地认为他的常识能让他远离大的麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: a misguided idea or opinion is wrong because it is based on a wrong understanding of a situation

sentences.english: Filling stations have whacked as much as a dime off their regular prices.
sentences.chinese: 加油站已经把正常价格降了一角银币。

detailed_translations.english: a coin of the US and Canada, worth one tenth of a dollar

name: scale
trans: 规模；比例；鳞；刻度；天平；数值范围

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

name: potential
trans: 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: chemicals used to purify the water
sentences.chinese: 用于净化水质的化学品

detailed_translations.english: to remove dirty or harmful substances from something

sentences.english: He is next in line to the throne (= will become king when the present ruler dies ) .
sentences.chinese: 他是第一王位继承人。

sentences.english: In 1913, George V was on the throne (= was ruling ) .
sentences.chinese: 1913年乔治五世在位。

detailed_translations.english: the position and power of being a king or queen

sentences.english: She takes her inspiration from shells and stones she finds on the seashore.
sentences.chinese: 她从她在海岸边发现的贝壳和石头里获取灵感。

detailed_translations.english: the land at the edge of the sea, consisting of sand and rocks

sentences.english: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
sentences.chinese: 我扣着钱，直到他们完工。

sentences.english: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
sentences.chinese: 伊恩被控向警方隐瞒重要信息。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to give someone something

sentences.english: the Israeli government
sentences.chinese: 以色列政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to Israel or its people
someone from Israel

sentences.english: books in which the lives of famous people are dissected
sentences.chinese: 剖析名人生平的书籍

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to understand it

name: element
trans: 元素；要素；原理；成分；自然环境

sentences.english: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.chinese: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is a one-valence element.
sentences.chinese: 氢是一价的元素。

detailed_translations.english: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

sentences.english: A boy came towards them, rolling an iron hoop.
sentences.chinese: 一个男孩滚着一个铁环朝他们走来。

detailed_translations.english: a large ring made of wood, metal, plastic etc
to surround with or as if with a hoop

sentences.english: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
sentences.chinese: 在阵亡之前他奉命执行过200多次军事任务。

sentences.english: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
sentences.chinese: 参与维和任务的美军

sentences.english: a British trade mission to Moscow
sentences.chinese: 派往莫斯科的英国贸易代表团

detailed_translations.english: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft

sentences.english: We can only prosecute if there is sufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 有了足够的证据，我们才能提出起诉。

sentences.english: Unauthorized absence is sufficient reason for dismissal.
sentences.chinese: 旷工足以成为解雇的理由。

sentences.english: We need sufficient time to deal with the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要足够的时间来处理这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: as much as is needed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: He’s a nice guy when he’s sober.
sentences.chinese: 他没喝醉时是个不错的家伙。

detailed_translations.english: not drunk

sentences.english: a country ravaged by civil war
sentences.chinese: 遭受内战重创的国家

sentences.english: His health was gradually ravaged by drink and drugs.
sentences.chinese: 酗酒和吸毒渐渐毁了他的健康。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly

sentences.english: Kennedy’s assassin is assumed to have been Lee Harvey Oswald.
sentences.chinese: 暗杀肯尼迪的人据说是李·哈维·奥斯瓦尔德。

detailed_translations.english: someone who murders an important person

sentences.english: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
sentences.chinese: 谁也别想侮辱了我的家人之后就这么算了！

sentences.english: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不来，希望安迪不要介意。

sentences.english: 200 for all that work? It’s an insult.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：干那么多工作才给200美元？这简直是侮辱。

detailed_translations.english: to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
a remark or action that is offensive or deliberately rude

sentences.english: Is the coffee break the adult version of recess?
sentences.chinese: 工间喝咖啡是成人的休息方式吗？

detailed_translations.english: a way of explaining or doing something that is typical of a particular group or period of time

sentences.english: The exterior walls need a new coat of paint.
sentences.chinese: 外墙需要刷新漆了。

detailed_translations.english: on the outside of something
the outside of something, especially a building

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

sentences.english: Westerly gales forced the ship off course.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的西风将那艘船吹离了航道。

sentences.english: Firemen entering the building were forced back by flames.
sentences.chinese: 冲进大楼的消防队员被火焰挡了回来。

sentences.english: She tried to keep the door shut but the man forced it open .
sentences.chinese: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强迫；用力推动，用力打开
detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move in a particular direction or into a different position, especially through or using great strength

detailed_translations.chinese: 军队， 兵力； 暴力， 武力； 力， 力气； 影响力， 效力
detailed_translations.english: military action used as a way of achieving your aims

sentences.english: He slipped and fell, badly bruising an elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他滑倒了，严重挫伤了一只胳膊肘。

detailed_translations.english: the joint where your arm bends
to push someone with your elbows, especially in order to move past them

name: preserve
trans: 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品

sentences.english: We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

detailed_translations.english: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

name: grapevine
trans: 葡萄树；葡萄藤；小道消息；秘密情报网

sentences.english: I had heard through the grapevine that he was quite critical of what we were doing.
sentences.chinese: 我已经私下听说他对我们的工作十分挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 葡萄树；葡萄藤；小道消息；秘密情报网
detailed_translations.english: a climbing plant on which grapes grow

name: intense
trans: 强烈的；紧张的；非常的；热情的

sentences.english: Young people today are under intense pressure to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.english: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.chinese: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.english: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.chinese: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.english: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.english: a look of intense dislike
sentences.chinese: 极端厌恶的表情

sentences.english: The job demands intense concentration.
sentences.chinese: 这工作需要全神贯注。

detailed_translations.english: having a very strong effect or felt very strongly

sentences.english: She apologized and sounded genuinely regretful.
sentences.chinese: 她道歉了，听语气是真心觉得后悔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is regretful feels sorry or disappointed

name: concerning
trans: 涉及；使关心（concern的ing形式）；忧虑

sentences.english: calls from young children concerning lost pets
sentences.chinese: 小孩子打来的有关宠物走失的电话

sentences.english: the facts concerning Marr’s car crash
sentences.chinese: 有关马尔撞车事故的事实

detailed_translations.english: about or relating to

sentences.english: The church's message of salvation has changed the lives of many.
sentences.chinese: 这个教会的灵魂得救的训诫已经改变了很多人的一生。

detailed_translations.english: something that prevents or saves someone or something from danger, loss, or failure

sentences.english: The whole park is spoiled by litter.
sentences.chinese: 整个公园环境都给垃圾破坏了。

sentences.english: We didn’t let the incident spoil our day.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有让这件事破坏我们一整天的气氛。

sentences.english: I don’t want to spoil your fun.
sentences.chinese: 我不想扫你的兴。

sentences.english: Why do you always have to spoil everything ?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么老是要把一切都弄糟呢？

detailed_translations.english: to have a bad effect on something so that it is no longer attractive, enjoyable, useful etc

sentences.english: a deer dazzled by the headlights
sentences.chinese: 被车头灯光照得目眩的鹿

sentences.english: As children, we were dazzled by my uncle’s good looks and charm.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我叔叔的英俊外表和魅力令我们倾倒。

detailed_translations.english: if a very bright light dazzles you, it stops you from seeing properly for a short time

name: alas
trans: 唉（表悲伤、遗憾、恐惧、关切等等）

sentences.english: For many people, alas, hunger is part of everyday life.
sentences.chinese: 唉，对很多人来说，挨饿是家常便饭。

detailed_translations.english: used to express sadness, shame, or fear

name: athletic
trans: 运动的，运动员的；体格健壮的

sentences.english: a tall athletic man
sentences.chinese: 一个高大强壮的男子

detailed_translations.english: physically strong and good at sport

sentences.english: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察向示威人群中的一名学生开枪，暴乱随之发生。

sentences.english: A political row erupted over the MP’s comments.
sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.english: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

detailed_translations.english: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly

name: compile
trans: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编
detailed_translations.english: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

name: release
trans: 释放；发射；让与；允许发表

sentences.english: Police arrested several men, who were later released.
sentences.chinese: 警察逮捕了几个人，后来都释放了。

sentences.english: The bears are eventually released into the wild.
sentences.chinese: 这些熊最后被放回野生环境中。

sentences.english: You need to release the tension in these shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你需要放松肩部肌肉。

sentences.english: The new trade figures have just been released.
sentences.chinese: 新的贸易数字刚刚公布。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone go free, after having kept them somewhere

name: impression
trans: 印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想；曝光（衡量广告被显示的次数。打开一个带有该广告的网页，则该广告的impression 次数增加一次）

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: envious looks
sentences.chinese: 妒忌的神色

detailed_translations.english: wanting something that someone else has

name: convention
trans: 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

name: impractical
trans: 不切实际的，不现实的；不能实行的

sentences.english: The road toll scheme was dismissed as impractical.
sentences.chinese: 公路收费计划由于不切实际而遭到否定。

sentences.english: James was a foolish man, full of impractical plans.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯是个愚蠢的人，满脑子都是不切实际的计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不切实际的，不现实的；不能实行的
detailed_translations.english: not sensible or possible for practical reasons

sentences.english: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.chinese: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

detailed_translations.english: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do

sentences.english: Her ankle was already starting to swell.
sentences.chinese: 她的脚踝已经开始肿起来了。

sentences.english: The window frame was swollen shut.
sentences.chinese: 窗框膨胀变形，关得死死的。

detailed_translations.english: to become larger and rounder than normal – used especially about parts of the body
the roundness or curved shape of something
very good

name: VIP
trans: 大人物，贵宾（Very Important Person）；视频接口处理器（Video Interface Processor）；可变信息处理（Variable Information Processing）

detailed_translations.chinese: 大人物，贵宾（Very Important Person）；视频接口处理器（Video Interface Processor）；可变信息处理（Variable Information Processing）

sentences.english: measures taken to deter potential aggressors
sentences.chinese: 阻止潜在侵略者的措施

detailed_translations.english: a person or country that begins a fight or war with another person or country

sentences.english: They are proudly trumpeting the fact that they are creating more jobs.
sentences.chinese: 他们得意地宣扬他们是在创造更多的工作岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to tell everyone about something that you are proud of, especially in an annoying way

name: habitual
trans: 习惯的；惯常的；习以为常的

sentences.english: James took his habitual morning walk around the garden.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯又像往常习惯的那样绕花园作晨间散步去了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 习惯的；惯常的；习以为常的
detailed_translations.english: doing something from habit, and unable to stop doing it

name: uneatable
trans: 不能吃的；不适合食用的

sentences.english: The bread, bad enough in the morning, was now positively uneatable; it was so hard that even the strongest jaws could make little impression on it.
sentences.chinese: 早上的面包已经够糟糕了，晚饭的面包却变本加厉得坏，根本不能吃，它是如此之坚硬，叫牙口最好的人见了也一筹莫展。

sentences.english: "Crops are the first level in the food chain, " he told SciDev.Net. "When people make it uneatable to certain insects, we need to understand how it might affect the whole ecosystem."
sentences.chinese: “农作物是食物链中的第一个环节，”他对SciDev.Net表示，“当人们将它变得对某些昆虫而言不可食用时，我们需要了解整个生态系统可能受到的影响。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能吃的；不适合食用的
detailed_translations.english: a word meaning unpleas­ant or unsuitable to eat, that some people think is incorrect

sentences.english: The seafood here is a gourmet's delight.
sentences.chinese: 这儿的海鲜是美食家的一大享受。

sentences.english: Flavoured coffee is sold at gourmet food stores and coffee shops.
sentences.chinese: 调味咖啡在美食店和咖啡馆出售。

sentences.english: The couple share a love of gourmet cooking.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇都有烹饪美食的爱好。

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about food and wine and who enjoys good food and wine
Gourmet food is nicer or more unusual or sophisticated than ordinary food, and is often more expensive

name: fertile
trans: 富饶的，肥沃的；能生育的

sentences.english: the product of a fertile imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力丰富的产物

detailed_translations.english: (of a person's mind or imagination) that produces a lot of new ideas

sentences.english: a preacher who claims that he can heal the sick
sentences.chinese: 自称可以治病的传道士

sentences.english: The rift between the two younger men never healed.
sentences.chinese: 两个较年轻者之间的裂痕从未得以弥合。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone who is ill become healthy again, especially by using natural powers or prayer

name: gin

trans: 算出…的平均数；将…平均分配；使…平衡

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

sentences.english: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.chinese: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.english: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.chinese: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支。

sentences.english: They conferred with the accountant vis-à-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.chinese: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc

name: sentimental
trans: 伤感的；多愁善感的；感情用事的；寓有情感的

sentences.english: She said a sentimental goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 她依依不舍地道别。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伤感的；多愁善感的；感情用事的；寓有情感的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is sentimental is easily affected by emotions such as love, sympathy, sadness etc, often in a way that seems silly to other people

sentences.english: The book is full of amusing anecdotes about his life in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这本书里全是他在日本生活的趣闻轶事。

detailed_translations.english: a short story based on your personal experience

name: priceless
trans: 无价的；极贵重的；非常有趣的

sentences.english: priceless antiques
sentences.chinese: 极其贵重的古董

detailed_translations.chinese: 无价的；极贵重的；非常有趣的
detailed_translations.english: extremely valuable

sentences.english: She has hair that refuses to curl.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发怎么也不卷。

sentences.english: Maria had curled her hair for the event.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚为这次活动卷了头发。

sentences.english: a little boy with beautiful blonde curls
sentences.chinese: 满头漂亮的金色鬈发的小男孩

sentences.english: Decorate the cake with chocolate curls.
sentences.chinese: 用巧克力圈装饰蛋糕。

detailed_translations.english: to form a twisted or curved shape, or to make something do this
a piece of hair that hangs in a curved shape

name: unwise
trans: 不明智的；愚蠢的；轻率的

sentences.english: It would be unwise to expect too much.
sentences.chinese: 期望太多是不明智的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不明智的；愚蠢的；轻率的
detailed_translations.english: not based on good judgment

sentences.english: the cycle of birth, death and rebirth
sentences.chinese: 生死轮回

detailed_translations.english: when an important idea, feeling, or organization becomes strong or popular again

sentences.english: Ella asked them to hush their voices.
sentences.chinese: 埃拉叫他们别作声。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone stop shouting, talking, crying etc
a period of silence, especially when people are expecting something to happen

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

sentences.english: The cashier absconded with the money.
sentences.chinese: 出纳员携款潜逃。

sentences.english: The cashier had run out with eighty thousand pounds in cash.
sentences.chinese: 这个出纳员带着八万镑现钞消失得无影无踪。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to receive or pay out money in a shop

name: unworthy
trans: 不值得的；无价值的；不相称的

sentences.english: You may feel unworthy of the attention and help people offer you.
sentences.chinese: 你可能觉得自己不值得别人的关心和帮助。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不值得的；无价值的；不相称的
detailed_translations.english: not deserving respect, attention etc

sentences.english: She wore a string of green glass beads around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串绿色的玻璃珠子。

detailed_translations.english: one of a set of small, usually round, pieces of glass, wood, plastic etc, that you can put on a string and wear as jewellery

sentences.english: Chobe is also renowned for its large herds of elephant and buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.english: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的职责是放牛。

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals of one kind that live and feed together
to make animals move together in a group

name: neglected
trans: 被忽视的；未被好好照管的

sentences.english: He'd given too much to his career, worked long hours, neglected her.
sentences.chinese: 他在事业上投入太多了，长时间地工作，冷落了她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 被忽视的；未被好好照管的

detailed_translations.english: If you neglect someone or something, you fail to give them the amount of attention that they deserve

name: herald
trans: 预兆，征兆；先驱；传令官；报信者

sentences.english: A flash of lightning heralded torrential rain.
sentences.chinese: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.english: Flashing blue lights heralded the arrival of the police.
sentences.chinese: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

sentences.english: I welcome the report as a herald of more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 我欢迎这份报告，认为它预示着更多的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to be a sign of something that is going to come or happen soon

detailed_translations.chinese: 信使； 预示， 预兆
detailed_translations.english: Something that is a herald of a future event or situation is a sign that it is going to happen or appear

name: wholesome
trans: 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的

sentences.english: good wholesome fun
sentences.chinese: 健康有益的娱乐

detailed_translations.chinese: 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的
detailed_translations.english: likely to make you healthy

name: rinse
trans: 冲洗；漂洗；[轻] 染发剂；染发

sentences.english: Let me just rinse my hands.
sentences.chinese: 让我冲个手。

sentences.english: Rinse the vegetables under a cold tap.
sentences.chinese: 把蔬菜放在冷水龙头下冲洗。

detailed_translations.english: to wash clothes, dishes, vegetables etc quickly with water, especially running water, and without soap

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲洗；漂洗；[轻] 染发剂；染发
detailed_translations.english: when you rinse something

sentences.english: Here you should use plural pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 这里你应该用复数代词。

sentences.english: No chance! It was the best of the weak pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 没有机会！这真是弱者的最好代词。

sentences.english: Now if we could only figure out the pronoun problem.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们可以解决这个代词问题了。

detailed_translations.english: a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase, such as ‘he’ instead of ‘Peter’ or ‘the man’

name: cater
trans: 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务

sentences.english: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.chinese: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务
detailed_translations.english: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

sentences.english: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一部小说遭到六家出版商的拒绝。其间我又完成了一部戏剧。

sentences.english: The doctor will be here soon. In the meantime, try and relax.
sentences.chinese: 医生很快就来，现在尽量放松一下。

sentences.english: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
sentences.chinese: 我会尽快和他们联系。在此期间，不要告诉他们我回来了。

detailed_translations.english: in the period of time between two times or two events
英文释义: meanwhile

name: flask
trans: [分化] 烧瓶；长颈瓶，细颈瓶；酒瓶，携带瓶

sentences.english: He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从帆布袋里拿出了一个金属水瓶。

detailed_translations.english: a special type of bottle that you use to keep liquids either hot or cold, for example when travelling

name: chase
trans: 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

name: strong
trans: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的

sentences.english: He was a big strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.english: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.english: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.chinese: 和他打我还不够强壮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc

name: carol
trans: 欢乐地歌唱；唱耶诞颂歌

sentences.english: ‘Goodbye,’ carolled Boris happily.
sentences.chinese: “再见。”鲍里斯愉快地说道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢乐地歌唱；唱耶诞颂歌

detailed_translations.english: a traditional Christmas song

name: hedge
trans: 用树篱笆围住；避免作正面答复
对冲，套期保值；树篱；障碍

sentences.english: You’re hedging again - have you got the money or haven’t you?
sentences.chinese: 你又在闪烁其词了，你究竟有没有钱？

sentences.english: ‘That depends on my partner,’ she hedged.
sentences.chinese: “那取决于我的合伙人。”她避重就轻地答道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 避免直接回答；   套头交易； 以套期保值避免损失
detailed_translations.english: to avoid giving a direct answer to a question

detailed_translations.chinese: 保值措施；套期保值；树篱；防备；障碍物；套头，两面下注以避免损失
detailed_translations.english: a row of small bushes or trees growing close together, usually dividing one field or garden from another

name: consumed
trans: 消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: We consumed much time and energy in writing this book.
sentences.chinese: 我们写这本书消耗了很多时间和精力。

sentences.english: Parents completed questionnaires about the food and drink consumed by their children at the ages of three, four, seven and eight.
sentences.chinese: 在调查中家长被要求填写有关他们孩子在三、四、七和八岁期间的食物和饮料消费问卷。

sentences.english: Scientists are tantalized by plants and trees because they store far more energy than is consumed by cars, trucks, trains and planes, and they do it by taking carbon out of the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 科学家对植物和树木储存的能量非常感兴趣，首先是因为它们的总量比汽车、卡车、火车和飞机消耗的还多，其次是因为能源来自空气中的碳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 消耗（consume的过去式和过去分词）

name: vast
trans: 广阔的；巨大的；大量的；巨额的

sentences.english: The refugees come across the border in vast numbers.
sentences.chinese: 大量难民涌过边境。

sentences.english: In the past five years, there has been a vast improvement in graduation rates.
sentences.chinese: 过去的五年内，毕业率大幅度提高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨大的， 大量的； 浩瀚的
detailed_translations.english: extremely large

name: starry
trans: 布满星星的；闪闪发光的；星光照耀的；星形的

sentences.english: a starry winter sky
sentences.chinese: 满天繁星的冬夜

detailed_translations.chinese: 布满星星的；闪闪发光的；星光照耀的；星形的
detailed_translations.english: having many stars

name: practicable
trans: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的

sentences.english: The only practicable course of action is to sell the company.
sentences.chinese: 唯一可行的做法是把公司卖掉。

sentences.english: at the earliest practicable opportunity
sentences.chinese: 在尽可能早的时机

detailed_translations.english: able to be done; likely to be successful

name: territory
trans: 领土，领域；范围；地域；版图

sentences.english: Hong Kong is a Chinese territory.
sentences.chinese: 香港是中国的领土。

sentences.english: The company is moving into unfamiliar territory with this new software.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正通过这种新软件进入一个不熟悉的领域。

detailed_translations.english: land that is owned or controlled by a particular country, ruler, or military force

name: intensive
trans: 加强的；集中的；透彻的；加强语气的

sentences.english: a one-week intensive course in English
sentences.chinese: 为期一周的英语强化课程

sentences.english: a day of intensive negotiations
sentences.chinese: 紧张谈判的一天

detailed_translations.english: involving a lot of activity, effort, or careful attention in a short period of time

name: drill
trans: 训练；钻孔机；钻子；播种机

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

sentences.english: the feudal lords
sentences.chinese: 封建领主

detailed_translations.english: a man in  medieval  Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land
a man in  medieval  Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land

name: subtle
trans: 微妙的；精细的；敏感的；狡猾的；稀薄的

sentences.english: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
sentences.chinese: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病的警示征兆不易察觉，因而往往被忽视。

sentences.english: a subtle form of racism
sentences.chinese: 隐性的种族歧视

sentences.english: The dish had a subtle hint of ginger.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜微微带点姜的味道。

detailed_translations.english: not easy to notice or understand unless you pay careful attention

sentences.english: an oblong table
sentences.chinese: 长方形桌子

sentences.english: ...an oblong table.
sentences.chinese: ...一张长方形桌子。

detailed_translations.english: an oblong shape has four straight sides at 90 degrees to each other, two of which are longer than the other two
An oblong is a shape which has two long sides and two short sides and in which all the angles are right angles

sentences.english: Manning hoped to acquire valuable works of art as cheaply as possible.
sentences.chinese: 曼宁希望以尽可能低的价格买到有价值的艺术品。

sentences.english: She has acquired an email address and a site on the World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了一个电子邮件地址和万维网网址。

detailed_translations.chinese: 取得， 获得； 学到
detailed_translations.english: to obtain something by buying it or being given it

name: glorify
trans: 赞美；美化；崇拜（神）；使更壮丽

sentences.english: This magazine in no way glorifies gangs.
sentences.chinese: 本杂志决不美化各种犯罪团伙。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone or something, especially God

sentences.english: The audience applauded loudly.
sentences.chinese: 观众掌声雷动。

sentences.english: A crowd of 300 supporters warmly applauded her speech.
sentences.chinese: 300名支持者为她的演讲热烈鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc
to express strong approval of an idea, plan etc

sentences.english: I could simply not be heard in the tumult.
sentences.chinese: 一片嘈杂声中别人根本听不到我说话。

detailed_translations.english: a confused, noisy, and excited situation, often caused by a large crowd

name: priority
trans: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事

sentences.english: The club’s priority is to win the League.
sentences.chinese: 该俱乐部首先考虑的是要赢得联赛。

sentences.english: After several burglaries in the area, security is now a high priority (= very important and needing attention soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 该地区发生了几宗入室盗窃案以后，治安成了当务之急。

sentences.english: With so little money available, repairs must remain a low priority (= not important and not needing attention soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 可用的钱这么少，只好暂时放下维修事宜了。

sentences.english: The customer is high on our list of priorities .
sentences.chinese: 顾客在我们的心目中排在第一位。

sentences.english: List your tasks in order of priority (= most important first ) .
sentences.chinese: 按照轻重缓急列出你的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the thing that you think is most important and that needs attention before anything else

sentences.english: The ceremony must take place in a recognized place of worship.
sentences.chinese: 该仪式必须在获得认可的敬拜场所举行。

sentences.english: He absolutely worships her.
sentences.chinese: 他太崇拜她了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼拜；崇拜；崇拜: 爱慕：崇敬
detailed_translations.english: the activity of praying or singing in a religious building in order to show respect and love for a god
to admire and love someone very much

sentences.english: a discussion of marriage from the standpoint of women
sentences.chinese: 从女性角度对婚姻的探讨

detailed_translations.english: a way of thinking about people, situations, ideas etc

sentences.english: Goods are normally dispatched within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 货物一般在24小时内派送。

sentences.english: I was carrying dispatches from the ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 我正拿着大使的急件。

detailed_translations.english: to send someone or something somewhere for a particular purpose
a message or report sent quickly from one military officer to another or between government officials

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.english: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

detailed_translations.english: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this
to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

name: diner
trans: 用餐者；路边小饭店；餐车式简便餐厅

sentences.english: They sat in a corner, away from other diners.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在一个远离其他用餐者的角落里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用餐者；路边小饭店；餐车式简便餐厅
detailed_translations.english: someone who is eating in a restaurant

name: criterion
trans: （批评判断的）标准；准则；规范；准据

sentences.english: the criteria we use to select candidates
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选候选人的标准

detailed_translations.english: a standard that you use to judge something or make a decision about something

sentences.english: The music suited her melancholy mood.
sentences.chinese: 这音乐很适合她的伤感情绪。

detailed_translations.english: very sad
a feeling of sadness for no particular reason

name: talkative
trans: 饶舌的；多话的；多嘴的；爱说话的

sentences.english: He suddenly became very talkative, his face slightly flushed, his eyes much brighter.
sentences.chinese: 他突然变得很爱说话，他的脸颊稍微有点红，他的眼睛明亮多了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 饶舌的；多话的；多嘴的；爱说话的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is talkative talks a lot

name: soapy
trans: 涂着肥皂的；含有肥皂的；似肥皂的；圆滑的

sentences.english: hot soapy water
sentences.chinese: 热肥皂水

sentences.english: What is your surname?
sentences.chinese: 你姓什么?

sentences.english: Your surname may be derived from a place, such as Lancaster, for example, or an occupation, such as Weaver, but this is not necessarily of relevance to your family history.
sentences.chinese: 或许，你的姓氏来源于一个地方名，例如兰开斯特，或者来源于职业，例如编织工。 但是，这并不能中肯地说出你家族的历史。

detailed_translations.english: the name that you share with your parents, or often with your husband if you are a married woman, and which in English comes at the end of your full name

sentences.chinese: “你不需要我。”她语气平静，没有丝毫责备。

detailed_translations.english: criticism, blame, or disapproval

sentences.chinese: 她最终沦落风尘。

name: domestic
trans: 国内的；家庭的；驯养的；一心只管家务的

sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

sentences.chinese: 室内游泳池

sentences.english: the world indoor athletics championship
sentences.chinese: 世界室内田径锦标赛

sentences.english: Too much central heating can harm indoor plants.

trans: 造币；[金融] 货币制度；新造的字及其语等

sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国时代的金币

detailed_translations.chinese: 造币；[金融] 货币制度；新造的字及其语等
detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money used in a country

sentences.english: the government’s tight monetary policy
sentences.chinese: 政府从紧的货币政策

sentences.english: objects of little monetary value
sentences.chinese: 不值钱的物件

detailed_translations.english: relating to money, especially all the money in a particular country

name: stalk
trans: （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）梗，柄；追踪；高视阔步

sentences.english: celery stalks
sentences.chinese: 芹菜茎

detailed_translations.english: to walk in a proud or angry way, with long steps
a long narrow part of a plant that supports leaves, fruits, or flowers
to follow a person or animal quietly in order to catch and attack or kill them

sentences.english: The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

sentences.english: campaigners who want greater autonomy for Corsica
sentences.chinese: 希望科西嘉有更多自治权的活动家

detailed_translations.english: freedom that a place or an organization has to govern or control itself

sentences.english: In the service of the empress, this inept chauffeur faced no legal sanction for the mishap.
sentences.chinese: 由于服侍太后，这位无能的司机在这场车祸中没有受到任何法律的制裁。

sentences.english: For example, chauffeur Pande said he wants his two children to acquire skills that will help them do better jobs than driving.
sentences.chinese: 例如，作为司机的潘德说，他希望他的两个孩子能学到技术，让他们找到比司机更好的工作。

sentences.english: His main job was guarding Dodi, acting as his chauffeur, bodyguard and dogsbody.
sentences.chinese: 他的主要工作是保护多迪，当多迪的司机、保镖和勤杂工。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to drive a car for someone else
to drive a car for someone as your job

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

sentences.english: a successful economy
sentences.chinese: 发展成功的经济

sentences.english: the slowdown in the Japanese economy
sentences.chinese: 日本经济的减缓

sentences.english: The gas fire was turned low for reasons of economy.
sentences.chinese: 为了节省，把煤气取暖器开小了。

detailed_translations.english: the system by which a country’s money and goods are produced and used, or a country considered in this way

sentences.english: You would think screenplay dialogue should be easy to write.
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为电影剧本的对话应该易于编写。

sentences.english: Well, you’re in luck because we can help with one of those things. Writing your first screenplay.
sentences.chinese: 好，你很幸运因为我们可以帮助你实现其中之一，即创作你的第一部电影剧本。

sentences.english: Visualize your screenplay and write it according to what you want your audience to see and hear in your movie script.
sentences.chinese: 请设想你的电影剧本,并按照你希望观众在剧本中看到的和听到的东西写它.

detailed_translations.english: the words that are written down for actors to say in a film, and the instructions that tell them what they should do

name: smash
trans: 了不起的；非常轰动的；出色的

sentences.english: Vandals had smashed all the windows.
sentences.chinese: 破坏分子打碎了所有的窗子。

sentences.english: Firemen had to smash the lock to get in.
sentences.chinese: 消防员不得不砸锁而入。

sentences.english: Several cups fell to the floor and smashed to pieces .
sentences.chinese: 有几个杯子掉到地上摔得粉碎。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉碎，打烂；狠打，猛击；破灭，失败；猛撞，猛冲
detailed_translations.english: to break into pieces violently or noisily, or to make something do this by dropping, throwing, or hitting it

detailed_translations.chinese: 破碎 ； 猛击， 猛撞； 轰动的演出， 巨大的成功
detailed_translations.english: the loud sound of something breaking

name: pierce
trans: 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动

sentences.english: Steam the corn until it can easily be pierced with a fork.
sentences.chinese: 把玉米蒸到用叉子可以轻易扎透。

sentences.english: Rose underwent emergency surgery after a bullet pierced her lung.
sentences.chinese: 罗丝被子弹射穿肺部，接受了紧急手术。

detailed_translations.english: to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point
to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point

name: striking
trans: 显著的，突出的，惊人的；打击的；罢工的

sentences.chinese: 显著的贫富差异

sentences.chinese: 那些统计数据最显著的特征是高自杀率。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or interesting enough to be easily noticed

name: canine
trans: 犬的；犬齿的；犬科的；似犬的

sentences.english: canine diseases
sentences.chinese: 犬类疾病

sentences.english: her loyal canine friend
sentences.chinese: 她那忠实的狗朋友

detailed_translations.chinese: 犬的；犬齿的；犬科的；似犬的
detailed_translations.english: relating to dogs
one of the four sharp pointed teeth in the front of your mouth

name: hereabout
trans: 在这一带；在这附近（等于hereabouts）

sentences.english: The moon says to him:] 'Oh, I've been scanning pond and hole And waterway hereabout For the body of one with a sunken soul Who has put his life-light out.
sentences.chinese: 月亮对他说],哦，我一直在审视着池塘和地洞,还有在附近的排水沟,因为一个人的灵魂已沦陷,熄灭了他的生命之光。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在这一带；在这附近（等于hereabouts）

sentences.chinese: 几只死鸟被冲上了岸。

detailed_translations.english: on or towards the shore of a lake, river, sea etc

sentences.english: His respiration grew fainter throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 一天当中，他的呼吸越来越微弱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 呼吸作用；一次呼吸；植物光合作用

trans: 打滑；[车辆] 刹车；滑轨，滑动垫木

sentences.english: Turn the car towards the skid if you lose control of it.
sentences.chinese: 如果汽车失去控制，就往打滑的方向转。

sentences.english: He slammed on the brakes and we went into a long skid (= started to skid ) .
sentences.chinese: 他猛力踩下车，我们的车子打滑了很长一段路。

sentences.chinese: 这家公司开设了飞往阿姆斯特丹并续飞海牙的航班。

sentences.chinese: 公交车继续前行。

Onward is also an adverb

trans: 拍打，拍打声；神经紧张；[航] 襟翼
拍动；神经紧张；鼓翼而飞；（帽边等）垂下

sentences.chinese: 旗帜在微风中飘扬。

a sentence or  clause  that is expressed in a conditional form

trans: 撞碎；坠毁；破产；轰隆声；睡觉
摔碎；坠落；发出隆隆声；(金融企业等)破产

sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else

trans: 刺激；使活动；使活泼；使产生放射性

sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

sentences.chinese: 他的投资价值已经增长$50000多。

detailed_translations.english: The value of something is how much money it is worth

name: silvery
trans: 银色的；清脆的；银铃一般的；似银的

sentences.english: her silvery hair
sentences.chinese: 她的银发

sentences.english: the silvery light of the moon

detailed_translations.english: shiny and silver in colour

name: shaft
trans: 拍杆；[机] 轴；箭杆；杆状物

sentences.english: a drive shaft
sentences.chinese: 驱动轴

detailed_translations.english: an  arrow

sentences.english: He was very skilled at pointing down the blocks of granite.
sentences.chinese: 他善于把花岗岩石凿平。

sentences.english: If you're working in steel or granite, redesigning or adding onto something is very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用钢或花岗岩来工作，重新设计或增加一些东西是很贵的。

sentences.english: Everything you see, from the cobblestones the characters walk on to the granite within the buildings, all those details help to bring you into that era.
sentences.chinese: 影片里你所见之处，从角色走过的鹅卵石路到大楼的花岗石，所有的细节都能帮助将你置身于那个年代。” 克罗尔解释道。

detailed_translations.english: a very hard grey rock, often used in building

sentences.english: ...bilateral talks between Britain and America.
sentences.chinese: …英美之间的双边会谈。

detailed_translations.english: involving two groups or nations

sentences.english: At which point my townsfolk started calling the new Edisonians "dot heads.
sentences.chinese: 此时我的同乡们开始把这些新来的爱迪生市民叫“点脑壳”。

sentences.english: I never thought homely, townsfolk killing Brits could be so hot.
sentences.chinese: 我也没想到普通的小市民，杀戮起来可以如此性感。

sentences.english: Empty beaches are perfect for strolling and the sociable townsfolk are masters of the art of shooting the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 空旷的海滩非常适合散步，爱好社交的市民都是闲聊的大师。

detailed_translations.english: The townsfolk of a town or city are the people who live there

sentences.english: She slipped over the borderline into sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她先是半睡半醒，后来慢慢睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a border between two countries
having qualities of both one situation, state etc and another more extreme situation or state

name: membership
trans: 资格；成员资格；会员身份

sentences.english: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

sentences.english: Membership fees are being increased this year.
sentences.chinese: 会费今年提高了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会员身份， 会籍； 全体会员， 会员数
detailed_translations.english: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization

name: concrete
trans: 混凝土的；实在的，具体的；有形的

sentences.english: What does that mean in concrete terms ?
sentences.chinese: 具体来说那到底是什么意思？

sentences.english: the lack of any concrete evidence
sentences.chinese: 缺少具体证据的

sentences.english: a dialogue about concrete issues and problems
sentences.chinese: 有关具体事情和问题的对话

detailed_translations.english: definite and specific

sentences.english: My knowledge of the business is limited.
sentences.chinese: 我对这一行了解有限。

sentences.english: The organization has very limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 这家机构资源非常有限。

sentences.english: So far, the education reforms have had only limited success.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，教育改革只取得了有限的成效。

detailed_translations.english: not very great in amount, number, ability etc

sentences.english: She was wearing the perfume that he’d bought her.
sentences.chinese: 她擦了他买给她的香水。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid with a strong pleasant smell that women put on their skin or clothing to make themselves smell nice
to put perfume on something

name: stake
trans: 资助，支持；系…于桩上；把…押下打赌

sentences.english: They have to win the contract – thousands of jobs are at stake.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须拿下这份合同，这关系到数千个工作岗位。

sentences.english: National pride is at stake in next week’s game against England.
sentences.chinese: 下星期对英格兰队的比赛关乎民族尊严。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you value very much is at stake, you will lose it if a plan or action is not successful

sentences.english: the centre-right coalition government
sentences.chinese: 政治上中间偏右的联合政府

sentences.english: an emergency meeting of the three coalition parties
sentences.chinese: 三个联盟政党召开的一次紧急会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合体， 同盟； 结合， 联合
detailed_translations.english: a union of two or more political parties that allows them to form a government or fight an election together

name: stapler
trans: [轻] 订书机；主要商品批发商；把羊毛分级的人

sentences.english: He wants a stapler, but she have not get one.
sentences.chinese: 他想要一个订书机， 但她没有。

sentences.english: A "stapler" is a small object that pushes a small piece of metal through pieces of paper to hold them together.
sentences.chinese: “订书机”是一种能将一小块金属穿过一沓纸把它们放在一起的小物体。

sentences.english: "If Joanne cracks her gum one more time, I swear I'm going to send my stapler sailing into her cubicle, " you think to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你在心里对自己说“如果下次乔安娜再嚼口香糖的话，我发誓一定冲过去将订书机甩到她位置上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool used for putting staples into paper

sentences.english: General Motors and Chrysler will be forced into bankruptcy early next year if they do not present a government-appointed "car tsar" with viable restructuring plans, the White House warned today.
sentences.chinese: 白宫今天警告道：如果通用汽车和克莱斯勒未能给在政府指派的“汽车沙皇”提供一系列的重组计划的话，他们在明年早些时候将会破产。

detailed_translations.english: a male ruler of Russia before

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

sentences.english: So the American company fired the rower.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美国公司解雇了划桨员。

sentences.english: Now they had one senior manager, six management consultants and one rower.
sentences.chinese: 这次他们有一个高级舵手、六个舵手顾问、一个划桨员。

sentences.english: Just last year, British ocean rower Roz Savage became the first woman to cross the Pacific Ocean alone, in a rowboat.
sentences.chinese: 就在去年，英国海洋桨手罗兹萨维奇成为了独自划船跨越太平洋的第一名女性。

name: raw
trans: 生的；未加工的；阴冷的；刺痛的；擦掉皮的；无经验的；（在艺术等方面）不成熟的

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

name: marmalade
trans: 橘子或柠檬等水果制成的果酱

sentences.chinese: 你所要做的就是把它翻下来，面包就会自动滑落到你的盘子上，等待你给它们抹上黄油和果酱了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 橘子或柠檬等水果制成的果酱
detailed_translations.english: a  jam  made from fruit such as oranges,  lemon s  ,or  grapefruit  , usually eaten at breakfast

sentences.chinese: 有命令要我们必须在一小时内挖好战壕。

sentences.chinese: 九点到十一点，他打算挖一个洞，或者一条小沟也行，没准儿还能从脏土里翻出什么好吃的呢。

sentences.chinese: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a long narrow hole dug into the surface of the ground

trans: 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.

sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

sentences.english: In recognition of their vulnerability, the lichen fields have been marked off on maps and with fences.
sentences.chinese: 人们意识到它们的脆弱，因此地衣区被从地图上标注出来同时也被栅栏围起来。

sentences.english: The lichen tests were conducted in Spain and at Utah’s Mars Desert Research Station, where two of the researchers donned spacesuits and lived for two weeks in the field as astronauts.
sentences.chinese: 这些地衣测试是在西班牙和犹他州的火星沙漠研究站进行的。 两个研究人员穿着者宇航服如同宇航员般的过了两周。

detailed_translations.english: a grey, green, or yellow plant that spreads over the surface of stones and trees

name: pram
trans: 婴儿车；送牛奶用的手推车

sentences.chinese: 推着婴儿车的年轻女子

detailed_translations.chinese: 婴儿车；送牛奶用的手推车
detailed_translations.english: a small vehicle with four wheels in which a baby can lie down while it is being pushed

sentences.english: She leapt over the fence.
sentences.chinese: 她跳过篱笆。

sentences.chinese: 直立的石壁

trans: 杀害，杀死；使禁不住大笑

sentences.chinese: …圣乔治屠龙之丘。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杀害，杀死；使禁不住大笑

sentences.chinese: 他们让这个翼状杆落入盛有水的烧杯中，并用激光束从底部击中它。

sentences.chinese: 烧杯的固有频率可以用直接测量法、共振法或水滴流调制法加以测定，各法中均利用利萨如图形。

sentences.chinese: 销售人员有优厚的里程补贴或者公司提供的专用汽车。

sentences.chinese: 这幅画被一个私人收藏家买走。

trans: 舒适的；温暖的；紧身的；隐藏的

sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

sentences.chinese: 她定期去看牙医。

sentences.chinese: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.chinese: 雇用非熟练工的公司

trans: 健全的；理智的；[临床] 神志正常的

sentences.english: He seems perfectly sane (= completely sane ) to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来他神志完全正常。

sentences.chinese: 神志正常的人不会去杀一个婴儿。

sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代初的经济衰退

sentences.chinese: 武术能教人尊重他人、遵守纪律并且相互合作。

sentences.chinese: 背诗是训练记忆力的一种好方法。

sentences.chinese: 不同的文化有不同的管教孩子的方法。

sentences.chinese: 克莱将于6月19日离职。

sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

sentences.chinese: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.chinese: 离婚过程中我的家人自始至终都很支持我。

sentences.chinese: 你可选择在地中海夜间垂钓，或是在瑞士的湖上玩帆板。

sentences.chinese: 此刻，当手指在一层层柔软的、叠得整整齐齐的棉衣下翻寻，摸到一只冰凉的、亮晶晶的金属太妃糖罐的时候，这样的兴奋又出现了。

sentences.english: Children with a mean consumption of biscuits, milk toffee and chocolate made with such milk powder would also not exceed the TDI.
sentences.chinese: 儿童如果不慎吃掉含有污染奶粉的饼干、牛奶太妃糖以及巧克力时，所摄取的三聚氰胺量也不应超过TDI值。

name: landscape

对…做景观美化，给…做园林美化；从事庭园设计

sentences.chinese: 新英格兰风光之美

sentences.chinese: 招生主任

detailed_translations.english: someone in a university who is responsible for a particular area of work

detailed_translations.english: a spoken or written story about events that you remember

sentences.chinese: 犯罪率上升主要由社会和经济因素造成。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因素， 因子； 系数
detailed_translations.english: one of several things that influence or cause a situation

sentences.english: Obviously, given that impossibility, we have to do the next best thing.
sentences.chinese: 明显地，考虑到那是不可能的，我们必须做好下一个事情。

sentences.chinese: 说实话，我觉得这个理念是现在微软几乎不可能实现的了的。

detailed_translations.english: to treat a person or group differently from another in an unfair way

name: reluctant
trans: 不情愿的；勉强的；顽抗的

sentences.chinese: 警方昨天的调查为其开脱了在这件事故中所有的责任。

sentences.chinese: 军队屠杀了150多名手无寸铁的平民。

sentences.chinese: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

someone who has officially said that they cannot pay their debts

sentences.chinese: 他小心地不留下指纹。

sentences.chinese: 警察审问了贝雷斯福德，并提取了他的指纹。

sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.chinese: 设想一下这样的美好夜晚：住在米洛斯岛上超有魅力的风车改造的房子里，手里拿着一杯松香葡萄酒，桌上放着一盘橄榄，欣赏着海上的日落。

sentences.english: How about a night in a charming converted windmill on the island of Milos, watching the sunset over the sea, with a glass of retsina in hand and a plate of olives on the table?
sentences.chinese: 想一下这样的美好夜晚：住在米洛斯岛上超有魅力的风车改造的房子里，手里拿着一杯松香葡萄酒，桌上放着一盘橄榄，欣赏着海上的日落。

sentences.chinese: 然而，在另一本书，我发现一个图表显示人口增长与酵母细胞比重密谋对付时间。

sentences.chinese: 辛劳的一生

sentences.chinese: 在阴暗潮湿的工厂里苦作的人们精疲力竭了，无法享受家庭生活。

sentences.chinese: 工人们长时间辛苦工作。

sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

name: quotation

sentences.chinese: 下文引自19世纪的一篇旅行日记。

trans: 分配；指派；[计][数] 赋值

sentences.english: Then it’s really no more than a means of transportation, it too loses its luster.
sentences.chinese: 然后它就仅仅是一个名符其实的交通工具，失去了它的光彩。

sentences.chinese: 警方从那辆出租车里找回一支非法手枪，曾一开始令外界怀疑杜干是否曾向一名警察开枪。

sentences.english: One of the criminals immediately shoved a .38 caliber handgun to my head, ordered me to the cooler, pushed me down on the floor, and pumped a bullet into the back of my head - execution style.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个匪徒迅速掏出一把口径为38毫米的手枪用力指著我的头，勒令我走到冷冻机旁，然后把我推倒在地，像执行死刑般从后面朝我头部开了一枪。

detailed_translations.english: a small gun that you hold in one hand when you fire it

trans: 最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量

sentences.chinese: 从小船上卸下所有的货物并彻底地清洗。

sentences.chinese: 世俗教育

sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

trans: 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人

sentences.chinese: 潜水员发现了一艘沉没的德国旧军舰。

sentences.chinese: 40号高速公路上的第5交叉口

trans: 竭力做到，试图或力图（做某事）

sentences.chinese: 可是我一定会竭力打消一切苦痛的念头，只去想一些能使我高兴的事───譬如想想你的亲切以及亲爱的舅父母对我始终如一的关切。

trans: 螺栓，螺钉；闪电，雷电；门闩；弩箭;（布的）一匹，一卷
筛选；囫囵吞下；（把门、窗等）闩上；突然说出，脱口说出
突然地；像箭似地；直立地

sentences.chinese: 她父亲安葬在一处公墓。

sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

name: theoretical
trans: 理论的；理论上的；假设的；推理的

sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.chinese: 球队需要能够相互取长补短的队员。

sentences.chinese: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

sentences.english: Save and export the project by using the project interchange mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用项目交换机理来保存和导出项目。

sentences.chinese: 在您导入本文中的项目交换文件时，所有这些值都应该已经设置好了。

name: engrossed

sentences.chinese: 托尼因过于全神贯注于工作而没有注意到。

detailed_translations.chinese: 全神贯注的；专心致志的

sentences.chinese: 随后我们找到了一项研究，研究表明的确有一种物质可以刺激睫毛增长。

sentences.chinese: 到上午10点左右，气温已超过华氏100度了。

sentences.english: The senator arrived, surrounded by personal bodyguards.
sentences.chinese: 这位参议员在私人保镖的簇拥下抵达。

摇摆；转向；悬挂；大摇大摆地行走
旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的
