name: plump
trans: 使丰满；使鼓起；突然放下

sentences.english: The nurse was a cheerful plump woman.
sentences.chinese: 那护士是个性格开朗、体形丰满的女人。

sentences.english: The baby’s nice and plump.
sentences.chinese: 那个婴儿很可爱，胖嘟嘟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使丰满；使鼓起；突然放下

detailed_translations.english: to sit down suddenly and heavily
slightly fat in a fairly pleasant way – used especially about women or children, often to avoid saying the word ‘fat’
a heavy abrupt fall or the sound of this

name: bony
trans: 骨的；多骨的；瘦骨嶙峋的；似骨的

sentences.english: She had a bony intelligent face.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸很瘦，看来很聪明。

sentences.english: He was tall and bony.
sentences.chinese: 他很高，而且瘦骨嶙峋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 骨的；多骨的；瘦骨嶙峋的；似骨的
detailed_translations.english: someone or part of their body that is bony is very thin

name: clash
trans: 冲突，不协调；碰撞声，铿锵声
冲突，抵触；砰地相碰撞，发出铿锵声

sentences.english: Troops clashed near the border.
sentences.chinese: 军队在边境附近发生了冲突。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发生冲突；不协调；砰地相撞，发出刺耳的撞击声
detailed_translations.english: if two armies, groups etc clash, they start fighting – used in news reports

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突； 不协调； 刺耳的撞击声
detailed_translations.english: a short fight between two armies or groups – used in news reports

name: upright
trans: 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的

sentences.english: Katie was still awake, sitting bolt upright(= sitting with her back very straight ) staring at the television.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂还醒着，坐得笔直，眼睛盯着电视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的
detailed_translations.english: standing or sitting straight up
a long piece of wood or metal that stands straight up and supports something

sentences.english: Perry would always flatter Mrs. Mitchell by praising her cooking.
sentences.chinese: 佩里常常奉承米切尔太太，称赞她的烹调手艺。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone in order to please them or get something from them, even though you do not mean it

sentences.english: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.english: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death

name: turn
trans: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

name: governor
trans: 主管人员；统治者，管理者；[自] 调节器；地方长官

sentences.english: He was governor of Iowa in the late 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 他是20世纪70年代末爱荷华州的州长。

sentences.english: the prison governor
sentences.chinese: 监狱长

detailed_translations.english: the person in charge of governing a state in the US

sentences.english: Small particles adhere to the seed.
sentences.chinese: 微小的粒子紧贴着种子。

sentences.english: We adhere to the principles of equal rights and freedom of expression for all.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持人人平等和言论自由的原则。

detailed_translations.english: to stick firmly to something

sentences.english: Although you can go swimming with this shockproof and water-resistant watch, be sure to dry the USB connector before plugging it into your PC.
sentences.chinese: 这款腕表能够防震、防水，你可以戴着它去游泳，但是，回来之后你必须把USB的接口弄干才可以插到你的个人电脑上。

detailed_translations.english: a watch, machine etc that is shockproof is designed so that it is not easily damaged if it is dropped or hit

name: Danish
trans: 丹麦的；丹麦人的；丹麦语（文）的

sentences.english: There is no inherent right to some particular quantity of any commodity whether it’s oil, gold, coffee, or Danish pastry.
sentences.chinese: 任何一种商品的具体数量本身是没有正确性的，不论它是石油，黄金，咖啡或者丹麦点心。

sentences.english: Like all Danish students, they study for free and receive a monthly stipend equivalent to about $900 per person from the government.
sentences.chinese: 和其他丹麦学生一样，他们免费学习，并且每人每月可从政府领取约合900美元的津贴。

sentences.english: Here you can see equipment of the Danish company Danfoss.
sentences.chinese: 在这里你可以看到丹麦丹佛斯公司的设备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丹麦的；丹麦人的；丹麦语（文）的
detailed_translations.english: relating to Denmark, its people, or its language
the language used in Denmark

sentences.english: Keep to the seaward side of the path.
sentences.chinese: 沿着路上靠海的一侧走。

sentences.english: A barge was about a hundred yards away, waiting to return seaward.
sentences.chinese: 一艘驳船停在约100码远的地方，等待返海回航。

sentences.english: It faced seawards to the north.
sentences.chinese: 它面向北方，朝着海。

detailed_translations.english: facing towards the sea
Something that moves or faces seaward or seawards moves or faces in the direction of the sea or further out to sea

name: ornament
trans: 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品

sentences.english: a shelf covered with books and ornaments
sentences.chinese: 摆满书籍和装饰品的架子

sentences.english: a cabinet in which she kept her collection of china ornaments
sentences.chinese: 她放置瓷器摆设收藏品的柜子

detailed_translations.chinese: 装饰品，点缀品；装饰，点缀
detailed_translations.english: a small object that you keep in your house because it is beautiful rather than useful

detailed_translations.chinese: 装饰， 点缀， 美化

sentences.english: They had their coffee and tea on the veranda.
sentences.chinese: 他们在阳台上享用了自己的咖啡和茶。

detailed_translations.english: an open area with a floor and a roof that is attached to the side of a house at ground level

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

sentences.english: Abruptly the group ahead of us came to a standstill.
sentences.chinese: 忽然我们前面的队伍停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is no movement or activity at all

sentences.english: Shareholders have been told to expect an even lower result next year.
sentences.chinese: 股东们被告知明年的业绩还会更差。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns shares in a company or business

name: consul
trans: 领事；（古罗马的）两执政官之一

sentences.english: the British Consul in Paris
sentences.chinese: 英国驻巴黎领事

detailed_translations.english: a government official sent to live in a foreign city to help people from his or her own country who are living or staying there

sentences.english: And we will set our sights on the eradication of extreme poverty in our time.
sentences.chinese: 我们还将力争在我们这个时代根除极端贫困的现象。

sentences.english: After meeting with Rotary's delegation, Uttar Pradesh's chief minister vowed to personally monitor eradication progress in the state.
sentences.chinese: 北方邦的省长在与扶轮的代表团会面之后，誓言亲自监督该省根除工作的进度。

sentences.english: From that point of view, why not extend our control even into our sleep and rewrite our painful dreams in a general program of nightmare eradication?
sentences.chinese: 从这个角度上看，为什么不用一个通用的程序进入到我们的睡眠，改写使我们痛苦的梦境，将梦魇连根拔除？

sentences.english: The living room was warm and cosy .
sentences.chinese: 客厅暖和又舒适。

detailed_translations.english: a place that is cosy is small, comfortable, and warm
a covering for a  teapot  that keeps the tea inside from getting cold too quickly

name: advanced
trans: 先进的；高级的；晚期的；年老的
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）

sentences.english: advanced learners of English
sentences.chinese: 高级程度的英语学习者

sentences.english: advanced physics
sentences.chinese: 高等物理（学）

detailed_translations.english: studying or dealing with a school subject at a difficult level

name: designer
trans: 由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的

sentences.english: an interior designer
sentences.chinese: 室内装潢设计师

sentences.english: a software designer
sentences.chinese: 软件设计师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make plans or patterns for clothes, furniture, equipment etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的
detailed_translations.english: made by a well-known and fashionable designer

name: politburo
trans: （共产党中央委员会的）政治局；类似政治局的决策控制机构

detailed_translations.chinese: （共产党中央委员会的）政治局；类似政治局的决策控制机构
detailed_translations.english: the most important decision-making committee of a Communist party or Communist government

sentences.english: a contemptuous glance
sentences.chinese: 轻蔑的一瞥

detailed_translations.english: showing that you think someone or something deserves no respect

sentences.english: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

sentences.english: a metric tonne
sentences.chinese: 一公吨

sentences.english: The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.chinese: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

detailed_translations.english: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures

name: overcrowd
trans: 使过度拥挤；把…塞得过满

sentences.english: Do not overcrowd the fish.
sentences.chinese: 不要过度拥挤的鱼。

sentences.english: The manager of that theatre created a dangerous situation by allowing people to overcrowd the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 那家剧场的经理让过多的人拥挤在楼厅里，造成了一种危险的情形。

sentences.english: There are too many of them flying right now, they overcrowd the scene so proceed to erase some of them in order to maintain balance.
sentences.chinese: 现在，图上的飞行物太多了，它们让场景过渡拥挤。 所以，为了保持画面平衡，要删除一些。

detailed_translations.english: to fill (a room, vehicle, city, etc) with more people or things than is desirable

name: defy
trans: 藐视；公然反抗；挑衅；使落空

sentences.english: This was the first (and last) time that I dared to defy my mother.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一次（也是最后一次）胆敢违抗我母亲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 藐视；公然反抗；挑衅；使落空
detailed_translations.english: If you defy someone or something that is trying to make you behave in a particular way, you refuse to obey them and behave in that way

sentences.english: I was still striving to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在努力争取成功。

sentences.english: We must continue to strive for greater efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须继续为提高效率而努力。

detailed_translations.english: to make a great effort to achieve something

name: marsh
trans: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

sentences.english: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 他把他们带离沼泽。

sentences.english: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.chinese: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

detailed_translations.english: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft

detailed_translations.chinese: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

sentences.english: He died after five days of excruciating torture.
sentences.chinese: 遭受了五天的严刑拷打之后，他死了。

sentences.english: The waiting must be torture for you.
sentences.chinese: 这样的等待对你来说肯定是一种煎熬。

sentences.english: Political opponents of the regime may be tortured.
sentences.chinese: 这个政权的政治异己可能会遭受酷刑。

detailed_translations.english: an act of deliberately hurting someone in order to force them to tell you something, to punish them, or to be cruel
to deliberately hurt someone in order to force them to give you information, to punish them, or to be cruel

sentences.english: The fully inclusive fare for the trip is £22.
sentences.chinese: 这次出行的全部费用为22英镑。

sentences.english: The rent is £120 a week, inclusive of heating.
sentences.chinese: 房租连暖气费在内是每星期120英镑。

detailed_translations.english: an inclusive price or cost includes everything

sentences.english: The walls were black with grime.
sentences.chinese: 墙上黑黑的，积满了灰尘。

detailed_translations.english: a lot of dirt

sentences.english: You must love everything that contributes to the glory and honour of the fatherland.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要热爱那些,能为祖国增添光荣和辉煌的事物

sentences.english: Then will all the earth be your fatherland, and all your work and effort spread forth blessings.
sentences.chinese: 那么普天之下到处都是你们的祖国，你们所有的工作和努力都会遍地开花，造福天下。

detailed_translations.english: the place where someone or their family was born

sentences.english: a cynical view of human nature
sentences.chinese: 认为人性本恶的一种观点

detailed_translations.chinese: 愤世嫉俗的， 怀疑的
detailed_translations.english: unwilling to believe that people have good, honest, or sincere reasons for doing something

name: ace
trans: 幺点；直接得分的发球；佼佼者；（俚）最好的朋友

sentences.english: Agassi believed he had served an ace at 5-3 (40-30) in the deciding set.
sentences.chinese: 阿加西认为他在决胜盘中5-3(40-30)时曾发出过一记Ace球。

sentences.english: ...ace horror-film producer Lawrence Woolsey.
sentences.chinese: …一流的恐怖片制片人劳伦斯·伍希。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幺点；直接得分的发球；佼佼者；（俚）最好的朋友
detailed_translations.english: a first shot in tennis or  volleyball  which is hit so well that your opponent cannot reach the ball and you win the point
Ace is also an adjective

name: untiring
trans: 不知疲倦的；不屈不挠的；坚持不懈的

sentences.english: untiring efforts to help the homeless
sentences.chinese: 帮助无家可归者的不懈努力

detailed_translations.english: working very hard for a long period of time in order to do something – used to show approval

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

name: vehicle
trans: [车辆] 车辆；工具；交通工具；运载工具；传播媒介；媒介物

sentences.english: a description of the stolen vehicle
sentences.chinese: 对被盗车辆的描述

sentences.english: Have you locked your vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a machine with an engine that is used to take people or things from one place to another, such as a car, bus, or truck

sentences.english: ...the city's traditional dependence on tourism.
sentences.chinese: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

detailed_translations.english: when you depend on the help and support of someone or something else in order to exist or be successful

name: vendor
trans: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机

sentences.english: the shouts of street vendors
sentences.chinese: 街头小贩的吆喝声

detailed_translations.chinese: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机
detailed_translations.english: someone who sells things, especially on the street

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

name: divide
trans: 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

name: function
trans: 功能；[数] 函数；职责；盛大的集会

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

sentences.english: Bruckner’s Fifth Symphony
sentences.chinese: 布鲁克纳的《第五交响曲》

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of music usually in four parts, written for an orchestra

name: joint
trans: 关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉
共同的；连接的；联合的，合办的
连接，贴合；接合；使有接头

sentences.english: The two ministers have issued a joint statement.
sentences.chinese: 两位部长发布了一项联合声明。

sentences.english: Both companies are involved in the joint development of a new medium-sized car.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司联合开发一款新的中型汽车。

sentences.english: The meal was a joint effort(= two or more people worked on it together ).
sentences.chinese: 这顿饭是大家一起做的。

sentences.english: Manchester United and Arsenal are joint favourites to win the title (= are thought to have the same chance of winning ).
sentences.chinese: 曼联和阿森纳均为夺冠的热门球队。

sentences.english: Both parties must sign the form if the account is to be in joint names(= belong to two named people ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这是联名账户的话，双方都必须在表格上签名。

detailed_translations.english: involving two or more people or groups, or owned or shared by them
a part of your body that can bend because two bones meet there

sentences.english: the Gulf of Mexico
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥湾

detailed_translations.english: a large area of sea partly enclosed by land

sentences.english: ...a white van with smoked glass windows.
sentences.chinese: ...一辆装有烟熏玻璃窗的白色货车。

detailed_translations.english: Smoked glass has been made darker by being treated with smoke

sentences.english: a milk jug
sentences.chinese: 牛奶罐

detailed_translations.english: a container with a wide curved opening at the top and a handle, used especially at meals for pouring liquids

sentences.english: ...a ruby and diamond ring.
sentences.chinese: …一枚红宝石钻戒。

detailed_translations.english: a red jewel

sentences.english: ...the Sheriff of Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 牛津的郡长

detailed_translations.english: the representative of the king or queen in a county of England and Wales, who has mostly ceremonial duties

name: snapshot
trans: 快照，快相；急射，速射；简单印象

sentences.english: Let me take a snapshot of you guys, so friends back home can see you.
sentences.chinese: 让我给你们大家拍张快照，这样家里的朋友们可以看到你们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快照，快相；急射，速射；简单印象
detailed_translations.english: a photograph taken quickly and often not very skilfully

name: saint
trans: 圣人；圣徒；道德崇高的人

sentences.english: Saint Patrick
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克

sentences.english: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣人；圣徒；道德崇高的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy

name: deficient
trans: 不足的；有缺陷的；不充分的

sentences.english: Women who are dieting can become iron deficient.
sentences.chinese: 节食的女性有可能缺铁。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不足的；有缺陷的；不充分的
detailed_translations.english: not containing or having enough of something

name: free
trans: 免费的；自由的，不受约束的；[化学] 游离的

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

sentences.english: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.english: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.chinese: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

detailed_translations.english: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

name: reproduce
trans: 复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现

sentences.english: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的书里翻印了克里木特的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: to make a photograph or printed copy of something

name: allege
trans: 宣称，断言；提出…作为理由

sentences.english: She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group.
sentences.chinese: 她指称该组织中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断言， 宣称， 硬说
detailed_translations.english: to say that something is true or that someone has done something wrong, although it has not been proved

sentences.english: Britain’s friends and foes
sentences.chinese: 英国的朋友和敌人

detailed_translations.english: an enemy

name: peculiar
trans: 特殊的；独特的；奇怪的；罕见的

sentences.english: He’s been a little peculiar lately.
sentences.chinese: 最近他有点怪异。

sentences.english: She’s a very peculiar child.
sentences.chinese: 她是个非常古怪的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a strange and slightly crazy way

sentences.english: He reached into the bin with a look of disgust on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把手伸进垃圾箱，脸上带着厌恶的表情。

sentences.english: He disgusted many with his boorish behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他以其粗鲁的行为使许多人感到厌恶。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of dislike, annoyance, or disapproval
To disgust someone means to make them feel a strong sense of dislike and disapproval

name: provision
trans: 规定；条款；准备；[经] 供应品

sentences.english: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.english: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

detailed_translations.english: a condition in an agreement or law

sentences.english: the controversial issue of welfare reform
sentences.chinese: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.english: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.english: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.chinese: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

detailed_translations.english: causing a lot of disagreement, because many people have strong opinions about the subject being discussed

name: calf
trans: [解剖] 腓肠，小腿；小牛；小牛皮；(鲸等大哺乳动物的)幼崽

sentences.english: ...a calf injury.
sentences.chinese: …一处小腿的伤。

detailed_translations.chinese: [解剖] 腓肠，小腿；小牛；小牛皮；(鲸等大哺乳动物的)幼崽
detailed_translations.english: the part of the back of your leg between your knee and your  ankle

sentences.english: Children clamored excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋地叫嚷着。

detailed_translations.english: to demand something loudly
a very loud noise made by a large group of people or animals

sentences.english: ...a flat, square wristwatch with classic Roman numerals.
sentences.chinese: ...一块扁平、有标准罗马数字的正方形手表。

detailed_translations.english: a written sign such as 1, 2, or 3 that represents a number

name: federation
trans: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府

sentences.english: the National Federation of Women’s Institutes
sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
detailed_translations.english: a group of organizations, clubs, or people that have joined together to form a single group

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

sentences.english: A staircase leads to the upper storey .
sentences.chinese: 有一段楼梯通往上面一层。

detailed_translations.english: a floor or level of a building

sentences.english: I went and waited in the foyer.
sentences.chinese: 我去了，在门厅里等着。

detailed_translations.english: a room or hall at the entrance to a public building

name: spawn
trans: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产

sentences.english: ...her passion for collecting frog spawn.
sentences.chinese: ...她对采蛙卵的热爱。

detailed_translations.english: the eggs of a fish or  frog  laid together in a soft mass

detailed_translations.chinese: 产卵；酿成，造成；大量生产
detailed_translations.english: to make a series of things happen or start to exist

name: rustic
trans: 乡村的；纯朴的；粗野的；手工粗糙的

sentences.english: The village had a certain rustic charm .
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄有一种迷人的田园风情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乡村的；纯朴的；粗野的；手工粗糙的
detailed_translations.english: simple, old-fashioned, and not spoiled by modern developments, in a way that is typical of the countryside
someone from the country, especially a farm worker

name: Jupiter
trans: [天] 木星；朱庇特（罗马神话中的宙斯神）

sentences.english: a space probe on its way to Jupiter
sentences.chinese: 飞向木星的一个太空探测器

detailed_translations.english: the planet that is fifth in order from the sun and is the largest in the solar system

sentences.english: The married women of Shitamachi maintained the custom of blackening their teeth.
sentences.chinese: 下町的已婚妇女保留了染黑牙齿的习俗。

detailed_translations.english: To blacken something means to make it black or very dark in colour. Something that blackens becomes black or very dark in colour.

name: utter
trans: 完全的；彻底的；无条件的

sentences.english: That’s utter nonsense!
sentences.chinese: 真是一派胡言！

sentences.english: This company treats its employees with utter contempt.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司对其员工不屑一顾。

sentences.english: I watched in complete and utter horror as he pulled out a gun.
sentences.chinese: 我惊恐万分地看着他拔出枪来。

sentences.english: fifteen years of utter confusion
sentences.chinese: 15年的大混乱

detailed_translations.english: complete – used especially to emphasize that something is very bad, or that a feeling is very strong
to make a sound with your voice, especially with difficulty

sentences.english: latent aggression
sentences.chinese: 潜在的侵略

detailed_translations.english: something that is latent is present but hidden, and may develop or become more noticeable in the future

sentences.english: "I do not know. " And thus ended their discourse.
sentences.chinese: “我也不晓得。”就这样，他们的谈话结束了。 。

sentences.english: They listened to his discourse on human relations.
sentences.chinese: 他们听他作关于人际关系的演讲。

sentences.english: In discourse thou must attend to what is said, and in every movement thou must observe what is doing.
sentences.chinese: 在谈话中你必须注意所说的话，在任何活动中你都必须观察在做什么。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲， 谈话， 论文
detailed_translations.english: a serious speech or piece of writing on a particular subject

name: Christianity
trans: 基督教；基督教精神，基督教教义

sentences.english: He converted to Christianity that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天他改信了基督教。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基督教；基督教精神，基督教教义
detailed_translations.english: the religion based on the life and beliefs of Jesus Christ

name: worthy
trans: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

sentences.english: He had to have ten stitches in his head.
sentences.chinese: 他头上不得不缝了十针。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of thread that has been sewn into a piece of cloth, or the action of the thread going into and out of the cloth
to sew two pieces of cloth together, or to sew a decoration onto a piece of cloth

sentences.english: Stay at a cheap motel.
sentences.chinese: 住便宜的汽车旅馆。

sentences.english: We can stay in a motel overnight, then continue on to Copenhagen tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在一家汽车旅馆过夜，然后明天再继续出发到哥本哈根。

sentences.english: A wide range of hotel, motel and apartment accommodation is available in most cities, major resorts and many rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 在大部分城市、主要旅游点和许多农村地区，都能找到各种类型的旅馆、汽车旅馆和公寓住所。

detailed_translations.english: a hotel for people who are travelling by car, where you can park your car outside your room

name: outrageous
trans: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的

sentences.english: By diplomatic standards, this was outrageous behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 按外交标准，这是不可接受的行为。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粗暴的；可恶的；令人吃惊的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe something as outrageous, you are emphasizing that it is unacceptable or very shocking

sentences.english: ...an annual levy on all drivers.
sentences.chinese: …向所有司机征收的年税。

sentences.english: a new tax levied on all electrical goods
sentences.chinese: 对所有电器商品征收的一种新税

detailed_translations.english: an additional sum of money, usually paid as a tax
to officially say that people must pay a tax or charge

name: claim
trans: 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.
sentences.chinese: 我不会自称是女权主义者，但我希望看到更多的女性担任高职。

sentences.english: Opposition leaders will claim victory if the turnout is lower than 50%.
sentences.chinese: 如果投票率低于 50%，反对党领袖将宣布获胜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 声称，主张；对…提出要求，索取；使失踪或死亡；需要，值得
detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.english: The horses' hooves often could not get a proper grip.
sentences.chinese: 这些马的蹄子经常踩不稳。

detailed_translations.english: the hard foot of an animal such as a horse, cow etc

sentences.english: The press has been blamed for intruding into people's personal lives in an unacceptable way.
sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体因以一种令人无法接受的方式侵入人们的私生活而受到谴责。

detailed_translations.english: to come into a place or situation, and have an unwanted effect

name: murmur
trans: 低语；低语声；低声抱怨；潺潺声
低声说；私下抱怨；发出轻柔持续的声音

sentences.english: She replied in a low murmur.
sentences.chinese: 她轻轻地柔声回答。

detailed_translations.chinese: 低语；低语声；低声抱怨；潺潺声
detailed_translations.english: a soft low sound made by people speaking quietly or a long way away

detailed_translations.chinese: 低声说；私下抱怨；发出轻柔持续的声音
detailed_translations.english: to make a soft low sound

sentences.english: He barreled along the expressway.
sentences.chinese: 他沿高速公路高速行驶。

sentences.english: Then he swung the car onto the expressway.
sentences.chinese: 然后他便转弯把车驶入了高速公路。

sentences.english: The car collision succeeded on the expressway due to a dense fog.
sentences.chinese: 因为浓雾，在高速公路上发生了连续撞车事件。

detailed_translations.english: a wide road in a city on which cars can travel very quickly without stopping

sentences.english: challenges to the existing power structure
sentences.chinese: 对现有权力结构的挑战

sentences.english: A new management structure has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 已推行一种新的管理结构。

sentences.english: molecular structures
sentences.chinese: 分子结构

detailed_translations.english: the way in which the parts of something are connected with each other and form a whole, or the thing that these parts make up

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

sentences.english: Their marriage was annulled last year.
sentences.chinese: 他们的婚姻关系去年宣告解除。

detailed_translations.english: to officially state that a marriage or legal agreement no longer exists

name: tag
trans: 标签；名称；结束语；附属物
尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰

sentences.english: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.chinese: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc
to attach a tag to something

name: replace
trans: 取代，代替；替换，更换；归还，偿还；把…放回原处

sentences.english: I’m replacing Sue on the team.
sentences.chinese: 我将接替队里的休。

sentences.english: Lectures have replaced the old tutorial system.
sentences.chinese: 课堂授课取代了旧式的导师制。

detailed_translations.english: to start doing something instead of another person, or start being used instead of another thing

name: sheet
trans: 覆盖；盖上被单；使成大片

sentences.english: I’ll go and find you some clean sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.english: white cotton sheets
sentences.chinese: 白色的棉布床单

sentences.english: a sheet of paper with names and numbers on it
sentences.chinese: 写了姓名和电话号码的一张纸

sentences.english: a sheet of glass
sentences.chinese: 一块玻璃

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under

sentences.english: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
sentences.chinese: 过了几个月他的案子才开审。

sentences.english: The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
sentences.chinese: 这项任务总的时限为一周，必须按时完成。

detailed_translations.english: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes

name: queer
trans: 奇怪的；同性恋的；不舒服的；心智不平衡的
同性恋者；怪人；伪造的货币

sentences.english: She gave a queer laugh.
sentences.chinese: 她古怪地笑了笑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奇怪的；同性恋的；不舒服的；心智不平衡的
detailed_translations.english: an offensive word used to describe someone who is homosexual, especially a man. Do not use this word.

detailed_translations.chinese: 同性恋者；怪人；伪造的货币
detailed_translations.english: an offensive word for a homosexual person, especially a man. Do not use this word.

sentences.english: She was infected with tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 她被传染上了肺结核。

sentences.english: With that, he handed me some papers and the address of a tuberculosis specialist; I was to go see him and report back.
sentences.chinese: 他边说边把几张纸和一个肺结核病专家的住址塞到我手里，要我去见那个专家并回报结果。

detailed_translations.english: a serious infectious disease that affects many parts of your body, especially your lungs

sentences.english: a writer of great insight
sentences.chinese: 有深刻洞察力的作家

sentences.english: The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 这本书生动地表现了墨西哥的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand and realize what people or situations are really like

name: shovel
trans: 铲除；用铲挖；把…胡乱塞入

sentences.english: ...a coal shovel.
sentences.chinese: …一把煤铲。

sentences.english: The workmen shovelled gravel onto the road.
sentences.chinese: 工人们把碎石铲到路面上。

detailed_translations.english: a tool with a rounded blade and a long handle used for moving earth, stones etc
to lift and move earth, stones etc with a shovel

sentences.english: The motel was off the main thoroughfare .
sentences.chinese: 那家汽车旅馆远离大路。

detailed_translations.english: the main road through a place such as a city or village

name: indicative
trans: 陈述语气；陈述语气的动词形式

sentences.english: This behaviour is indicative of her whole attitude, I’m afraid.
sentences.chinese: 这一行为恐怕已表明了她的总体态度。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标示的，指示的，象征的；陈述的
detailed_translations.english: an indicative verb form is used for making statements
the form of a verb that is used to make statements. For example, in the sentences ‘Penny passed her test’, and ‘Michael likes cake’, the verbs ‘passed’ and ‘likes’ are in the indicative.

sentences.english: Just after the avalanche.
sentences.chinese: 就在这雪崩后不久。

sentences.english: But what if the avalanche happened?
sentences.chinese: 不过，要是发生雪崩怎么办呢？

sentences.english: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，如果结果是一个比一小很多的数字，那么雪崩很快就会停止。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of snow, ice, and rocks that falls down the side of a mountain

sentences.english: We stayed in adjacent rooms.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在毗连的房间里。

sentences.english: the building adjacent to the library
sentences.chinese: 紧挨着图书馆的建筑

detailed_translations.english: (of an area, a building, a room, etc.) next to or near sth

name: platinum
trans: [化学] 铂；白金；唱片集达100万张的销售量；银灰色

sentences.english: a platinum ring
sentences.chinese: 白金戒指

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 铂；白金；唱片集达100万张的销售量；银灰色
detailed_translations.english: a silver-grey metal that does not change colour or lose its brightness, and is used in making expensive jewellery and in indus-try. It is a chemical element: symbol Pt

name: opposition
trans: 反对；反对派；在野党；敌对

sentences.english: He is confident in his ability to overcome all opposition with his personal charm.
sentences.chinese: 他自信有能力以个人魅力来化解一切反对力量。

sentences.english: The proposals have aroused the opposition of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 这些建议引起了教师们的反对。

sentences.english: Strong opposition resulted in rejection of the bill.
sentences.chinese: 在强烈反对下这项议案遭到否决。

sentences.english: Plans to turn the site into a £600 million leisure complex have met with stiff opposition.
sentences.chinese: 将该处改造成造价六亿英镑的综合性休闲大楼的计划遭到了激烈的反对。

sentences.english: Much public opposition to the new law remained.
sentences.chinese: 公众对这项新法律仍存在普遍的反对情绪。

sentences.english: Workers found themselves in opposition to local interests.
sentences.chinese: 工人们发现自己与当地人的利益存在冲突。

sentences.chinese: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.english: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.chinese: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

detailed_translations.chinese: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
detailed_translations.english: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
Stumble is also a noun

name: calendar
trans: 日历；[天] 历法；日程表
将…列入表中；将…排入日程表

sentences.english: There was a calendar on the wall above, with large squares around the dates.
sentences.chinese: 墙的上方曾有一本日历，日期框在大方格里。

sentences.english: The Christian calendar was originally based on the Julian calendar of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 公历最初是基于罗马的儒略历的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of pages that show the days, weeks, and months of a particular year, that you usually hang on a wall

name: target
trans: 把……作为目标；规定……的指标；瞄准某物

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

sentences.english: Of, like, or in an artery or arteries.
sentences.chinese: 动脉的动脉的，似动脉的，或在动脉里的。

sentences.english: When they are found, doctors pass a tube with a balloon into the narrowed area and inflate the balloon to compress plaque deposits against the side of the artery.
sentences.chinese: 当它们被发现后，医生通过一个软管把一个小气球进入狭小的区域并且膨胀这个气球去压缩动脉边沉淀下来的血小板。

sentences.english: This term is used to describe a condition in which the blood supply to part of the brain is suddenly and critically impaired by a blood clot or when a ruptured artery leaks blood into the brain.
sentences.chinese: 该术语是用来形容如下的一种情况：提供给大脑部分的血液突然地削弱，这种削弱是由于血液的凝固或由于动脉割裂导致血液漏到大脑里面。

detailed_translations.english: one of the tubes that carries blood from your heart to the rest of your body

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.english: The darkness was almost complete.
sentences.chinese: 几乎是漆黑一片。

sentences.english: a complete stranger
sentences.chinese: 一个完全陌生的人

detailed_translations.english: to finish doing or making something, especially when it has taken a long time
used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

name: grandstand
trans: 正面看台；观众；哗众取宠的表演
做博取观众喝采的演技

sentences.english: The grandstand was filled with men in seersucker suits, braces and pocket squares.
sentences.chinese: 看台上的男士都身着泡泡纱西服，配着背带和西服袋巾。

sentences.english: Kim Fonda said she also saw the plane disrespect toward where she was seated in the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 肯.芬达说在她坐的看台上，她也看到飞机向她横冲直撞过来

sentences.english: He held a presidential review of the troops from a flag-draped grandstand built in front of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 他在白宫前面的看台上检阅了部队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正面看台；观众；哗众取宠的表演
detailed_translations.english: a large structure that has many rows of seats where people sit and watch sports competitions, games, or races

detailed_translations.chinese: 做博取观众喝采的演技

name: memoir
trans: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录

sentences.english: Lady Thatcher had just published her memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 撒切尔夫人刚刚出版了她的回忆录。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回忆录；研究报告；自传；实录
detailed_translations.english: a book by someone important and famous in which they write about their life and experiences

sentences.english: Half an hour later I am in the cooling room studying the sides of 365, now just so much red meat and amber fat, the muscles occasionally still twitching.
sentences.chinese: 半小时以后，我在冷却室里站在365号的旁边研究，现在这只是些如此鲜红的肉和琥珀色的脂肪，肌肉时不时的还在抽搐。

detailed_translations.english: a yellowish brown colour

sentences.english: His solicitor said he committed the offence because he was heavily in debt.
sentences.chinese: 他的律师说他犯罪是因为欠下巨债。

detailed_translations.english: an illegal action or a crime

sentences.english: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.english: I quit school at 16.
sentences.chinese: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.english: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.chinese: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.english: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.chinese: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.english: I've quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 我戒了烟。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

sentences.english: To this class of substance belong mica, porcelain, quartz, glass, wood, etc.
sentences.chinese: 属于这类物质的有云母、瓷器、石英、玻璃、木材等等。

sentences.english: In some words in English the initial h is not sounded,as honour,hour,honesty,etc.
sentences.chinese: 英语里有些词如 honour，hour，honesty等等的首字h不发音。

name: truism
trans: 自明之理；老生常谈；老套；众所周知；真实性

sentences.english: His speech was just a collection of clichés and truisms.
sentences.chinese: 他的演说就是一堆陈词滥调和自明之理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自明之理；老生常谈；老套；众所周知；真实性
detailed_translations.english: a statement that is clearly true, so that there is no need to say it

name: icy
trans: 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的

sentences.english: an icy wind
sentences.chinese: 刺骨寒风

sentences.english: The bath water was icy cold.
sentences.chinese: 洗澡水冰冷刺骨。

sentences.english: an icy mountain road
sentences.chinese: 冰封的山路

detailed_translations.english: extremely cold

name: rehearsal
trans: 排演；预演；练习；训练；叙述

sentences.english: a wedding rehearsal
sentences.chinese: 婚礼的预演

detailed_translations.chinese: 排演；预演；练习；训练；叙述
detailed_translations.english: a time when all the people in a play, concert etc practise before a public performance

name: machinery
trans: 机械；机器；机构；机械装置

sentences.english: ...quality tools and machinery.
sentences.chinese: …优质工具和机械。

detailed_translations.english: You can use machinery to refer to machines in general, or machines that are used in a factory or on a farm

name: abuse
trans: 滥用；虐待；辱骂；弊端；恶习，陋习

sentences.english: several cases of child abuse
sentences.chinese: 数宗虐待儿童案

sentences.english: An independent committee will look into alleged human rights abuses.
sentences.chinese: 一个独立委员会将对涉嫌践踏人权的行为进行调查。

detailed_translations.english: cruel or violent treatment of someone
to deliberately use something for the wrong purpose or for your own advantage

name: grudge
trans: 怀恨；吝惜；妒忌；不情愿做

sentences.english: Mr Gillis was not normally a man to bear grudges .
sentences.chinese: 吉利斯先生通常不是那种会积怨的人。

sentences.english: I’m not harbouring some secret grudge against you.
sentences.chinese: 我没有对你暗地里怀恨在心。

sentences.english: It could be the work of someone with a grudge against the company.
sentences.chinese: 这事可能是某些对公司怀有怨愤的人干的。

sentences.english: You let nasty little personal grudges creep in.
sentences.chinese: 你就由着怨恨的情绪一点一点滋长。

detailed_translations.chinese: 勉强做； 不情愿地给
detailed_translations.english: to do or give something very unwillingly
a feeling of dislike for someone because you cannot forget that they harmed you in the past

sentences.english: The children skated on the frozen pond.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在结冰的池塘上滑冰。

detailed_translations.english: to move on skates
one of a pair of boots with metal blades on the bottom, for moving quickly on ice

sentences.english: ...Angel Falls, the world's highest waterfall.
sentences.chinese: …安赫尔瀑布，世界上最高的瀑布。

detailed_translations.english: a place where water from a river or stream falls down over a cliff or rock

name: corporate
trans: 法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的；公司的；企业的

sentences.english: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.english: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.chinese: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.english: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.english: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.chinese: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.english: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.chinese: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.english: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.chinese: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to a corporation

sentences.english: ...a sumo wrestler.
sentences.chinese: ...一名相扑选手。

detailed_translations.english: a Japanese form of  wrestling  , done by men who are very large

name: involved
trans: 涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: The plot was so involved that very few people knew what was going on.
sentences.chinese: 情节太复杂，几乎没人知道是怎么回事。

detailed_translations.english: having so many different parts that it is difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: The company plans to merge its subsidiaries in the US.
sentences.chinese: 该公司计划合并其在美国的几家子公司。

detailed_translations.english: to combine, or to join things together to form one thing

name: chair
trans: 椅子；讲座；（会议的）主席位；大学教授的职位
担任（会议的）主席；使…入座；使就任要职

sentences.english: a kitchen chair
sentences.chinese: 厨房椅

sentences.english: They bought a new table and chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们买了一套新的桌椅。

sentences.english: One of the chair legs was broken.
sentences.chinese: 椅子有一条腿断了。

sentences.english: Address your questions to the chair, please.
sentences.chinese: 请向主席提出你的问题。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, which has a back, a seat, and four legs

name: restless
trans: 焦躁不安的；不安宁的；得不到满足的

sentences.english: After a few weeks in Marseille, I grew restless and decided to move on.
sentences.chinese: 在马赛住了几星期后，我开始待不住了，决定换个地方。

detailed_translations.english: unwilling to keep still or stay where you are, especially because you are nervous or bored

sentences.english: It was clear from the outset that there were going to be problems.
sentences.chinese: 从一开始就很清楚会有问题出现的。

sentences.english: It’s better to get something in writing right at the outset.
sentences.chinese: 最好一开始就有个书面的东西。

detailed_translations.english: at or from the beginning of an event or process

name: stride
trans: 跨过；大踏步走过；跨坐在…

sentences.english: He strode toward her.
sentences.chinese: 他大步向她走去。

sentences.english: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
sentences.chinese: 帕科三大步就走到了门口。

detailed_translations.english: to walk quickly with long steps
a long step you make while you are walking

name: royal
trans: 皇家的；盛大的；女王的；高贵的；第一流的

sentences.english: the royal palace
sentences.chinese: 王宫

sentences.english: the royal family
sentences.chinese: 王室

detailed_translations.english: relating to or belonging to a king or queen

name: tell
trans: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

sentences.english: I’ll tell you all about it when I get back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

sentences.english: Stone decided to hold a contest to see who could write the best song.
sentences.chinese: 斯通决定举行一场比赛，看谁能够写出最佳歌曲。

sentences.english: I only entered the contest for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我只是为了好玩才参加这次比赛的。

sentences.english: It is clear that the election will be a close contest .
sentences.chinese: 显然这次选举将是一场难分高下的角逐。

sentences.english: the 1975 Liberal leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 1975年自由党的领导权之争

detailed_translations.english: a competition or a situation in which two or more people or groups are competing with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 争夺， 与…竞争； 对…提出质疑， 辩驳
detailed_translations.english: to say formally that you do not accept something or do not agree with it

name: spill
trans: 溢出，溅出；溢出量；摔下；小塞子

sentences.english: Katie almost spilled her milk.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

detailed_translations.english: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

sentences.english: Add fertilizer to enrich the soil.
sentences.chinese: 施上肥料使土壤肥沃。

sentences.english: Education can greatly enrich your life.
sentences.chinese: 教育可以大大充实生活。

detailed_translations.english: to improve the quality of something, especially by adding things to it

sentences.english: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
sentences.chinese: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future

sentences.english: Rebels were already making plans to overthrow the government.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者已在密谋颠覆政府。

sentences.english: The organization was dedicated to the overthrow of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 该组织致力于推翻资本主义。

detailed_translations.english: to remove a leader or government from power, especially by force
the defeat and removal from power of a leader or government, especially by force

sentences.english: The physician must exercise caution when prescribing antidepressants.
sentences.chinese: 医师在开抗抑郁药处方时必须谨慎。

sentences.english: Business leaders are cautioning against hasty action that would hamper flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 企业领导人被告诫不要贸然采取行动，以免把事情搞僵。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being very careful to avoid danger or risks
to warn someone that something might be dangerous, difficult etc

name: resume
trans: 摘要；[管理] 履历，简历
重新开始，继续；恢复，重新占用

sentences.english: She hopes to resume work after the baby is born.
sentences.chinese: 她想生完孩子后继续工作。

sentences.english: The rebels have resumed hostilities against government troops.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子继续与政府军发生冲突。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新开始， 继续， 恢复
detailed_translations.english: to start doing something again after stopping or being interrupted

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要， 概要； 简历
detailed_translations.english: a short account of something such as an article or speech which gives the main points but no details

sentences.english: A: Fold up your bedding, and change the pillowcase.
sentences.chinese: 整理好你的床铺，同时换一下枕套。

sentences.english: For an extra-calming treat, take a nap on a pillow scented with lavender—either in fabric spray form, or crumble some of the plant itself and put it in your pillowcase.
sentences.chinese: 想要更加平静的话，在洒有薰衣草的枕头或者喷有香薰的织物再或者是填充了薰衣草碎屑的枕套上小憩一会。

sentences.english: So this Halloween, after kids make the rounds, blame the excitement surrounding the holiday for your child’s jumpy behavior -- not the pillowcase protruding with candy.
sentences.chinese: 所以这个万圣节，如果孩子们要完糖都兴奋过头，要怪就去怪节日的燃点吧，别误会了枕套里溢出来的糖果。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth cover for a pillow

name: gulp
trans: 狼吞虎咽地吃；大口地吸

sentences.english: She gulped down her breakfast and ran for the bus.
sentences.chinese: 她狼吞虎咽地吃完早饭，跑去赶公交车了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 狼吞虎咽地吃；大口地吸
detailed_translations.english: to swallow large quantities of food or drink quickly
a large amount of something that you swallow quickly, or the action of swallowing

sentences.english: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.chinese: 那种著名的硬币名叫先令,并且它是一种银质的硬币。

sentences.english: We wanted this to be a twenty shilling coin but now in the market it's trading at twenty-one.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望它是一个值二十先令的硬币,但现在它在市场上以二十一个先令的价值来交换。

sentences.english: Walter Scott wanted to give him a six penny piece to reward him for this service; but not finding any in his purse he presented him with a shilling saying, "You will owe me six pence, my good fellow.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特•司各脱想奖赏给他一枚六便士的硬币,但他在钱包里找不到便士,于是他给了他一个先令,说:"你将欠我六便士,我亲爱的朋友.

detailed_translations.english: an old British coin or unit of money. There were 20 shillings in one pound.

name: stud
trans: 散布；用许多饰钮等装饰
种马的；为配种而饲养的

sentences.english: a stud dog
sentences.chinese: 种犬

detailed_translations.english: the use of animals, especially horses, for breeding, an animal that is used in this way, or a place where this is done

detailed_translations.chinese: 散布；用许多饰钮等装饰
种马的；为配种而饲养的

name: plum
trans: 人所希望的；有利的；上等的

sentences.english: juicy ripe plums
sentences.chinese: 多汁的成熟李子

detailed_translations.english: a small round juicy fruit which is dark red, purple, or yellow and has a single hard seed, or the tree that produces this fruit

detailed_translations.chinese: 人所希望的；有利的；上等的

sentences.english: Each individual leaf on the tree is different.
sentences.chinese: 树上每片叶子都不相同。

sentences.english: the needs of the individual customer
sentences.chinese: 每位顾客的需求

detailed_translations.english: considered separately from other people or things in the same group
a person, considered separately from the rest of the group or society that they live in

sentences.english: a beautiful country mansion
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的乡村宅第

detailed_translations.english: a very large house

sentences.english: a new adult literacy campaign
sentences.chinese: 新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

detailed_translations.chinese: 识字， 有文化， 读写能力
detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to read and write

name: grammatical
trans: 文法的；符合语法规则的

sentences.english: grammatical rules
sentences.chinese: 语法规则

detailed_translations.english: concerning grammar

name: futile
trans: 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的

sentences.english: My efforts to go back to sleep proved futile.
sentences.chinese: 我努力想再次入睡，但怎么也睡不着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的
detailed_translations.english: actions that are futile are useless because they have no chance of being successful

name: diverse
trans: 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

name: rigid
trans: 严格的；僵硬的，死板的；坚硬的；精确的

sentences.english: rigid plastic
sentences.chinese: 硬塑料

detailed_translations.english: stiff and not moving or bending

sentences.english: traditional doctrines of divine power
sentences.chinese: 神力的传统教义

sentences.english: Marxist doctrine
sentences.chinese: 马克思主义学说

detailed_translations.english: a set of beliefs that form an important part of a religion or system of ideas

sentences.english: The Soviet Union had been forced by circumstances to sign a pact with Nazi Germany.
sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.english: I can’t imagine a circumstance in which I would be willing to steal.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象我在什么情况下会愿意去偷东西。

sentences.english: Grants are awarded according to your financial circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 补助金根据经济状况发给。

detailed_translations.english: the conditions that affect a situation, action, event etc

sentences.english: Every beer on the menu was brewed locally.
sentences.chinese: 酒单上的所有啤酒都是本地酿造的。

detailed_translations.english: to make beer
to make beer
a drink that is brewed, especially tea

sentences.english: They had to cross five military checkpoints.
sentences.chinese: 他们得通过五个军事检查站。

detailed_translations.english: a place, especially on a border, where an official person examines vehicles or people

name: deposit
trans: 存款；押金；订金；保证金；沉淀物

sentences.english: You are advised to deposit your valuables in the hotel safe.
sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.english: As the river slows down, it deposits a layer of soil.
sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

sentences.english: fatty deposits on the heart
sentences.chinese: 心脏上沉积的脂肪层

detailed_translations.english: to put money or something valuable in a bank or other place where it will be safe
an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

name: leftovers
trans: 遗留；剩余物；吃剩的食物（leftover的复数形式）

sentences.english: Refrigerate any leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 把剩饭冷藏起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗留；剩余物；吃剩的食物（leftover的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: You can refer to food that has not been eaten after a meal as leftovers

sentences.english: The magazine is unable to enter into any correspondence on medical matters.
sentences.chinese: 本杂志无法答复有关医学方面的来信。

sentences.english: All correspondence between us must cease.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间的所有通信必须停止。

detailed_translations.english: the process of sending and receiving letters

name: faithful
trans: 忠实的，忠诚的；如实的；准确可靠的

sentences.english: a faithful friend
sentences.chinese: 忠诚的朋友

sentences.english: years of faithful service to the company
sentences.chinese: 为公司多年忠诚的服务

sentences.english: our faithful family dog, Bogey
sentences.chinese: 我家的忠犬博吉

sentences.english: a faithful member of the church
sentences.chinese: 教会的忠实信徒

sentences.english: a faithful account of what had happened
sentences.chinese: 对所发生之事的如实报道

detailed_translations.english: remaining loyal to a particular person, belief, political party etc and continuing to support them

sentences.english: the untimely death of a popular local man
sentences.chinese: 一名当地红人的过早死亡

sentences.english: The announcement brought the meeting to an untimely end.
sentences.chinese: 这事的公布使会议早早地就结束了。

detailed_translations.english: happening too soon or sooner than you expected

sentences.english: ‘Don’t go!’ Robert pleaded.
sentences.chinese: “别走！”罗伯特央求道。

sentences.english: He appeared before the committee to plead his case.
sentences.chinese: 他出现在委员会上为他的案子辩护。

detailed_translations.chinese: 恳求，请求；申诉，答辩，辩护
detailed_translations.english: to ask for something that you want very much, in a sincere and emotional way

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…辩护， 提出…为理由
detailed_translations.english: If you plead the case or cause of someone or something, you speak out in their support or defence

name: conifer
trans: 针叶树；[植] 松柏科植物

sentences.english: In conifer orchards new stumps should be removed.
sentences.chinese: 在针叶树的种子园，新的伐桩应予除掉。

sentences.english: They are large evergreen conifer trees, ranging from 23m to 32m high.
sentences.chinese: 它们是23 米到32 米高的大型的常绿针叶树。

sentences.english: Drag onto the page to add a conifer tree, such as pine, fir, spruce, redwood, or cypress.
sentences.chinese: 拖到绘图页后，可以添加针叶树，如松树、杉树、云杉、红木或柏树。

detailed_translations.english: a tree such as a  pine  or  fir  that has leaves like needles and produces brown  cones  that contain seeds. Most types of conifer keep their leaves in winter.

sentences.english: Some people are very resistant to the idea of exercise.
sentences.chinese: 一些人对锻炼的主意非常抵制。

detailed_translations.english: not damaged or affected by something

name: oats
trans: 燕麦；燕麦片（oat的复数）；燕麦粥

sentences.english: Oats provide good, nutritious food for horses.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦为马提供营养丰富的好饲料。

detailed_translations.chinese: 燕麦；燕麦片（oat的复数）；燕麦粥
detailed_translations.english: the grain from which flour or oatmeal is made and that is used in cooking, or in food for animals

name: vintage
trans: 葡萄收获期；葡萄酒酿造期

sentences.english: This wine is from one of the two best vintages of the decade in this region.
sentences.chinese: 这种葡萄酒是这一地区近十年来葡萄产量最好的两个年份之一生产的佳酿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 葡萄收获期；葡萄酒酿造期
detailed_translations.english: The vintage of a good quality wine is the year and place that it was made before being stored to improve it. You can also use vintage to refer to the wine that was made in a certain year.
old, but high quality

name: sweetheart
trans: 私下签订的；私下达成的

sentences.english: They were childhood sweethearts .
sentences.chinese: 他们是青梅竹马。

detailed_translations.english: the person that you love

detailed_translations.chinese: 私下签订的；私下达成的

sentences.english: Add some raisins to the dough.
sentences.chinese: 在生面团中加一些葡萄干。

sentences.english: A baker is kneading a dough.
sentences.chinese: 一位面包师正在揉面团。

sentences.english: She patted the dough into a flat cake.
sentences.chinese: 她把面团轻轻拍成扁饼。

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of flour and water ready to be baked into bread,  pastry  etc

name: realistic
trans: 现实的；现实主义的；逼真的；实在论的

sentences.english: It’s just not realistic to expect a promotion so soon.
sentences.chinese: 这么快就想升职根本不现实。

sentences.english: You need to be realistic about the amount you can do in a day.
sentences.chinese: 你对自己一天能完成多少工作量要现实一点。

detailed_translations.english: judging and dealing with situations in a practical way according to what is actually possible rather than what you would like to happen

sentences.english: This could be magnesium.
sentences.chinese: 这也可能是镁。

sentences.english: But, we know for example that magnesium, when it reacts, it reacts with both of its electrons, not just one of its electrons.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们知道，拿镁来说，当它发生反应的时候，并不只是，某一个电子反应，而是两个价电子都发生反应。

sentences.english: So, if we want to get more magnesium into the marketplace at an affordable price, not by government edict, what do we have to do?
sentences.chinese: 所以如果我们想把更多的镁,投诸市场，并让它保持在一个不太昂贵的价格，而且不靠政府法令，我们应该怎样做？

detailed_translations.english: Magnesium is a light, silvery white metal which burns with a bright white flame

sentences.english: The boom has created job opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 经济繁荣创造了就业的机会。

sentences.english: the economic boom of the 1950s
sentences.chinese: 20世纪50年代的经济繁荣

sentences.english: The economy went from boom to bust (=  from increasing to decreasing  ) very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 经济很快就从繁荣走向了萧条。

detailed_translations.english: a quick increase of business activity

sentences.english: All offers of help will be greatly appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 如蒙帮助，感激不尽。

sentences.english: The quality of health care varies greatly .
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务质量差别很大。

detailed_translations.english: extremely or very much

name: profound
trans: 深厚的；意义深远的；渊博的

sentences.english: a profound question
sentences.chinese: 深刻的问题

sentences.english: Jenner is a profound thinker.
sentences.chinese: 詹纳是个思想深刻的人。

detailed_translations.english: showing great knowledge and understanding

sentences.english: It’s raining, which presumably means that your football match will be cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 下雨了，这可能意味着你们的足球比赛要取消。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大概， 可能， 据推测
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you think something is probably true

name: option
trans: [计] 选项；选择权；买卖的特权

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

sentences.english: redevelopment of the city’s downtown area
sentences.chinese: 中心城区的改造

detailed_translations.english: the act of redeveloping an area, especially in a city

sentences.english: He stumbled to the door and found a six-foot cockroach standing there.
sentences.chinese: 他跌跌撞撞地去打开门，见到一只六英尺高的蟑螂站在那儿！

sentences.english: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.chinese: 蟑螂急匆匆的从冰箱底下跑过去，壁虎在后面也努力的想要钻过去。

sentences.english: Competitions include Skating Around Poverty and Welfare Hurdles. Mascots include a cockroach and a rat.
sentences.chinese: 比赛项目包括贫穷和福利绕障碍滑冰，吉祥物是蟑螂和老鼠。

detailed_translations.english: a large black or brown insect that lives in dirty houses, especially if they are warm and there is food to eat

name: impact
trans: 挤入，压紧；撞击；对…产生影响

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: inconsiderable
trans: 不足取的；不值得考虑的；琐屑的

sentences.english: He has built up a not inconsiderable business empire.
sentences.chinese: 他已建立起一个有相当规模的商业帝国。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不足取的；不值得考虑的；琐屑的

sentences.english: ...Becket, a recent appointee to the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: ...贝克特，一个最近刚被任命在最高法院工作的人。

detailed_translations.english: An appointee is someone who has been chosen for a particular job or position of responsibility

sentences.english: A small aircraft was obstructing the runway.
sentences.chinese: 一架小型飞机堵住了跑道。

sentences.english: The column obstructed our view of the stage.
sentences.chinese: 柱子挡着，我们看不见舞台。

detailed_translations.english: to block a road, passage etc

sentences.english: an attempt to eradicate inflation
sentences.chinese: 为消除通货膨胀所作的努力

sentences.english: This problem has now been completely eradicated.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题现已彻底杜绝。

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something such as a disease or a social problem

name: infant
trans: 婴儿的；幼稚的；初期的；未成年的

sentences.english: An infant’s skin is very sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的皮肤非常敏感。

sentences.english: infant formula milk
sentences.chinese: 婴(幼)儿配方奶

detailed_translations.english: a baby or very young child
intended for babies or very young children

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

name: vibrant
trans: 振动的；充满生气的；响亮的；战栗的

sentences.english: a painting full of vibrant reds and blues
sentences.chinese: 满是鲜亮的红色和蓝色的画作

detailed_translations.chinese: 振动的；充满生气的；响亮的；战栗的
detailed_translations.english: a vibrant colour is bright and strong

sentences.english: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price.
sentences.chinese: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small amount of something

sentences.english: They saw a sudden gleam of light.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到一道微光一闪而过。

sentences.english: The wooden panelling was gleaming with wax polish.
sentences.chinese: 木嵌板上过蜡显得很光亮。

detailed_translations.english: a small pale light, especially one that shines for a short time
to shine softly

name: dart
trans: 投掷，投射；使迅速突然移动
飞镖，标枪；急驰，飞奔；（虫的）螯；飞快的移动

sentences.english: a poisoned dart
sentences.chinese: 毒镖

sentences.english: She darted a sly sideways glance at Bramwell.
sentences.chinese: 她狡猾地斜瞟了布莱威尔一眼。

detailed_translations.english: a small pointed object that is thrown or shot as a weapon, or one that is thrown in the game of darts
If you dart a look at someone or something, or if your eyes dart to them, you look at them very quickly
to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction

name: trolley
trans: 手推车；（美）有轨电车（等于trolley car）；（英）无轨电车（等于trolleybus）；空中吊运车

sentences.english: a supermarket trolley
sentences.chinese: 超市购物手推车

detailed_translations.chinese: 手推车；（美）有轨电车（等于trolley car）；（英）无轨电车（等于trolleybus）；空中吊运车
detailed_translations.english: a large basket on wheels that you use for carrying bags, shopping etc

name: massive
trans: 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的

sentences.english: The bell is massive, weighing over 40 tons.
sentences.chinese: 那口钟非常大，有40多吨重。

sentences.english: the castle’s massive walls
sentences.chinese: 城堡高大厚实的围墙

detailed_translations.chinese: (尺寸、数量、规模) 非常大的
detailed_translations.english: very large in size, quantity, or extent

sentences.english: She looked at him over the rim of her glass.
sentences.chinese: 她沿玻璃杯口看着他。

detailed_translations.english: the outside edge of something circular
to be around the edge of something

sentences.english: One of the most poignant sights awaiting visitors is the funfair, which was due to open just a few days before disaster struck.
sentences.chinese: 最能打动游客心弦的情景是一家游乐场，它原定几天后就要开放。

detailed_translations.english: a noisy outdoor event where you can ride on machines, play games to win prizes etc

name: recognition
trans: 识别；承认，认出；重视；赞誉；公认

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

name: unashamed
trans: 无耻的；恬不知耻的；问心无愧的

sentences.english: his unashamed love of money
sentences.chinese: 他对金钱恬不知耻的贪恋

detailed_translations.chinese: 无耻的；恬不知耻的；问心无愧的
detailed_translations.english: not feeling embarrassed or ashamed about something that people might disapprove of

sentences.english: A modification of the common-origin theory accounts for the density discrepancy .
sentences.chinese: 关于共同起源的理论，有一种改进的论点解释了密度的不符。

detailed_translations.english: a difference between two amounts, details, reports etc that should be the same

name: salon
trans: 沙龙；客厅；画廊；美术展览馆

sentences.english: a literary salon
sentences.chinese: 文学沙龙

detailed_translations.chinese: 沙龙；客厅；画廊；美术展览馆
detailed_translations.english: a room in a very large house, where people can meet and talk

sentences.english: At the bar he ordered a cider.
sentences.chinese: 他在酒吧点了一杯苹果汁。

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from apples, or a glass of this drink

sentences.english: Under the new name of Jane Elliott, she finds a job as village schoolmistress and tries to forget her seemingly hopeless love for Rochester.
sentences.chinese: 她改名为简·艾略特，找到一份工作，担任乡村小学女教师，竭力想忘掉她对罗切斯特的看来毫无希望的爱情。

sentences.english: Instead of spilling brew, ballot chads, or blood, I’ll celebrate by sharing 18 lessons I’ve learned over the years from the harsh schoolmistress named Experience.
sentences.chinese: 不过今天这里没有啤酒、没有废票，也没有流血，我将和大家一起分享自己从叫做“经验”的那位严厉的女校长那里学到的18个教训的方式来庆祝它。

detailed_translations.english: a female teacher, especially in a  private school (= one that parents pay to send their children to )

sentences.english: They listened in respectful silence.
sentences.chinese: 他们毕恭毕敬地静听。

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing respect

name: support
trans: 支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养
支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

name: cement
trans: 巩固，加强；用水泥涂；接合

sentences.english: a bag of cement
sentences.chinese: 一袋水泥

sentences.english: Most artificial joints are cemented into place.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分人造关节是被黏结复位的。

detailed_translations.english: a grey powder made from  lime  and clay that becomes hard when it is mixed with water and allowed to dry, and that is used in building
to join two things together using cement , glue, etc.

sentences.english: The robe was held at the waist by a cord.
sentences.chinese: 在袍子腰处束了根细绳。

sentences.english: He pulled explosives and some tangled cord from his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他从他的包里掏出炸药和一些乱糟糟的绳子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of thick string or thin rope

name: limousine
trans: 豪华轿车；大型豪华轿车

sentences.english: Supervisors in this unit group supervise and co-ordinate activities of truck drivers, bus drivers, delivery drivers, subway and other transit operators, chauffeurs and taxi and limousine drivers.
sentences.chinese: 本单元组主管监督和协调卡车司机，巴士司机，送货司机，地铁及其他交通营办商，司机，出租车和豪华轿车司机的活动。

sentences.english: In 1992, George Bush visited Australia and, from the window of his limousine, held up his index and middle fingers in the "V" shape, a la Winston Churchill.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，乔治·布什拜访澳大利的时候，效仿温斯顿·丘吉尔，从豪华的轿车里伸出食指和中指作出“V”字形的手势。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大型轿车， 大型豪华轿车
detailed_translations.english: a very large, expensive, and comfortable car, driven by someone who is paid to drive

name: neutral
trans: 中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的
中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档

sentences.english: I always tried to remain neutral when they started arguing.
sentences.chinese: 他们争论起来的时候我总是努力保持中立。

sentences.english: Clive decided to adopt a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 克莱夫决定采取中立立场。

sentences.english: The British government acted as a neutral observer during the talks.
sentences.chinese: 英国政府在会谈中扮演了中立观察员的角色。

sentences.english: the neutral language of an official news report
sentences.chinese: 官方新闻报道采用的中性语言

detailed_translations.english: not supporting any of the people or groups involved in an argument or disagreement

name: linear
trans: 线的，线型的；直线的，线状的；长度的

sentences.english: a linear diagram
sentences.chinese: 线形图

sentences.english: linear measurements
sentences.chinese: 长度量度

detailed_translations.english: consisting of lines, or in the form of a straight line

sentences.english: They walked a little further.
sentences.chinese: 他们又往前走了一点。

sentences.english: His hands moved further down her back.

sentences.english: ...a major intellectual figure with disciples throughout Europe.

detailed_translations.english: someone who believes in the ideas of a great teacher or leader, especially a religious one

name: efficient

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is efficient, they work well without wasting time, money, or energy

sentences.english: Paddy’s words had a startling effect on the children.

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.chinese: 我们希望这些地区会乐意接受民主改革。

sentences.english: Most West European countries have embraced the concept of high-speed rail networks with enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 大多数西欧国家都表现出极大的兴趣，欣然接受修建高速铁路网的想法。

detailed_translations.english: to eagerly accept a new idea, opinion, religion etc

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

sentences.english: How can you be so selfish?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能这样自私？

sentences.english: selfish behaviour

detailed_translations.english: caring only about yourself and not about other people – used to show disapproval

name: revolve
trans: 旋转；循环出现；反复考虑

sentences.chinese: 轮子开始旋转。

sentences.english: The restaurant slowly revolves, giving excellent views of the city.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅缓缓旋转，城市美景尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Using graphics software, you can revolve the image on the screen.

detailed_translations.chinese: 旋转；循环出现；反复考虑

sentences.english: We squatted beside the pool and watched the diver sink slowly down.
sentences.chinese: 我们蹲在池边，看潜水员慢慢沉下水。

a squatting position
short and thick or low and wide, especially in a way which is not attractive

sentences.english: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

detailed_translations.english: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it

name: whim
trans: 奇想；一时的兴致；怪念头；幻想

sentences.english: On arrival, she buys a glass factory on a whim, and challenges him to transport a church built entirely of glass by boat from Sydney 250 miles up the coast.
sentences.chinese: 到达目的地后，她突发奇想买了一个玻璃厂，并向他挑战，让他用船沿着 250 英里长的海岸线从悉尼运来建造一整座玻璃教堂。

sentences.english: An idle whim, I fear, sir,' was my answer; `or else an idle whim is going to spirit me away.
sentences.chinese: “恐怕是一种无聊的奇想，先生，”这是我的回答，“不然就是一种无聊的奇想又要诱使我走开。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden feeling that you would like to do or have something, especially when there is no important or good reason

name: unjust
trans: 不公平的，不公正的；非正义的

sentences.chinese: 不公正的法律

detailed_translations.chinese: 不公平的，不公正的；非正义的
detailed_translations.english: not fair or reasonable

name: trickle
trans: 滴；细细地流；慢慢地移动

sentences.english: A tear trickled down the old man's cheek.
sentences.chinese: 一滴泪水顺着老人的面颊流了下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滴；细细地流；慢慢地移动
detailed_translations.english: if liquid trickles somewhere, it flows slowly in drops or in a thin stream
a thin slow flow of liquid

sentences.english: We had to stoop to pass through the low entrance.
sentences.chinese: 我们得弯腰通过那低矮的入口。

sentences.english: Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫俯身系鞋带。

detailed_translations.english: to bend your body forward and down
if sb has a stoop , their shoulders are always bent forward

sentences.english: ...the underside of the car.
sentences.chinese: …汽车的底部。

detailed_translations.english: The underside of something is the part of it which normally faces towards the ground

name: finished
trans: 完成；结束；毁掉（finish的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: I’m almost finished.
sentences.chinese: 我差不多完成了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer doing, dealing with, or using something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完成；结束；毁掉（finish的过去分词形式）

name: closely
trans: 紧密地；接近地；严密地；亲近地

sentences.english: The successful applicant will be working closely with our international staff.
sentences.chinese: 被录用者将与我们的国际员工紧密合作。

sentences.english: lightning, followed closely by thunder
sentences.chinese: 闪电，紧跟着是雷鸣

sentences.chinese: 电梯里人挨着人，我几乎动弹不得。

sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

name: float
trans: 彩车，花车；漂流物；浮舟；浮萍
