sentences.chinese: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.english: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

detailed_translations.english: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air

sentences.english: This involved being shown a picture of eight animals and being asked to memorise the order in which the creatures appeared.
sentences.chinese: 其中一项实验是给受试者一张画有八只动物的图片，让他们记住动物的顺序。

sentences.english: In the study, volunteers were given a rubber ball and asked to squeeze it as hard as possible before trying to memorise a list of 72 words.
sentences.chinese: 在这一研究中，研究人员给每个志愿者发了一个橡皮球，并让他们在试着记住一个包含72个单词的列表时尽全力握紧它。

sentences.english: Note - If you need to remember which one to use, memorise this sentence: Why do some people assume they know what other people think about something?
sentences.chinese: 提示：如果你想记住这三个词的区别的话，记住下面这个例句就行了：为什么有些人自认为他们知道别人在想些什么？

name: thumb
trans: 翻阅；以拇指拨弄；作搭车手势；笨拙地摆弄

sentences.chinese: 我拦顺路车进了城。

the part of your hand that is shaped like a thick short finger and helps you to hold things

sentences.chinese: 硫酸铜具有防腐性，这是不曾有过问题的。

sentences.chinese: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.english: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。

sentences.chinese: 需要事先告诉警察这种情况怎样处理。

sentences.english: When you give a speech, it’s natural to feel nervous beforehand.

sentences.chinese: 我们用了半小时给橡皮筏充好气。

sentences.chinese: 她的救生衣未能充进去气。

detailed_translations.english: to fill something with air or gas so it becomes larger, or to become filled with air or gas

name: majesty

sentences.english: the sheer majesty of St Peter's in Rome
sentences.chinese: 罗马圣彼得大教堂的雄伟庄严

sentences.english: His Majesty the King
sentences.chinese: 国王陛下

sentences.chinese: 环境保护

sentences.chinese: 美国授予了二战期间的英国首相温斯顿·丘吉尔爵士荣誉公民的称号。

sentences.english: He ran across the courtyard, dodging a storm of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 他跑过院子，躲避雨点般的子弹。

sentences.english: ...saffron-robed Buddhist monks.
sentences.chinese: …身穿黄袍的和尚们。

detailed_translations.english: a member of an all-male religious group that lives apart from other people in a  monastery

sentences.chinese: 应该制作一个副本呈交县档案室。

sentences.english: a duplicate key

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制， 复印； 重复

name: sausage

sentences.chinese: 猪肉香肠

detailed_translations.english: a small tube of skin filled with a mixture of meat, spices etc, eaten hot or cold after it has been cooked

trans: 使困惑，使为难；使复杂化

sentences.chinese: 谢伊的症状令医生们困惑。

sentences.chinese: 所有参赛作品必须是参赛者自己的作品。

detailed_translations.english: someone who takes part in a competition

sentences.chinese: 他认定，没有刺客会冒险混在人群里开枪。

trans: 明智；头脑清楚；精神健全；通情达理

sentences.chinese: 我开始怀疑他是否神志正常。

sentences.chinese: 她怀疑自己是否精神有问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心智健全，神智正常；判断正确
detailed_translations.english: the condition of being mentally healthy

sentences.chinese: 非常古老的建筑物

sentences.english: vegetarian cuisine
sentences.chinese: 素食烹饪

detailed_translations.english: a particular style of cooking

name: jeweler
trans: 珠宝商；宝石匠；钟表匠；钟表商

detailed_translations.chinese: 珠宝商；宝石匠；钟表匠；钟表商

sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

sentences.english: a blue and white striped shirt
sentences.chinese: 蓝白条纹的衬衫

detailed_translations.english: having lines or bands of colour

sentences.chinese: 船只封锁了港口。

something that is used to stop vehicles or people entering or leaving a place

sentences.chinese: 他威胁要用手枪向我射击。

sentences.chinese: 他在她的手袋里藏了一把小手枪。

sentences.english: He hopped back up the stairs and took his pistol.
sentences.chinese: 他赶紧返回到楼上，拿上了他的手枪。

detailed_translations.english: a small gun you can use with one hand

sentences.chinese: 他竭尽全力才保持了镇定。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to control your mind and body in order to achieve something that you want to do

sentences.chinese: 这家人在房子前面的小围场养马。

保证，许诺；用……抵押；举杯祝……健康

sentences.chinese: 会议以加快该地区6个州之间合作的承诺结束。

name: lump
trans: 块，块状；肿块；瘤；很多；笨人
混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动

sentences.english: You are the one with a lump.
sentences.chinese: 你是那个有了肿块的人。

sentences.english: One day, I noticed a lump in her skin.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我注意到她皮肤上有个肿块。

sentences.english: Then the lump or cancer attaches itself to this wall.
sentences.chinese: 然后肿块或癌就附着在那钙壁上。

to put two or more different people or things together and consider them as a single group, sometimes wrongly

name: trough
trans: 水槽，水槽；低谷期；饲料槽；低气压

sentences.english: a horse trough
sentences.chinese: 马槽

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽，水槽；低谷期；饲料槽；低气压
detailed_translations.english: a long narrow open container that holds water or food for animals

sentences.english: We must consider how best to utilize what resources we have.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须考虑怎样充分利用现有的资源。

detailed_translations.english: to use something for a particular purpose

name: tension
trans: 张力，拉力；紧张，不安；电压

sentences.english: The tension was becoming unbearable, and I wanted to scream.
sentences.chinese: 这种紧张变得难以忍受，我真想大声尖叫。

sentences.english: Muscle tension can be a sign of stress.
sentences.chinese: 肌肉紧张可能是压力大的迹象。

sentences.english: This wire will take 50 pounds tension.
sentences.chinese: 这种金属线能承受50磅的张力。

detailed_translations.english: a nervous worried feeling that makes it impossible for you to relax

name: haul
trans: 拖，拉；用力拖拉；努力得到的结果；捕获物；一网捕获的鱼量；拖运距离

sentences.english: the steam locomotive which hauled the train
sentences.chinese: 拖动火车的蒸汽机车

sentences.english: I hauled the door shut behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我用力拽上了门。

detailed_translations.english: to pull something heavy with a continuous steady movement

detailed_translations.chinese: 拖， 拉， 托运； 一次获得的数量
detailed_translations.english: the amount of fish caught when fishing with a net

sentences.english: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
sentences.chinese: 大雨和洪水淹死了许多家畜。

detailed_translations.english: animals such as cows and sheep that are kept on a farm

sentences.english: Lindsay, like his films, is hard to categorize.
sentences.chinese: 就像他演的电影难于归类一样，很难说林赛属于哪一类演员。

sentences.english: Make a list of your child's toys and then categorize them as sociable or antisocial.
sentences.chinese: 把你孩子的玩具列个清单，然后将之分为交际型和非交际型。

detailed_translations.english: If you categorize people or things, you divide them into sets or you say which set they belong to

name: misery
trans: 痛苦，悲惨；不幸；苦恼；穷困

sentences.english: What we are witnessing here is human misery on a vast scale.
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里所目睹的情景是许许多多的人都生活困苦。

sentences.english: the misery of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 失业的痛苦

sentences.english: the miseries of war
sentences.chinese: 战争造成的苦难

detailed_translations.english: great suffering that is caused for example by being very poor or very sick

sentences.english: A lion’s head was among the trophies of his African trip.
sentences.chinese: 他非洲之行的战利品之一是个狮头。

detailed_translations.english: something that you keep to prove your success in something, especially in war or hunting

sentences.english: Drivers coming in the opposite direction swerved to avoid the bodies.
sentences.chinese: 从反方向过来的司机们突然转向以避开这些尸体。

sentences.english: He swung the car to the left and that swerve saved Malone's life.
sentences.chinese: 他把车猛转向左边，那一转救了马隆的命。

detailed_translations.english: to make a sudden sideways movement while moving forwards, usually in order to avoid hitting something
Swerve is also a noun

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to make certain that something will happen properly

sentences.english: We went out in spite of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下着雨，我们还是出去了。

sentences.english: Kelly loved her husband in spite of the fact that he drank too much.
sentences.chinese: 虽然丈夫酗酒，凯莉仍然爱着他。

sentences.english: She broke it just out of spite.
sentences.chinese: 她就是出于恶意把它打破的。

sentences.english: The neighbours throw things over the garden wall just to spite us.
sentences.chinese: 邻居把东西扔过花园围墙，故意和我们作对。

sentences.english: My grandmother taught me how to knit.
sentences.chinese: 我祖母教过我编织。

sentences.english: She’s knitting a sweater.
sentences.chinese: 她在织毛衣。

detailed_translations.english: to make clothing out of wool, using two knitting needles

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

sentences.chinese: 你想让我把花盆里的土都吃了还是咋地？

sentences.english: He might as well plant an oak in a flowerpot, and expect it to thrive, as imagine he can restore her to vigour in the soil of his shallow cares!
sentences.chinese: 他与其想象他能在他那浮浅的照料中使她恢复精力，还不如说正像把一棵橡树种在一个花盆里！

detailed_translations.english: a plastic or clay pot in which you grow plants

sentences.english: Work will commence on the new building immediately.
sentences.chinese: 新大楼即将破土动工。

detailed_translations.english: to begin or to start something

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: liquor
trans: 酒，含酒精饮料；溶液；液体；烈酒

sentences.english: The room was filled with cases of liquor.
sentences.chinese: 房间里满是一箱箱的烈性酒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 酒，含酒精饮料；溶液；液体；烈酒

sentences.english: Bob was forced to leave the car at the roadside and run for help.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃被迫把车停在路边，跑去求助。

detailed_translations.english: the edge of the road

sentences.english: Something scared him. Probably your ugly mug !
sentences.chinese: 什么东西吓着他了，很可能是你这张丑八怪的脸！

detailed_translations.english: a face
to make silly expressions with your face or behave in a silly way, especially for a photograph or in a play

sentences.english: The risks can be so complex that banks hire mathematicians to assess them.
sentences.chinese: 这类风险可以是如此复杂以至于银行雇佣数学家们去评估它们。

detailed_translations.english: someone who studies or teaches mathematics, or is a specialist in mathematics

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

sentences.english: Fuel was rationed during the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争期间，燃油定量供应。

detailed_translations.english: to control the supply of something because there is not enough
a fixed amount of something that people are allowed to have when there is not enough, for example during a war

sentences.english: They were still driving away at the encyclopaedia.
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在孜孜不倦地编写那部百科全书。

sentences.english: I might do an eighth book for charity, a kind of encyclopaedia of the world so that I could use all the extra material that's not in the books ... we'll see!
sentences.chinese: 我可能出于慈善的目的写第八本书，大概是有关这个世界的百科全书，这样我可以使用书中没能出现的所有额外材料······敬请期待！

sentences.english: An encyclopaedia's-worth of knowledge feels trivialised when it can be generated with just a few strokes on the keyboard, just as the live chatter of the world becomes so much waste paper.
sentences.chinese: 当仅靠敲打几下键盘就能创作出那样的作品时，一种百科全书式的学问感瞬间变得微不足道，正如同那对这个世界鲜活的唠叨变成这里的一堆废纸那样。

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

sentences.english: At 17 she found her true vocation as a writer.
sentences.chinese: 17岁时她找到了自己真正的使命——当一名作家。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of work that you feel is right for you

name: cadet
trans: 幼子，次子；实习生；候补军官；陆海军官学校的学员

sentences.english: ...army cadets.
sentences.chinese: …陆军军校学员们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼子，次子；实习生；候补军官；陆海军官学校的学员
detailed_translations.english: someone who is training to be an officer in the army, navy,  air force  , or police

sentences.english: They feasted well into the afternoon on mutton and corn stew.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽情享用玉米炖羊肉，一直吃到下午。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尽情地吃， 宴饮； 参加宴会
detailed_translations.english: If you feast on a particular food, you eat a large amount of it with great enjoyment
a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

name: patent
trans: 授予专利；取得…的专利权

sentences.english: a patent lock
sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.english: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

detailed_translations.english: protected by a patent
A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

sentences.english: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.chinese: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青春期的； 青少年的
detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.
a young person, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, who is developing into an adult

sentences.english: The hotel has been renovated and redecorated.
sentences.chinese: 酒店已经翻新，并重新装饰。

detailed_translations.english: to repair a building or old furniture so that it is in good condition again

name: ammeter
trans: [电] 安培计；[电] 电流计

sentences.english: A shunt ammeter can be modeled as a voltmeter with a resistor across the input.
sentences.chinese: 分流型安培计可以看成是在其输入端跨接了电阻器的电压表。

sentences.chinese: 如果元件或材料发生击穿，全部电压都会加到安培计的输入端，从而可能将其损坏。

sentences.english: The effects of input capacitance on current measurements using a shunt type ammeter (Figure 2-49) are similar to those for voltage measurements.
sentences.chinese: 使用分流型安培计（图2-49）时，输入电容对电流测量的影响与电压测量时类似。

detailed_translations.chinese: [电] 安培计；[电] 电流计
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to measure the strength of an electric current

name: pottery

sentences.english: Native American pottery
sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的陶器

detailed_translations.english: objects made out of baked clay

sentences.english: Two or three fishing boats were moored alongside the pier.
sentences.chinese: 有两三艘渔船停泊在码头边。

sentences.english: Colliford is higher, right up on the moors.
sentences.chinese: 考里弗德更高，正好在荒野之上。

detailed_translations.english: to fasten a ship or boat to the land or to the bottom of the sea using ropes or an  anchor
A moor is an area of open and usually high land with poor soil that is covered mainly with grass and heather

name: distinguish
trans: 区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

trans: 唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声

sentences.english: She chattered away happily until she noticed I wasn’t listening.
sentences.chinese: 她开心地说个不停，直到发觉我没在听才停下来。

sentences.english: She chattered excitedly like a child.
sentences.chinese: 她像个孩子似的兴奋地讲个不停。

detailed_translations.chinese: 唠叨；喋喋不休；（动物等）吱吱叫
detailed_translations.english: to talk quickly in a friendly way without stopping, especially about things that are not serious or important

detailed_translations.chinese: 唠叨；饶舌；（动物的）啁啾声；潺潺流水声
detailed_translations.english: talk, especially about things that are not serious or important

name: beat
trans: 拍子；敲击；有规律的一连串敲打
筋疲力尽的；疲惫不堪的

sentences.english: Somebody was beating at the door.
sentences.chinese: 有人在打门。

sentences.chinese: 巴西队以1比2告负。

sentences.chinese: 工党在上一届选举中轻松击败保守党。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth many times, usually very hard

sentences.chinese: 他将螺钉与他前臂的一个小六边形纹身比了比，尺寸是一样的。

sentences.chinese: 工作时间每周不得超过42小时。

sentences.chinese: 他的表现出乎我们的预料。

sentences.chinese: 防暴警察超越了他们的权限。

detailed_translations.chinese: 超过,胜过；越出 (限制、规定)

sentences.chinese: 最高温度11摄氏度，即52华氏度。

detailed_translations.english: Celsius is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 0˚ and boils at 100˚

sentences.english: She suffered appalling injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她伤势非常严重。

sentences.english: He was kept in appalling conditions in prison.
sentences.chinese: 他被关在环境极其恶劣的监狱中。

detailed_translations.english: very unpleasant and shocking

trans: 拖车；[电视] 预告片；追踪者
乘拖车式活动房屋旅行

sentences.english: ...a misleadingly violent trailer for the film.
sentences.chinese: …一个让人误以为充斥暴力的电影预告片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拖车；[电视] 预告片；追踪者
detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that can be pulled behind another vehicle, used for carrying something heavy

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘拖车式活动房屋旅行

sentences.english: Use a rolling pin to flatten the dough.
sentences.chinese: 用擀面杖把面团擀平。

sentences.english: The land flattened out as we neared the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们接近海岸时，地势变平坦了。

使成脉络；象脉络般分布于

sentences.english: the pulmonary vein
sentences.chinese: 肺静脉

sentences.chinese: 他们接吻时她觉得热血沸腾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 血管；叶脉；[地质] 岩脉；纹理；翅脉；性情
detailed_translations.english: one of the tubes which carries blood to your heart from other parts of your body

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成脉络；象脉络般分布于

sentences.english: the beggars on the streets
sentences.chinese: 街头乞丐

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives by asking people for food and money
to make someone very poor

name: peppermint

detailed_translations.english: a plant with a strong taste and smell, often used in sweets

sentences.english: Your car was stolen at the police station! How ironic!
sentences.chinese: 你的车在警察局被偷！真让人哭笑不得！

sentences.english: It’s ironic that her husband smoked for thirty years, and yet she’s the one who died of lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 具有讽刺意味的是，她丈夫吸烟30年，而死于肺癌的却是她。

sentences.chinese: 影片中故事情节来了一个出乎意料的转折，最可信赖的人原来是小偷。

sentences.chinese: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.chinese: 打孔器

a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather
sentences.chinese: 极好的天气

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: produced by combining different artificial substances, rather than being naturally produced

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

sentences.english: She still spins the yarn and knits sweaters for her family.
sentences.chinese: 她仍在为她的家人纺线织毛衣。

detailed_translations.english: thick thread made of cotton or wool, which is used to knit things

sentences.english: The factory is an eyesore.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂很碍眼。

detailed_translations.english: something that is very ugly, especially a building surrounded by other things that are not ugly

sentences.english: A car drew up alongside .
sentences.chinese: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.english: Children’s prices are shown alongside adult prices.
sentences.chinese: 儿童票价标在成人票价旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to the side of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…旁边， 沿着…的边； 和…在一起

name: myth
trans: 神话；虚构的人，虚构的事

sentences.english: a book of Greek myths
sentences.chinese: 一本关于希腊神话的图书

sentences.english: the giants of myth and fairytale
sentences.chinese: 神话和童话里的巨人

detailed_translations.english: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events

sentences.english: The windows are cracked and covered in cobwebs.
sentences.chinese: 窗户裂开了，上面布满蜘蛛网。

detailed_translations.english: a net of sticky threads made by a  spider  to catch insects, that is inside a building and has not been removed

sentences.english: And let it direct your passion with reason, that your passion may live through its own daily resurrection, and like the phoenix rise above its own ashes.
sentences.chinese: 让你们的灵魂以理性引导热情的方向，这样你们的热情才会经历每日的复活，宛若凤凰从自己的灰烬中再生。

detailed_translations.english: a magic bird that is born from a fire, according to ancient stories

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

sentences.english: ...the two fundamentally opposed social systems, capitalism and socialism.
sentences.chinese: …两种根本对立的社会制度，资本主义与社会主义。

detailed_translations.english: an economic and political system in which businesses belong mostly to private owners, not to the government

name: err
trans: 犯错；做错；犯罪；走上歧途

sentences.english: It’s always best to err on the side of caution.
sentences.chinese: 过于谨慎永远比冒风险强。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯错；做错；犯罪；走上歧途
detailed_translations.english: to be more careful or safe than is necessary, in order to make sure that nothing bad happens

name: millennium
trans: 千年期，千禧年；一千年，千年纪念；太平盛世，黄金时代

sentences.english: people who have inhabited this land for millennia
sentences.chinese: 在这片土地上已经居住了数千年的人们

detailed_translations.chinese: 千年期，千禧年；一千年，千年纪念；太平盛世，黄金时代
detailed_translations.english: a period of 1,000 years

sentences.english: His 36 ft yacht sank suddenly last summer.
sentences.chinese: 他的36英尺游艇去年夏天突然沉没了。

detailed_translations.english: a large boat with a sail, used for pleasure or sport, especially one that has a place where you can sleep

sentences.english: These plants bloom in spring.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.english: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.english: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

detailed_translations.english: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open

detailed_translations.chinese: 花，开花，开花期；青春焕发
detailed_translations.english: a flower or flowers

name: layer
trans: 层，层次；膜；[植]压条；放置者，计划者
把…分层堆放；借助压条法；生根繁殖；将（头发）剪成不同层次

sentences.english: He pulled off layer upon layer of clothing (= many layers of clothing ).
sentences.chinese: 他把衣服一件件地脱掉。

detailed_translations.english: an amount or piece of a material or substance that covers a surface or that is between two other things

sentences.english: Ramps are needed at exits and entrances for wheelchair users.
sentences.chinese: 出入口处需有坡道供坐轮椅者使用。

detailed_translations.english: a slope that has been built to connect two places that are at different levels

name: board
trans: 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.english: Shelley and Byron were the sons of aristocrats while Keats was the son of an innkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 雪莱和拜伦是贵族子弟，而济慈只是一个旅馆老板的儿子。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or manages an inn

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

name: polar
trans: 极地的；两极的；正好相反的

sentences.english: Well, what is the equation of this circle in polar coordinates?
sentences.chinese: 那么，这个圆方程在极坐标系下相当于什么呢？

sentences.english: This image shows part of a polar crater that still holds on to some summer ice, as well as beautiful sand dunes sculpted by the wind.

sentences.chinese: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

detailed_translations.english: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it

name: gather
trans: 收集；收割；使…聚集；使…皱起

sentences.english: You two know each other, I gather.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们俩认识。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true because of what you have seen or heard

sentences.english: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.english: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.chinese: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

name: owl
trans: 猫头鹰；枭；惯于晚上活动的人

sentences.english: Some of the more extreme contacts give you "cat eyes" or how about "owl eyes"?
sentences.chinese: 一些更酷的隐形眼镜可以给你一双"猫眼"或者是"猫头鹰的眼睛"。

sentences.english: A great owl, with yellow sulphurous eyes, called to him by his name, but he made it no answer.
sentences.chinese: 一只长着黄色硫磺的巨大眼睛的猫头鹰，呼唤着他的名字，但他没有应答。

detailed_translations.english: a bird with large eyes that hunts at night

name: severely
trans: 严重地；严格地，严厉地；纯朴地

sentences.english: The town was severely damaged in the war.
sentences.chinese: 这座城镇在战争中遭到了严重破坏。

sentences.english: She’s now severely disabled.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是重度残疾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重地；严格地，严厉地；纯朴地
detailed_translations.english: very badly or to a great degree

name: emotional
trans: 情绪的；易激动的；感动人的

sentences.english: She provided emotional support at a very distressing time for me.
sentences.chinese: 在我非常痛苦的时候，她是我的情感支柱。

sentences.english: Ann suffered from depression and a number of other emotional problems.
sentences.chinese: 安患了抑郁症，还遇到一些其他的情绪问题。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional state of the patient
sentences.chinese: 患者的生理和情绪状态

sentences.english: The funeral was a very emotional experience for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 那次葬礼对我们大家来说都是一次无比伤感的经历。

sentences.english: He became very emotional when we had to leave.
sentences.chinese: 当我们不得不离开时，他非常伤感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情绪(上)的，情感(上)的；激起感情的； 敏感的；情绪激动的〔尤指哭泣〕
detailed_translations.english: relating to your feelings or how you control them

sentences.english: Any school trip requires careful planning.
sentences.chinese: 学校的任何出游活动都需要周密的安排。

detailed_translations.english: giving a lot of attention to details

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从； 忍受； 甘心
detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: mighty
trans: 有力的；强有力的；有势力的

sentences.english: the mighty Mississippi river
sentences.chinese: 浩荡的密西西比河

sentences.english: a mighty army
sentences.chinese: 强大的军队

detailed_translations.chinese: 有力的；强有力的；有势力的
detailed_translations.english: very strong and powerful, or very big and impressive
very

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: "If you can stop the enzymes involved in that process with a small molecule or chemical," says Dunman, "that chemical could be an antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: “如果能用一小分子或化学物质阻止这一酶的活性过程，”德明说，“这种化学物质就能够用来做抗生素。”

sentences.english: If we all recognize that antibiotic resistance is one of the greatest threats to public health that we face today, we have to do something about this.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们大家都能认识到耐抗生素（药性）已经成为我们今天面对的最大的公众健康威胁之一，我们就真的需要做点什么了。

detailed_translations.english: a drug that is used to kill  bacteria  and cure infections

sentences.english: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.chinese: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava is sometimes forced out

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.english: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits

name: playful
trans: 开玩笑的；幽默的；爱嬉戏的

sentences.english: a playful little dog
sentences.chinese: 活泼的小狗

sentences.english: Babies are playful and alert when they first wake up.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝们刚醒来的时候很好动，而且反应敏捷。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开玩笑的；幽默的；爱嬉戏的
detailed_translations.english: very active, happy, and wanting to have fun

name: temperate
trans: 温和的；适度的；有节制的

sentences.english: The Nile Valley keeps a temperate climate throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 尼罗河流域全年气候温和。

detailed_translations.chinese: 温和的；适度的；有节制的
detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is temperate is calm and sensible

sentences.english: He unpacked his bag.
sentences.chinese: 他打开了他的包。

detailed_translations.english: When you unpack a suitcase, box, or similar container, or you unpack the things inside it, you take the things out of the container

sentences.english: I deem it advisable to buy property now.
sentences.chinese: 我认为现在购置房地产是明智的。

sentences.english: It would't be advisable for us to kiss off their objections.
sentences.chinese: 对人家的意见不予理睬是不明智的。

sentences.english: A troubled hound was baying the moon.
sentences.chinese: 一条受惊不安的猎狗正在对月狂吠。

sentences.english: Our fox and hound find their long friendship thoroughly obliterated and end up trying to kill each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们的狐狸和猎狗发现他们的老交情彻底被毁了，最后居然要杀死对方。

detailed_translations.english: a dog that is fast and has a good sense of smell, used for hunting

sentences.english: a tradition that has little resonance in the 21st century
sentences.chinese: 在21世纪难以引起共鸣的传统

sentences.english: His words will have resonance for many musicians.
sentences.chinese: 他的话将在很多音乐家心里产生共鸣。

detailed_translations.english: the special meaning or importance that something has for you because it relates to your own experiences

sentences.english: This will limit the number of stray dogs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这将会减少流浪狗在这一区域的数量。

sentences.english: As for her personal safety, she said she isn't overly worried but does think about what a stray lunatic could do.
sentences.chinese: 至于她个人的安全，她说她并没有过度担心，但是她的确在考虑一个流浪疯子可以做些什么。

sentences.english: Then let's say you get into horrible, disastrous debt and have to go begging to the government, like a sad little stray.
sentences.chinese: 另外，比如说，你陷入了讨厌的、损失惨重的债务，而且必须像一个可怜的小流浪儿一样向政府祈求。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that is lost or has no home

sentences.english: ...flowering shrubs.
sentences.chinese: …开花的灌木。

detailed_translations.english: a small bush with several woody stems

sentences.english: He became a millionaire overnight.
sentences.chinese: 他一夜之间就成了百万富翁。

detailed_translations.english: suddenly or surprisingly quickly
happening during the night or for the night

sentences.english: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.chinese: 成年母牛头上长有角。

detailed_translations.english: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, used in the past for drinking from, carrying  gunpowder  etc

sentences.english: She’s a brilliant lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 她是位出色的演讲者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives lectures, especially in a university

sentences.english: a pictorial record of their journey
sentences.chinese: 他们旅程的照片记录

detailed_translations.english: using or relating to paintings, drawings, or photographs

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime
An innocent is someone who is innocent

sentences.english: a letter on hotel stationery
sentences.chinese: 用酒店信纸写的信

sentences.english: envelopes and other office stationery
sentences.chinese: 信封及其他办公文具

detailed_translations.english: paper for writing letters, usually with matching envelopes

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

sentences.english: ice chunks
sentences.chinese: 大冰块

detailed_translations.chinese: 厚片， 大块； 相当大的部分
detailed_translations.english: a large thick piece of something that does not have an even shape

name: tissue
trans: 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

name: troublemaker
trans: 捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人

sentences.english: The fair coordinator has been given powers to expel suspected troublemakers.
sentences.chinese: 那位公正的协调员已被赋予权力，以驱逐涉嫌闹事者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人
detailed_translations.english: If you refer to someone as a troublemaker, you mean that they cause unpleasantness, quarrels, or fights, especially by encouraging people to oppose authority

sentences.english: The kids all groaned when I switched off the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我关掉电视时，孩子们都发出不满的抱怨声。

sentences.english: Richard’s jokes make you groan rather than laugh.
sentences.chinese: 理查德的笑话让你哭笑不得。

detailed_translations.english: to make a long deep sound because you are in pain, upset, or disappointed, or because something is very enjoyable
a long deep sound that you make when you are in pain or do not want to do something

name: most
trans: 大部分的，多数的；最多的

sentences.english: Which class has the most children in it?
sentences.chinese: 哪个班级孩子最多？

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

detailed_translations.english: a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else
having the greatest amount of a particular quality

name: association
trans: 协会，联盟，社团；联合；联想

sentences.english: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship with a particular person, organization, group etc

name: blaze
trans: 在树皮上刻路标；公开宣布
火焰，烈火；光辉；情感爆发

sentences.english: Some 4,000 firefighters are battling the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 约有四千名消防人员正在与大火搏斗。

sentences.english: the blaze of light from the security lamps
sentences.chinese: 安全灯的强光

sentences.english: The room was warm, with a fire blazing in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 房间里暖融融的，壁炉里的火熊熊燃烧。

detailed_translations.english: a big dangerous fire – used especially in news reports
to burn very brightly and strongly

name: crusade
trans: 加入十字军；从事改革运动

sentences.english: Dante: I took up the crusade. The bishop assured us that our sins would be absolved.
sentences.chinese: 但丁： 我参与了十字军东征。主教向我们保证我们的罪会被赦免。

sentences.english: Hard to believe that a life of glamour and wealth would be able to rob Xuande of his noble ambitions and crusade to give peace and prosperity to the common people.
sentences.chinese: 很难相信一个生命充满魅力和财富的玄德会用抢和类似十字军东征的方式实现他高尚的抱负并给普通百姓带来安定与和平。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十字军东征， 宗教战争
detailed_translations.english: one of a series of wars fought in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries by Christian armies trying to take Palestine from the Muslims

sentences.english: Yeh, you marry them and u will get real good life such as cockroach for breakfast, scorpion for lunch and snake for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 耶，你要是和他们结婚，就可以过上真正的好生活，比如早餐吃蟑螂、午餐吃蝎子、晚餐吃蛇。

sentences.english: But such activity produces a healthy appetite and who could forgo the epicurean delight of fried scorpion, cockroach, grasshopper or locust stir-fry.
sentences.chinese: 但是这样的活动让胃口变得好起来。谁又能放弃油煎蝎子、蟑螂、蚱蜢和爆炒知了带来的口福之乐呢？

detailed_translations.english: a tropical animal like an insect, with a curving tail and a poisonous sting

name: thriller
trans: 惊险小说；使人毛骨悚然的东西；使人毛骨悚然的小说

sentences.english: ...a tense psychological thriller.
sentences.chinese: …一部紧张刺激的心理惊悚小说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 惊险小说；使人毛骨悚然的东西；使人毛骨悚然的小说
detailed_translations.english: a book or film that tells an exciting story about murder or crime

sentences.english: a look of complete disdain
sentences.chinese: 极为鄙视的样子

detailed_translations.english: a complete lack of respect that you show for someone or something because you think they are not important or good enough
to have no respect for someone or something, because you think they are not important or good enough

sentences.english: Long-term savers qualify for a cash bonus.
sentences.chinese: 长期储户可获现金红利。

sentences.english: Further additions to your pay may take the form of bonus payments.
sentences.chinese: 工资以外的钱可能以奖金的形式发放。

sentences.english: a Christmas bonus
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节奖金

sentences.english: Each worker receives an annual bonus.
sentences.chinese: 每个员工都可获得一笔年度奖金。

sentences.english: a £20,000 bonus
sentences.chinese: 一笔2万英镑的奖金

detailed_translations.english: money added to someone’s wages, especially as a reward for good work

sentences.english: The team’s hopes of playing in Europe suffered a setback last night.
sentences.chinese: 球队赴欧洲参加比赛的希望昨晚遇到了阻碍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挫折， 倒退， 失败
detailed_translations.english: a problem that delays or prevents progress, or makes things worse than they were

sentences.english: The town was isolated by the floods.
sentences.chinese: 洪水使该镇与外界隔绝。

sentences.english: The US has sought to isolate Cuba both economically and politically.
sentences.chinese: 美国一直想在经济和政治上孤立古巴。

detailed_translations.english: to separate one person, group, or thing from other people or things

name: unanimous
trans: 全体一致的；意见一致的；无异议的

sentences.english: It was decided by a unanimous vote that the school should close.
sentences.chinese: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.english: The decision to appoint Matt was almost unanimous.
sentences.chinese: 任命马特的决定几乎是一致通过的。

detailed_translations.english: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree

sentences.english: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.chinese: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.english: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

sentences.english: Ancient scrolls were found in caves by the Dead Sea.
sentences.chinese: 在死海边的洞穴里发现了古代的卷轴。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of paper that can be rolled up, and is used as an official document

name: industrial
trans: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的

sentences.english: By 1900, Britain was a mainly industrial society.
sentences.chinese: 到1900年英国已基本进入工业社会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to industry or the people working in it

name: welfare
trans: 福利；幸福；福利事业；安宁
福利的；接受社会救济的

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

sentences.english: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute (= established by law ) .
sentences.chinese: 保障消费者权益已有法律明文规定。

detailed_translations.english: a law passed by a parliament, council etc and formally written down

name: monarchy
trans: 君主政体；君主国；君主政治

sentences.english: the abolition of the monarchy
sentences.chinese: 君主制的废除

detailed_translations.chinese: 君主政体；君主国；君主政治
detailed_translations.english: the system in which a country is ruled by a king or queen

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。

detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
when someone moves for a short time in a particular direction

name: redeem
trans: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复

sentences.english: Olivier’s performance redeemed an otherwise second-rate play.
sentences.chinese: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复
detailed_translations.english: to make something less bad

sentences.english: a follower of Christ
sentences.chinese: 耶稣的门徒

detailed_translations.english: the man who is worshipped by Christians as the son of God

name: whip
trans: 抽打；煽动；搅打（蛋，奶油）；彻底击败
鞭子；抽打；车夫；[机] 搅拌器

sentences.english: He whipped the horse into a canter.
sentences.chinese: 他抽了一下鞭子，马儿就小跑起来。

sentences.english: The coachman cracked his whip and the carriage lurched forward.
sentences.chinese: 马车夫甩了一记响鞭，马车猛然向前冲去。

detailed_translations.english: to hit someone or something with a whip

trans: 部分重叠；部分的同时发生

sentences.chinese: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a shop that sells tobacco, cigarettes etc

detailed_translations.english: a considered opinion, reply, judgment etc is one that you have thought about carefully

sentences.english: The second decision in the flowchart asks if the package software is immediately useful.
sentences.chinese: 流程图中的第二个决策就是询问数据包软件是否能立刻起作用。

sentences.chinese: 在这个流程图中，您要做出的第一个决策就是战略和经费的重要区别。

sentences.chinese: 大多数 BPM 工具被视为绘制流程图的工具或根据业务需求建模的工作流建模器，以生成一些类似代码的实现构件。

name: hasty
trans: 轻率的；匆忙的；草率的；懈怠的

sentences.chinese: 他很快就对自己仓促作出的决定感到后悔了。

sentences.english: a hasty breakfast

sentences.english: It is believed that it inhibits an enzyme that promotes cell proliferation in tumours.
sentences.chinese: 据信它能抑制一种能在肿瘤中促进细胞增殖的酶的生成。

sentences.chinese: 这种酶在幼虫体内积累到一定浓度，就会变得有毒并杀死它们。

sentences.english: Apparently, though, CYP2E1 affects how sensitive the brain is to alcohol, perhaps because it —unlike the enzyme in the liver —generates free radicals, tiny molecules that can damage cells.
sentences.chinese: 虽然表面上是这样，CYP2E1却影响着大脑对酒精的敏感度，或许因为它—不像在肝脏中的酶—产生了自由基，能损害细胞的微小分子。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that is produced in a plant or animal, and helps chemical changes to take place in the plant or animal

sentences.english: The shorts are so small I can't fit my thighs into any of them.
sentences.chinese: 短裤太小了，我的大腿塞不进去。

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

sentences.chinese: 她完全有理由不信任他。

a feeling that you cannot trust someone

sentences.chinese: 他们在月光下沿路散步。

sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

sentences.chinese: 持久和平的前景难料。

sentences.chinese: 猎人在灌木丛中追踪那只受伤的美洲野牛。

sentences.chinese: 为了提醒美国公民保护环境，政府就发行了这种野牛镍币。

sentences.english: Humans then may develop living communities where the deer, buffalo, elk and bear, or elephant, giraffe and hippo freely roam again.
sentences.chinese: 或许有一天，人类会组织生活社区，在那里鹿、野牛、麋鹿、熊、大象、长颈鹿和河马会再一次自由倘佯。

detailed_translations.english: an African animal similar to a large cow with long curved horns

sentences.chinese: 胶水干透大约需要24小时。

sentences.chinese: 它在伊拉克成了畅销书，甚至被改编成了音乐剧，尽管其中有一幕令人惊恐且匪夷所思——其中有一个牧人和一头母熊的人兽交。

Pearl is used to describe something that looks like a pearl

sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.chinese: 如果这是定罪，那么它就是来自于上帝；如果是谴责，这就是来自撒旦。

sentences.chinese: 撒旦企图仿效这个秘密让我们感觉到特别，如同我们是秘密的一部分，隐藏在他的领域里。

sentences.chinese: 如果有被污染的血液残留在针的内孔或注射器里，然后有人使用它进行毒品注射的话，残留的血液可能会进入血液循环系统中。

sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

sentences.chinese: 她在人群中迷路了。

sentences.english: Economic recovery has so far been sluggish.

detailed_translations.chinese: 萧条的；迟钝的；行动迟缓的；懒惰的
detailed_translations.english: moving or reacting more slowly than normal

sentences.english: Police appealed for wit­nesses after a woman was kidnapped at gunpoint.
sentences.chinese: 一名妇女遭到持枪绑架，警方呼吁目击者挺身而出。

sentences.chinese: 牛奶桶

name: nasty

sentences.chinese: 坏脾气

sentences.chinese: 司机常有一个坏习惯，就是车开得离骑自行车的人太近。

sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.

name: item

sentences.chinese: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.chinese: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔尤指清单上、一群或一组事物中的〕一项，一件，一条
detailed_translations.english: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things

name: overdo
trans: 把…做得过分；使过于疲劳；对…表演过火；夸张

sentences.english: Analysts believe that worries about the economy are overdone.
sentences.chinese: 分析人士认为对经济的担忧有些过火了。

sentences.english: Use a few drawings and photographs, but don’t overdo it.
sentences.chinese: 可使用一些图画和照片，但不要太多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…做得过分；使过于疲劳；对…表演过火；夸张
detailed_translations.english: to do something more than is suitable or natural

name: disc
trans: 圆盘，[电子] 唱片（等于disk）

sentences.english: three keys attached to a metal disc
sentences.chinese: 穿在金属圆盘上的三把钥匙

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆盘，[电子] 唱片（等于disk）
detailed_translations.english: a round flat shape or object

sentences.english: Do this for all nodes in the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 对集群中的所有节点都这样做。

sentences.english: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.chinese: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.english: However, there are some problems in the cluster environment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在集群环境中却存在一些问题。

detailed_translations.english: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place

sentences.english: In the east there is the slightest glimmer of light.
sentences.chinese: 东方有一丝闪烁的微光。

detailed_translations.english: a light that is not very bright
to shine with a light that is not very bright

sentences.english: Jake stood shivering in the cold air.
sentences.chinese: 大冷天里，杰克站着冻得瑟瑟发抖。

sentences.english: A shiver ran through (= went through ) me.
sentences.chinese: 我浑身一阵颤抖。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly because you are cold or frightened
a slight shaking movement of your body caused by cold or fear

sentences.english: an inner room
sentences.chinese: 内室

sentences.english: inner London
sentences.chinese: 伦敦中心区

sentences.english: the inner ear
sentences.chinese: 内耳

sentences.english: Yoga gives me a sense of inner calm.
sentences.chinese: 练习瑜伽使我感到内心平和。

detailed_translations.english: on the inside or close to the centre of something

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.chinese: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: attempts to improve the image of the police
sentences.chinese: 提升警察形象的努力

sentences.english: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion people have of a person, organization, product etc, or the way a person, organization etc seems to be to the public

name: outstanding
trans: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: an accessory to murder
sentences.chinese: 谋杀案的帮凶

sentences.english: the accessory muscles of respiration
sentences.chinese: 副呼吸肌

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps a criminal, especially by helping them hide from the police
not the most important when compared to others

sentences.english: His headmaster agreed to act as his referee.
sentences.chinese: 他的校长同意做他的推荐人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who makes sure that the rules of a sport such as football,  basketball  , or  boxing  , are followed
to be the referee of a game

name: reef
trans: 暗礁；[地质] 矿脉；收帆

sentences.english: a proposal to protect several miles of thousand-year-old coral reef
sentences.chinese: 保护绵延数英里的千年古珊瑚礁的提案

detailed_translations.chinese: 暗礁；[地质] 矿脉；收帆
detailed_translations.english: a line of sharp rocks, often made of  coral  , or a raised area of sand near the surface of the sea
to tie up part of a sail in order to make it smaller

sentences.english: Only a handful of studies have analyzed the heart effects of smokeless tobacco, and the findings are not as strong as the researchers expected.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数的几个研究分析了无烟烟草对健康的影响，得出来的结并不如所预期的那样联系紧密。

sentences.english: If you smoke or use smokeless tobacco, your dentist or dental hygienist can show you where a sore, spot, patch or lump is most likely to appear.
sentences.chinese: 如果你吸烟或者无烟烟草，你的牙医或牙科保健师会告诉你哪里很可能会出现溃疡，斑片，碎屑或者肿块。

detailed_translations.english: tobacco that you chew rather than smoke

sentences.english: ...sheltering from a sudden downpour of rain.
sentences.chinese: …躲避一场突如其来的瓢泼大雨。

detailed_translations.english: a lot of rain that falls in a short time

sentences.english: favourable film reviews
sentences.chinese: 正面的影评

sentences.english: The response has been overwhelmingly favorable.
sentences.chinese: 回应是一边倒的肯定。

sentences.english: The disease spreads quickly under favourable conditions.
sentences.chinese: 这种病在合适的条件下会传播得很快。

detailed_translations.english: a favourable report, opinion, or reaction shows that you think that someone or something is good or that you agree with them

sentences.english: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.chinese: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.english: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.english: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.chinese: 医务人员中的良心危机

detailed_translations.english: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong

sentences.english: a politician of rare honesty and courage
sentences.chinese: 具备少见的诚实及勇气的政治家

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest

name: amiss
trans: 有毛病的，有缺陷的；出差错的

sentences.english: Their instincts warned them something was amiss.
sentences.chinese: 他们的直觉警告他们某些地方不对头。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有毛病的，有缺陷的；出差错的
detailed_translations.english: If you say that something is amiss, you mean there is something wrong

sentences.english: A deathly silence hung over the square.
sentences.chinese: 死一般的静寂笼罩着广场。

sentences.english: Bernadette turned deathly pale.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔纳黛特变得如死般地惨白。

detailed_translations.english: reminding you of death or of a dead body
If you say that someone is deathly pale or deathly still, you are emphasizing that they are very pale or still, like a dead person

sentences.english: I was under the delusion that he intended to marry me.
sentences.chinese: 我有一种错觉，他要娶我。

detailed_translations.english: a false belief about yourself or the situation you are in

sentences.english: You will be notified of any changes in the system.
sentences.chinese: 系统中有任何变化都会通知你。

sentences.english: In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
sentences.chinese: 8月份我们接到通知，说我们的文章不予采用。

detailed_translations.english: to formally or officially tell someone about something

name: evil
trans: 邪恶的；不幸的；有害的；讨厌的

sentences.english: She wanted to protect her children from the evils of the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.english: Poverty is one of the greatest social evils of our time.
sentences.chinese: 贫困是当代最大的社会弊端之一。

sentences.english: the evils of capitalism
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的种种祸害

sentences.english: There is too much evil in the world.
sentences.chinese: 世上的罪恶太多。

sentences.english: an evil dictator responsible for the deaths of millions
sentences.chinese: 对数百万人之死负责的邪恶独裁者

detailed_translations.english: something that is very bad or harmful
someone who is evil deliberately does very cruel things to harm other people

sentences.english: a young mother trying to control her offspring
sentences.chinese: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

detailed_translations.english: someone’s child or children – often used humorously

name: doubtless
trans: 无疑地；确定地；大概，多半

sentences.english: Doubtless there would be lots of rumours.
sentences.chinese: 无疑会谣言四起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无疑地；确定地；大概，多半
detailed_translations.english: used when saying that something is almost certain to happen or be true

sentences.english: She’s struggling to cope with the heavy workload .
sentences.chinese: 她在努力应付繁重的工作量。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of work that a person or organization has to do

name: threshold
trans: 入口；门槛；开始；极限；临界值

sentences.english: She opened the door and stepped across the threshold.
sentences.chinese: 她打开门，跨过门槛。

sentences.english: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 这种生物已濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: the entrance to a room or building, or the area of floor or ground at the entrance

sentences.english: a knight wearing a suit of armour
sentences.chinese: 全身披挂的骑士

detailed_translations.english: metal or leather clothing that protects your body, worn by soldiers in battles in past times

sentences.english: the company’s distribution depot
sentences.chinese: 公司的发货仓库

sentences.english: a fuel storage depot
sentences.chinese: 燃料储存仓库

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are stored until they are needed

name: legend
trans: 传奇；说明；图例；刻印文字

sentences.english: Local legend has it that (= says that ) the island was the original Garden of Eden.
sentences.chinese: 当地传说这个岛就是伊甸园的原型。

detailed_translations.english: an old, well-known story, often about brave people, adventures, or magical events

name: flute
trans: 长笛；【工程设计】(刀具的)出屑槽

sentences.english: The boy trilled on a flute.
sentences.chinese: 男孩在长笛上吹颤音。

sentences.english: He played a nice tune on the flute.
sentences.chinese: 他吹奏了一首优美的笛子曲。

sentences.english: A pipe organ gives much more volume than a violin or flute.
sentences.chinese: 管风琴发出的音量比小提琴或笛子都大。

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument like a thin pipe, that you play by holding it across your lips, blowing over a hole, and pressing down buttons with your fingers
a large metal musical instrument that you play by blowing into it and sliding a long tube in and out to change the notes

name: hinge
trans: 铰链，折叶；关键，转折点；枢要，中枢
用铰链连接；依…为转移；给…安装铰链；（门等）装有蝶铰

sentences.english: Your arm should hinge from the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂应该像从肩膀铰链住一般。

sentences.english: Each compartment should have a hinged seal door with a concealed or piano-type hinge .
sentences.chinese: 每个隔室应具有一个带暗装或钢琴型铰链的铰接密封门。

sentences.english: GATE: external direct (opposite side of the hinge). Flow direction should climb over the gasket side.
sentences.chinese: 浇口：外部方向（铰链对面）。流向须爬过衬垫侧。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal fastened to a door, lid etc that allows it to swing open and shut
to attach something, using a hinge

name: ideal
trans: 理想的；完美的；想象的；不切实际的

sentences.english: advice on how to reach your ideal weight
sentences.chinese: 如何达到理想体重的建议

sentences.english: The scheme offers an ideal opportunity for youngsters to get training.
sentences.chinese: 该计划为年轻人提供了获得培训的极好机会。

sentences.english: With so much rain, conditions are far from ideal.
sentences.chinese: 雨水这么多，天气情况很不理想。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve

name: duster
trans: 抹布，掸子；除尘器；打扫灰尘的人

detailed_translations.chinese: 抹布，掸子；除尘器；打扫灰尘的人
detailed_translations.english: a cloth for removing dust from furniture

sentences.english: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿在我们的挡风玻璃上画了一只鲜红的小熊。

sentences.english: As she was thrown forward, the cake went right through the windscreen and landed on the road.
sentences.chinese: 当她由于惯性向前一冲的时候，蛋糕被甩出了挡风玻璃，落到马路上。

sentences.english: A single piece of glass stretches from the hood to the rear, acting as hood, windscreen, roof, and rear window.
sentences.chinese: 一整块玻璃覆盖从引擎盖到车的后部，可以充当引擎盖，挡风玻璃，天窗和后窗。

detailed_translations.english: the large window at the front of a car, bus etc

name: preach
trans: 说教；讲道；鼓吹；传道；反复灌输

sentences.english: He traveled the southern states, preaching the gospel .
sentences.chinese: 他游历南方各州宣讲福音。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说教；讲道；鼓吹；传道；反复灌输
detailed_translations.english: to talk about a religious subject in a public place, especially in a church during a service

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

name: lobby
trans: 大厅；休息室；会客室；游说议员的团体

sentences.english: a hotel lobby
sentences.chinese: 宾馆大堂

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.chinese: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.english: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.chinese: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

name: poll
trans: 投票；民意测验；投票数；投票所
投票；剪短；对…进行民意测验；获得选票
无角的；剪过毛的；修过枝的

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

name: frugal
trans: 节俭的；朴素的；花钱少的

sentences.english: As children we were taught to be frugal and hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 我们小时候被教育要节俭和勤劳。

sentences.english: He led a remarkably frugal existence.
sentences.chinese: 他过着极其节俭的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 节俭的；朴素的；花钱少的
detailed_translations.english: careful to buy only what is necessary

name: reunite
trans: 使重聚；使再结合；使再联合

sentences.english: The band will reunite for a US tour.
sentences.chinese: 乐队将重聚作美国巡演。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使重聚；使再结合；使再联合
detailed_translations.english: to come together again or to bring people, parts of an organization, political party, or country together again

name: sullen
trans: 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的

sentences.english: Bill sat in sullen silence and refused to eat his lunch.
sentences.chinese: 比尔一声不响，闷闷不乐地坐着，不肯吃午饭。

sentences.english: a look of sullen resentment
sentences.chinese: 愤懑的眼神

detailed_translations.chinese: 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的
detailed_translations.english: angry and silent, especially because you feel life has been unfair to you

name: community
trans: 社区；[生态] 群落；共同体；团体

sentences.english: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.english: This dish is good for dinner parties because much of the preparation can be done ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜适合宴会，因为很多准备工作可以事先做好。

sentences.english: Plans for the new school are now in preparation .
sentences.chinese: 新学校的设计图正在绘制中。

sentences.english: a course in food service and food preparation
sentences.chinese: 餐饮服务和备菜课程

detailed_translations.english: the process of preparing something or preparing for something

sentences.english: an eminent lawyer
sentences.chinese: 杰出的律师

detailed_translations.english: an eminent person is famous, important, and respected

name: partial
trans: 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的

sentences.english: The exhibition was only a partial success.
sentences.chinese: 那次展会只获得部分成功。

sentences.english: a partial solution to traffic congestion in Oxford
sentences.chinese: 部分解决牛津地区交通拥堵问题的方法

sentences.english: I might be accused of being partial.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会被人指责是偏袒的。

detailed_translations.english: not complete

name: hydroelectric
trans: 水力发电的；水电治疗的

sentences.english: a huge hydroelectric power station
sentences.chinese: 大型水力发电站

detailed_translations.chinese: 水力发电的；水电治疗的
detailed_translations.english: using water power to produce electricity

name: protective
trans: 防护的；关切保护的；保护贸易的

sentences.english: protective clothing
sentences.chinese: 防护服

sentences.english: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜提供了一层抵挡阳光中有害光线的防护层。

detailed_translations.english: used or intended for protection

sentences.english: His speech laid the groundwork for independence.
sentences.chinese: 他的演说为独立打下了基础。

sentences.english: Much of the groundwork has already been done .
sentences.chinese: 准备工作已经完成了很多。

detailed_translations.english: something that has to happen before an activity or plan can be successful

name: genre
trans: 类型；种类；体裁；样式；流派；风俗画
风俗画的；以日常情景为主题的

sentences.english: a literary genre
sentences.chinese: 文学体裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 类型；种类；体裁；样式；流派；风俗画
detailed_translations.english: a particular type of art, writing, music etc, which has certain features that all examples of this type share

detailed_translations.chinese: 风俗画的；以日常情景为主题的

name: fade
trans: [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

sentences.english: A fund was set up as a goodwill gesture to survivors and their families.
sentences.chinese: 成立了基金会，以向幸存者及其家属作出善意的表示。

detailed_translations.english: kind feelings towards or between people and a willingness to be helpful

sentences.english: an insincere smile
sentences.chinese: 虚伪的微笑

sentences.english: an offer which she knew to be impractical and insincere
sentences.chinese: 一个她认为不实际、不真诚的建议

detailed_translations.english: pretending to be pleased, sympathetic etc, especially by saying nice things, but not really meaning what you say

sentences.english: The persimmon tastes puckery.
sentences.chinese: 这柿子涩。

sentences.english: Outside, a flock of white birds dip over gray-tiled rooftops and persimmon trees.
