sentences.chinese: 火箭的前部脱落了。

sentences.english: Do you have any children’s portions?
sentences.chinese: 你们有儿童餐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a part of something larger, especially a part that is different from the other parts

name: solar
trans: 太阳的；日光的；利用太阳光的；与太阳相关的

sentences.english: a solar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 日食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sun

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: gong
trans: 鸣锣传唤；鸣锣命令驾车者停驶

detailed_translations.english: a round piece of metal that hangs in a frame and which you hit with a stick to give a deep ringing sound. It is used as a musical instrument or to announce that a meal is ready.

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸣锣传唤；鸣锣命令驾车者停驶

name: mystery
trans: 秘密，谜；神秘，神秘的事物；推理小说，推理剧；常作 mysteries 秘技，秘诀

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: glance
trans: 扫视，匆匆一看；反光；瞥闪，瞥见

sentences.english: Wyatt glanced around the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 怀亚特环视了一下餐馆。

sentences.english: Emily glanced over her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉回头看了一眼。

sentences.english: He gave her a quick glance and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速地瞥了她一眼，笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to quickly look at someone or something
a quick look

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

name: discard
trans: 抛弃；被丢弃的东西或人

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.chinese: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
detailed_translations.english: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

sentences.english: Andy reeled away from the bar and knocked over his stool.
sentences.chinese: 安迪踉跄着离开吧台，把凳子都撞倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 摇摇晃晃地移动，蹒跚；眩晕，发昏
detailed_translations.english: to walk in an unsteady way and almost fall over, as if you are drunk
a round object onto which film, wire, a special string for fishing etc can be wound
to wind (cotton, thread, etc) onto a reel

name: hobbyist
trans: 业余爱好者；沉溺于某嗜好之人

detailed_translations.chinese: 业余爱好者；沉溺于某嗜好之人
detailed_translations.english: You can refer to person who is very interested in a particular hobby and spends a lot of time on it as a hobbyist

name: script
trans: 脚本；手迹；书写用的字母

sentences.english: a diary entry written in neat black script
sentences.chinese: 用工整的黑色字写下的一则日记

sentences.english: ...James Cameron, who scripted and directed both films.
sentences.chinese: …为这两部电影写脚本并执导的詹姆斯·卡梅伦。

detailed_translations.chinese: 脚本；手迹；书写用的字母
detailed_translations.english: writing done by hand
The person who scripts a movie or a radio or television play writes it
a high and very steep rough rock or mass of rocks

name: reduction
trans: 减少；下降；缩小；还原反应

sentences.english: strategies for noise reduction
sentences.chinese: 减少噪音的对策

sentences.english: The company promised they would make no staff reductions for at least two years.
sentences.chinese: 公司承诺至少两年不裁员。

detailed_translations.english: a decrease in the size, price, or amount of something, or the act of decreasing something

sentences.english: The landscape has remained predominantly rural in appearance.
sentences.chinese: 该风景看上去主要保留了乡村风貌。

detailed_translations.english: You use predominantly to indicate which feature or quality is most noticeable in a situation

name: dressing
trans: 穿衣；加工；调味品；装饰；梳理
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

sentences.english: a vinaigrette dressing
sentences.chinese: 醋油调味料

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿衣；加工；调味品；装饰；梳理
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

sentences.english: The car won’t start. Do you think it’s an omen?
sentences.chinese: 汽车发动不起来。你觉得这是某种预兆吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sign of what will happen in the future

name: flaw
trans: 瑕疵，缺点；一阵狂风；短暂的风暴；裂缝，裂纹
使生裂缝，使有裂纹；使无效；使有缺陷

sentences.english: A design flaw (= a mistake or weakness in the way something was made ) caused the engine to explode.
sentences.chinese: 一个设计缺陷导致了引擎爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake, mark, or weakness that makes something imperfect

sentences.english: He was standing on the porch, waving as we drove away.
sentences.chinese: 我们开车离开的时候，他站在走廊上向我们挥手。

detailed_translations.english: an entrance covered by a roof outside the front door of a house or church

sentences.english: ...a government decision earlier this month to deport all illegal immigrants.
sentences.chinese: …本月早些时候政府一项驱逐所有非法移民的决定。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone leave a country and return to the country they came from, especially because they do not have a legal right to stay

name: compute
trans: 计算；估算；用计算机计算

sentences.english: Final results had not yet been computed.
sentences.chinese: 最终的结果还未计算出来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算；估算；用计算机计算
detailed_translations.english: to calculate a result, answer, sum etc

sentences.english: The cat dug his claws into my leg.
sentences.chinese: 猫的爪子抓进了我的腿中。

sentences.english: lobster claws
sentences.chinese: 龙虾的螯

detailed_translations.english: a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects
to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers

sentences.english: Excuse me while I change the baby’s nappy.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我给宝宝换一下尿布。

sentences.english: a dirty nappy
sentences.chinese: 脏尿布

detailed_translations.english: a piece of soft cloth or paper worn by a baby between its legs and fastened around its waist to hold its liquid and solid waste

name: disable
trans: 使失去能力；使残废；使无资格

sentences.english: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.chinese: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

detailed_translations.english: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life

name: effective
trans: 有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended
the piece of thread in a candle, that burns when you light it

sentences.english: Would you go to church or the synagogue or the mosque?
sentences.chinese: 你会去教堂，犹太教会，或者清真寺吗？

sentences.english: If there is to be a new city church, they argue, then why not a mosque?
sentences.chinese: 他们置疑说，如果要修建一个新的城市教堂为什么不能是座清真寺呢？

sentences.english: Tell the congregation of a church or mosque that existence is too vulgar an attribute to fasten onto their God, and they will brand you an atheist.
sentences.chinese: 告诉教堂或清真寺的会众们，存在，是强加在他们的上帝身上的一种过于庸俗的属性，他们将会指责你为无神论者。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which Muslims worship

sentences.english: a wealthy patron
sentences.chinese: 富有的赞助人

detailed_translations.english: someone who supports the activities of an organization, for example by giving money

name: duty
trans: 责任；[税收] 关税；职务

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

sentences.english: Father Doyle moved to a new parish.
sentences.chinese: 多伊尔神父调到了新的教区。

detailed_translations.english: the area that a priest in some Christian churches is responsible for

sentences.english: He swished the tops off weeds with a sickle.
sentences.chinese: 他挥动镰刀嗖嗖地割掉了杂草的草尖。

sentences.english: Family history. If your family has a history of an inherited anemia, such as sickle cell anemia, you also may be at increased risk of the condition.
sentences.chinese: 家族史如果你有亲人患有遗传性的贫血，比如镰刀细胞性贫血，那么你患有这种贫血的风险也会比一般人高。

sentences.english: The flag flutters everywhere, beside red banners with the hammer and sickle, a reminder that the country is one of the last to uphold Marxist values.
sentences.chinese: 国旗各处飘扬，伴随着印有镰刀斧头的红色横幅，提醒人们，这是最后一个坚持马克思主义价值观的国家。

detailed_translations.english: a tool with a blade in the shape of a hook, used for cutting wheat or long grass

name: oblige
trans: 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成；义务

sentences.english: Mr. Oakley has always been ready to oblige journalists with information.
sentences.chinese: 奥克利先生一直乐于提供信息帮助记者们。

sentences.english: We called up three economists to ask how to eliminate the deficit and they obliged with very straightforward answers.
sentences.chinese: 我们致电3位经济学家咨询消除赤字的方法，他们满足了我们的要求，给出了非常直接的答复。

detailed_translations.english: To oblige someone means to be helpful to them by doing what they have asked you to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 迫使；施恩于，帮…的忙；使感激
detailed_translations.english: if you are obliged to do something, you have to do it because the situation, the law, a duty etc makes it necessary

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

sentences.english: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.chinese: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

sentences.english: The registration fee is $75.
sentences.chinese: 注册费是75美元。

detailed_translations.english: the act of recording names and details on an official list

sentences.english: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.chinese: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.english: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.english: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.chinese: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.english: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.chinese: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

detailed_translations.english: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

sentences.english: The violet eyes, Taylor's white skin and raven hair may be captivating on their own, but Etcoff said that it was the combination of them that likely boosted her allure.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒蓝紫色的眼睛、白皙的皮肤和乌黑的头发本身就颇为迷人，但是在艾科夫看来，很可能是所有这些的结合，更增添了她的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: a large shiny black bird
raven hair is black and shiny
to seize or seek (plunder, prey, etc)

name: locomotive
trans: 火车头的；运动的；移动的

sentences.english: How many coaches can that locomotive pull?
sentences.chinese: 那个机车能拉多少节客车?。

sentences.english: A chamber, such as the furnace of a steam locomotive, in which fuel is burned.
sentences.chinese: 火箱，燃烧室一种燃料在里面燃烧的内室，例如蒸汽机车的燃烧室。

sentences.english: Displaying some of his versatility, here Iqbal shows an HO electric locomotive, track and signals he made.
sentences.chinese: 展示了他的一些多才多艺，在这里伊克巴尔显示，一何电力机车，轨道和信号，他所作的。

detailed_translations.english: a railway engine

sentences.english: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.chinese: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

detailed_translations.english: to print a book, story, newspaper article etc again
an occasion when more copies of a book are printed because all the copies of it have been sold

name: batter
trans: 击球手；（用鸡蛋、牛奶、面粉等调成的）糊状物；墙面的倾斜

sentences.english: Fry the fish in batter.
sentences.chinese: 把鱼蘸上面糊油炸。

sentences.english: pancake batter
sentences.chinese: 煎饼面糊

detailed_translations.chinese: 击球手；（用鸡蛋、牛奶、面粉等调成的）糊状物；墙面的倾斜
detailed_translations.english: a mixture of flour, eggs, milk etc, used in cooking and for making bread, cakes etc
to hit someone or something many times, in a way that hurts or damages them

sentences.english: Patrick sat gazing into space  (= looking straight in front, not at any particular person or thing ).
sentences.chinese: 帕特里克坐着，茫然地看着前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a long time, giving it all your attention, often without realizing you are doing so
a long steady look

name: statistics
trans: 统计；统计学；[统计] 统计资料

sentences.english: crime/unemployment, etc. statistics
sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of information shown in numbers

sentences.english: the opening chords of 'Stairway to Heaven'
sentences.chinese: 《通往天堂的阶梯》的开篇和弦

detailed_translations.english: a combination of several musical notes that are played at the same time and sound pleasant together

sentences.english: Mike went to fetch a bottle of wine from the cooler.
sentences.chinese: 迈克从冰桶里拿来一瓶酒。

detailed_translations.english: a container in which something, especially drinks, is cooled or kept cold

name: guillotine
trans: 断头台；切纸机；截止辩论以付表决法
于断头台斩首；终止辩论将议案付诸表决

sentences.english: Opposition leaders accused the government of introducing a guillotine motion to stifle debate.
sentences.chinese: 反对党领袖指责政府推行规定辩论时限的动议来压制辩论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 断头台；切纸机；截止辩论以付表决法
detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to cut off the heads of criminals, especially in France in the past

detailed_translations.chinese: 于断头台斩首；终止辩论将议案付诸表决
detailed_translations.english: to cut off someone’s head using a guillotine

sentences.english: Alan stretched and yawned.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

sentences.english: Kay shook her head and stifled a yawn (= tried to stop yawning ).
sentences.chinese: 凯摇摇头，忍住呵欠。

detailed_translations.english: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
an act of yawning

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.english: There is the bird, sitting on a twig halfway up the tree.
sentences.chinese: 鸟儿在那里，栖息在树中段的一根细枝上。

detailed_translations.english: to understand (something)
a small very thin stem of wood that grows from a branch on a tree
a private room or place for sleeping on a ship

sentences.english: Police managed to subdue the angry crowd.
sentences.chinese: 警察设法控制住了愤怒的人群。

sentences.english: Napoleon subdued much of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑控制了大半个欧洲。

detailed_translations.english: to defeat or control a person or group, especially using force

sentences.english: Sometimes the instruments are read-only, like your speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 有些仪器是只读的，就像速度计一样；

sentences.english: Once the speedometer is placed in a conventional sedan, the system test for the sedan would not road test it at 160 miles/hour.
sentences.chinese: 但是一旦将速度计安装到家用轿车里面时，对于整部轿车的系统测试将不会在公路上测试160英里/小时这一速度值。

sentences.english: A population study from Finland has developed a fascinating scale that can predict 20-year risk for dementia –sort of a brain aging speedometer.
sentences.chinese: 一项芬兰的人口学研究给出了一个引人注目的量表，能够预计20年罹患失忆症的风险，即一种大脑衰老的速度计。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument in a vehicle that shows how fast it is going

name: settee
trans: 有靠背的长椅；中型沙发

sentences.english: The photo of the settee is in a little nook on the side of the staircase.
sentences.chinese: 这张靠背沙发的照片是楼梯边上的一个角落。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有靠背的长椅；中型沙发
detailed_translations.english: a long comfortable seat with a back and usually with arms, for more than one person to sit on

sentences.english: It is placed in the stern of a boat.
sentences.chinese: 它被放在船尾。

detailed_translations.english: the back of a ship
serious and strict, and showing strong disapproval of someone’s behaviour

sentences.english: Nor is the detriment only to the US industry .
sentences.chinese: 受到损害的不仅仅是美国轮胎行业。

sentences.english: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.chinese: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

sentences.english: Governments which ignore them, however, do so to their own detriment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，政府忽略这些因素就是损害自己的利益。

detailed_translations.english: harm or damage

sentences.english: a criminal prosecution
sentences.chinese: 刑事诉讼

sentences.english: The evidence is not sufficient to bring a prosecution against him.
sentences.chinese: 现有证据不足以对他提出起诉。

detailed_translations.english: when a charge is made against someone for a crime, or when someone is judged for a crime in a court of law

sentences.english: the tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林

sentences.english: tropical fruit
sentences.chinese: 热带水果

detailed_translations.english: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world

sentences.english: We followed the footprints of a deer in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我们追踪雪地里一头鹿的足迹。

detailed_translations.english: a mark made by a foot or shoe

name: recruit
trans: 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

name: thereby
trans: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

sentences.english: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。

detailed_translations.english: with the result that something else happens

sentences.english: a secretarial course
sentences.chinese: 秘书课程

sentences.english: secretarial college
sentences.chinese: 秘书专科学校

detailed_translations.english: relating to the work of a secretary

name: spa
trans: 矿泉；温泉浴场；矿泉治疗地

sentences.english: a historic spa town
sentences.chinese: 一座历史上有名的矿泉城镇

detailed_translations.chinese: 矿泉；温泉浴场；矿泉治疗地
detailed_translations.english: a place where the water has special minerals in it, and where people go to improve their health by drinking the water or swimming in it

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

sentences.english: ...Iran and other Muslim countries.
sentences.chinese: …伊朗和其他穆斯林国家。

detailed_translations.english: A Muslim is someone who believes in Islam and lives according to its rules
Muslim means relating to Islam or Muslims

sentences.english: We met, the Scotsman and I, one summer at the Edinburgh Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在爱丁堡艺术节的一个夏天，我与那个苏格兰人相遇了。

sentences.english: Founded by the Scotsman David Dunbar Buick in 1899, the upscale Buick brand was the first marketed by what would eventually become General Motors.
sentences.chinese: 由苏格兰人大卫·邓巴·别克于1899年创立，别克这个高端的品牌是由如今的通用公司首先投入市场的。

sentences.english: The Scotsman William "Captain" Kidd seizes his biggest prize, the loot-laden Armenian ship Cara Merchant, off the coast of India.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰人“船长基德”抓住了他人生中最大的一笔横财，印度附近海域中装满了战利品的美国船“加拉商人”号。

detailed_translations.english: a man from Scotland

sentences.english: glistening black hair
sentences.chinese: 乌黑发亮的头发

detailed_translations.english: to shine and look wet or oily

sentences.english: a hormonal imbalance
sentences.chinese: 内分泌失调

detailed_translations.english: a lack of a fair or correct balance between two things, which results in problems or unfairness

sentences.english: Each flowerbed is populated with those classic English garden decorations: little statues of gnomes.
sentences.chinese: 他们各自的花圃开的花布满了那些传统英式花园，这些花就是地精的塑像。

sentences.english: In one of our attacks the regiment ran into an almost insurmountable obstacle: enemy fire coming from an emplacement camouflaged as a flowerbed was mowing down the lines of our infantrymen.
sentences.chinese: 在一次进攻中我们团遇到了一个几乎无法逾越的障碍：敌人从伪装成花圃的掩体中向我军步兵射击打乱了其队形。

detailed_translations.english: an area of ground, for example in a garden, in which flowers are grown

sentences.english: a large, placid baby
sentences.chinese: 一个胖胖的、安静的婴儿

sentences.english: She sat still, placid and waiting.
sentences.chinese: 她安安静静坐着等候。

detailed_translations.english: a placid person does not often get angry or upset and does not usually mind doing what other people want them to

sentences.english: Their attempts to speak to him were frustrated by the guards.
sentences.chinese: 他们想跟他说话，但被警卫拦住了。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent someone’s plans, efforts, or attempts from succeeding

name: equally
trans: 同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地

sentences.english: You must have a good education, but practical training is equally important.
sentences.chinese: 你必须接受良好的教育，不过实际培训也同样重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地
detailed_translations.english: to the same degree or amount

name: willow
trans: [林] 柳树；[木] 柳木制品

sentences.english: The willow trees cast their shadows all around.
sentences.chinese: 柳荫匝地。

sentences.english: He worships that big willow south of the house.
sentences.chinese: 他很崇拜房子南面的那颗大柳树。

sentences.english: He has also captured pollen from alder, pine and willow.
sentences.chinese: 他还从桤树、松树和柳树上捕捉到了花粉。

detailed_translations.english: a type of tree that has long thin branches and grows near water, or the wood from this tree

sentences.english: That chair doesn’t look very sturdy.
sentences.chinese: 那把椅子看上去不太结实。

sentences.english: They kept up a sturdy opposition to the plan.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直坚决反对那项计划。

detailed_translations.english: (of an object) strong and not easily damaged

sentences.english: The company has consolidated its position as the country’s leading gas supplier.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司巩固了作为该国主要煤气供应商的地位。

sentences.english: We consolidate information from a wide range of sources.
sentences.chinese: 我们把来自各种渠道的信息加以汇总。

detailed_translations.english: to strengthen the position of power or success that you have, so that it becomes more effective or continues for longer

name: pane
trans: 窗格；边；面；窗格玻璃；嵌板

sentences.english: a window pane
sentences.chinese: 一块窗玻璃

sentences.english: a pane of glass
sentences.chinese: 一块玻璃

detailed_translations.chinese: 窗格；边；面；窗格玻璃；嵌板
detailed_translations.english: a piece of glass used in a window or door

sentences.english: The area is renowned for its Romanesque churches.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区以其罗马式教堂闻名。

detailed_translations.english: known and admired by a lot of people, especially for a special skill, achievement, or quality

sentences.english: It invariably rains when I go there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次去那儿都下雨。

sentences.english: The security guards were invariably ex-servicemen.
sentences.chinese: 保安人员毫无例外地都是退伍军人。

detailed_translations.english: always

name: baggy
trans: 袋状的，膨胀的；宽松而下垂的

sentences.english: She was wearing jeans and a baggy T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一条牛仔裤和一件宽松的T恤衫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 袋状的，膨胀的；宽松而下垂的
detailed_translations.english: baggy clothes are big and do not fit tightly on your body

sentences.english: ...writing implements.
sentences.chinese: …书写用具。

sentences.english: We have decided to implement the committee’s recommendations in full.
sentences.chinese: 我们已决定全面实施委员会提出的建议。

detailed_translations.english: a tool, especially one used for outdoor physical work
to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen

sentences.english: The term "industrial democracy" is often used as a synonym for worker participation.
sentences.chinese: “工业民主”这一词语常被用作“工人参与”的同义词。

detailed_translations.english: a word with the same meaning as another word in the same language

sentences.english: People in manual occupations have a lower life expectancy.
sentences.chinese: 干体力活的人预期寿命较短。

detailed_translations.english: manual work involves using your hands or your physical strength rather than your mind
a book that gives instructions about how to do something, especially how to use a machine

sentences.english: The palace has now been restored to its original splendour.
sentences.chinese: 宫殿如今已恢复了它昔日的辉煌。

sentences.english: Tests of the manure showed a high ammonia content.
sentences.chinese: 这种肥料经过化验表明氨的含量很高。

sentences.english: The red and white upper clouds are particles of frozen ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 最上面的是红白色的、由冻结的氨粒构成的云。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of relative humidity on indoor concentrations of formaldehyde and ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察相对湿度对装修后室内空气中甲醛和氨浓度的影响。

name: sample
trans: 试样的，样品的；作为例子的

sentences.english: They took a blood sample to test for hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.english: a small part or amount of something that is examined in order to find out something about the whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验
detailed_translations.english: to taste food or drink in order to see what it is like

name: pizza
trans: 比萨饼（一种涂有乳酪核番茄酱的意大利式有馅烘饼）

sentences.english: ...the last piece of pizza.
sentences.chinese: …最后一块比萨饼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比萨饼（一种涂有乳酪核番茄酱的意大利式有馅烘饼）
detailed_translations.english: A pizza is a flat, round piece of dough covered with tomatoes, cheese, and other toppings, and then baked in an oven

sentences.english: Clothes mould in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.english: Such oil can contain carcinogens and toxic mould.
sentences.chinese: 这种油可能包含致癌物和有毒的霉。

detailed_translations.english: to become or cause to become covered with this growth
a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container

name: emphatic
trans: 着重的；加强语气的；显著的

sentences.english: an emphatic denial
sentences.chinese: 断然否认

detailed_translations.english: expressing an opinion, idea etc in a clear, strong way to show its importance

sentences.english: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.chinese: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.english: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.chinese: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉，它会重新生出一条尾巴。

sentences.chinese: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

detailed_translations.english: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail

name: cellular
trans: 细胞的；多孔的；由细胞组成的

sentences.chinese: 蜂窝式网络系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 细胞的；多孔的；由细胞组成的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of or relating to the cells of plants or animals

sentences.english: Gosh, it’s cold.
sentences.chinese: 啊呀，真冷啊。

detailed_translations.english: used to express surprise

trans: 潦草写成的东西；潦草的写法；杂文

sentences.english: I couldn’t read his scribble.
sentences.chinese: 我看不懂他潦草的字。

detailed_translations.chinese: 潦草写成的东西；潦草的写法；杂文
detailed_translations.english: untidy writing that is difficult to read
to write something quickly and untidily

sentences.english: Sarah hung her coat on the peg.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉把外套挂在衣钩上。

sentences.english: a table fitted together with pegs
sentences.chinese: 一张用钉子钉起来的桌子

sentences.english: a pattern made with coloured pegs on a board
sentences.chinese: 木板上彩钉构成的图形

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of wood, metal, or plastic that is attached to a wall or fits into a hole, used especially to hang things on or to fasten things together

sentences.english: "Shall I put him in a box for you?"the saleslady asked.
sentences.chinese: “我帮你把他放到盒子里，好吗？” 女售货员问道。

sentences.english: She found a job as a saleslady at the Ludwig-Baumann furniture store in the Bronx and was able to hold it through the Depression.
sentences.chinese: 她在布朗克斯区的路德维格-鲍曼家具店找了份售货员的工作，并且靠这份工作度过了整个大萧条时期。

name: seasoning
trans: 调味品；佐料；风干；增添趣味的东西

sentences.english: Mix the meat with the onion, carrot, and some seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 将肉、洋葱、胡萝卜及一些佐料拌在一起。

detailed_translations.chinese: 调味品；佐料；风干；增添趣味的东西
detailed_translations.english: salt, pepper, spices etc that give food a more interesting taste

sentences.english: a parade to commemorate the town’s bicentenary
sentences.chinese: 庆祝该镇建立200周年的游行

detailed_translations.english: to do something to show that you remember and respect someone important or an important event in the past

name: immeasurable
trans: 无限的；[数] 不可计量的；不能测量的

sentences.english: The refugee problem has now reached immeasurable proportions.
sentences.chinese: 难民问题现在已经到了无法估量的程度。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is too big or too extreme to be measured

name: harry
trans: (Harry)人名；(英)哈里，哈丽(女名)(教名Henry、Harriet的昵称)

sentences.english: He is increasingly active in harrying the government in late-night debates.
sentences.chinese: 他愈来愈积极地在午夜辩论节目中不断攻击政府。

detailed_translations.english: to keep asking someone for something in a way that is upsetting or annoying

detailed_translations.chinese: (Harry)人名；(英)哈里，哈丽(女名)(教名Henry、Harriet的昵称)

detailed_translations.english: a bed for a baby or young child, with bars on the side to stop the baby from falling out
to copy school or college work dishonestly from someone else

sentences.english: He accused me of slandering him and trying to undermine his position.
sentences.chinese: 他指控我诽谤他并想削弱他的地位。

detailed_translations.english: to say false things about someone in order to damage other people’s good opinion of them
a false spoken statement about someone, intended to damage the good opinion that people have of that person

name: dinosaur
trans: 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

sentences.english: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.english: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

sentences.english: The sky darkened and a few drops of rain fell.
sentences.chinese: 天色变暗，落下几滴雨来。

sentences.english: a darkened theater
sentences.chinese: 变暗了的剧院

sentences.english: The evening shadows darkened the room.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕使房间暗了下来。

detailed_translations.english: to become dark, or to make something dark

name: feeder
trans: 支线；喂食器；奶瓶；饲养员；支流

sentences.english: The feeder fed new feed to pigs so that they laid on fresh.
sentences.chinese: 饲养员用新饲料喂猪好让它们长肉。

sentences.english: Both females and the baby were eating carrots near the feeder, absolutely calm, one by one, trying to feel the taste of each carrot.
sentences.chinese: 雌性大猩猩和幼年猩猩则在饲养员旁边一根接一根地平静进食。 像是在试图品尝每根萝卜的味道。

name: illiterate
trans: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的

sentences.english: It was an illiterate letter, full of mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 这封信文笔拙劣，错误连篇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 文盲的；不识字的；没受教育的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is illiterate has not learned to read or write
someone who has not learned to read or write

name: inward
trans: 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的

sentences.english: a feeling of inward satisfaction
sentences.chinese: 内心的满足感

sentences.english: inward panic
sentences.chinese: 内心的恐慌

sentences.english: He pushed open the front door, which swung inward with a groan.
sentences.chinese: 他推开前门，门呀的一声向里开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的
detailed_translations.english: felt or experienced in your own mind but not expressed to other people
If something moves or faces inward, it moves or faces toward the inside or centre of something

name: trafficker
trans: 贩子；商人；从事违法勾当者

sentences.english: They have been arrested as suspected drug traffickers.
sentences.chinese: 他们因涉嫌贩毒而被捕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 贩子；商人；从事违法勾当者
detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and sells illegal goods, especially drugs

sentences.english: This sofa is so uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

sentences.english: The brewery will remain open to the public throughout its ten-year transformation, so the architects wanted to test how a construction site can be used for public activities.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒厂在它转型的十年内都将持续对公众开放，所以建筑师希望测试一个施工基地怎样才能用于公共活动。

sentences.english: The Muller family have been making specialist beers at their brewery in Munster for 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 马勒家族已经在他们位于明斯特的啤酒厂专门从事啤酒酿制达200年之久。

detailed_translations.english: a place where beer is made, or a company that makes beer

name: inert
trans: [化学] 惰性的；呆滞的；迟缓的；无效的

sentences.english: inert gases
sentences.chinese: 惰性气体

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 惰性的；呆滞的；迟缓的；无效的
detailed_translations.english: not producing a chemical reaction when combined with other substances

name: vague
trans: 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的

sentences.english: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不明确的； 含糊的； 暧昧的
detailed_translations.english: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean

name: epidemic
trans: 传染病；流行病；风尚等的流行

sentences.english: Over 500 people died during last year’s flu epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 去年流感大暴发期间有五百多人死亡。

detailed_translations.english: a large number of cases of a disease that happen at the same time

name: reconcile
trans: 使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从

sentences.english: The possibility remains that the two theories may be reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 这两种理论仍是有可能协调的。

sentences.english: The pair were reconciled after Jackson made a public apology.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊公开道歉之后，这两个人又言归于好了。

detailed_translations.english: if you reconcile two ideas, situations, or facts, you find a way in which they can both be true or acceptable

name: slope
trans: 斜坡；倾斜；斜率；扛枪姿势

sentences.english: a steep slope
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

sentences.english: a gentle
sentences.chinese: 缓坡

sentences.english: She looked back up the grassy slope.
sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.english: a pleasant garden that slopes down to the river
sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

detailed_translations.english: a piece of ground or a surface that slopes
if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other

name: enlighten
trans: 启发，启蒙；教导，开导；照耀

sentences.english: Baldwin enlightened her as to the nature of the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德温给她讲解了这个实验的性质。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone more knowledge and greater understanding about something

sentences.english: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
sentences.chinese: 他通过调制解调器把作品发给他的出版商。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment that allows information from one computer to be sent along telephone wires to another computer

sentences.english: Jonson was his political heir as leader of the party.
sentences.chinese: 琼森是他的政治接班人，他将担任该党派的领袖。

detailed_translations.english: the person who has the legal right to receive the property or title of another person when they die

name: hippie
trans: 嬉皮士；嬉皮模样的年青人

sentences.english: He was a hippie: who else drops out of Reed?
sentences.chinese: 他曾是个嬉皮士：不然谁会从里德学院退学？

sentences.english: The truth is, if one probes just beneath the surface of the bucolic hippie image, one finds a puzzling infatuation with certain forms of outrè technology reaching well back into the early sixties.
sentences.chinese: 事实是，如果我们深入乡野嬉皮士形象的表面之下，便可以发现他们有一种令人费解的、对某些奇怪技术的迷恋，这种迷恋最早始于六十年代初期。

sentences.english: Clean-cut and favoring a coat and tie these days, he described himself as a ragged “hippie” during his time in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 现在的他轮廓清秀，喜欢穿西服打领带，而在欧洲时，他形容自己是个衣衫褴褛的“嬉皮士”。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially in the 1960s, who opposed violence peacefully and often wore unusual clothes, had long hair, and took drugs for pleasure

sentences.english: There’s a big difference between knowing that something is true, and being able to prove it.
sentences.chinese: 知道什么正确与能够证明它正确，这之间有很大的不同。

sentences.english: There's not much difference in price between the two computers.
sentences.chinese: 这两种计算机价格上没有多大的差别。

sentences.english: We have our differences , but she's still my sister.
sentences.chinese: 我们之间虽然不和，但她仍旧是我的妹妹。

detailed_translations.english: a way in which two or more people or things are not like each other

sentences.english: Jackson spent the day meeting with local religious and civic leaders.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊那天与当地的宗教领袖和市领导会面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to a town or city

sentences.english: a colourful tapestry depicting a hunting scene
sentences.chinese: 描绘狩猎场面的彩色壁毯

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of heavy cloth on which coloured threads are woven to produce a picture, pattern etc

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

sentences.english: Barbara answered with her customary enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉以惯有的热情作了回答。

detailed_translations.english: something that is customary is normal because it is the way something is usually done

sentences.english: If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，我们可用铝代钢。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al

name: inlet
trans: 引进; 嵌入; 插入;

sentences.english: There are several sheltered inlets along the coast.
sentences.chinese: 沿着海岸线有几处有天然屏障的水湾。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow area of water that reaches from the sea or a lake into the land

detailed_translations.chinese: 引进; 嵌入; 插入;

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

sentences.english: Marx and his followers were convinced that capitalism would destroy itself.
sentences.chinese: 马克思及其支持者确信资本主义将自我毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: someone who believes in a particular system of ideas, or who supports a leader who teaches these ideas
an impostor

name: escort
trans: 陪同；护航舰；护卫队；护送者

sentences.english: The shipment was escorted by guards.
sentences.chinese: 货物的运输由卫兵护送。

sentences.english: a police escort
sentences.chinese: 警察护卫队

detailed_translations.english: to take someone somewhere, especially when you are protecting or guarding them
a person or a group of people or vehicles that go with someone in order to protect or guard them

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

name: extension
trans: 延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机

sentences.english: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of many telephone lines connected to a central system in a large building, which all have different numbers

sentences.english: The town lies at longitude 12˚ east.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇位于东经12度。

detailed_translations.english: the distance east or west of a particular  meridian (= imaginary line along the Earth’s surface from the North Pole to the South Pole )  , measured in degrees

sentences.english: the firm clasp of her hand
sentences.chinese: 她有力的握手

detailed_translations.english: a small metal object for fastening a bag, belt, piece of jewellery etc
to hold someone or something tightly, closing your fingers or arms around them

sentences.english: You have excelled yourself with the new exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 你新办的这次展览特别成功。

detailed_translations.english: to do something very well, or much better than most people
to do something very well, or much better than most people

name: masculine
trans: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的

sentences.english: They’re nice curtains, but I’d prefer something a little more masculine.
sentences.chinese: 这些窗帘很好，但我更喜欢男性化一点的。

sentences.english: She has a very masculine voice.
sentences.chinese: 她的嗓音非常男性化。

sentences.english: Hunting was a typically masculine occupation.
sentences.chinese: 打猎是典型的男性消遣活动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 男性的；阳性的；男子气概的
detailed_translations.english: having qualities considered to be typical of men or of what men do

name: scaffolding
trans: 脚手架；搭脚手架的材料

sentences.english: Workers have erected scaffolding around the base of the tower below the roadway.
sentences.chinese: 工人们已经在车行道下的塔基四周竖起了脚手架。

detailed_translations.english: a set of poles and boards that are built into a structure for workers to stand on when they are working on the outside of a building

name: ballot
trans: 投票；投票用纸；投票总数

sentences.english: The party leader is elected by secret ballot .
sentences.chinese: 政党领袖是通过无记名投票选举产生的。

sentences.english: Workers at the plant held a ballot and rejected strike action.
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人举行投票，否决了罢工行动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投票；投票用纸；投票总数
detailed_translations.english: a system of voting, usually in secret, or an occasion when you vote in this way
to ask someone to vote for something

name: outdated
trans: 使过时（outdate的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: outdated teaching methods
sentences.chinese: 不合时宜的教学方法

sentences.english: a factory with outdated equipment
sentences.chinese: 设备陈旧的工厂

sentences.english: His writing style is now boring and outdated.
sentences.chinese: 他的写作风格如今已显得乏味而过时了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is outdated, it is no longer considered useful or effective, because something more modern exists

sentences.english: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.chinese: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

sentences.english: The girls were awed by the splendour of the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 女孩们对大教堂的宏伟气势大为惊叹。

detailed_translations.english: if you are awed by someone or something, you feel great respect and liking for them, and are often slightly afraid of them
a feeling of great respect and liking for someone or something

sentences.english: Two men were attempting to scythe the long grass.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人正试图割掉疯长的草。

detailed_translations.english: a farming tool that has a long curved blade attached to a long wooden handle, and is used to cut grain or long grass
to cut with a scythe

name: equipped
trans: 装备；预备（equip的过去分词）；整装

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备；预备（equip的过去分词）；整装

sentences.english: the Christian promise of eternal life
sentences.chinese: 基督教承诺的永生

sentences.english: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.chinese: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for ever and having no end

name: agony
trans: 苦恼；极大的痛苦；临死的挣扎

sentences.english: the agony of arthritis
sentences.chinese: 关节炎的剧烈疼痛

detailed_translations.english: very severe pain

sentences.english: the Campbell clan
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔家族

sentences.english: warring clans
sentences.chinese: 交战的各氏族

detailed_translations.english: a large group of families who often share the same name

name: chin
trans: 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作
用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作

sentences.english: He rubbed his chin thoughtfully.
sentences.chinese: 他若有所思地抚摸着下巴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下巴；聊天；引体向上动作
detailed_translations.english: the front part of your face below your mouth

detailed_translations.chinese: 用下巴夹住；与…聊天；在单杠上作引体向上动作

name: trivial
trans: 不重要的，琐碎的；琐细的

sentences.english: a trivial detail
sentences.chinese: 细枝末节

sentences.english: I know it sounds trivial , but I'm worried about it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道这事听起来微不足道，但我还是放心不下。

detailed_translations.english: not important or serious; not worth considering

sentences.english: bathroom tiles
sentences.chinese: 浴室瓷砖

detailed_translations.english: a flat square piece of baked clay or other material, used for covering walls, floors etc

name: drugstore
trans: [药] 药房（常兼售化妆品、杂志等杂货）；（美）杂货店

detailed_translations.chinese: [药] 药房（常兼售化妆品、杂志等杂货）；（美）杂货店
detailed_translations.english: a shop where you can buy medicines, beauty products etc

sentences.english: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

detailed_translations.english: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop

sentences.english: They were guarding the bridge, so we forded the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们当时守着那座桥，我们就涉水过了那条河。

detailed_translations.english: a place where a river is not deep, so that you can walk or drive across it
If you ford a river or stream, you cross it without using a boat, usually at a shallow point

name: blister
trans: 水泡；水疱；气泡；砂眼；起泡剂
使起水泡；痛打；猛烈抨击

sentences.english: New shoes always give me blisters.
sentences.chinese: 我穿新鞋脚上总是起泡。

detailed_translations.chinese: 水泡；水疱；气泡；砂眼；起泡剂
detailed_translations.english: a swelling on your skin containing clear liquid, caused, for example, by a burn or continuous rubbing

detailed_translations.chinese: 使起水泡；痛打；猛烈抨击
detailed_translations.english: to develop blisters, or make blisters form

name: imperative
trans: 必要的，不可避免的；紧急的；命令的，专横的；势在必行的；[语]祈使的
必要的事；命令；需要；规则；[语]祈使语气

sentences.english: It is imperative that politicians should be good communicators.
sentences.chinese: 政治家应该是很好的沟通者，这很重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的；紧急的，极重要的；命令的
detailed_translations.english: extremely important and needing to be done or dealt with immediately

detailed_translations.chinese: 必要的事， 必须完成的事； 【语】祈使语气
detailed_translations.english: something that must be done urgently

name: heritage
trans: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权

sentences.english: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权
detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

sentences.english: I shave my armpits every couple of days.
sentences.chinese: 我每隔几天刮一次腋毛。

detailed_translations.english: the hollow place under your arm where it joins your body

sentences.english: care for pregnant women
sentences.chinese: 孕妇保健

sentences.english: I knew right away that I was pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 我立即明白我怀孕了。

sentences.english: I thought I was too old to get pregnant .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己年龄太大，已经不能怀孕了。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to get her pregnant (= make her pregnant ) .
sentences.chinese: 我没想让她怀孕。

sentences.english: His wife was heavily pregnant (= almost ready to give birth ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子即将临产。

detailed_translations.english: if a woman or female animal is pregnant, she has an unborn baby growing inside her body

name: locker
trans: 柜，箱；上锁的人；有锁的橱柜；锁扣装置；有锁的存物柜

sentences.english: a meat locker
sentences.chinese: 肉类冷藏间

detailed_translations.chinese: 柜，箱；上锁的人；有锁的橱柜；锁扣装置；有锁的存物柜
detailed_translations.english: a small cupboard with a lock in a school, sports building, office etc, where you can leave clothes or possessions while you do something

name: uncompromising
trans: 不妥协的，不让步的；坚定的

sentences.english: an uncompromising opponent of democratic reform
sentences.chinese: 民主改革的坚决反对者

detailed_translations.chinese: 不妥协的，不让步的；坚定的
detailed_translations.english: unwilling to change your opinions or intentions

name: communicative
trans: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的

sentences.english: Tom wasn’t very communicative, and kept himself to himself.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆不大善于言谈，不喜欢与人交往。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交际的；爱说话的，健谈的；无隐讳交谈的
detailed_translations.english: able to talk easily to other people

name: gramophone
trans: 用唱片录制；用唱机播放

sentences.english: ...a wind-up gramophone with a big horn.
sentences.chinese: ...一台带大喇叭的发条式留声机。

detailed_translations.english: a  record player

detailed_translations.chinese: 用唱片录制；用唱机播放

name: oyster
trans: 牡蛎，[无脊椎] 蚝；沉默寡言的人

sentences.english: How can I pull the pearl from the burning oyster?
sentences.chinese: 我怎样做才能算是从燃烧的牡蛎中取出珍珠？

detailed_translations.english: a type of shellfish that can be eaten cooked or uncooked, and that produces a jewel called a pearl

sentences.english: a dogged determination to succeed
sentences.chinese: 不屈不挠的成功决心

detailed_translations.english: dogged behaviour shows that you are very determined to continue doing something

name: rhetoric
trans: 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻

sentences.english: The speech was dismissed by some people as merely political rhetoric .
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为这场演讲只是华而不实的政治空谈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 修辞，修辞学；华丽的词藻
detailed_translations.english: the art of speaking or writing to persuade or influence people

sentences.english: After the game the victors returned in triumph.
sentences.chinese: 比赛结束后，得胜者凯旋。

detailed_translations.english: the winner of a battle, game, competition etc

sentences.english: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.chinese: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.english: a neglected garden
sentences.chinese: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.english: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to look after someone or something properly

sentences.english: I hereby agree to the conditions of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 我同意此合同的条款，特此声明。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of this statement – used in official situations

name: bossy
trans: 专横的；浮雕装饰的；爱指挥他人的

sentences.english: her loud bossy sister
sentences.chinese: 她那个爱管人的大嗓门姐姐

detailed_translations.chinese: 专横的；浮雕装饰的；爱指挥他人的
detailed_translations.english: always telling other people what to do, in a way that is annoying

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: latter
trans: 后者的；近来的；后面的；较后的

sentences.english: In the latter case, buyers pay a 15% commission.
sentences.chinese: 在后一种情况下，买家付15%的佣金。

detailed_translations.english: being the second of two people or things, or the last in a list just mentioned

sentences.english: ...the cosmic laws governing our world.
sentences.chinese: …主宰我们世界的宇宙法则。

detailed_translations.english: relating to space or the universe

sentences.english: We found further scientific evidence for this theory.
sentences.chinese: 我们找到了进一步证实这种理论的科学根据。

sentences.english: I was asked to give evidence (= to say what I knew, describe what I had seen, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 我被要求出庭作证。

detailed_translations.english: facts or signs that show clearly that something exists or is true

name: statement
trans: 声明；陈述，叙述；报表，清单

sentences.english: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.chinese: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陈述， 声明； 结算单， 报表
detailed_translations.english: something you say or write, especially publicly or officially, to let people know your intentions or opinions, or to record facts

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.english: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.chinese: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

detailed_translations.english: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

name: systematic
trans: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的；一贯的，惯常的

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

name: radically
trans: 根本上；彻底地；以激进的方式

name: capacity
trans: 能力；容量；资格，地位；生产力

sentences.english: The room had seating capacity for about 80.
sentences.chinese: 这房间能坐80个人左右。

sentences.english: The orchestra played to a capacity crowd (= the largest number of people who can fit into a hall, theatre etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 管弦乐队为满场的观众演奏。

sentences.english: All the hotels were filled to capacity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的宾馆都住满了。

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning
sentences.chinese: 孩子的学习能力

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space a container, room etc has to hold things or people

sentences.english: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.chinese: 教师和学生都反对这些措施。

detailed_translations.english: all the teachers in a university

name: skirmish
trans: 小冲突，小规模战斗；小争论
进行小规模战斗；发生小争论

sentences.english: Border skirmishes between India and Pakistan were common.
sentences.chinese: 印巴边境的小冲突曾经是常有的事。

sentences.english: They were skirmishing close to the minefield now.
sentences.chinese: 他们当时正在雷区附近小规模交火。

detailed_translations.chinese: 小冲突，小规模战斗；小争论
detailed_translations.english: a fight between small groups of soldiers, ships etc, especially one that happens away from the main part of a battle – used in news reports

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行小规模战斗；发生小争论
detailed_translations.english: If people skirmish, they fight

name: syntax
trans: 语法；句法；有秩序的排列

sentences.english: His grammar and syntax, both in oral and written expression, were much better than the average.
sentences.chinese: 无论在口头还是笔头上，他的语法和句法都非常出众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 语法；句法；有秩序的排列
detailed_translations.english: the way words are arranged to form sentences or phrases, or the rules of grammar which control this

sentences.english: a parachute jump
sentences.chinese: 跳伞

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment fastened to the back of people who jump out of planes, which makes them fall slowly and safely to the ground
to jump from a plane using a parachute

sentences.english: 10,000 men had volunteered by the end of September; thereafter, approximately 1,000 men enlisted each month.
sentences.chinese: 到9月底时已有10,000人志愿参军，此后，每个月差不多有1,000人应征入伍。

sentences.english: Sophie was born in France, but shortly thereafter her family moved to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 索菲出生在法国，但不久以后她全家就移居到了美国。

detailed_translations.english: after a particular event or time

sentences.english: We need an electrician to fix our light switch.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个电工来修理电灯开关。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to connect or repair electrical wires or equipment

sentences.english: If an entry is only sparsely filled in, the results may look more like Figure 8.
sentences.chinese: 如果一个条目只填充了稀疏的内容，那么结果看上去就像图 8 那样。

sentences.chinese: 相反地，用户邮件文件稀疏地分布在集群内的部分服务器中。

sentences.english: A carpet of deep green covers most of the rugged landscape, but patches of bare or sparsely vegetated ground occur around the fringes of this image.
sentences.chinese: 一片深绿色的地毯覆盖了大部分崎岖的地表，而片片裸地或植被稀疏的地块散布于图片边缘。

name: bubble
trans: 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶

sentences.english: When water boils, bubbles rise to the surface.
sentences.chinese: 水烧开时，水面会冒泡泡。

sentences.english: soap bubbles
sentences.chinese: 肥皂泡

sentences.english: She was blowing bubbles in her milk with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 她用吸管在牛奶里吹泡泡。

sentences.english: Heat the cheese until it bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 把奶酪加热到冒泡。

sentences.english: ...the Baltic seaport of Rostock.
sentences.chinese: ...波罗的海沿岸的海港城市罗斯托克。

detailed_translations.english: a large town on or near a coast, with a harbour that big ships can use

name: entitle
trans: 称做…；定名为…；给…称号；使…有权利

sentences.english: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.chinese: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the official right to do or have something

sentences.english: Employees must familiarize themselves with the health and safety manual.
sentences.chinese: 雇员必须熟悉健康和安全手册。

detailed_translations.english: to learn about something so that you understand it, or to teach someone else about something so that they understand it

name: improper
trans: 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的

sentences.english: 25 officers were investigated following allegations of improper conduct.
sentences.chinese: 25名警官被指控行为不当而受到调查。

detailed_translations.english: dishonest, illegal, or morally wrong

sentences.english: measures to stimulate economic growth
sentences.chinese: 刺激经济增长的措施

detailed_translations.english: an increase in amount, number, or size

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

name: squad
trans: 班；小队；五人组（篮球队的非正式说法）

sentences.english: a drill squad
sentences.chinese: 操练小队

detailed_translations.chinese: 班；小队；五人组（篮球队的非正式说法）
detailed_translations.english: a small group of soldiers working together as a unit

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

name: fashion
trans: 时尚；时装；样式；时髦人物

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

sentences.english: His name has come up in the rumour mill as a possible director for the project.
sentences.chinese: 有谣传说他可能出任这个项目的主管。

detailed_translations.english: information or a story that is passed from one person to another and which may or may not be true

sentences.english: The plane started taxiing down the runway.
sentences.chinese: 该飞机开始沿跑道滑行。

detailed_translations.english: a long specially prepared hard surface like a road on which aircraft land and take off

sentences.english: Drums are basic to African rhythm.
sentences.chinese: 非洲音乐节奏少不了鼓。

sentences.english: complicated dance rhythms
sentences.chinese: 复杂的舞蹈节奏

sentences.english: the body’s natural rhythms
sentences.chinese: 人体的自然节律

detailed_translations.english: a regular repeated pattern of sounds or movements

name: toast
trans: 干杯；烤面包；接受敬酒的人；（在某领域）广受赞誉的人

sentences.english: I had a piece of toast for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我早饭吃了一片吐司。

sentences.english: I toasted the cheese sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 我烤了干酪三明治。

detailed_translations.english: bread that has been heated so that it is brown on both sides and no longer soft
to make bread or other food brown by placing it close to heat

name: cursor
trans: 光标；（计算尺的）[计] 游标，指针

sentences.english: He moves the cursor, clicks the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 他移动光标，点击鼠标。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that can be moved around a computer screen to show where you are working

sentences.english: ...a group of ten-year-old schoolboys.
sentences.chinese: …一群10岁的男学生。

detailed_translations.english: a boy attending school

name: hop
trans: 蹦跳,跳跃；跳舞；一次飞行的距离

sentences.english: a little girl hopping and skipping
sentences.chinese: 一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩

detailed_translations.chinese: 单足跳跃，单足跳行；齐足跳跃，齐足跳行
detailed_translations.english: to move by jumping on one foot
to move by jumping on one foot
a short jump

sentences.english: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.chinese: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搬， 转移； 调动， 转学； 转让， 过户； 乘车， 转乘
detailed_translations.english: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

name: frosting
trans: 结霜；霜状白糖；无光泽面；去光泽
以霜覆盖；冻坏；起霜（frost的ing形式）

sentences.english: ...a huge pastry with green frosting on it.
sentences.chinese: …一个撒有绿色糖霜的大型酥饼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结霜；霜状白糖；无光泽面；去光泽
detailed_translations.english: a sweet substance put on cakes and made from powdery sugar and butter

detailed_translations.chinese: 以霜覆盖；冻坏；起霜（frost的ing形式）

sentences.english: The peasants leaned down to reap wheat.
sentences.chinese: 农民们俯身收割小麦。

detailed_translations.english: to cut and collect a crop of grain

name: chance
trans: 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: Wicky peeked at John's flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

sentences.english: Do you have a flashlight?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有手电筒？

detailed_translations.english: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand

name: snobbery
trans: 势利，谄上欺下；摆绅士架子；势利的行为或语言

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["intellectual snobbery"]}
sentences.chinese: 知识分子的自命不凡

detailed_translations.chinese: 势利，谄上欺下；摆绅士架子；势利的行为或语言
detailed_translations.english: behaviour or attitudes which show that you think you are better than other people, because you belong to a higher social class or know much more than they do – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: It is beyond dispute that advances in medicine have enabled people to live longer.
sentences.chinese: 医学的发展使人们更加长寿，这是无可置疑的。

sentences.english: What happened next is hotly disputed .
sentences.chinese: 关于后来发生了什么，争论很激烈。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument or disagreement
to argue or disagree with someone

sentences.english: Inside the cover someone had inscribed the words ‘To Thomas, with love’.
sentences.chinese: 在书的内封上，有人题写了“托马斯惠存”几个字。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully cut, print, or write words on something, especially on the surface of a stone or coin

name: championship
trans: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位

sentences.english: the women’s figure skating championships
sentences.chinese: 女子花样滑冰锦标赛

sentences.english: Greece won the European Championship.
sentences.chinese: 希腊队赢得了欧洲锦标赛的冠军。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位
detailed_translations.english: a competition to find which player, team etc is the best in a particular sport

sentences.english: The boy sings bass in the choir.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在合唱团里唱男低音。

sentences.english: You joined the choir, but you don't even like singing. What is your design anyway?
sentences.chinese: 你根本不喜欢唱歌，但是你还是加入了唱诗班。到底你想干什么？

sentences.chinese: 在街对面的一扇窗户里，一位少年吹着长笛，附和着唱诗班的歌声。

sentences.chinese: 这茶有淡淡的菊花味。

sentences.chinese: 他用菊花的花瓣来喂它，还照料它的伤口，直到它康复能够飞翔。

name: conclusive
trans: 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的

sentences.english: Her attorneys claim there is no conclusive evidence that any murders took place.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师们声称没有任何发生过谋杀的确凿证据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的； 最后的； 决定性的
detailed_translations.english: showing that something is definitely true

name: roadway
trans: 道路；路面；车行道；铁路的路基

sentences.english: Marks in the roadway seem to indicate that he skidded taking a sharp turn.
sentences.chinese: 从车道上的痕迹看，他似乎在急转弯时打滑了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道路；路面；车行道；铁路的路基
detailed_translations.english: the part of the road used by vehicles

sentences.english: Children used to learn by repetition.
sentences.chinese: 过去小孩子是通过背诵来学习的。

detailed_translations.english: doing or saying the same thing many times

sentences.english: Oil is refined to remove naturally occurring impurities.
sentences.chinese: 油经过提炼去除天然生成的杂质。

detailed_translations.english: When a substance is refined, it is made pure by having all other substances removed from it

sentences.english: The difference in quality was immediately apparent .
sentences.chinese: 质量的差异显而易见。

sentences.english: He left suddenly, for no apparent reason .
sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，他突然离开了。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: Helicopters have been upgraded and modernized.
sentences.chinese: 直升机已经升级并且装上现代化设备。

detailed_translations.english: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

sentences.english: rose petals
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花瓣

sentences.english: The flower has seven petals.
sentences.chinese: 这种花有七片花瓣。

detailed_translations.english: one of the coloured parts of a flower that are shaped like leaves

sentences.chinese: 他们同意和巴西合作进行一个保护热带雨林的项目。

sentences.english: I advised my client to cooperate fully with the police.
sentences.chinese: 我建议我的当事人要全力与警方配合。

detailed_translations.english: to work with someone else to achieve something that you both want

sentences.english: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.chinese: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

detailed_translations.english: to work together with a person or group in order to achieve something, especially in science or art

sentences.english: Instead, we should be articulating guidelines that answer consistently the questions: Who should we support in the Middle East?
sentences.chinese: 而我们应该作为回答这一系列一致问题的清晰指向标。 例如，“在中东我们应该支持谁？”

sentences.english: Peel and dice the potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯去皮并切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables

the skin of some fruits and vegetables, especially the thick skin of fruits such as oranges, which you do not eat

sentences.english: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.chinese: 这些卵很快孵化成幼虫。

detailed_translations.english: a young insect with a soft tube-shaped body, which will later become an insect with wings

name: satin
trans: 光滑的；绸缎做的；似缎的

sentences.english: a red satin ribbon
sentences.chinese: 红缎带

detailed_translations.english: a type of cloth that is very smooth and shiny

detailed_translations.chinese: 光滑的；绸缎做的；似缎的
detailed_translations.english: having a smooth shiny surface

sentences.english: The robbers were armed with sawn-off shotguns (= ones that have been made shorter, so the balls go in different directions ) .
sentences.chinese: 抢劫者手持枪管被锯短的猎枪。

detailed_translations.english: a long gun fired from the shoulder, that shoots many small round balls at one time, used especially for killing birds or animals

sentences.english: He stubbed his toe (= hurt it by kicking it against something ) on a rock.
sentences.chinese: 他的脚趾踢到一块石头上受了伤。

detailed_translations.english: one of the five movable parts at the end of your foot

sentences.english: ...their stepfather, Baron Michael Distemple.
sentences.chinese: …他们的继父迈克尔• 迪斯坦普尔男爵

sentences.english: drug barons
sentences.chinese: 大毒枭

detailed_translations.english: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British nobility or of a rank of European nobility

sentences.english: The whisky had been distilled in 1926 and sat quietly maturing until 1987.
sentences.chinese: 这瓶威士忌是1926年被蒸馏的，存放至1987年酿造成熟。

detailed_translations.english: If a liquid such as whisky or water is distilled, it is heated until it changes into steam or vapour and then cooled until it becomes liquid again. This is usually done in order to make it pure.

sentences.english: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
sentences.chinese: 厂区严禁吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed

sentences.english: dark green foliage
sentences.chinese: 墨绿色的叶子

detailed_translations.english: the leaves of a plant

name: mortal
trans: 凡人的；致死的；终有一死的；不共戴天的

sentences.english: Her father’s death reminded her that she was mortal.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的去世让她认识到终有一天她也会死去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凡人的；致死的；终有一死的；不共戴天的
detailed_translations.english: not able to live for ever
a human – used especially when comparing humans with gods,  spirit s  etc

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.english: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.chinese: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer

sentences.english: an indignant reply
sentences.chinese: 愤慨的回复

detailed_translations.chinese: 愤怒的， 愤慨的， 义愤的
detailed_translations.english: angry and surprised because you feel insulted or unfairly treated

name: dispensary
trans: 药房；（学校、兵营或工厂的）诊疗所；防治站

detailed_translations.chinese: 药房；（学校、兵营或工厂的）诊疗所；防治站
detailed_translations.english: a place where medicines are prepared and given out, especially in a hospital

name: impulse
trans: 冲动；[电子] 脉冲；刺激；神经冲动；推动力

sentences.english: a sudden impulse to laugh
sentences.chinese: 突然想笑的冲动

sentences.english: It is the passions which provide the main impulse of music.
sentences.chinese: 激情是音乐创作的主要动力。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong desire to do something without thinking about whether it is a sensible thing to do

name: scarlet
trans: 深红的；鲜红色的；罪孽深重的；淫荡的
猩红色；红衣；绯红色；鲜红色布

sentences.english: The jacket is of scarlet cloth of a very fine weave.
sentences.chinese: 这件夹克是由织法精妙的鲜红色布料做的。

sentences.english: Her scarlet lipstick emphasized the whiteness of her teeth.
sentences.chinese: 她鲜红色的口红更衬出了她牙齿的洁白。

sentences.english: Nay, we might have judged that such a child's mother must needs be a scarlet woman, and a worthy type of her of Babylon!
sentences.chinese: 不，我们满可以判断，这样一个孩子的母亲，应该是一个鲜红色的女人，而且要当之无愧是个巴比伦式的女人④。

detailed_translations.english: bright red

sentences.english: It sounds like the singing of lark birds.
sentences.chinese: 这歌声就像百灵鸟一样清脆。

sentences.english: Only the little lark never sang.
sentences.chinese: 不过这只百灵鸟从来不歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a small brown singing bird with long pointed wings

sentences.english: Her boss humiliated her in front of all her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她的老板在所有同事面前羞辱了她。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel ashamed or stupid, especially when other people are present

name: concern
trans: 关系；关心；关心的事；忧虑

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

sentences.english: Chickens and geese roam freely in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 鸡和鹅在后院随意溜达。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t let your children roam the streets .
sentences.chinese: 你不应该让孩子在街上游荡。

detailed_translations.english: to walk or travel, usually for a long time, with no clear purpose or direction

name: insider
trans: 内部的人，会员；熟悉内情者

sentences.english: an insider’s view of the way that a Japanese company works
sentences.chinese: 业内人士对日本公司运作方式的看法

detailed_translations.chinese: 内部的人，会员；熟悉内情者

sentences.chinese: 三个男孩儿把他们的冰球装备扔到山顶上，然后试着沿小路往上爬，但雨夹雪已经令山坡变得更加的滑，而且没有任何可以抓住的东西。

trans: 虔诚的；敬神的；可嘉的；尽责的

sentences.chinese: 他是个文静、虔诚的人。

detailed_translations.english: having strong religious beliefs, and showing this in the way you behave

name: fling
trans: 掷，抛；嘲笑；使陷入；轻蔑地投射；猛动

sentences.chinese: 他把盒子扔进河里。

sentences.chinese: 民众欢呼着把帽子抛向空中。

sentences.chinese: 阿尔勒的一大片古罗马遗迹

detailed_translations.english: the parts of something that are left after the rest has been destroyed or has disappeared

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

sentences.english: Northbound traffic will have to be diverted onto minor roads.
sentences.chinese: 北行车辆将不得不绕次要道路行驶。

sentences.english: The war diverted people's attention away from the economic situation.
sentences.chinese: 战争把民众的注意力从经济状况上移开了。

name: overflow
trans: 充满，洋溢；泛滥；超值；溢值

sentences.chinese: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

sentences.chinese: 河水漫堤了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 淹没， 从…中溢出， 多得无法容纳
detailed_translations.english: if a river, lake, or container overflows, it is so full that the liquid or material inside flows over its edges

detailed_translations.english: the amount of something or the number of people that cannot be contained in a place because it is already full

name: curry
trans: 用咖喱烧，给…加咖喱粉；梳刷；鞭打

sentences.english: All the cars are tested for defects before they leave the factory.
sentences.chinese: 所有汽车在出厂前都经过品质检验。

sentences.english: a genetic defect

歇斯底里的；癔病的；亢奋的

sentences.english: THE treatment, in the early 1880s, of an Austrian hysteric called Anna O is generally regarded as the beginning of talking-it-through as a form of therapy.
sentences.chinese: 在19世纪八十年代早期，对一个名为安娜·奥（Anna O）的澳大利亚癔病患者的治疗被认为是谈话治疗法（译者注：弗洛伊德称之为宣泄疗法）成为一种治疗手段的开端。

sentences.english: He tried hypnotism with his hysteric and neurotic patients, but gradually discarded the practice.
sentences.chinese: 他试图用催眠疗法去治疗患有歇斯底里症和神经质的病人，但后来他却逐步地摒弃了这种疗法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 癔病患者；歇斯底里患者

sentences.chinese: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.chinese: 同意给该岛的进出口特许权

sentences.chinese: 这种骑乘不适合紧张型性格的人。

sentences.chinese: 显示美军部署的地图

sentences.chinese: 双方都没有表露出丝毫妥协的意思。

sentences.chinese: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

sentences.chinese: 海洛因瘾君子

sentences.chinese: 你真是个淘气鬼！瞧你干了些什么！

sentences.chinese: 总统选择了忠诚的支持者到他的内阁服务。

sentences.chinese: 每年国情咨文都被内阁和幕僚们作为我们提出新政策思路的一个组织工具，然后我们努力下功夫，让它们以最佳方式呈现在人们面前。

detailed_translations.english: the politicians with important positions in a government who meet to make decisions or advise the leader of the government

sentences.chinese: 三周前，发现癌已扩散到了他的肝脏。

sentences.chinese: 大多数吸烟的人都是在十几岁时开始吸的。

sentences.chinese: 身为记者，他已经声名鹊起。

sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯特别留意把她加进来。

sentences.chinese: 大型热带椰树园

sentences.chinese: 在5月的选举中，选民普遍排斥极右政党。

sentences.chinese: 1972年，83%的爱尔兰选民赞成加入欧洲共同体。

sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

sentences.chinese: …在苏丹驻扎的利比里亚伊斯兰教军团部队。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of soldiers, especially in ancient Rome

sentences.english: It’s our job to establish the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.english: There is no cause for alarm.
sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.english: My father fought for the Nationalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

sentences.chinese: 海绵橡胶床垫

sentences.chinese: 冰冷的世界从桨上摇落。

sentences.chinese: 轰鸣的桨击中了船上碗柜上的粗糙键盘。

sentences.chinese: 苏晨从来没有想明白，是什么驱使她在最后一刻抓住了一条船桨。

sentences.english: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.chinese: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.english: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.chinese: 中国古人说蒜能延寿。

name: volt
trans: 伏特（电压单位）；环骑；闪避

sentences.english: That is one electron volt.
sentences.chinese: 就是一单位的电子伏特。

sentences.english: If I multiply these two, what is the coulomb times a volt?
sentences.chinese: 如果我把这两个乘起来，库仑乘以伏特是多少？

sentences.chinese: 房间里唯一的美国人

sentences.chinese: 格里菲思是此次撞车事故唯一的幸存者。

sentences.chinese: 他的脚掌上沾满了泥巴。

sentences.chinese: 她鞋子的鞋底

sentences.chinese: “十四分钟，”克里斯瞥了一眼手表说道。

detailed_translations.english: a quick or secret look at something

detailed_translations.chinese: 窥视；慢慢露出，出现；吱吱叫

name: navigate
trans: 驾驶，操纵；使通过；航行于

sentences.english: The river is too dangerous to navigate.
sentences.chinese: 这河道太危险，不适宜航行。
